title: I ara, també fa gols
creator: webmaster@elpuntavui.cat (Carles González)
content: Lamine Yamal continua fent passes endavant. L’atacant de 17 anys ja és un referent al Barça, i també en clau de seleccions, en el combinat estatal, però té marge de creixement, evidentment, ja que encara és juvenil de segon any. I, en aquests primers compassos de campanya, en aquest Barça de Hansi Flick, se li estan veient aspectes nous en el joc. El més important, ja que és el que fa la diferència en el futbol, és que està marcant gols. Ahir, a Montilivi, en va fer dos, per encarrilar la victòria (1-4) del conjunt blaugrana contra el Girona. Així, amb el doblet, n’acumula tres en la lliga, en només cinc jornades. El curs passat, en els 37 partits que va disputar, 22 com a titular, en va anotar cinc. També fa gols, doncs, el davanter de la Rocafonda, cosa que, irremeiablement, el situarà, si manté l’eficiència, en una dimensió nova com a futbolista. I tot fa pensar que Lamine Yamal en continuarà marcant. Ja en marcava al planter i en celebrarà, com ha començat a fer, amb els grans. “Acostuma a fer l’última passada i que hagi marcat em posa molt content”, va dir Flick al final de l’enfrontament, conscient que Lamine Yamal s’ha de destapar en aquest sentit per continuar millorant. El dorsal 19 va ser el millor jugador del matx a Girona. Determinant, seus van ser el 0-1 i el 0-2. El primer, el va aconseguir després de pispar la pilota a David López en la sortida, fruit de la pressió alta, i resolent amb suficiència davant de Gazzaniga; el segon,...

title: “Podríem haver fet un o dos gols més, però estic molt content”
creator: webmaster@elpuntavui.cat (C.G)
content: Hansi Flick estava radiant, després d’una altra actuació convincent, amb golejada, protagonitzada pel conjunt que orienta. “Hauríem pogut marcar un o dos gols més, però estic molt content amb l’actuació de l’equip”, va assegurar el tècnic. “Ara tenim confiança i es pot veure en tots els partits que hem jugat. Estem compactes i units sempre sense pilota. I amb pilota, tenim qualitat per jugar i generar ocasions”, va indicar l’alemany, que va donar valor a la pressió alta que efectua l’equip, un dels trets més característics d’aquest Barça. “Hem estat molt ben posats, centrats en la pressió. Sabíem que si els deixàvem espai, ens ficaríem en problemes”, va expressar. “Hem merescut la victòria”, va reiterar el preparador, qüestionat per l’arbitratge, que va tenir com a punts de controvèrsia el penal a favor del Girona que l’àrbitre va tirar enrere advertit pel VAR i la vermella a Ferran Torres: “Em centro en el meu equip. Si passa alguna cosa, hi ha el VAR. No soc un entrenador que busca excuses amb els àrbitres. Tenen una feina dura.” Proves a Dani Olmo Flick també confirmar que el canvi d’Olmo va ser per molèsties. “Hem d’esperar a demà [per avui] a les proves i veurem. Esperem que no sigui gran cosa”, va dir.

title: Piastri esvaeix el domini de Leclerc i venç a Bakú
creator: webmaster@elpuntavui.cat (J.m)
content: L’australià Oscar Piastri (McLaren) va diluir el domini que havia exercit durant la resta del cap de setmana el monegasc Charles Leclerc (Ferrari) i va guanyar al circuit urbà de Bakú el Gran Premi de l’Azerbaidjan, la dissetena cursa del mundial de Fórmula 1. El podi el van completar Leclerc i el britànic George Russell (Mercedes), que es va trobar amb un regal inesperat quan Carlos Sainz (Ferrari) i Checo Pérez (Red Bull), que lluitaven per la tercera plaça, es van estavellar a la tanca a dues voltes del final. El madrileny va tancar a destemps el mexicà quan tenia la posició perduda. La cursa es va acabar amb el cotxe de seguretat a la pista. Verstappen, encara líder, va ser cinquè i encadena set grans premis sense guanyar. Lando Norris (McLaren) va ser quart i li esgarrapa tres punts. Red Bull perd pistonada en el mundial i mana McLaren.

title: L’Open Day, un invent a copiar
creator: webmaster@elpuntavui.cat (Xavi Ballesteros)
content: La Ciutat Esportiva de Blanes ha viscut aquest cap de setmana una cosa que alguns esports i competicions acabaran copiant. L’invent és que en un sol espai hi ha habilitades fins a 6 pistes de joc per jugar al mateix moment, es poden veure tots els equips de la mateixa categoria preferent tant en infantil com en cadet i júnior masculí i femení. En resum: 96 equips i 48 partits en només 36 hores amb 1.500 participants. Qualsevol entrenador/a, aficionat/da o jugador/a es pot fer una idea del nivell de les diferents categories perquè pot veure tothom. A més, per evitar que hi hagi joves que es quedin sense doblar en dues categories, la FCBQ no fa coincidir clubs en els mateixos horaris. Enguany, a més, s’ha assolit que no hi hagi cap partit ajornat com havia passat amb clubs que, com per exemple l’Spar Girona, podien tenir júniors amb el primer equip, o d’altres com el Segle XXI, que tenien compromisos. També està controlada una situació que podria provocar descontentament: que els clubs que juguen com a locals a Blanes, que és una pista neutral, perdessin l’avantatge de tenir el partit al seu pavelló. Però això la FCBQ ho va compensar i qui en aquesta edició ha jugat com a local, el curs vinent ho farà com a visitant. En definitiva, un gran encert. Per acabar-ho d’adobar s’ha arribat a un acord amb Panini i els infantils i cadets poden aconseguir els cromos i els àlbums dels seus equips. Un somni pels que hem fet col·leccions sempre de Panini de petits.

title: A comic novel about Hitler and his beloved dog Blondi
content: Eugene Shafir didn’t intend to write a book about Nazis. It was an idea that came to him during the COVID-19 lockdowns, bunkered down in Melbourne, much like Hitler bunkered down in Berlin for the last six months of his life. Shafir is a second generation Holocaust survivor. “My father, Arthur, who lost his whole family except for one sister to the Nazis, never spoke about what he went through to the children. By the same token, we didn’t push him to talk,” Shafir said. “But we felt it. Little things. He ate very fast and would hector us to finish everything on our plate. His favourite phrase was ‘You don’t know where your next meal’s coming from.’” Shafir’s book, , has been described as a comic novel. It’s dedicated to Arthur. And according to Shafir, though it has many comedic moments, “it deals with grim subjects.” It follows Hitler and his beloved dog Blondi. The official story goes that Hitler wasn’t sure his cyanide pill would work so he gave a capsule to Blondi. It worked. Blondi died and Hitler committed suicide the next day. In Shafir’s version of the story, the dog kills the dictator. When launching the book at a WIZO function earlier this year, Shafir was asked whether his father would be okay with a book that includes jokes about the Holocaust. In his response, Shafir noted that the Holocaust is becoming sanitised. “I agonised on how to deal with the Holocaust in the book,” he said. “I had no intention of trivialising the Holocaust but I have no problem with...

title: Celebrating 90 years of Leonard Cohen
content: Monsieur Camembert has been performing a show about legendary musician Leonard Cohen for almost 20 years. But the music group is very excited about their upcoming performance – celebrating the Jewish songwriter/poet’s 90th birthday. It’s the first time in four years that the show will be performed, featuring more guest singers and instrumentalists than ever before. Monsieur Camembert formed in 1998. According to vocalist and guitarist Yaron Hallis, it was formed to appeal to the broadest cross-section of humanity, with “a particular interest in mixing gypsy and Jewish music with other styles to create something potent and original and exciting.” Hallis said that they have always played Cohen’s . “It became a real crowd favourite and probably our most requested song,” he explained. “So, this was the genesis of us wanting to put together an entire evening of Leonard Cohen music. All too often Cohen music gets branded ‘depressing’ so we were inspired to showcase how uplifting and entertaining it can be.” The band enjoyed sold-out shows in 2017, 2018 and 2019 at Sydney’s City Recital Hall, and a performance at the Sydney Opera House in 2020. This year, they’re bringing the show to the State Theatre, featuring a total of 19 musicians, as well as a 50-piece choir including the Sydney Jewish Chorale Society. Hallis said every artist involved brings their lifetime of performance and life experience to the stage. “All these different styles and musical influences impact in such a...

title: شكر للمعزين في وفاة الوالد محمد فال ولد بوبكر
creator: Neda
content: بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم قال جل من قائل: {مِنَ المُؤْمِنِينَ رِجَالٌ صَدَقُوا مَا عَاهَدُوا اللهَ عَلَيْهِ فَمِنْهُمْ مَنْ قَضَى نَحْبَهُ وَمِنْهُمْ مَنْ يَنْتَظِرُ وَمَا بَدَّلُوا تَبْدِيلًا} (الأحزاب: 23). شهدت الساعات الأولى من صباح الخميس 8 ربيع الأول 1446 هـ، الموافق 12 سبتمبر 2024، رحيل الوالد المنعم محمد فال ولد بوبكر عن هذه الدنيا الفانية، وهي مصيبة عظيمة، وخطب جلل.. وإن العين لتدمع، وإن القلب ليحزن ولا نقول إلا ما يرضي الرب، إنا لله وإنا إليه راجعون. لقد كان الفقيد أحد رجالات الدولة وخدامها الذين عملوا بصمت بعيدا عن الأضواء، ومثلوا بصدق نموذجا لأولئك الذين تميزوا بالأمانة والتفاني في خدمة وطنهم، وذلك من خلال عدة مواقع ظل خلالها جميعا مثالا ونموذجا للموظف المخلص، القوي الأمين، المؤمن بوطنه مهما كان حجم التقصير والظلم أحيانا في حقه. إن أهم تكريم لهذا النوع من الرجال هو تلك الهبة التي عبرت عنها الأعداد الكبيرة من المعزين والمواسين للأسرة في مصابها الجلل، والذين وصلوا من كل مناطق البلاد، واتصلوا عبر مختلف وسائل التواصل. إننا وبهذه المناسبة لنتقدم بالشكر الجزيل لكل أولئك الذين حرصوا على زيارة المنزل لتقديم التعزية، وأولئك الذين دونوا وكتبوا، وكذلك الذين اتصلوا، أو نشروا بيانات تعزية.. لقد كان كل ذلك دعما ومؤازرة لنا في تلك اللحظات العصيبة، فجزاكم الله خيرا، وتقبل منكم صالح الأعمال، ولا أراكم مكروهاً في عزيزٍ لديكم، وغفر لأمواتكم ولأموات المسلمين والمسلمات جميعاً. اللهم أجرنا في مصيبتنا واخلفنا خيرا منها، اللَّهُمَّ، اغْفِرْ له وَارْحَمْهُ، وَاعْفُ عنْه وَعَافِهِ، وَأَكْرِمْ نُزُلَهُ، وَوَسِّعْ مُدْخَلَهُ، وَاغْسِلْهُ بمَاءٍ وَثَلْجٍ...

title: A larger than life tale of Jewish resilience
content: Diane von Furstenberg, the designer of the iconic wrap dress, was born 18 months after her mother, Lily Halfin, was liberated from Auschwitz. That fact shaped everything in her life and made her the woman she is – but it was later in life, while being honoured at the Anti-Defamation League gala at the Pierre Hotel, where she publicly came out as the daughter of a survivor, that its full weight really struck her. She was suddenly profoundly aware that she was a Jewish woman. Diane von Furstenberg, or DVF, as many know her, recounts that fateful moment in Disney’s , which paints an incredible, comprehensive, lush and loving portrait of the woman who changed the fashion world with her deceptively simple designs. Since the 1970s, when it first hit the market, the wrap dress has been a sort of armour – fitting its wearer with comfort, ease and femininity, a certain sexiness even. It’s a dress to step into the world during your first job interview or fancy outing. It’s a dress that women – even Oprah Winfrey in her early journalism days – saved their salaries for. It’s Furstenberg’s beginnings that she credits with her success. She was her mother’s miracle baby. Halfin was told she could not carry a child to term after barely surviving the death camp, emaciated and weak. Her mother, Diane’s grandmother, fed her, like a wounded bird, a little at a time. And there, less than two years later, was Diane: her biggest joy, her ultimate revenge, Jewish continuity in the face of those who...

title: A unique take on disability, multiculturalism and young grief
content: Jewish comedian Jeremy Moses intends to bring his unique take on disability, multiculturalism and young grief to the Sydney Fringe Festival in September and the Melbourne Fringe Festival in October. In Sydney, his show is titled . Moses describes “bad slam poetry” as “a silly art form developed in the deepest depths of Victoria’s many lockdowns”. Moses show will tell tales of growing up legally blind, his big, diverse family and his beret-topped alter ego. Born with a rare genetic condition affecting his eyesight and coordination, Moses said he intends to share the trials and tribulations of visual impairment, the often-funny difficulties of disability and the awkward misadventures that continue to plague his adulthood. Discussing his upcoming shows, Moses said, “I’m so excited to open up about my disability in new and creative ways. It’s something I’m learning to embrace as a comedian and performer. I take comfort in being seen and using my story to celebrate the strengths of living with a disability. “I’m performing my solo show in Sydney for the first time, to the fresh eyes of friends and family. It could make for some awkward family dinners if they disapprove. I grew up in Bondi, so this feels like coming home, to a home I can no longer afford.” In Melbourne, Moses will team up with Emilie Biggar for their comedy performance . Biggar was born deaf/hard of hearing. Commenting on the show Moses said, “My Melbourne show is my first time performing as a duo. She’s deaf and...

title: Jewish actor Rubin Matters to understudy leads in Beauty and the Beast
content: The tale as old as time, has returned to Melbourne and has dazzled audiences with its stunning production including cutting-edge technology, Broadway style dance numbers and enchanting melodies. Based on the much-loved 1991 animated Disney film, the story of how book-loving Belle fell in love with a cursed Beast features an all-Australian cast including Shubshri Kandiah as Belle and Brendan Xavier as Beast. Produced by Disney Theatrical Group ( ), this new production of brings back members of the original creative team from the Broadway musical to reimagine the story. Olivier Award nominee Matt West directs and choreographs, leading a team that includes original Jewish composer Alan Menken, lyricist Tim Rice, book writer Linda Woolverton, scenic designer Stan Meyer and lighting designer Natasha Katz. In the 1980s, Menken, a brilliant composer, worked alongside Jewish lyricist Howard Ashman to develop the music for the Disney film. Ashman and Menken also helped write the music for and , along with Tim Rice. Sadly, Ashman did not live to see the premier of and , as he died at the age of 40 from complications from AIDS. Ashman battled with AIDS throughout the process of creating and much of . The closing credits to 1991’s were dedicated to him – “To our friend Howard, Who gave a mermaid her voice and a beast his soul, We will be forever grateful.” Ashman’s battle with AIDS is speculated to have inspired the music he was creating. Bill Condon, director of 2017’s told the media:...

title: 양수 터진 임신부 6시간 만에 치료...병원 75곳서 거절
creator: 장한별
content: 양수 터진 임신부 6시간 만에 치료...병원 75곳서 거절 충북 청주에서 양수가 터진 임신 25주 차 임신부가 병원을 찾지 못해 구급차에서 대기하다 6시간 만에 치료를 받았습니다. 충북소방본부 등에 따르면, 지난 14일 오전 11시 25분쯤 신고를 받고 출동한 구급대원들이 충북뿐 아니라 서울과 제주 등 병원 75곳의 문을 두드렸지만 "산부인과 의사가 없다"는 등의 이유로 환자 이송을 거부했습니다. 해당 임신부는 6시간이 지나서야 청주의 한 산부인과에서 치료를 받았습니다. 이마저도, '아이가 잘못돼도 병원 책임을 묻지 않겠다'는 취지의 서류에 서명한 뒤에야 가능했던 것으로 전해졌습니다. 장한별 기자 (good_star@yna.co.kr) #구급차_뺑뺑이 #임신부 연합뉴스TV 기사문의 및 제보 : 카톡/라인 jebo23 (끝)

title: রংপুরে সরকারি গুদাম থেকে কোটি টাকার চাল-গম উধাও, খাদ্য কর্মকর্তাও লাপাত্তা
creator: লিয়াকত আলী বাদল, রংপুর
content: রংপুর সদর সরকারি খাদ্য গুদামে থাকা কোটি টাকা মূল্যের চাল ও গম আত্মসাৎ করার অভিযোগে ওসি এলএসডি (খাদ্য গুদাম কর্মকর্তা) কানিজ ফাতেমার বিরুদ্ধে রংপুর মেট্রোপলিটন কোতয়ালি থানায় একটি মামলা দায়ের করা হয়েছে। সদর উপজেলা খাদ্য কর্মকর্তা নিখিল চন্দ্র সরকার বাদী হয়ে এই মামলা দায়ের করেছেন। বিষয়টি নিশ্চিত করেছেন জেলা খাদ্য নিয়ন্ত্রক অন্তরা মল্লিক। ঘটনা জানাজানি হওয়ার পরপরই গা ঢাকা দিয়েছেন খাদ্য গুদাম কর্মকর্তা কানিজ ফাতেমা। জেলা খাদ্য নিয়ন্ত্রক ও সদর এলএসডির একাধিক কর্মকর্তা সূত্রে জানা গেছে, কানিজ ফাতেমা রংপুর সদর এলএসডি গুদামের প্রধান কর্মকর্তা হিসেবে দেড় বছরেও বেশি সময় ধরে দায়িত্ব পালন করে আসছিলেন। এই সময়ের মধ্যে তিনি কোটি টাকা মূল্যের চাল ও গম কালোবাজারে বিক্রি করে পুরো টাকা আত্মসাৎ করেন। বিষয়টি দীর্ঘদিন ধরে তিনি ও খাদ্য গুদামের অন্য কর্মকর্তারা ধামাচাপা দিয়ে আসছিলেন। সরকারি খাদ্য গুদামের চাল ও গম লোপাট করার ঘটনা বেশ কিছুদিন ধরে কানাঘুষা চলে আসলেও ওসি এলএসডি হিসেবে কানিজ ফাতেমা বিভিন্নভাবে ম্যানেজ করে ধামাচাপা দিয়ে আসছিলেন। এদিকে সদর উপজেলা খাদ্য গুদাম কর্মকর্তা হিসেবে কানিজ ফাতেমাকে কুড়িগ্রামে বদলি করা হয় তার স্থলে দায়িত্ব পান নুরন্নবী বাবু। কিন্তু বদলির আদেশ পাওয়ার পরও কানিজ ফাতেমা তার দায়িত্ব হস্তান্তরে গড়িমসি শুরু করলে জেলা খাদ্য নিয়ন্ত্রক অন্তরা মল্লিকের সন্দেহ হয়। তিনি গত ২ সেপ্টেম্বর রংপুর সদর এলএসডির খাদ্য গুদামের খাদ্য মজুতের পরিমাণসহ সার্বিক বিষয় তদন্ত করার জন্য তারাগঞ্জ উপজেলা খাদ্য নিয়ন্ত্রক রইছ উদ্দিনকে আহ্বায়ক পীরগঞ্জ উপজেলা খাদ্য নিয়ন্ত্রক অমুল্য সরকারকে সদস্য সচিব করে ৫ সদস্য বিশিষ্ট তদন্ত কমিটি গঠন করে দেন। তদন্ত কমিটি গুদামের...

title: Пресс-конференция властей по поводу покушения на Дональда Трампа
content: Шериф Палм-Бич Рик Брэдшоу демонстрирует на проходящей в эти минуты пресс-конференции PBSO изображение двух рюкзаков, прикрепленных к забору на границе собственности поля для гольфа, где готовилось покушение на Дональда Трампа . Главные тезисы озвученные на пресс-конференции: Шериф Брэдшоу: ✔ Секретная служба сообщила о выстрелах и мы немедленно оцепили территорию. ✔ Свидетель сфотографировал автомобиль, на котором скрылся подозреваемый. ✔ Мы обнаружили автомобиль, направлявшийся в округ Мартин. Шериф округа Мартин задержал мужчину. ✔ В кустах, где находился подозреваемый, была найдена винтовка типа АК-47 с прицелом, два рюкзака и камера GoPro. Представитель Секретной службы: ✔ Трамп в безопасности и невредим. Военнослужащий USSS открыл огонь по вооруженному мужчине возле границы собственности, увидев винтовку. ✔ Мы живём в опасные времена. Ответственный спецагент ФБР: ✔ ФБР взяло на себя ведущую роль в расследовании. Государственный прокурор округа Палм-Бич Дэйв Аронберг: ✔ Наши прокуроры в настоящее время готовят ордера и ходатайство о предварительном заключении, чтобы оставить его под стражей, но могут последовать федеральные обвинения.

title: 민주 "김 여사 파렴치한 활동 재개...가야 할 곳은 특검 조사실"
content: 더불어민주당은 15일 김건희 여사의 연이은 공개 행보를 겨냥해 "들끓는 민심은 아랑곳 않는 파렴치한 활동 재개"라며 "지금 김 여사가 가야 할 곳은 특검 조사실"이라고 비판했다. 조승래 수석대변인은 이날 서면 브리핑에서 "온갖 부패와 추문의 몸통으로 지목되는 김 여사가 추석을 기점으로 노골적인 광폭 행보를 재개했다"고 밝혔다. 그러면서 "명품백 수수, 대통령실·관저 이전 공사, 공천 개입 의혹 등 무수한 의혹 앞에 선 김 여사가 국민께 드리는 한가위 선물이 '파렴치한 활동 재개'냐"고 따져 물었다. 조 수석대변인은 "김 여사는 마포대교 순찰, 대통령 추석 인사에 이어 오늘 장애 아동 시설을 찾았고, 윤 대통령도 없이 별도로 독자 일정을 소화했다"며 "아무런 공식적 권한도 없는 대통령 부인이 스스로 대통령과 동격이라고 여기는 것인지 황당하다"고 지적했다. 이어 "기세등등한 김 여사의 모습에 국민은 기가 막힌다. 대통령실 역시 앞으로 김 여사가 더 적극적인 활동을 이어갈 계획이라고 한다"며 "대통령 부부는 '대통령이 둘이냐' '권력서열 1위가 김 여사냐'는 국민의 분노가 두렵지도 않으냐"고 했다. 그는 "민주당은 국민께 약속한 대로 김건희 특검법을 반드시 관철해내겠다"며 "특검을 포함한 모든 수단을 동원해 김 여사를 법의 심판대에 세우고 대한민국 정의를 바로 세우겠다"고 덧붙였다. 뉴시스> [c 세계일보 & Segye.com, 무단전재 및 재배포 금지]

title: Cristian Barrios, sensación en la temporada de América de Cali
creator: Guillermo Puerto
content: ¡Volvió a hacerlo ! Segundo partido consecutivo abriendo el marcador para y unos números de lujo en el semestre. El talentoso mediocampista continúa brillando con luz propia en el cuadro escarlata. Conocido por su capacidad de marcar la diferencia en momentos clave, volvió a demostrar su talento al abrir el marcador contra Deportivo Pereira. Aprovechando una perfecta asistencia de Adrián Ramos a los 10 minutos, supo definir a placer para vencer la resistencia del arquero Salvador Ichazo. AMÉ 🆚 PER [1-0] |11’ ⏱| ⚽ ¡GOOOOOOOOOL DE AMÉÉÉRICA DE CALI! CRISTIAN BARRIOS ABRE EL MARCADOR EN VILLAVO TRAS UN GRAN PASE DEL CAPI ADRIÁN RAMOS. 👹🇦🇹 — América de Cali (@AmericadeCali) En un semestre que ha sido notable para él, Barrios ha mostrado una consistencia impresionante. Con 3 goles y 4 asistencias en 8 partidos, su impacto en el equipo no pasa desapercibido. La habilidad de Cristian para definir en los primeros minutos ha sido crucial para establecer una ventaja temprana, y su precisión en el área rival demuestra su madurez y comprensión del juego a una edad temprana. Cristian Barrios ha demostrado ser un jugador versátil y confiable para el América. Su capacidad para abrir el marcador subraya su habilidad técnica y capacidad para mantener la calma bajo presión. Está consolidándose como pieza clave, contribuyendo tanto en el aspecto ofensivo como en la construcción de jugadas. El rendimiento de Cristian Barrios en el América de Cali es una señal alentadora...

title: Centro de Xalapa permanecerá cerrado; Grito de Independencia será el último del gobernador
content: / domingo 15 de septiembre de 2024 Itzel Molina / Diario de Xalapa XALAPA, Ver.- Este domingo 15 de septiembre se realizará el último festejo del Grito de Independencia de Cuitláhuac García Jiménez como gobernador de Veracruz, por lo que el primer cuadro de Xalapa, donde se encuentra Palacio de Gobierno, permanecerá cerrado y con amplia seguridad . Esta será la primera vez que en este festejo patrio se cuente con la presencia de quien sustituirá al titular del Ejecutivo estatal, ya que, de acuerdo a la agenda previa, estará presente Rocío Nahle García, próxima gobernadora de Veracruz y primera mujer en asumir este cargo. Local Avanzan los preparativos para el Grito de Independencia y la participación de Edén Muñoz en Xalapa Pese a que en otros estados se tienen programadas movilizaciones, en Veracruz los trabajadores del Poder Judicial de la Federación descartaron realizar actos de presencia en la plaza Sebastián Lerdo, frente a Palacio de Gobierno, espacio destinado para este festejo patrio. Los trabajadores anteriormente han realizado marchas y manifestaciones públicas en la plaza Sebastián Lerdo, el Congreso de Veracruz y cerrado la avenida Lázaro Cárdenas, una de las vías de comunicación principales de Xalapa y la cual es el paso para dirigirse hacia Veracruz al sur y la Ciudad de México al norte. De acuerdo con la Dirección de Tránsito del Estado, el centro de la capital del estado permanecerá cerrado todo este domingo y se abrirá mañana 16...

title: Hong Kong’s Autumn Wellness Experience Awaits in the Heart of Stunning Natural Beauty
content: Monday, September 16, 2024 Autumn is the perfect time to explore Hong Kong, where the cool, cozy weather beautifully complements the city’s breathtaking landscapes. This season offers endless opportunities to refresh your mind, body, and soul. Get ready for a revitalizing escape to Hong Kong, where you can enhance your well-being while discovering the hidden gems of this world-renowned wellness destination. Prepare to explore like never before! Looking to get active? The 2024 Hong Kong Cyclothon, the city’s largest cycling event and carnival, is set to deliver an unforgettable experience on 13 October. With 6,000 cyclists from around the globe, the event promises an exciting challenge against the backdrop of Hong Kong’s stunning natural and urban scenery. This year’s edition introduces enhanced routes, taking riders through four tunnels and across three bridges, showcasing incredible views of the city’s natural beauty and iconic Victoria Harbour. The 50- and 32-kilometre rides will conclude at the West Kowloon Cultural District (WKCD), a new highlight for participants and spectators alike. At the WKCD, a vibrant carnival awaits, offering sports and cycling-themed activities, photo opportunities, a local market, yoga, stretching, and dance workshops. Add to that an array of local drinks and delicacies, all set against the mesmerizing backdrop of Victoria Harbour and the city’s famous skyline—making this year’s Cyclothon a must-attend event for both participants and visitors....

title: Baker Mayfield, Buccaneers start 2-0 by holding off Lions
content: Baker Mayfield went 12-of-19 passing for 185 yards with a touchdown throw and a rushing score to lead the Tampa Buccaneers to a 20-16 road win over the Detroit Lions on Sunday. Chris Godwin caught seven passes for 117 yards and a touchdown for the Buccaneers (2-0). Jared Goff went 34-of-55 passing for 307 yards and two interceptions in defeat for the Lions (1-1). Aidan Hutchinson had 4.5 sacks for Detroit, falling one sack short of the franchise record for sacks in a game. Leading by four in the fourth quarter, Tampa Bay stopped the Lions on downs at their 6-yard line with 53 seconds remaining in the game. But Detroit forced a punt and got the ball back with 33 seconds left at the Tampa Bay 44-yard line. The Lions drove as far as the Tampa Bay 26 with 14 seconds remaining, but three straight incompletions ended the game. Tampa Bay prevailed despite Detroit holding a 463-216 edge in total yards. Trailing 13-9, the Lions took their first lead of the game with 3:26 left in the third quarter on a 1-yard touchdown run by David Montgomery that made it 16-13 Detroit. The run finished off a 12-play, 68-yard drive that saw the Lions register three third-down conversions. Tampa Bay answered right back, driving 70 yards in six plays and grabbing a 20-16 lead on an 11-yard touchdown run by Mayfield. With the game tied at 6-6 in the second quarter, the Buccaneers took the lead with 9:08 until halftime on a 41-yard touchdown pass from Mayfield to Godwin. Tampa Bay established a 6-0 lead...

청주서 또 응급실 뺑뺑이...30대 임신부 병원 75곳에서 거부
content: 충북 청주에서 양수가 터진 30대 임신부가 병원 75곳의 진료 거부 끝에 6시간 만에 병원에 이송된 것으로 드러났다. 15일 충북소방본부에 따르면 전날 오전 11시25분께 충북 청주시 금천동에서 "25주차 임신부의 양수가 터졌다"는 신고가 119상황실에 접수됐다. 당시 임신부 A(30대)씨는 하혈과 함께 반복적 복통, 배뭉침 등의 증상을 보였던 것으로 알려졌다. 출동한 119구급대는 충북, 서울, 인천, 경기, 충남 등 전국의 병원 75곳에 전화 180여통을 걸며 이송 요청을 했으나 "산부인과 의사가 없다"는 이유 등으로 이송 불가 답변을 받았다. 소방 관계자는 "산부인과 진료가 되면서 신생아 중환자실·인큐베이터 시설이 갖춰진 병원을 찾는데 어려움이 컸다"고 설명했다. 충북소방본부는 이날 오후 3시 39분께 비상의료관리상황반을 운영하는 충북도에 병원 섭외 요청을 한 것으로 파악됐다. 119구급대는 충북도의 도움 끝에 신고 접수 6시간 만인 오후 5시32분께 청주의 한 산부인과로 A씨를 이송했다. 현재 A씨는 치료를 받은 뒤 안정을 되찾았다. 뉴시스> [c 세계일보 & Segye.com, 무단전재 및 재배포 금지]

title: Así fue la historia de amor de Eugenio Derbez y Alessandra Rosaldo
content: Eugenio Derbez y Alessandra Rosaldo se han convertido en una de las parejas más estables del medio, tras más de una década de matrimonio , destacando que juntos han formado una familia, al lado de su hija Aitana. PUBLICIDAD Así que aquí te contamos cómo ha sido la historia de amor de las celebridades, a lo largo de los años. La historia de amor de Eugenio Derbez y Alessandra Rosaldo La historia de amor entre las celebridades comenzó en 2005, cuando se conocieron durante la grabación de un episodio especial de la serie “Vecinos”. Aunque era la primera vez que ambos actores participaban en la serie, Alessandra reveló en el programa Tu-Night con Omar Chaparro que ya se conocían de antes , pero fue durante esa grabación que sintieron una conexión especial. Mientras que una entrevista para el programa Hoy hace algunos años, Alessandra explicó que, a pesar de la química que sintieron durante la grabación, su relación romántica no comenzó de inmediato . Según contó, pasaron siete meses antes de volver a verse, ya que ambos estaban enfocados en sus vidas profesionales y personales en ese momento, además de que ambos tenían pareja en ese momento. El romance entre Eugenio y Alessandra se formalizó en 2006, un año después de su primer encuentro en Vecinos . Su relación se consolidó rápidamente, y en 2012, la pareja se casó en una ceremonia elegante en la Ciudad de México. Una publicación compartida por Alessandra Rosaldo (@alexrosaldo) Son padres de una...

title: Suparco gears up to mark World Space Week through series of activities
creator: NEWS WIRE
content: ISLAMABAD - Maintaining its previous traditions, Space and Upper Atmosphere Research Commission (SUPARCO)- the national space agency has planned a series of activities to mark the upcoming World Space Week, to be held from October 04-10. According to an official of SUPARCO, the Space Week will be marked under the theme of using space technology to fight climate change. The SUPARCO has announced various contests for the general public in different categories revolving around the theme. The first category is “Reuse, Reduce, Recycle for Climate Action: Show how small steps can make a BIG difference!” while the second category is, “Planting for a Greener Pakistan’: Let’s work together to plant a sustainable future!”. The third category of the contest is “Space form limited:Video Challenge’: Share your creative ideas on how space technology can help save our planet!”. The students, professionals or climate enthusiasts can participate in the contests to create a better world for future generations. World Space Week is an international celebration of science and technology, and their contribution to the betterment of the human condition. The United Nations General Assembly declared in 1999 that World Space Week will be held each year from October 4-10. These dates commemorate two events including `October 4, 1957: Launch of the first human-made Earth satellite, Sputnik 1, thus opening the way for space exploration’ and the other is `October 10, 1967: the signing of the treaty on...

title: Victoria sube al tercer puesto y Real España se aferra al liderato
creator: EFE
content: Tegucigalpa. – Victoria venció este domingo por 3-2 a Olancho, al cierre de la séptima jornada del torneo Apertura de Honduras, que lidera el Real España con 18 puntos. José Danielo Tobias, Héctor Aranda y Maynor Arzú anotaron los goles que le dieron el triunfo al Victoria, resultado que le valió para colocarse en la tercera posición con 11 unidades. Victoria, bajo el mando del hondureño Salomón Nazar, exportero de la selección hondureña y de la Universidad Nacional Autónoma de Honduras, sumó en casa su tercer triunfo. Olancho, que dirige el hondureño Humberto Rivera, descontó por medio de Alex López y Eddie Hernánde, yse ubicó en la séptima casilla, con siete enteros. La víspera, el líder Real España, que tiene el costarricense Jeaustin Campos en el banquillo, derrotó por 1-0 a Juticalpa, con gol del panameño Carlos Small, y se consolidó en el liderato. Motagua, del argentino hondureño Diego Vázquez, goleó por 3-0 a Génesis. Las anotaciones fueron obra del argentino Droopy Gómez, Rubilio Castillo y Riki Zapata. Marathón, del argentino Hernán Medina, empató 1-1 con Real Sociedad. Ángel Tejeda pueso en ventaja a Marathón, pero Rony Martínez dejó todo igual. Olimpia, último campeón del fútbol hondureño, se impuso el viernes por 3-1 a Universidad Pedagógica. Los Leones del Olimpia ganaron con goles de Jorge Benguché, José Mario Pinto y Edwin Solano. Osmán Rodríguez acortó distancia para los universitarios. Olimpia, que tiene al...

title: اللجنة المكلفة من قبل محافظ لحج تواصل نزولها للاطلاع على محطات الغاز في مديريتي الحوطة وتبن
content: يواصل اعضاء اللجنة المشتركة من السلطة المحلية وفي مقدمتهم مدير عام مكتب الصناعة والتجارة بالمحافظة عبدالرب الجعفري والشركة اليمنية للغاز المكلفة من محافظ محافظة لحج اللواء ركن احمد عبدالله تركي بالنزول الى مواقع محطات الغاز في مديريتي الحوطة وتبن لليوم الرابع على التوالي لحصرها والاطلاع عن قرب على اماكن تواجدها ليتسنى للجنة المكلفة من رفع تقريرها التفصيلي عن تلك المحطات الى المحافظ التركي لاتخاذ لاجراءات اللازمة والحلول المناسبة وذلك بعد الانتهاء من الاعمال المكلفة بها.. الجدير بالذكر فان التوسع والانتشار المتزايد لعدد محطات الغاز في كلا من مديريتي ىالحوطة وتبن محافظة لحج بطريقة عشوائية في الاحياء السكنية وعلى الخطوط العامة وفي الاسواق المكتضة بالناس دون مراعاة الاخطار التي قد تلحق بالضرر الكبير على سلامة حياة المواطنين الساكنين بالقرب من هذه المحطات وبيوتهم ومحلاتهم التجارية وكافة ممتلكاتهم الاخرى.. كما ان كثرة شكاوي المواطنين الى الجهات المختصة بالمحافظة بهذا الشان ازدادت وارتفعت الاصوات استشعارا بالخطر والخوف مما حصل في انفجار محطتي المنصورة بالعاصمة عدن قبل حوالي اسبوعين الأمر الذي دفع بالجهات المسؤولة الى سرعة اتخاذ القرار اللازم بهذا الشان بما يخدم المصلحة العامة. *من صالح الجرداني

title: పరపతి.. అధోగతి
creator: bharath kumar
content: ప్రాథమిక సహకార పరపతి సంఘాలు కట్టుతప్పుతున్నాయి. రైతులకు అండగా నిలిచి పురోగమనంలో ముందుకు తీసుకువెళ్లాల్సిన సొసైటీల్లో అవినీతి మరకలు కనిపిస్తున్నాయి. నిధుల దుర్వినియోగం, రైతుల రుణమాఫీల్లో అవకతవకలు, రైతుల వివరాలు బ్యాంకులకు సమర్పించడంలో తీవ్ర నిర్లక్ష్యం చేస్తుండగా, మరోవైపు వాటాధనాల విషయంలో అనేక ఆరోపణలు వెల్లువెత్తుతున్నాయి. ఇందుకు ఇటీవల జరిగిన పలు ఘటనలే నిదర్శనంగా నిలుస్తున్నాయి. మల్యాలకు చెందిన రైతు రూ.లక్ష లోన్‌ తీసుకుంటే రూ.2లక్షల పైన నమోదై ఉండడం, జైనకు చెందిన మరొక రైతు గతంలో రుణమాఫీ జరిగి ఎన్‌వోసీ సైతం తీసుకున్న లోన్‌ కట్టలేదని రికార్డుల్లో ఉండడం అనుమానాలకు తావిస్తుండగా, రైతుల్లో ఆగ్రహావేశాలు వ్యక్తమవుతున్నాయి. జగిత్యాల, సెప్టెంబర్‌ 15 (నమస్తే తెలంగాణ): జగిత్యాల జిల్లా వ్యాప్తంగా 52 సంఘాలు, 17 కేడీసీసీ బ్యాంకు శాఖలు ఉన్నాయి. వీటి పరిధిలో వేలాది మంది రైతులు సభ్యులుగా ఉన్నారు. వీరు వందల కోట్ల రుణం పొందారు. ఈ సంఘాల ద్వారా రైతులకు, రైతు ఉత్పత్తులకు సేవలందిస్తున్నారు. మొత్తంగా 270కి పైగా ధాన్యం కొనుగోలు కేంద్రాల ద్వారా ప్రతి సీజన్‌లో ధాన్యం సేకరిస్తున్నారు. ఒకానొక దశలో 3లక్షల మెట్రిక్‌ టన్నులకు పైగా ధాన్యం కొనుగోళ్లు జరిపి 671 కోట్ల చెల్లింపులు జరిపిన చరిత్ర సంఘాలకు ఉన్నది. అయితే, ఇటీవలి కాలంలో వరుసగా సింగిల్‌ విండోలపై ఆరోపణలు వినిపిస్తున్నాయి. సింగిల్‌ విండోల్లో వాటాధనం చెల్లింపుల విషయంలో అనేక అనుమానాలు వ్యక్తమవుతున్నాయి. సంఘంలో సభ్యుడైన రైతు పంట రుణం తీసుకునే సమయంలో రుణ మొత్తంలో పదిశాతాన్ని వాటాధనంగా చెల్లిస్తున్నారు. ఇది సభ్యుడి పేరుపైనే ఉంటుంది. ఒకసారి వాటాధనం చెల్లించిన రైతు మరోసారి చెల్లించాల్సిన అవసరం లేదు. గతంలో తీసుకున్న రుణం కంటే ఎక్కువగా...

title: నేడు ఎల్‌ఎండీ గేట్లు ఓపెన్‌
creator: bharath kumar
content: తిమ్మాపూర్‌, సెప్టెంబర్‌15: ఇటీవల కురిసిన భారీ వర్షాలకు తోడు కాళేశ్వరం జలాలతో ఎల్‌ఎండీ వారం రోజుల క్రితం నిండు కుండలా మారింది. 24.034 టీఎంసీల సామర్థ్యం గల లోయర్‌ మానేరు జలాశయంలో ప్రస్తుతం 23.947 టీఎంసీల స్టోరేజీతో పూర్తి స్థాయి నీటిమట్టం చేరుకున్నది. ఈ క్రమంలో ఎల్‌ఎండీ ఎగువన ఉన్న శ్రీ రాజరాజేశ్వర జలాశయానికి ఇన్‌ ఫ్లో పెరుగుతున్న నేపథ్యంలో ఎల్‌ఎండీలోకి నీళ్లను వదిలే అవకాశం ఉండడంతో ఉన్నతాధికారుల ఆదేశాల మేరకు ఎల్‌ఎండీ నుంచి సోమవారం 3గేట్ల ద్వారా సుమారు 5వేల క్యూసెకుల నీటిని వదలనునట్టు ఎల్‌ఎండీ ఈఈ నాగభూషణ రావు తెలిపారు. గేట్ల ద్వారా నీళ్లను మానేరు వాగులోకి వదులుతున్న క్రమంలో నది పరీవాహక ప్రాంతాల్లో పశువులు, గొర్రెలు మేపేవారు, చేపలు పట్టేవారు, రైతులు అప్రమత్తంగా ఉండాలని సూచించారు.

title: Brazil vets heal burns of jaguar burned in Pantanal fire
creator: NEWS WIRE
content: CORUMBA DE GOIAS - At a shelter for big cats in Brazil, a vet gingerly dresses wounds on a jaguar that was caught in wildfires raging in the world’s largest tropical wetland. While the animal is expected to heal, her home in the Pantanal continues to burn. The Pantanal, south of the Amazon in Mato Grosso do Sul state, has the world’s highest density of jaguars. It is also home to millions of caimans, parrots and giant otters. Brazil has been parched by a historic drought that experts link to climate change and which has sparked what authorities have called a “fire pandemic.” So far this year, some 6.7 million hectares (16.6 million acres) have burned in the Brazilian Amazon, amounting to 1.6 percent of the rainforest. The fires are also ripping through the Pantanal, a UN World Heritage site which has recorded 1,452 fire outbreaks so far in September -- almost four times the number recorded in September 2023, according to the National Institute for Space Research. Pollyanna Motinha, a vet at the Nex NoExtinction shelter on the outskirts of Brasilia, says she is increasingly seeing animals “at the top of the food chain, like jaguars” being injured in wildfires. “It’s not something that happened often in the past,” she told AFP. The jaguar, the largest feline in the Americas, is listed as a “near threatened” species by the International Union for Conservation of Nature. The Pantanal jaguar, which is found along the banks of the Paraguay River, weighs on average 100 kilograms...

title: المصري يدرس نقل مبارياته في الموسم الجديد إلى ستاد العاصمة الإدارية
creator: رياضة محلية
content: يدرس مسؤولو نادي المصري البورسعيدي أكثر من خيار بشأن الملعب الذي يستضيف مباريات الفريق في الموسم الجديد 2025/2024. كشف رجب عبد القادر نائب رئيس النادي البورسعيدي أن هناك محاولات لإقناع المسؤولين بتغيير ملعب الفريق، مضيفا أن هناك مفاضلة بين ستاد العاصمة الإدارية وهيئة قناة السويس وستاد الإسماعيلية. وأكد عبد القادر عبر قناة النهار أن لقاء الإياب أمام الهلال الليبي في كأس الكونفدرالية سيقام على ملعب برج العرب بالإسكندرية الذي يستضيف مباريات الفريق في المواسم الأربعة الأخيرة. في سياق متصل، أبدى رجب عبد القادر ثقته في قدرة الفريق على تعويض خسارته بنتيجة 3/2 أمام الهلال الليبي أمس الأحد، والتأهل لدور المجموعات في كأس الكونفدرالية.

title: عاجل - تطورات سعر الدولار مقابل الجنيه المصري اليوم الاثنين
content: في ظل الظروف الاقتصادية التي تشهدها البلاد، تظل متابعة سعر الدولار مقابل الجنيه المصري من الأمور المحورية التي تؤثر على قرارات المواطنين والمستثمرين. اليوم، الاثنين 16 سبتمبر 2024، شهدت الأسواق السوداء تحركات ملحوظة في سعر صرف الدولار، ما دفع الأفراد للبحث عن أحدث التحديثات لمواكبة تغيرات السوق. في هذا السياق، نعرض التفاصيل المتعلقة بأسعار الدولار في السوق السوداء والبنوك المصرية. أسعار الدولار في السوق السوداء شهدت السوق السوداء تغييرات ملحوظة في سعر الدولار اليوم، حيث بلغ سعر الدولار الواحد نحو 48.64 جنيه مصري. بالنسبة للمبالغ الصغيرة، سجل سعر الـ5 دولارات 243.2 جنيه مصري، وسعر الـ10 دولارات 486.4 جنيه مصري، في حين وصل سعر الـ25 دولار إلى 1،216 جنيه مصري. بالنسبة للمبالغ الأكبر، سجل سعر الـ50 دولار 2،432 جنيه مصري، وسعر الـ100 دولار 4،864 جنيه مصري، بينما بلغت قيمة الـ150 دولار 7،296 جنيه مصري. أما سعر الـ200 دولار فقد سجل 9،728 جنيه مصري. أسعار الدولار في البنوك المصرية لا يقتصر التأثير على السوق السوداء فقط، بل يمتد إلى البنوك المصرية حيث سجلت الأسعار في معظم البنوك الرئيسية تغيرات ملحوظة. في البنك المركزي المصري، بلغ سعر شراء الدولار 48.50 جنيه مصري وسعر البيع 48.36 جنيه مصري. أما في البنك الأهلي المصري وبنك مصر وبنك القاهرة، فسجل سعر الشراء 48.48 جنيه مصري وسعر البيع 48.38 جنيه مصري. في مصرف أبوظبي الإسلامي، سجل سعر الشراء 48.53 جنيه مصري وسعر البيع 48.43 جنيه مصري، بينما سجل بنك الإسكندرية سعر الشراء عند 48.49 جنيه مصري وسعر البيع عند 48.39 جنيه مصري. تفاصيل الأسعار في جدول

title: أحمد عبدالحليم: الزمالك حقق انتصارًا هامًا خارج أرضه.. والتراجع البدني طبيعي في بداية الموسم
content: أكد أحمد عبدالحليم نجم الكرة المصرية، أن الزمالك حقق انتصارًا هامًا على حساب الشرطة الكيني، والمنافس فريق جيد، والأهم كان تحقيق الفوز خارج الأرض، مشيرًا إلى أن الزمالك فاز خارج ملعبه لأول مرة منذ 7 سنوات، مبديا سعادته بذلك رغم بعض الأخطاء. وقال عبر برنامج بوكس تو بوكس الذي يبث على قناة etc: "اللاعبين لم يتجمعوا مع بعضهم منذ فترة طويلة، والفوز على الشرطة الكيني أمر جيد والفريق لازال في فترة الاعداد، وهدف عبدالله السعيد جاء بشكل جيد، وحزنت من القناة الناقلة والاستوديو التحليلي سواء خالد بيومي أو محمود فتح الله، بسبب عدم منح الفريق حقه بين شوطي اللقاء". وأضاف: "الزمالك بدأ المباراة بشكل جيد، والشوط الثاني شهد تراجع بدني لبعض لاعبي الفريق الأبيض، لكن الأهم هو المحافظة على نتيجة الفوز، وهذا هو الأهم بالنسبة للجهاز الفني من أجل اراحة بعض اللاعبين في لقاء الإياب، ولكن دون استهتار بالمنافس، وهذا الأمر أيضا جيد في رفع معنويات اللاعبين". وواصل: "الزمالك لم يدفع بأي لاعب جديد في تلك المباراة، ولا بد من دعم الفريق في المرحلة المقبلة، والزمالك مقبل على مباراة هامة في القاهرة والفوز بها مطلوب أيضا، والزمالك هو المرشح الأول للفوز بالبطولة لأنه حامل اللقب". وأكمل: "عبدالله السعيد واحد من هدافي الكرة المصرية رغم أنه لاعب خط وسط في الأساس، ولا يلعب في خط الهجوم، وهو لاعب صاحب قيمة كبيرة، ويجب منحه المزيد من الحرية الهجومية، فكلما كان قريبا من مرمى المنافس يكون أفضل كثيرًا، لكن جوميز يطالبه بأداء بعض المهام الدفاعية". وزاد: "الزمالك تعرض لـ "دروب بدني" طبيعي في بداية الموسم، وسيصل إلى الفورمة الفنية العالية بعد 7 أو 8 مباريات، لكن حتى مع تراجع الأداء استطاع...

title: সিলেটে স্বেচ্ছাসেবক লীগ নেতার ভাতিজাকে কুপিয়েছে দুর্বৃত্তরা
content: স্বেচ্ছাসেবক লীগ সিলেট মহানগর সভাপতি ও সিলেট সিটি করপোরেশনের সাবেক কাউন্সিলর আফতাব হোসেন খানের ভাতিজা জ্যাকি খানকে (১৪) কুপিয়ে গুরুতর আহত করেছে একদল দুর্বৃত্ত। রবিবার (১৫ সেপ্টেম্বর) সন্ধ্যায় সিলেট নগরের পশ্চিম পীর মহল্লা এলাকায় এ ঘটনা ঘটে।জ্যাকি দশম শ্রেণির ছাত্র এবং পীর মহল্লা এরাকার বাসিন্দা জহির হোসেন খানের ছেলে। জানা গেছে, রবিবার সন্ধ্যায় স্থানীয় মসজিদে মাগরিবের নামাজ শেষে বাসায় ফিরছিল জ্যাকি। পশ্চিম পীর মহল্লার গৌছ উদ্দিন মাদরাসার সামনে আসা মাত্র ১০ থেকে ১৫ জনের দুর্বৃত্তের দল ধারাল অস্ত্র হাতে তার ওপর হামলা চালায়। তাকে রক্তাক্ত আহত করে ফেলে রেখে যায়। পরে স্থানীয়রা তাকে গুরুতর আহত অবস্থায় উদ্ধার করে সিলেট এম এ জি ওসমানী মেডিক্যাল কলেজ হাসপাতালে ভর্তি করেন।সাবেক কাউন্সিলর আফতাব উদ্দিন খান অভিযোগ করে বলেন, ‘ছাত্রদল নেতা সেলিম আহমদ ও মিজানের নেতৃত্বে ১০ থেকে ১৫ জনের একটি দল ধারাল অস্ত্র হাতে আমার ভাতিজার ওপর অতর্কিত হামলা চালায়। তাদের হামলায় সে গুরুতর আহত হয়ে হাসপাতালে চিকিৎসাধীন। কিন্তু আমরা পুলিশের কোনো সহযোগিতা পাচ্ছি না।’ এ বিষয়ে জানতে সিলেট মহানগর পুলিশের বিমানবন্দর থানার ভারপ্রাপ্ত কর্মকর্তা (ওসি) মো. আনিসুর রহমানের সঙ্গে মোবাইল ফোনে যোগাযোগের চেষ্টা করা হলেও তিনি কল রিসিভ করেননি।পরে রাত সোয়া ৪টার দিকে বিমানবন্দর থানার ডিউটি অফিসারের দায়িত্বে থাকা উপপরিদর্শক (এসআই) সাইফুরের সঙ্গে কথা হলে তিনি বলেন, ‘হামলা হয়েছে বলে শুনেছি। তবে এখনো কেউ অভিযোগ করতে আসেনি। অভিযোগ পেলে যথাযথ ব্যবস্থা নেওয়া হবে।’এর আগে গত ৮ সেপ্টেম্বর রাতে নগরের বনকলাপাড়া এলাকায় ৭ নম্বর ওয়ার্ড স্বেচ্ছাসেবক লীগের সাধারণ সম্পাদক মনজুর আহমদ এবং দলের কর্মী রুমেল আহমদকে...

title: После покушения Трамп снова лидер гонки
Carille e Pituca elogiam disposição do Santos: ‘Nos outros jogos faltou um pouquinho’
content: Santos, SP, 15 – O técnico Fábio Carille e o meia Diego Pituca elogiaram a disposição demonstrada pelo Santos na vitória sobre o América-MG por 2 a 1 neste domingo na Vila Belmiro pela 26a rodada da Série B do Campeonato Brasileiro . “Foi o que eu falei para eles hoje”, afirmou Carille se referindo à oração com os jogadores pós-jogo. “Deixar organização do time para a comissão técnica e vir com a entrega nos 12 jogos que faltam. Vem com entrega e disposição e presta atenção nas orientações.” NOVIDADE! Futebol Interior agora está nos Canais do WhatsApp. Participe agora! Pituca disse que a comissão técnica do Santos havia avisado que o jogo contra o América-MG seria “uma guerra”. “Conseguimos nos entregar, nos outros jogos faltou um pouquinho”, afirmou o jogador. “Eles haviam pedido para lutar, brigar pela bola.” Carille disse que o Santos conseguiu mostrar personalidade em um jogo tenso. “O time persistiu e insistiu. Temos que valorizar bastante esta vitória no final”, afirmou o técnico do vice-líder da Série B. Uma publicação compartilhada por Santos Futebol Clube (@santosfc) O treinador disse que o planejamento tático para a partida na Vila Belmiro foi bem sucedido. “Tudo que a gente planejou aconteceu. Um time com jogadores de velocidade na frente, jogando no nosso erro”, afirmou Carille. “A gente tinha que rodar a bola para chegar pelos lados.” Na avaliação de Pituca, o time ainda precisa de mais tranquilidade. “Às vezes, queremos...

title: "교회서 목사가 물 뿌려 홀딱 젖은 몸...남편, 골프채 들고 찾아왔다"
content: 교회 목사가 뿌린 물에 온몸이 젖어 이를 남편에게 하소연했다가 남편이 골프채를 들고 교회에 찾아왔다는 사연이 전해졌다. 지난 12일 한 온라인 커뮤니티에는 '신랑이 골프채 들고 교회로 찾아왔어요'라는 제목의 글이 올라왔다. A 씨는 "제가 이번 주 교회 식사 당번이었다. 토요일에 2시간 정도 재료 손질하고, 식사 당번인 일요일에 새벽 6시까지 교회 가서 밥하고 국 끓이고 반찬 만드는 거 거들고 배식했다"고 적었다. 이어 "다 마치고 설거지하는데 주방 뒷문으로 담임 목사가 들어와서는 물 호스로 사람들에게 물을 뿌렸다"며 "수압이 엄청 셌다. 저는 홀딱 젖었다. 그 순간 왜 물을 뿌려대는지 너무 화가 났다"고 말했다. 목사는 "더울까 봐 그랬다"고 변명했다. 하지만 화를 참을 수 없었던 A 씨는 씻고 있던 젓가락과 입고 있던 앞치마를 집어 던지고 소리 지르면서 나갔다고 한다. A 씨는 차에서 엉엉 울며 남편한테 전화했다고. 그는 "화도 나고 사람들 앞에서 소리 지르고 화낸 모습 보인 게 속상하기도 해서 '나 어떡하냐'고 하면서 울었다. 그러자 남편이 교회에 골프채를 들고 와 목사를 찾아다녔다고 하더라"라고 했다. 당시 신도들은 A 씨 남편을 말렸고 교회는 한바탕 뒤집어졌다고 한다. A 씨는 "일단 (식사 당번) 모둠장님한테 죄송하다고 하고 얼른 집에 왔다"며 "지금 이런 상태인데 다시 교회에 나갈 수 있을까요? 대형 교회라 많은 사람이 그 장면을 봤다. 앞으로 어떻게 해야 하냐"고 조언을 구했다. 누리꾼들은 "왜 남편만 이상한 사람인...

title: ನುಡಿ ಬೆಳಗು–23: ಆಸೆಯೇ ದುಃಖಕ್ಕೆ ಮೂಲ!
creator: ಅಭಿನವ ಗವಿಸಿದ್ಧೇಶ್ವರ ಸ್ವಾಮೀಜಿ
content: ಮನಸ್ಸಿನಲ್ಲಿಯೇ ಸುಖ ದುಃಖ ಎಲ್ಲಾ ಐತಿ. ಬಯಕೆಯೇ ದುಃಖ ತಂದುಕೊಡತೈತಿ. ಹೀಂಗಂದರ ನೀವು ‘ಬಯಕೆನೇ ಇರಬಾರದೇನು’ ಅಂತ ಕೇಳ್ತೀರಿ. ‘ಕಲ್ಲಿಗೂ ಏನೂ ಬಯಕೆ ಇಲ್ಲ. ಬಯಕೆ ಇಲ್ಲ ಅಂದರ ನಾವೂ ಕಲ್ಲಾಗುತೀವಿ’ ಅಂತೀರಿ. ಬಯಸೋದಕ್ಕೆ ನಿಮಗೆ ಎಲ್ಲಾ ಹಕ್ಕು ಇದೆ; ಬಯಸಿ. ಆದರೆ, ಬಯಸಿದ್ದೆಲ್ಲಾ ಸಿಗತೈತಿ ಅಂತ ತಲೆಯೊಳಗೆ ಇಟ್ಟುಕೊಳ್ಳಬೇಡಿ. ಬಯಸಿದ್ದರಿಂದ ದುಃಖ ಆಗಿಲ್ಲ. ಬಯಸಿದ್ದೆಲ್ಲಾ ಸಿಗಬೇಕು ಎಂಬ ನಿಮ್ಮ ಆಸೆ ಐತಲ್ಲ, ಅದರಿಂದ ದುಃಖ ಆಗಿದೆ. ಯಾಕೆಂದರೆ, ಈ ಜಗತ್ತಿನೊಳಗೆ ಬಯಸಿದ್ದು ಸಿಗೋದಿಲ್ಲ. ಬಯಸಿದಷ್ಟು ಸಿಗೋದಿಲ್ಲ. ಬಯಸಿದಂಗೆ ಸಿಗಲ್ಲ. ಸಿಕ್ಕಿದ್ದು ಬಯಸಿದಂಗೆ ಇರಲ್ಲ. ಇದು ಜಗದ ನಿಯಮ. ಬಯಕೆಯೇ ದುಃಖಕ್ಕೆ ಕಾರಣ. ಸುಖದ ಬಯಕೆ ಇಲ್ಲೇನು? ನಮಗೆ ಸುಖ ಬ್ಯಾಡೇನು? ಅಂತ ಕೇಳಿದರೆ ಸುಖ ಬೇಕು. ನಮಗೆ ಯಾವ ವಸ್ತುಗಳು ಸುಖ ಕೊಡುತ್ತವೆ ಅನಕೋತೀವಿ, ಅವು ವಾಸ್ತವದಲ್ಲಿ ಸುಖ ಕೊಡಲು ಸಾಧ್ಯನೇ ಇಲ್ಲ. ಈ ಜಗತ್ತಿನಲ್ಲಿ ವಸ್ತುಗಳು ಸುಖ ಕೊಡುವಂತೆ ತೋರ್ತವೆ. ಆದರೆ, ದುಃಖ ಕೊಟ್ಟೇ ಹೋಗ್ತವೆ. ಯಾವುದು ಸುಖ ಅಂತ ಅನಸ್ತೈತಿ, ಅದು ಜೇನು ಮೆತ್ತಿದ ವಿಷ. ಉದಾಹರಣೆಗೆ, ನೀವು ಎರಡು ಹೋಳಿಗೆ ತಿಂತೀರಿ. ಸುಖ ಅನಸತೈತಿ. 20 ಹೋಳಿಗೆ ತಿಂದರೆ? ಎರಡು ಹೋಳಿಗೆ ಸುಖ ನೀಡಿದರೆ 20 ಹೋಳಿಗೆ ಇನ್ನೂ ಹೆಚ್ಚು ಸುಖ ಇರಬೇಕಿತ್ತಲ್ಲ. ಆದರೆ, ನೀವು ಸಾಕು ಸರಸು ಆಚೆ ಅಂತೀರಿ. ಅಂದರೆ ಸುಖ ಅನ್ನೋದು ಉಣ್ಣೋದರಲ್ಲೂ ಐತಿ, ದೂರ ಸರಿಸೋದರಲ್ಲೂ ಐತಿ. ಯಾವುದೂ ಕಾಯಂ ಸುಖ ಅಂತ ಇಲ್ಲ. ಎಲ್ಲವೂ ಸುಖದಂತೆ ತೋರುತೈತಿ. ಸುಖ ಅಂದರೆ ಸುಖ ಅಂತಲ್ಲ, ಕಡಿಮೆ ದುಃಖ. ದುಃಖ ಅಂದರೆ ದುಃಖ ಅಂತಲ್ಲ. ಕಡಿಮೆ ಸುಖ ಅಷ್ಟೆ. ಬರುವ ಪರಿಸ್ಥಿತಿಯನ್ನು ಒಪ್ಪಿಕೊಳ್ಳದ ಮನಃಸ್ಥಿತಿಯೇ ದುಃಖ, ಬರುವುದನ್ನು ಒಪ್ಪಿಕೊಳ್ಳುವುದೇ ಸುಖ. ಯಾವುದು ಬಂದೈತಿ ಅದು ಹೋಗತೈತಿ. ಇದನ್ನು ಮನುಷ್ಯ ತಿಳಕೋಬೇಕು. ಯಾವುದು ಬಯಸಿದ್ವಿ ಅದು ಸಿಗೋದಿಲ್ಲ, ಸಿಕ್ಕರೂ ಕಾಯಂ ನಮ್ ಜೊತೆ ಇರೋದಿಲ್ಲ. ಇದೇ ಸತ್ಯ. ರಷ್ಯಾದ ತತ್ವಶಾಸ್ತ್ರಜ್ಞ ಲಿಯೊ ಟಾಲ್‌ಸ್ಟಾಯ್ ಒಂದು ಕತೆ ಬರೆದಾನ. ಒಬ್ಬ ರಾಜ ಇದ್ದ. ಅವನು ಒಂದು ಡಂಗುರ ಸಾರಿದ. ‘ನಾಳೆ...

title: На Украине суд рассмотрит иск с требованием назначить выборы президента
creator: Ирина Зражевская
content: Стало известно, что украинский суд рассмотрит иск с требованием обязать украинский парламент назначить выборы президента. Он поступил депутата Верховной рады Александра Дубинского, РИА Новости. «Заседание по моему иску в Верховный суд с требованием к Верховной раде назначить выборы президента назначено на 16 сентября на 15.30», — указал он в Сети. Напомним, выборы в стране должны были пройти ещё 31 марта. Однако их отменили из-за военного положения и всеобщую мобилизацию. При этом срок полномочий нынешнего лидера «незалежной» истек еще 20 мая. Ранее «Свободная Пресса» писала о том, что член конгресса США от Республиканской партии с просьбой из-за конфликта на Украине. В частности, она отметила, что большинство американцев не поддерживают финансирование и разжигание украинско-российского конфликта. «Я призываю всех американцев не оставаться равнодушными, потому что никто из нас не сможет пережить ядерную войну», — указала она.

title: Trump was the subject of an apparent assassination attempt at his Florida golf club, FBI says
content: WEST PALM BEACH, Fla. — Donald Trump was the target Sunday of “what appears to be an attempted assassination” at his golf club in West Palm Beach, Florida, the FBI said, just nine weeks after the Republican presidential nominee survived another attempt on his life. The former president said he was safe and well, and authorities held a man in custody. Photos that show an AK-47 rifle, a backpack and a Go-Pro camera on a fence outside Trump International Golf Club taken after an apparent assassination attempt of Republican presidential candidate former President Donald Trump, are displayed during a news conference at the Palm Beach County Main Library on Sunday in West Palm Beach, Fla. Stephany Matat, Associated Press U.S. Secret Service agents posted a few holes up from where Trump was playing noticed the muzzle of an AK-style rifle sticking through the shrubbery that lines the course, roughly 400 yards away. An agent fired and the gunman dropped the rifle and fled in an SUV, leaving the firearm behind along with two backpacks, a scope used for aiming and a GoPro camera, Palm Beach County Sheriff Ric Bradshaw said. The man was later taken into custody in a neighboring county. It was the latest jarring moment in a campaign year marked by unprecedented upheaval. On July 13, Trump was shot during a rally in Butler, Pennsylvania, and a bullet grazed his ear. Eight days later, Democratic President Joe Biden withdrew from the race, giving way for Vice President Kamala Harris to...

title: Buescher tries not to think about missed shot for NASCAR playoff spot after win at The Glen
creator: By DAN GELSTON - AP Sports Writer
content: WATKINS GLEN, N.Y. (AP) — Chris Buescher had a playoff berth snatched from him at Kansas when Kyle Larson nipped him on the final lap to win the closest finish in NASCAR history. Furious over another postseason bid derailed, Buescher scuffled with Tyler Reddick when he was denied a shot at the checkered flag after a late wreck at Darlington. Who knows? Buescher may have been a darkhorse driver to beat for a Cup title had he actually raced into NASCAR's postseason. Buescher instead had to play spoiler Sunday on the road course at Watkins Glen. Buescher's last lap pass of road-course ace Shane van Gisbergen in overtime led the RFK Racing driver to victory lane. Buescher led a string of five straight non-playoff drivers to the finish in a road-course race that wreaked havoc for Denny Hamlin, Martin Truex Jr., Brad Keselowski and a handful of championship contenders. “We’re going to play spoiler as much as we can in the next seven or eight weeks, as well,” Buescher said. Let the playoff field of 16 worry about their Cup championship hopes headed into Saturday's cutoff race at Bristol. Buescher instead had to figure out how to swig all the bubbly out of an oversized bottle of booze he took with him from victory lane. “Looks ridiculous, don't it?" Buescher cracked. With championship contenders well behind them, Buescher and van Gisbergen raced door-to-door to the thrilling finish on the 2.45-mile road course at The Glen. Van Gisbergen, who won his NASCAR debut last season at the...

title: Grenzkontrollen im Westen angelaufen
content: Deutschland hat seine bereits laufenden Grenzkontrollen im Osten und Süden des Landes wie angekündigt auf die Landgrenze im Westen ausgeweitet. Seit Mitternacht laufen in Niedersachsen und in Nordrhein-Westfalen die temporären Grenzkontrollen zu Belgien und den Niederlanden an, wie die Bundespolizei bestätigte und Reporter der Deutschen Presse-Agentur beobachteten. Am Montag sollen auch Kontrollen an den Grenzen nach Luxemburg und Dänemark eingerichtet werden. Die zusätzlichen Kontrollen sollen zunächst sechs Monate andauern, um die Zahl unerlaubter Einreisen stärker einzudämmen. Der Pendler- und Reiseverkehr soll möglichst wenig beeinträchtigt werden. Grenzkontrollen sind im Schengen-Raum eigentlich nicht vorgesehen. Bisher kontrollierte die Bundespolizei nur an den Grenzen zu Polen, Tschechien, Österreich, der Schweiz und seit den Olympischen Spielen in Paris auch Frankreich. Rechtlich möglich sind die weiteren Kontrollen seit Mitternacht. Innenminister Nancy Faeser (SPD) sagte am Sonntagabend: «Diese Maßnahme ist aus meiner Sicht dringend erforderlich, um die irreguläre Migration weiter zurückzudrehen.» Sie hatte in der vergangenen Woche angeordnet, dass es ab Montag an allen Landgrenzen stationäre Kontrollen geben soll. Ein Sprecher der Bundespolizei sagte, in Niedersachsen seien wie geplant zusätzliche Beamte im Einsatz. Sie sollen auf niedersächsischer Seite Einreisende aus Richtung Niederlande überprüfen. Feste Kontrollstellen wurden auf der...

title: Sydney's metro trains running every five minutes
creator: Sam McKeith
content: Commuters using Sydney's metro will get trains every five minutes as part of "timetable boost" on the new Chatswood to Sydenham line. Login or signup to continue reading A month after launching the under-city driverless trains, Transport Minister Jo Haylen says services will run every five minutes instead of seven, between 10am and 3pm. Trains will also run past midnight every night except Sunday, under the changes, starting on Monday. The government says the boost in the service is in response to around five million passenger journeys being made on the $21 bilion line since it opened on August 16. "A train every five minutes during the day and services running until after midnight almost every night means more people can jump on the metro to enjoy everything Sydney has to offer, from the north to the inner west," Ms Haylen said in a statement. "We expect this boost in services will see even more people using the metro to commute, explore and keep our great city thriving well after the sun goes down." Commuters have taken around 200,000 trips each day on the metro since it opened. The cross-city extension, which runs from Chatswood in Sydney's north to Sydenham in the inner west via tunnels under Sydney Harbour, forms part of a metro network that is the largest public transport project in Australia. The project faces upcoming disruption from the NSW Rail, Tram and Bus Union which has threatened to suspend work on the T3 Bankstown Line from September 18 if the state...

title: Gamou 2024 : Wally Faye organise un banquet somptueux à Tivaoune
creator: Amy BA
content: Lors du Gamou, qui commémore la naissance du Prophète Mouhamed, l’homme d’affaires Wally Faye, PDG de Diamil Linguistique, a une nouvelle fois démontré sa générosité. En tant que fidèle disciple de Cheikh Hadji Malick, Wally Faye a investi plusieurs dizaines de millions pour orchestrer cet événement à Tivaoune. Il a offert à ses invités un somptueux festin pour marquer l’occasion.

title: PAN abre encuesta a militantes... para un cambio
creator: Agencia Reforma
content: Ciudad de México .- En su 85 aniversario, el Partido Acción Nacional (PAN) abrirá una encuesta a su militancia para emprender las modificaciones necesarias para el partido. En medio de la crisis que dejaron los resultados de la pasada elección federal y luego de que el senador panista Miguel Ángel Yunes Márquez , el dirigente nacional Marko Cortés hizo un llamado de unidad a sus militantes. “ En estos difíciles momentos de regresión autoritaria, seguiremos teniendo el mejor modelo de Gobierno y siendo un partido de Oposición que cuestione al régimen en turno, siendo la voz de las y los ciudadanos. Somos la última trinchera de la libertad y de la democracia . En 85 años, el PAN ha demostrado su capacidad de adaptarse y mantenerse como un actor clave en la arena política , por eso, los trabajos de la Comisión de Estudio y Propuestas de Cambio para el PAN van sumamente avanzados y ya se puede anunciar que el cambio va de fondo y va en serio”, destacó el dirigente panista. Anunció que la próxima semana, dicha comisión realizará “ una encuesta toda la militancia ” para que el cambio en este partido no sea sólo por la opinión de unos cuantos, sino el resultado de una deliberación nacional. El líder panista hizo un llamado a los panistas a mantenerse unidos y deseó que el 85 aniversario sirva para lograr “un punto de inflexión del PAN” ante lo que se avecina para el futuro de la nación. Destacó su carácter de segunda fuerza política nacional con 4...

title: ¿No nos daríamos cuenta? Ángela Aguilar cubre a Nodal de haber ido al cumpleaños de su hija: Anda de gira
creator: Andrea Ramírez Torres
content: Este fin de semana, Inti la hija que tuvo la relación de Christian Nodal con la argentina Cazzu, cumplió su primer año, por lo que las historias sobre su celebración no se hicieron esperar, causando entre polémica y gusto en los seguidores del sonorense. Te podría interesar: Se anuncian precios oficiales para el EDC La celebración fue en grande, al estilo Jenner la temática fue sobre Inti, esto lo pudimos apreciar gracias a las diferentes storys que Cazzu compartió por medio de Instagram, sin embargo hubo una en especial donde se puede apreciar a una tercera persona cargando a la niña...¿y esa mano?. Era ni mas ni menos la del papá, Christian Nodal, reconocido de manera evidente por los diversos tatuajes que lo caracterizan, sin embargo la argentina optó por cortar el video, para que no apareciera la cara del cantante mexicano. Pero internet una vez mas hizo su magia y aunque entre la sombra, se logra apreciar completo a Nodal bailando, cantando y cargando a su hija. Por su parte, la menor de los Aguilar, y esposa de Nodal, se presentó en el consulado de México en Houston, Texas, para presentar una galería de sus vestidos, y al ser cuestionada sobre su marido, dijo: ¿Creía que no nos daríamos cuenta? ¿O fue Nodal que creyó que ella no se enteraría Te podría interesar: Maná se deslinda de Nicky Jam; no trabajamos con racistas, aseguran

title: 全球玩具市場停滯,樂高獨唱凱歌
creator: 藍 弋丰
content: 全球面臨戰爭、通膨、升息,種種經濟不確定性下,家戶保守支出,第一個砍的就是並非生活必要的玩具,因此全球玩具市場 2023 年衰退 7%,2024 年也呈現停滯,但是大環境不好,還是有人會異軍突起,樂高在同業衰退時,業績仍然高唱凱歌。 樂高上半年銷售額年增 13% 達 310 億丹麥克朗,2023 上半年時年增 1%,2022上半年年增 17%,連三年成長,樂高很得意表示業績表現遠勝過同業。營業利益方面更大增 26% 達 81 億丹麥克朗。樂高預期全年營收也是兩位數百分比成長。 樂高今年全球定開設 100 家分店,總計超過 1,100 家,今年新增分店數量較 2023 年少,主因是中國放慢腳步,因樂高觀察到中國消費力裹足不前,將市場焦點轉移到需求強勁的歐洲與北美。 其他玩具大廠業績表現與樂高相反,孩之寶第二季營收大減 18% 至 9.953 億美元,靠壓低開支與嚴控庫存才把毛利提升 21.3%,預測全年獲利 10 億美元左右。美泰兒第二季營收下跌 1% 達 10.8 億美元,也是打算撙節開支以擠出獲利。 兩大競爭對手一個大幅萎縮,一個小跌,怪不得樂高對自己保持高度成長樂開懷。樂高各產品線表現最好是 Icons 系列、城市系列、科技系列及星際大戰系列。 (首圖來源: 樂高 )

title: Pakistan women set to face South Africa in historic T20I Series in Multan
creator: Our Staff Reporter
content: LAHORE - The Multan Cricket Stadium is set to host its first-ever international T20I series as Pakistan women’s team, led by Fatima Sana, faces off against South Africa, captained by Laura Wolvaardt, in a three-match Bank Alfalah T20I series starting today (Monday). The second and third T20Is will also take place at the same venue on September 18 and 20. The first and second matches will begin at 7:00 PM PST, while the final T20I is scheduled for a 10:00 AM start. This marks a historic moment for the Multan Cricket Stadium, which has previously hosted 11 ODIs and six Test matches. This series serves as a crucial preparatory stage for both teams ahead of the ICC Women’s T20 World Cup, set to take place next month in the UAE. South Africa, runners-up in the last ICC Women’s T20 World Cup, is visiting Pakistan for the second time in two years. Their previous tour included a white-ball series in Karachi, where Pakistan claimed a 3-0 clean sweep in the T20I format. To encourage fan support, stadium entry will be free, with spectators required to present their original ID cards for access. Pakistani fans can also catch the action live in high definition on A Sports, with live streaming available on the PCB’s official YouTube channel. Following the series, South Africa will depart for the UAE on September 21, while Pakistan will follow on September 23. In the upcoming ICC Women’s T20 World Cup, Pakistan is grouped with Australia, India, New Zealand, and Sri Lanka, while South...

title: Regional Australia 'at the front line' of radical misinformation crisis
creator: Sophia Baker
content: Being saved by someone he hated changed Matt Quinn's life forever. or signup to continue reading In his youth Mr Quinn was a leader of an anti-Asian hate group west of Sydney. "My parents went to war against the Japanese, so there was a lot of hatred against Asians in the family," he said. "I also had a lot of childhood trauma myself and I tried to get support but every time I tried the people that should have helped me, didn't. "I was just filled with rage and anger, so we sort of became a bit of a vigilante group which morphed into like a complete anti-Asian group." It wasn't until an Asian man rescued him from a vicious bashing that his perspective changed. "I was bashed in a fight and then somebody from the Asian community saved me," he said. "That was when I was hating Asians and I was like 'why would this person come and save me?'" It was that event that sent Mr Quinn down a new path. After he reconnected with an old friend, Mr Quinn put in the work to learn about different communities. "I got to see all the cultures and was like 'actually they're not that bad, you know'," he said. Mr Quinn, now 46, works de-radicalising young people across Australia. Starting in 2014, he said he had seen first-hand the impact social media had on radicalising young people. He said despite social media companies' efforts, bad actors were still able to slip through the cracks. "Social media organisations are trying to crack down on it as best they can," Mr Quinn said. "But the problem is...

title: Thủ lĩnh lực lượng Houthi ở Yemen tuyên bố sẽ tiếp tục tấn công Israel
content: Ngày 15/9, thủ lĩnh lực lượng Houthi ở Yemen, Abdul-Malik al-Houthi tuyên bố rằng các chiến dịch quân sự của nhóm này nhằm chống Israel sẽ tiếp tục được thực hiện và sẽ quyết liệt hơn. Thủ lĩnh của Houthi đưa ra lời đe dọa trên sau vụ tấn công bằng tên lửa của lực lượng này nhằm vào khu vực miền Trung Israel diễn ra trước đó cùng ngày. Trong bài phát biểu được phát sóng trên kênh truyền hình al-Masirah do Houthi kiểm soát, ông al-Houthi nêu rõ: “Các chiến dịch của chúng tôi sẽ tiếp tục chừng nào mà hành động gây hấn và chiếm đóng ở Dải Gaza vẫn tiếp tục.” Thủ lĩnh của Houthi cũng nêu bật những tiến bộ về công nghệ trong tiềm lực quân sự của nhóm này, đặc biệt khi đề cập tới loại tên lửa đạn đạo mới được cho là được sử dụng trong vụ tấn công mới đây nhằm vào lãnh thổ của Israel. Theo ông al-Houthi, tên lửa này “đã xuyên thủng tất cả các vành đai phòng thủ” của hệ thống phòng thủ tên lửa Israel, có tầm bắn khoảng hơn 2.000km và bay trong khoảng thời gian 11 phút rưỡi. Trong khi đó, người phát ngôn quân sự của Houthi, Yahya Sarea cho biết các lực lượng của nhóm này đã tấn công nhằm vào một mục tiêu quân sự của Israel ở khu vực Jaffa. Vụ tấn công này được thực hiện bằng “tên lửa...

title: هل صعد إخوان الأردن إلى الشجرة؟
content: حقق الإخوان المسلمون في الأردنمكاسب كبيرة في الانتخابات الأردنية الأخيرة، حيث حصدوا 31 مقعدا من مقاعد مجلسالنواب بنسبة 22 في المئة من مقاعد المجلس، فهل كان هذا الانتصار فوزا طبيعيا لفئةمهمة من الشعب الأردني؟ أم كان فخا سياسيا نصب لهم من قبل النظام؟ حتى نستطيع الإجابة على هذا التساؤلنحتاج أن نفهم السياقات التي جرت من خلالها هذه الانتخابات النيابية، فهي التيستخبرنا بمجموعة من الحقائق التي يجب أن توضع في الاعتبار للإجابة على السؤالالسابق: السياق الأول: فرص التأثير والتغيير - لم يشارك في هذه الانتخابات سوى 32في المئة من الناخبين الذين لهم حق الاقتراع، وهو ما يعني أن ثلثيّ الشعب الأردنيلا يرى في العملية الانتخابية كلها مسارا حقيقيا للتغيير يمكن الوثوق به. - النسبة التي حصل عليها الإخوان أوذراعهم السياسي "حزب جبهة العمل الإسلامي" لا تزيد عن ربع مقاعد البرلمان ، وهي نسبة لا يمكنها إقرار أو تعطيل أي قانون داخل البرلمان بدون تحالفانتخابي للوصول إلى الثلث المعطل. النسبة التي حصل عليها الإخوان أو ذراعهم السياسي "حزب جبهة العمل الإسلامي" لا تزيد عن ربع مقاعد البرلمان، وهي نسبة لا يمكنها إقرار أو تعطيل أي قانون داخل البرلمان بدون تحالف انتخابي للوصول إلى الثلث المعطل - حتى لو سيطر الإخوان على 100 فيالمئة من مقاعد البرلمان وشكلوا الحكومة فلا يمكنهم إقرار قانون واحد بدون موافقةالغرفة الثانية للبرلمان (مجلس الأعيان) الذي يعين الملك كامل أعضائه! ولو افترضنا أن الإخوان يملكون أداةسحرية لإقناع أعضاء مجلس الأعيان بالموافقة على قانون ما، فلا يزال الملك يملكصلاحية رفض القانون أو طلب تعديله أو إقراره. ولو افترضنا جدلا أن نواب الإخوانالذين يملكون...

title: Illegale Migration: Grenzkontrollen im Westen angelaufen
content: Deutschland hat seine bereits laufenden Grenzkontrollen im Osten und Süden des Landes wie angekündigt auf die Landgrenze im Westen ausgeweitet. Seit Mitternacht laufen in Niedersachsen und in Nordrhein-Westfalen die temporären Grenzkontrollen zu Belgien und den Niederlanden an, wie die Bundespolizei bestätigte und Reporter der Deutschen Presse-Agentur beobachteten. Am Montag sollen auch Kontrollen an den Grenzen nach Luxemburg und Dänemark eingerichtet werden. Die zusätzlichen Kontrollen sollen zunächst sechs Monate andauern, um die Zahl unerlaubter Einreisen stärker einzudämmen. Der Pendler- und Reiseverkehr soll möglichst wenig beeinträchtigt werden. Grenzkontrollen sind im Schengen-Raum eigentlich nicht vorgesehen. Bisher kontrollierte die Bundespolizei nur an den Grenzen zu Polen, Tschechien, Österreich, der Schweiz und seit den Olympischen Spielen in Paris auch Frankreich. Rechtlich möglich sind die weiteren Kontrollen seit Mitternacht. Innenminister Nancy Faeser (SPD) sagte am Sonntagabend: „Diese Maßnahme ist aus meiner Sicht dringend erforderlich, um die irreguläre Migration weiter zurückzudrehen.“ Sie hatte in der vergangenen Woche angeordnet, dass es ab Montag an allen Landgrenzen stationäre Kontrollen geben soll. Ein Sprecher der Bundespolizei sagte, in Niedersachsen seien wie geplant zusätzliche Beamte im Einsatz. Sie sollen auf niedersächsischer Seite Einreisende aus Richtung Niederlande überprüfen. Feste Kontrollstellen wurden auf der...

title: Okanagan Cops for Kids cyclists get warm welcome home
creator: Black Press Media Staff
content: After 10 days of cycling, police and corrections officers from around the Okanagan received a rousing welcome home. The 26 riders and support crew from the RCMP, B.C. Sheriffs Service and B.C. Corrections within the southeast district returned to Kelowna after navigating the province to raise funds for local children in need. The team left Kelowna on Friday, Sept. 6, cycling through the South Okanagan, Kootenays and Thompson region, before making their final push from Vernon on Sunday, Sept. 15. Presented by the Alan Budd Foundation, the Cops for Kids Charitable Foundation Ride saw the crew visit 26 different communities over the 10 day ride. In Creston, a community BBQ drew crowds to welcome the team and raise funds with a pulled pork dinner. Then, at the halfway point of the ride, Cranbrook hosted a very successful Jail and Bail event that Cops of Kids support crew were able to participate in to help raise funds needed for the children. “It’s not an easy feat to cycle these long distances day after day with the sun beating down on us,” said Cops for Kids President retired superintendent Brent Mundle. “Our riders have a great support system travelling with them to kept them hydrated and many service groups stepped up to help keep them fed.” Cpl. Tania Finn of the Vernon North Okanagan RCMP added that "great community support and meeting with children we have helped along the way keeps us coming back." While the signature event is over for this year, the organization is...

title: Việt Nam có 1 nàng Hoa hậu 32 năm chưa có người kế vị, 53 tuổi vẫn trẻ ngỡ ngàng: Bí quyết chống già, giữ dáng rất đáng học
content: Trong các Hoa hậu đã từng đăng quang ở Việt Nam, có lẽ Hoa hậu Giáng My là một trong những nàng hậu đặc biệt nhất bởi vì cuộc thi Hoa hậu Đền Hùng mà cô tham gia 32 năm trước chỉ tổ chức duy nhất một lần. Do đó đến nay cô vẫn được công chúng gọi vui bằng biệt danh "Hoa hậu độc nhất vô nhị" hay "Hoa hậu chưa có người kế vị". Nhan sắc xinh đẹp của Hoa hậu Giáng My 32 năm về trước. Hơn 30 năm trôi qua kể từ khi đăng quang, nhan sắc của Giáng My vẫn giữ vững danh hiệu "tượng đài" trong lòng công chúng. Dù đã ở tuổi U60 và không còn hoạt động thường xuyên trong showbiz, cô vẫn khiến mọi người trầm trồ với làn da mịn màng, vóc dáng thon gọn. Đặc biệt là các đường nét khuôn mặt dường như không thay đổi so với lúc đăng quang. Chia sẻ về bí quyết duy trì vẻ ngoài tươi trẻ, Giáng My nhấn mạnh tầm quan trọng của việc không thức khuya, một nguyên tắc mà cô luôn tuân thủ để bảo vệ sức khỏe và làn da. Về chế độ dinh dưỡng, cô ưu tiên uống nhiều nước, ăn đủ chất và tránh ăn kiêng quá mức hoặc ăn quá no. Đặc biệt, cô áp dụng quy tắc 8/16 (một kiểu nhịn ăn gián đoạn - IF): Nếu tham gia một bữa tiệc muộn, cô sẽ giữ khoảng cách 16 giờ trước khi ăn bữa tiếp theo, giúp cơ thể có...
