title: Cause of supermarket rat infestation still unknown
creator: Hamish MacLean
content: PHOTO: GREGOR RICHARDSON New Zealand Food Safety deputy director-general Vincent Arbuckle said yesterday Dunedin South Woolworths, formerly Countdown Dunedin South, had been monitored for a "significant period" and the MPI was satisfied its rat issue had been resolved. At the time of the infestation, the supermarket on Andersons Bay Rd was in the midst of an 18-day closure that grabbed national attention and seemingly sparked pest sightings in other supermarkets, including a video of a mouse in a deli at a Christchurch Woolworths and reports of a pigeon roosting on food shelves in Auckland. However, Mr Arbuckle could not say how the store came to be infested or when the MPI investigation would be complete. The government agency understood people were interested in the outcome of the investigation and would share more information "when we can". "The investigation by New Zealand Safety into the Dunedin South store continues," he said. "As with all investigations, we do a thorough job, keeping an open mind and following the evidence, so we are unable to give a definitive timeframe for completion." On February 14, Mr Arbuckle said broadly the purpose of the investigation was to "establish the causes of the problem and make whatever changes are necessary to prevent it from happening in future". He said on some occasions investigations would look into whether enforcement or prosecution action was necessary. The supermarket reopened on February 28, but not before more than 20 rats...

title: Saleema Imtiaz becomes first Pakistani women to join ICC Development Panel
creator: Staff Reporter
content: LAHORE - Saleema Imtiaz has become the first Pakistani woman to be appointed to the prestigious ICC International Panel of Development Umpires. This nomination qualifies her to officiate in women’s bilateral international matches and ICC Women’s Events, marking a significant milestone for Pakistan’s representation in international cricket officiating. Saleema, the mother of Pakistan women’s cricketer Kainat Imtiaz, began her umpiring career in 2008 with the Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB) Women’s Umpires Panel. Over the years, she has built a stellar portfolio, officiating at several high-profile events, including the 2022 and 2024 ACC Women’s T20 Asia Cup and the 2023 ACC Emerging Women’s Cup in Hong Kong. Recently, she was part of the playing control team for the ACC Women’s Premier Cup 2024 in Kuala Lumpur. Her elevation to the ICC panel highlights her status as a trailblazer in Pakistan’s cricket history. Saleema’s first international on-field appointment will be during the upcoming Pakistan-South Africa women’s T20I series in Multan. She will be joined by Nasir Hussain from the PCB Elite Panel of Umpires, with Humairah Farah serving as the third umpire, and Muhammad Javed Malik, from the PCB International Panel, acting as match referee. In her statement, Saleema expressed: “This achievement is the culmination of years of hard work and personal sacrifices. It is not just a win for me but for every aspiring female cricketer and umpire in Pakistan. I hope my success inspires...

title: "가족여행 간다는 경리 거짓말...모친에 연락해 확인" 스토킹 직장인 소름
content: 여직원의 사생활을 캐묻고는 뒷담화하듯 커뮤니티에 올린 남성을 향한 비난이 쏟아지고 있다. 14일 한 온라인 커뮤니티에는 '경리 씨XX'이라는 제목의 글이 올라왔다. 해당 글은 타 커뮤니티로도 확산하며 논란의 중심에 섰다. 중소기업 직장인으로 추정되는 A 씨가 남긴 글에는 13일 퇴근 전 여성 경리 직원과 나눈 대화 내용이 담겨 있다. A 씨는 "아까 퇴근하기 전에 (경리 직원에게) 추석에 뭐 하냐고 물어보니까 친가 친척 단체로 강릉 여행 간다고 하길래 잘 갔다 오라고 했다"라고 운을 뗐다. 이어 "집에 와서 이X 인스타 보니까 기차표 예매한 거 스토리에 올렸던데 두 명이 가더라. 태그 한 명 해놓고. 성별은 모른다"라고 했다. 그는 "둘이서 여행 가는 거 같길래 얘네 어머니 연락처가 있어서 문자로 물어보니까 가족여행 계획 없다더라. 나한테 거짓말한 거구나 싶어서 뭐라 하려다가 그냥 넘어갔다"라고 말했다. 그러고 한 시간 정도 지났을 무렵 경리에게 문자를 받았다는 A 씨는 "지 엄마한테 문자해서 물어봤냐고 하네. 할 말은 많지만 참고 그냥 사과했다"라고 덧붙였다. 일부 누리꾼이 주작을 의심하자 A 씨는 경리 직원이 나눈 메시지 내용을 공개하기도 했다. 경리 직원이 "혹시 아까 저희 어머니한테 연락하셨냐"라고 묻자 A 씨는 "네. 왜요?"라며 해맑게 답했다. 직원이 "저희 어머니 연락처는 어떻게 아셨는지 모르겠지만 앞으로 이런 연락은 안 해주셨으면 좋겠다. OO님께서 연락하셨다는 얘기 듣고 되게 당황스러웠다"고 말했다. 이어 "그리고 추석에...

title: FBI geht von versuchtem Attentat auf Trump aus
content: Der Secret Service hat nach eigenen Angaben anscheinend ein versuchtes Attentat auf den republikanischen US-Präsidentschaftskandidaten Donald Trump vereitelt. Laut dem Sicherheitsdienst, der in den USA für den Schutz hochrangiger Politiker zuständig ist, befindet sich Trump in Sicherheit und ist unverletzt. Nach Polizeiangaben fielen Schüsse, als Trump gerade Golf im Bundesstaat Florida spielte. Auch Stunden später war ungeklärt, ob nur die Personenschützer geschossen haben oder auch der mutmaßliche Attentäter. Die Polizei nahm einen Verdächtigen fest, den sie für den Angreifer hält. Der Secret Service habe am Sonntagnachmittag (Ortszeit) in West Palm Beach auf den mutmaßlichen Täter geschossen, sagte Rafael Barros, ein Sprecher des Sicherheitsdienstes. Der bewaffnete Mann habe sich an der Grundstücksgrenze zu Trumps Golfklub aufgehalten und sei anschließend geflohen, hieß es. Auf einer Autobahn in der Nähe des Tatorts Palm Beach sei ein Auto gestoppt und der Fahrer in Gewahrsam genommen worden, sagte William D. Snyder von der zuständigen Polizei. Der Mann habe ruhig und gelassen gewirkt. Viele Fragen waren zunächst ungeklärt - erste Details gaben die Behörden bei einer Pressekonferenz bekannt: So habe ein Agent des Secret Service am Tatort einen aus dem Zaun ragenden Gewehrlauf erkennen können, sagte der zuständige Sheriff Ric Bradshaw. Der Bewaffnete habe sich etwa 270 bis 450 Meter entfernt von Trump aufgehalten, der in seinem Club gerade Golf spielte....

title: Palworld will not be free-to-play or live service in future
creator: Leah J. Williams
content: will not evolve to become free-to-play or live service (GaaS) in future, according to from developer, Pocketpair. Going forward, the game will keep the same business model, and it will “remain buy-to-play and not f2p or GaaS.” The statement has been made as clarification of an interview delivered by Pocketpair CEO Takuro Mizobe, where he briefly speculated that making the game live service would “extend its lifespan and make it more stable, in terms of profitability.” Fans of the game seemingly misinterpreted this speculation, and fears around ‘s future grew. But as Pocketpair has now made clear, there are no plans to change the game to a new model. Mizobe was simply commenting that live service could extend the game, in theory. “This interview was conducted several months ago. At that time, we were still considering the best way forward for Palworld to create a long-lasting game that continues to grow,” Pocketpair . “We are still discussing this internally, as it is quite challenging to find the ideal path, but we have already decided that the F2P/GaaS approach is not suitable for us.” Pocketpair has explained that while the topic was discussed, the reality is was not designed to be a live service game, and it would require too much work to adapt the game to this model. In addition, the studio has acknowledged that players do not want this change, and it always wants to “put [its] players first.” To allow the game to continue running, additional features like skins and DLC...

title: Nueva Chicago empató ante Mitre (SdE), pero sigue en la punta: todo lo que pasó este domingo
creator: Redacción LAVOZ
content: Este domingo se le dio continuidad a la jornada 32 de la Primera Nacional, tanto en la Zona A como en la B . De los diez encuentros que se disputaron, el que llamó la atención fue la igualdad entre Nueva Chicago y Mitre de Santiago del Estero porque el Torito sigue siendo líder del segundo grupo, aunque se podría haber alegado más de sus perseguidores. Los otros resultados fueron: Arsenal le ganó a Brown (PM), Ferro empató ante Güemes (SdE), Chacarita perdió con All Boys, Deportivo Maipú cayó ante Gimnasia (J), Defensores Unidos empató con Chaco For Ever, Atlanta igualó ante Defensores de Belgrano, Deportivo Madryn ganó ante San Telmo, Colón perdió ante Brown (A). Racing de Nueva Italia jugará ante Quilmes , a partir de las 20 y se podrá ver por la pantalla de TyC Sports. Nueva Chicago ante Mitre (SdE) Nueva Chicago igualó sin goles ante Mitre de Santiago del Estero, por la jornada 32 de la Zona B. Con este resultado, el Torito de Mataderos sigue en la punta, pero podría haber aprovechado la oportunidad para alegarse más de sus perseguidores. De igual forma, contó con la ayuda de Deportivo Madryn, que le ganó a San Telmo y permitió que el Candombero no lo pasara. Por el otro lado, los santiagueños están en el escalón nueve, con 45 unidades. San Telmo ante Deportivo Madryn San Telmo, de visitante, cayó por 1-0 ante Deportivo Madryn en la fecha 32 del Grupo B. title: Padres beat Giants 4-3 in 10 innings for sweep, overcoming first righty Splash Homer by Ramos
creator: Eric He, The Associated Press

title: Padres beat Giants 4-3 in 10 innings for sweep, overcoming first righty Splash Homer by Ramos
creator: Eric He, The Associated Press
content: SAN FRANCISCO (AP) — David Peralta hit a tiebreaking single in the 10th inning, and the San Diego Padres overcame Heliot Ramos becoming the first right-handed batter to homer into McCovey Cove with a 4-3 win over the San Francisco Giants on Sunday that finished a three-game sweep. Ramos hit a 394-foot, opposite-field drive into the water behind the right field stands in the ninth off Robert Suarez (9-3), tying the score 2-2. There have been 104 Splash Homers by left-handed batters since the ballpark opened in 2000. San Diego began the day with a 2 1/2-game lead for the top NL wild card slot and 3 1/2 games back of the NL West-leading Dodgers, who played later Sunday. San Francisco has lost four straight. With the score 2-2, Peralta drove in automatic runner Jake Cronenworth with an opposite-field single to left leading off against Camilo Doval (5-3). Peralta took third on Luis Arráez's double and scored on Donovan Solano's groundout for a 4-2 lead. Michael Conforto hit a sacrifice fly in the bottom half against Adrián Morejón, who retired Patrick Bailey on a groundout for his second save. The Giants were scoreless in 32 innings, three shy of the San Francisco record set in 1976, before Donovan Walton's solo homer in the sixth against Martín Pérez. Manny Machado had hit a sacrifice fly in the top half. Pinch-hitter Fernando Tatís Jr. homered against Tyler Rogers in the eighth, his fourth home run in five games. title: Окупанти вдарили по Харкові: зросла кількість постраждалих до 43 осіб
content: • Внаслідок ворожого обстрілу в Харкові постраждали 43 людини, серед них четверо дітей. Загинула одна жінка. Поліція розгорнула штабна місці події та приймає заяви від постраждалих. Через ворожий обстріл зросла кількість постраждалих у Харкові до 43 осіб. Про це повідомляє Національна поліція України, передає . У Харкові внаслідок обстрілу постраждали 43 людини, серед них четверо дітей віком 1, 4, 12 і 13 років. Трагічно загинула жінка, мешканка будинку, тіло якої знайшли на 9-му поверсі під час пошукових робіт. На місці обстрілу розгорнуто штаб Національної поліції. Громадяни, які шукають рідних, можуть здати зразки ДНК для ідентифікації тіл, що можуть бути знайдені на місці трагедії. Поліція вже отримала 75 заяв від постраждалих щодо пошкодження майна та автомобілів, а також про зниклу безвісти жінку. Слідчі продовжують працювати на місці події до ранку, приймаючи звернення від людей, які втратили зв’язок із рідними. Юлія Котвицька

title: Guinée-Côte d’Ivoire : la route de Lola totalement coupée, à Karanah
creator: Mediaguinee
content: La route de Lola, précisément après le village de Karanah à environ 10 kilomètres de N’zérékoré, est coupée ce dimanche suite à l’effondrement d’un pont sur lequel se trouve un tuyau. Une situation qui n’est pas sans conséquence sur ce tronçon très fréquenté qui mène vers la Côte d’Ivoire. Les autorités locales sont déjà informées de cette situation, selon un des citoyens de la localité que nous avons joint au téléphone. Pour la moment, le trafic est totalement bloqué. Tél : 621-94-17-77.

title: Máxima de 20° y despejado: cómo estará el clima este lunes en Mar del Plata
creator: nquintaie
content: El Servicio Meteorológico Nacional (SMN) pronostica una jornada primaveral para este lunes en Mar del Plata, con una máxima de 20° y una mínima de 6°. La mínima se registrará a la mañana , en un día que tendrá el cielo despejado durante gran parte del tiempo. El viento tendrá dirección noroeste en esta franja horaria. A la tarde , se espera que llegue la máxima y el viento rotará hacia el norte. Mientras que, a la noche , la temperatura descenderá hasta los 10° y el cielo estará algo nublado.

title: Şenol Güneş: Hiç top oynamayalım daha iyi
content: Trabzonspor Teknik Direktörü Şenol Güneş , Beşiktaş maçının ardından yaptığı açıklamada "Taraftar takım savaştığı için memnun ama Trabzonspor savunmada kalacaksa hiç top oynamayalım daha iyi" dedi. Süper Lig'in 5'inci haftasında Trabzonspor, sahasında konuk ettiği Beşiktaş ile 1-1 berabere kaldı. Trabzonspor Teknik Direktörü Şenol Güneş maç sonrasında düzenlenen basın toplantısında açıklamalarda bulundu. Karşılaşmayı değerlendiren Şenol Güneş, “Kısa bir dönem içerisinde takımla birlikte olduk. Trabzonspor’un 2 maçta 2 puanı vardı şimdi 3 maçta 3 puanı oldu, ilk defa gol attık, ilk defa gol yedik. Biz üçüncü maçı oynadık, takımların bazıları beşinci maçı oynadı. Ligde tek rakamlı yani 19 takım olunca ligin de seyrinde bir dalgalanma, tehir maçları girince yani görüntü olarak iyi bir görüntüde değiliz. Zaten zor bir dönemde olduğumuzu söylüyoruz. Ama bu zorlukları aşacak bir durumumuz olduğunu da söyledik. Bugün de o oyuncular bize o konuda umut verdi. Onun dışında futbol yorumunu fazla yapmayı doğru bulmuyorum. Çünkü bizim tarafımızda sadece tek taraflı bir maç oldu. İyi başladık. Yani düşündüğümüz ön baskıları, çıkışları, oyuna hakim olmayı düşünürken beklenmeyen şekilde, talihsiz bir şekilde rakip de hızını kesince topa vurduktan sonra kayıp arkasından bastırdı kırmızı kart gördü Visca, en iyi oyuncularımızdan bir tanesi, takımda tecrübeli bir oyuncu. Ondan sonra benim de ne konuşursak...

title: FBI geht von versuchtem Attentat auf Trump aus
content: Der Secret Service hat nach eigenen Angaben anscheinend ein versuchtes Attentat auf den republikanischen US-Präsidentschaftskandidaten Donald Trump vereitelt. Laut dem Sicherheitsdienst, der in den USA für den Schutz hochrangiger Politiker zuständig ist, befindet sich Trump in Sicherheit und ist unverletzt. Nach Polizeiangaben fielen Schüsse, als Trump gerade Golf im Bundesstaat Florida spielte. Auch Stunden später war ungeklärt, ob nur die Personenschützer geschossen haben oder auch der mutmaßliche Attentäter. Die Polizei nahm einen Verdächtigen fest, den sie für den Angreifer hält. Der Secret Service habe am Sonntagnachmittag (Ortszeit) in West Palm Beach auf den mutmaßlichen Täter geschossen, sagte Rafael Barros, ein Sprecher des Sicherheitsdienstes. Der bewaffnete Mann habe sich an der Grundstücksgrenze zu Trumps Golfklub aufgehalten und sei anschließend geflohen, hieß es. Auf einer Autobahn in der Nähe des Tatorts Palm Beach sei ein Auto gestoppt und der Fahrer in Gewahrsam genommen worden, sagte William D. Snyder von der zuständigen Polizei. Der Mann habe ruhig und gelassen gewirkt. title: To raise or not to raise: the social media question dividing children and adults
creator: Madilyn McKinley
content: Growing up on a farm in regional Australia, Wil Lindner could soon be stripped of the chance to communicate with his friends after school on social media. or signup to continue reading Living in Burrumbuttock, more than 30 kilometres northwest of Albury, the 14-year-old believes it would be "pretty stupid" if the government from 13 to 16. With Instagram and Snapchat downloaded to his phone, his use of the apps is simple. "Just to see what everyone is up to and what is going on in the world," he says. With more than 115,000 signatures, the 36 months- raising the age for social media citizenship calls for government action to get children off social media as they continue to develop and grow as adolescents. Prime Minister Anthony Albanese has also promised to legislate a raised minimum social media age by the end of his term in May. Social networks that encourage interaction through addictive elements, including, but not limited to, infinite scrolling, streaks, likes, comments, and shares, could be banned. But Wil isn't too worried if the minimum age is raised, as he believes he will still be able to circumvent it. The teenager has been using social media even before the legal requirement, with his Snapchat age showing he was born in 1987. Wil isn't alone in not wanting the minimum age to change; his brother, James Lindner, also uses social media daily. Although now 16, James says if he were in Wil's shoes, he would feel annoyed if his right to social media was taken away....

title: RESUMEN | Nuevo líder en el Grupo A
creator: Jonathan Tamayac
content: GUATEMALA. La Libertad ganó y tomó el primer lugar de su grupo. Este fin de semana se realizó la Fecha 10 del Torneo Apertura 2024 de la Liga Primera División. Únete a nuestro Canal de WhatsApp y conoce lo mejor de nuestras publicaciones. Haz click AQUÍ El equipo de La Libertad venció por 3-1 al equipo de Pajapita, y llegó a 19 puntos en el Grupo A, desplazando al Deportivo Suchitepéquez que empató 0-0 contra San Pedro, y con ello el equipo Venado cayó al segundo puesto con 19 cifras. Aurora por su parte venció por 0-1 a Barberena , y gracias a la victoria llegó a 21 unidades en la primera posición del Grupo B, tomando una mayor distancia que el Deportivo San Benito, que no pudo derrotar a Sacachispas al empatar 1-1. En el Grupo A Pajapita está último con 8 puntos, mientras que en el Grupo B el equipo de Barberena se encuentra en el sótano con solo 4 unidades, complicándose ambos equipos en este Apertura 2024. Asi van los Grupos A y B en la Primera División

(AP) — Harrison Butker kicked a 51-yard field goal as time expired and the Kansas City Chiefs, kept alive by a pass interference call on Bengals safety Daijahn Anthony on fourth down in the final minute, rallied to beat Cincinnati 26-25 on Sunday. Patrick Mahomes threw for 151 yards with two touchdowns and two interceptions, but it was his incomplete pass to Rashee Rice on fourth-and-16 from the Kansas City 35 that turned out to be decisive. Anthony arrived a split-second early and hit Rice from behind with his body, and flags flew with 38 seconds remaining as the crowd in Arrowhead Stadium erupted. title: Grande artistas se unen al Super Festival del Merengue celebrarse en Jarabacoa
creator: EFE
content: EL NUEVO DIARIO, SANTO DOMINGO. – Los merengueros Ramón Orlando, Pochy Familia, Kinito Méndez y Fefita la Grande, se han sumado a los ejecutantes del género que participarán del Super Festival del Merengue, a celebrarse el 3 de noviembre en Jarabacoa, provincia de La Vega. El empresario Luis Medrano, responsable de la organización del encuentro, dijo en un comunicado que otras figuras del merengue que participarán son El Jeffrey, Steffany Constanza, El Rubio del Acordeón y José Peña Suazo. Estos se unirán a los consagrados Fernando Villalona, Eddy Herrera, Toño Rosario, Los Hermanos Rosario, Sergio Vargas, Miriam Cruz, Wilfrido Vargas y Alex Bueno, así como a los exponentes del merengue de calle Omega y Ala Jazza. «El presidente Luis Abinader se mantiene firme en su respaldo a las plataformas que promueven a nuestros artistas nacionales. Estos conciertos están creando empleos en la industria del entretenimiento, es un muy importante apoyo a la riqueza cultural y folclórica del país», afirmó Medrano. José Tejeda, presidente del Comité de Desarrollo de Jarabacoa y empresario con una vasta trayectoria en grandes conciertos en Estados Unidos y América Latina, ha expresado su apoyo al festival, agregó el empresario artístico. Durante 10 horas ininterrumpidas, los amantes del merengue disfrutarán de un espectáculo colmado de éxitos. Solo éxitos, cantos y bailes desbordarán emociones nunca antes vividas, con los ídolos dominicanos interpretando el...

title: Nach Schüssen in Florida: Wie kann man Trump schützen?
George Kirby dominates Rangers in Mariners' third straight victory
creator: Field Level Media
content: George Kirby allowed just one hit over seven scoreless innings as the Seattle Mariners defeated the visiting Texas Rangers 7-0 on Sunday afternoon. Mitch Garver and Randy Arozarena homered for the Mariners (77-73), who won their third consecutive game -- all while wearing their City Connect uniforms. The M's are 15-1 when donning their rush blue jerseys and black pants this season. Seattle remained 4 1/2 games behind Houston in the American League West and are 2 1/2 games back of Minnesota for the third and final wild-card berth. The Rangers (71-79) lost for the fifth time in their past six games. The only hit off Kirby (12-11) came with one out in the second inning, when Ezequiel Duran grounded a hard single into right field. The right-hander then got Carson Kelly to ground into an inning-ending double play. Kirby didn't allow a walk and struck out three, facing the minimum 21 batters over seven innings. Rangers lefty Andrew Heaney (5-14) took the loss. Heaney gave up three runs on seven hits in five innings, with one walk and three strikeouts. The Mariners scored all the runs they would need in the first inning. With two outs, Justin Turner lined a single to left and Arozarena walked. Garver, who was a member of the World Series champion Rangers last season, hit the first pitch he saw from Heaney over the fence in center field to make it 3-0. The Mariners tacked on runs in the sixth, seventh and eighth innings to pull away. In the sixth, Luis Urias was hit by a pitch from...

title: Chapecoense 2 x 1 Ceará – Chape segura Vozão e fica perto de deixar a degola
creator: kim
content: Chapecó, SC, 15 (AFI) – A Chapecoense está muito perto de deixar a zona de rebaixamento da Série B do Campeonato Brasileiro . Neste domingo, conquistou a segunda vitória consecutiva ao bater o Ceará por 2 a 1, na Arena Condá, pela 26a rodada. Com o resultado, a Chapecoense subiu para a 17a posição, com 28 pontos, mesma pontuação do Ituano, que leva a melhor no número de vitórias: 8 a 6. O Ceará perdeu a oportunidade de entrar no G-4 e caiu para a sexta posição, com 39. O primeiro tempo foi eletrizante, com as duas equipes buscando o gol. A Chapecoense tomou a iniciativa e assustou logo aos seis minutos, em um chute de Mário Sérgio, que acertou o travessão. A resposta foi na mesma moeda. Lucas Rian recebeu na área e jogou na trave. O Ceará foi crescendo aos poucos e abriu o placar aos 38. Após cruzamento, Léo Vieira e Mancha se atrapalharam e a bola acabou no fundo das redes. A arbitragem acabou marcando gol contra do lateral. Apesar da falha, a Chapecoense não se escondeu e acabou buscando o empate aos 49. Após cobrança de falta, Jhonnathan subiu sozinho e desviou de cabeça para o gol. No segundo tempo, a Chapecoense voltou melhor e fez o segundo aos 12. Marcelinho arriscou de fora da área e fez um golaço, que freou o ímpeto do Ceará. Com isso, a equipe mandante passou a ficar confortável na partida e administrou o duelo através da posse de bola. Após o gol, a Chapecoense recuou, chamou o adversário para o seu campo defensivo e não deixou...

title: “Đêm hội Trăng rằm” mang niềm vui đến cho thiếu nhi khó khăn ở Cần Thơ
content: Tối 15/9, tại Công viên Lưu Hữu Phước, thành phố Cần Thơ, Chương trình “Đêm hội Trăng rằm-San sẻ yêu thương” lần thứ 5 năm 2024 tổ chức trong không khí hào hứng chào đón Tết Trung thu. Sự kiện là hoạt động thường niên vào dịp Tết Trung thu được Tạp chí Gia đình Việt Nam tại Cần Thơ tổ chức nhằm mang lại niềm vui và không khí đầm ấm, đoàn viên cho các thiếu nhi có hoàn cảnh khó khăn, đồng thời thể hiện sự quan tâm của chính quyền địa phương cùng các cấp, các ngành đối với công tác chăm lo cho trẻ em trên địa bàn thành phố. Thông qua chương trình, Ban Tổ chức mong muốn đáp ứng nhu cầu thưởng thức văn hóa, nghệ thuật của thiếu nhi trên địa bàn, qua đó, tạo nên sân chơi giải trí, lành mạnh, an toàn; góp phần nâng cao nhận thức, trách nhiệm của gia đình, cộng đồng và các tổ chức đoàn thể đối với công tác bảo vệ, chăm sóc và giáo dục trẻ em, đảm bảo quyền bình đẳng để mọi trẻ em được tham gia hoạt động vui chơi, giải trí. Với chủ đề “Vui trăng cùng Hằng Nga," Đêm hội Trăng rằm lần thứ 5 năm 2024 bao gồm nhiều hoạt động: Chương trình lễ khai mạc hội Tết Trung Thu, hoạt động giao lưu, giới thiệu sản phẩm của gần 60 kiốt phát quà, trò chơi dân gian và đặc biệt là Chương trình...

title: FBI geht von versuchtem Attentat auf Trump aus
content: In der Nähe des republikanischen Präsidentschaftskandidaten Donald Trump fallen Schüsse. Das FBI geht von einem mutmaßlichen Attentatsversuch aus. Ein Verdächtiger wird festgenommen. Washington - Der Secret Service hat nach eigenen Angaben anscheinend ein versuchtes Attentat auf den republikanischen US-Präsidentschaftskandidaten Donald Trump vereitelt. Laut dem Sicherheitsdienst, der in den USA für den Schutz hochrangiger Politiker zuständig ist, befindet sich Trump in Sicherheit und ist unverletzt. Nach Polizeiangaben fielen Schüsse, als Trump gerade Golf im Bundesstaat Florida spielte. Auch Stunden später war ungeklärt, ob nur die Personenschützer geschossen haben oder auch der mutmaßliche Attentäter. Die Polizei nahm einen Verdächtigen fest, den sie für den Angreifer hält. Der Secret Service habe am Sonntagnachmittag (Ortszeit) in West Palm Beach auf den mutmaßlichen Täter geschossen, sagte Rafael Barros, ein Sprecher des Sicherheitsdienstes. Der bewaffnete Mann habe sich an der Grundstücksgrenze zu Trumps Golfklub aufgehalten und sei anschließend geflohen, hieß es. Auf einer Autobahn in der Nähe des Tatorts Palm Beach sei ein Auto gestoppt und der Fahrer in Gewahrsam genommen worden, sagte William D. Snyder von der zuständigen Polizei. Der Mann habe ruhig und gelassen gewirkt. Verdächtiger nur wenige Hundert Meter von Trump entfernt Viele Fragen waren zunächst ungeklärt - erste Details gaben die Behörden bei einer Pressekonferenz bekannt: So habe...

title: 美, 경찰관 모십니다...1년만에 급여 37% 급상승
content: ‘경찰관은 지금 미국에서 가장 뜨거운 직업 중 하나.’ 뜨거웠던 미국 고용시장이 점차 식어가고 있는 가운데 주 정부 및 연방 정부 일자리는 여전히 선방하고 있고, 그 중심에 경찰 및 보안관 등 법 집행 기관 일자리가 있는 것으로 나타났다. CNN은 고용 데이터 플랫폼 집리크루터를 인용, 경찰관의 올해 1월부터 8월까지 평균 급여가 지난해 같은 기간 대비 37% 상승했다고 지난 9일 보도했다. 2022년부터 2023년까지 경찰직의 평균 급여가 약 8% 상승한 것과 비교해 보면 경찰관에 대한 수요가 늘고 있다는 것이다. CNN은 2020년 조지 플로이드의 살인 사건 이후 지원자 수가 급감하고 퇴직자가 급증하는 등 경찰관 업무에 대한 반감이 있었지만, 최근 경찰서와 보안관 사무실이 적극적으로 인재 채용에 나서고 있다고 전했다. 조지 플로이드 사망 사건은 2020년 5월 미니애폴리스 경찰이 흑인인 조지 플로이드를 체포하는 과정에서 무릎으로 목을 눌러 숨지게 한 사건이다. 이 사건은 경찰의 과잉 진압과 인종 차별에 대한 전국적인 시위를 촉발시킨 바 있다. 집리크루터 수석 이코노미스트 줄리아 폴락은 “경찰이 채용 및 유지 위기를 겪은 이후 경찰직을 더 매력적으로 만들기 위해 노력하고 있다”고 CNN에 말했다. 각 경찰서는 경찰 채용을 늘리기 위해 급여를 인상하고 지원 절차를 더 원활하게 했다. 일부 경찰서는 공무원으로 20년 동안 근무하면 평생 의료 보험 혜택을 제공한다고 CNN은 전했다. 미 노동부의 지난 6일 발표에...

title: Remo 0 x 0 Volta Redonda – Leão pressiona mas Voltaço se segura
creator: Joao Chaves
content: Belém, PA, 15 (AFI) – O Remo voltou ao Mangueirão após a festa na estreia da segunda fase, e neste domingo (15) ficou apenas no empate com o Volta Redonda , por 0 a 0. Apesar da pressão azulina, o Voltaço segurou as pontas, também apelando para a cera, e segurando o resultado na terceira rodada do Campeonato Brasileiro da Série c . Com o resultado, a dupla segue grudada na liderança do Grupo B, ambos com cinco pontos conquistados. A vantagem é fluminense, com dois de saldo contra um do time azulino. Em terceiro, o São Bernardo alcançou quatro pontos na rodada, ao vencer o Botafogo-PB, que é o lanterna com apenas um ponto. NOVIDADE! Futebol Interior agora está nos Canais do WhatsApp. Participe agora! A bola mal rolou no Mangueirão e o Remo já teve uma primeira oportunidade, com Pedro Vitor, que cabeceou mas parou em Jean Drosny. Aos 13, nova chance do Azulino que surgiu no erro de saída de bola, quando Jaderson pressionou e ela sobrou com Ytalo. O atacante finalizou mal, e viu Jean Drosny salvar o Volta Redonda. O Volta Redonda respondeu em escanteio no segundo poste, que encontrou Bruno Santos. O centroavante cabeceou e venceu Marcelo Rangel, mas Ligger apareceu em cima da linha para salvar. O Leão assustou quando Giovanni Pavani emendou um voleio, mas errou a meta. Em falta próxima da área, foi a vez de Diogo Batista assustar o Voltaço, mas a finalização colocada saiu por muito pouco. A pressão remista se intensificou na reta final, circulando a bola...

title: 초밥 40만 원어치 주문한 평창동 회장님댁...배달 기사에 10만 원 팁
content: 평창동에 초밥을 배달 갔다가 예상치 못한 팁을 받았다는 배달 기사의 후기에 이목이 쏠리고 있다. 14일 여러 온라인 커뮤니티에는 '평창동 회장님댁에 초밥 40만 원어치 배달하고 받은 팁'이라는 제목의 글이 올라왔다. 배달 기사 A 씨는 "어제 평창동 모 기업 회장님댁에 초밥 40만 원어치 배달 갔는데 사모님이 고맙다고 명절 잘 보내라고 상품권 주셨다"라며 한 장의 사진을 공개했다. 공개된 사진에는 10만 원짜리 상품권이 담겨 있다. A 씨는 "40만 원 주문이라 배달비랑 할증 붙어 짭짤한데 상품권까지 주시다니"라며 고마워했다. 누리꾼들은 "초밥집 어딘지도 궁금하다", "안 베푸는 집도 많은데", "멋지시다. 나도 저런 사람이 되고 싶다", "저런 집은 뭐 하는 집인지 궁금하다. 베푸는 거 보니까 보기 좋다", "곳간에서 인심 나는 거지. 멋지다" 등의 반응을 보였다. 뉴스1> [c 세계일보 & Segye.com, 무단전재 및 재배포 금지]

title: Động đất có độ lớn 6,5 ngoài khơi Canada, không có cảnh báo sóng thần
content: Cơ quan Khảo sát Địa chất Mỹ (USGS) ngày 15/9 (giờ địa phương) cho biết một trận động đất có độ lớn 6,5 đã xảy ra ngoài khơi thành phố Port McNeill, thuộc tỉnh bang British Columbia của Canada trước đó cùng ngày. Theo USGS, tâm chấn của trận động đất nằm ở Thái Bình Dương, cách mực nước biển khoảng 10km. Trung tâm Cảnh báo Sóng thần của Mỹ không đưa ra cảnh báo sóng thần sau trận động đất này./. Bán đảo Kamchatka nằm ở vùng Viễn Đông của Nga là nơi nổi tiếng với những cụm núi lửa lớn, một điểm đến du lịch hấp dẫn và được UNESCO đưa vào danh sách Di sản Thế giới.

title: Томаш Бердих пое капитанската лента в Чехия
content: Двукратният шампион на Купа "Дейвис" Томаш Бердиш пое капитанския пост на отбора на Чехия, съобщава ДПА. 38-годиният наследи на позицията Ярослав Навратил, който водеше тима за Купа "Дейвис" в продължение почти на 20 години. Бердих, който е финалист от "Уимбълдън" през 2010, заяви: "Имах незабравими моменти в кариерата ми на Купа "Дейвис", така че не съм се колебал и за момент, преди да приема предложението". Той печели с тима на Чехия Купа "Дейвис" през 2012 и 2013. Той ще поеме отбора в квалификациите през следващата година, след като тимът завърни на дъното на Група "B" и пропусна да се класира за финалите на турнира през ноември в Малага. title: Un plan claro, los errores y un empate logrado desde el banco
creator: Hugo García
content: Talleres terminó sufriendo para poder empatar 2 a 2 con Rosario Central un partido que había arrancado en grande. Fue un viaje al pasado, a episodios que tuvo aquel Talleres de Walter Ribonetto, cuando hacía lo mejor y lo peor, de una sola pieza. Ahora, ocurrió en esta versión de Alexander Medina. La “T” inició el partido ganando por la viveza de Botta: el “10′′ aprovechó que el arquero Werner puso cinco hombres en barrera y que Cátalan estaba solo. Luego, pasó a vivir su peor momento al conceder dos penales, con expulsión de Ortegoza por doble amonestación por la falta a Enzo Copetti. Salió de ahí con la combinación de Blas Riveros y Cristian Tarragona, dos de los cinco cambios que hizo Alexander Medina. Las claves El 1-0 y lo mejor. La “T” arrancó ganando desde el vestuario con una propuesta que giró en torno a la impronta de Rubén Botta, algo que le permitió a la “T” llegar al menos cinco veces en la etapa. Logró el 1-0 con Matías Catalán, de pelota detenida con asistencia de Botta; luego, tuvo otro tiro desde afuera, Ulises Ortegoza y Matías Galarza perdieron sus mano a mano con Werner y finalmente el arquero local salvó dos tiros comprometidos, uno de Federico Girotti y el siguiente de Valentín Depietri, ambos contra un palo. Facturas. El partido cambió de manos por dos errores de Talleres. Una falta imprudente de Federico Girotti contra Damián Martínez en la puerta del área para evitar su remate y otra de Ulises Ortegoza a Enzo Copetti a...

title: 흥국證 "HPSP, 고객사 다변화 시작...투자의견 매수"
creator: 송하준
content: [사진=HPSP] 흥국증권은 최근 보고서에서 HPSP의 주당순이익(EPS) 추정치 변경에 따라 목표주가를 기존 5만5000원에서 4만2000원으로 하향 조정했다. 다만 투자의견 매수를 유지했다. 이의진 흥국증권 연구원은 "HPSP의 3분기 매출액은 467억원으로 전년동기 대비 11% 증가하고, 영업이익은 13% 늘어난 244억원을 기록할 것"이라며 "4분기는 메모리 투자의 회복과 더불어 중화권의 반도체 설비 투자 증가로 인해 신규 고객사향 매출액이 유의미하게 반영되어 ASP의 믹스개선에 기여할 것"이라고 분석했다. 이 연구원은 "차세대 HBM을 위한 D1c(6세대 10나노급 D램)의 설비투자는 필수"라며 "D1c에서 미세화로 인한 디램 신규 고객 확보는 기대할 수 있는 부분"이라고 말했다. 이어 "HPSP가 보유한 고압수소열처리를 이용한 하이브리드 본딩을 활용해 향후 성장세가 예상된다"고 덧붙였다. googletag.cmd.push(function() { googletag.display('div-gpt-ad-1681949839646-0'); }); 관련기사 DS투자證 "HPSP, 실적부진 지속...목표주가↓" 거래소, HPSP·와이지엔터 등 49곳 코스닥 글로벌 기업 지정 그러면서 "HPSP가 가진 기술 독점력과 모든 탑티어 고객사를 확보하고 있다는 점, 본격적으로 시작되는 중화궈 고객사 확대와 신규 장비에 대한 가치가 주가에 반영될 수 있다"고 말했다. 한국투자증권도 지난 5일 HPSP에 대해 목표주가를 기존 5만8000원에서 10% 하향 조정한 5만2000원으로 제시했다. 채민숙 한국투자증권 연구원은 "HPSP의 2분기 영업이익은 컨센서스 156억원을 22%...

title: Donald Trump Safe After New Assassination Attempt, Suspect Arrested
content: , - Republican presidential candidate was safe on Sunday, September 15, 2024, after what the FBI said appeared to be a second assassination attempt while he was golfing on his course in West Palm Beach, Florida. Law enforcement officials said U.S. agents spotted and fired on a gunman in some bushes near the property line who dropped an AK-47-style assault rifle and was arrested after fleeing the scene. The New York Times and Fox News identified the suspect as Ryan Wesley Routh, 58, of Hawaii, citing unnamed law enforcement officials. The FBI declined to comment on the suspect's identity, and other law enforcement agencies involved did not respond to requests for comment. After spotting the rifle barrel about 400 to 500 yards (365 to 457 meters) away from Trump as they cleared holes of potential threats ahead of his play, the agents engaged the gunman and fired at least four rounds of ammunition around 1:30 p.m. (1730 GMT), Palm Beach County Sheriff Ric Bradshaw told a news conference. The gunman then dropped his rifle, two backpacks and other items and fled in a black Nissan car. A witness, the sheriff said, saw the gunman and managed to take photos of his car and license plate. "The Secret Service did exactly what should have been done," Bradshaw added. After the suspect fled the scene, law enforcement officials said they sent out an alert to statewide agencies with the information on his vehicle, which led to sheriff’s deputies in neighboring Martin County apprehending the...

title: 인천서 충전하던 유아 전동차, 폭발 후 화재...인명피해 없어
creator: 김동영 기자
content: [인천=뉴시스] 김동영 기자 = 인천 다세대주택에서 충전 중이던 유아용 전동차 배터리가 폭발하면서 화재가 발생했다. 16일 인천소방본부에 따르면 전날 오전 8시10분께 서구 왕길동 다세대주택 2층에서 불이 났다. 이 불로 인명피해는 없었으나, 주택 내부와 유리창·가재도구 등이 불에 타 소방 당국 추산 600만원 상당의 재산 피해가 발생했다. “빌라에 불이 났다”는 신고를 받고 출동한 소방 당국은 인력 50명과 펌프 차량 등 장비 14대를 동원해 같은날 44분만에 불을 완전히 껐다. 소방 당국은 불이 난 2층 세대 방에서 충전 중이던 유아용 전동차 배터리가 폭발하면서 화재가 발생한 것으로 추정하고 정확한 화재 원인을 조사 중이다. ◎공감언론 뉴시스

title: WA news LIVE: Perth passenger charged over nightclub taxi crash
content: A Thornlie home has been gutted by fire overnight, forcing the young family who lived inside to flee to neighbours. 9 News Perth , who is at the scene this morning, said neighbours reported the flames being higher than the house “within minutes”, with one couple woken by the blaze. “I heard popping noises, it was very scary,” Maree Baker said. The house has been destroyed, with CCTV appearing to show the fire started in the garage. To overnight news now and a Mirrabooka man, 37, has been charged after an altercation inside a taxi allegedly led to a crash in Northbridge. WA Police said the incident occurred outside a nightclub on James Street around 3.25am yesterday. It’s alleged the accused man got into an argument with the taxi driver causing the driver to accelerate up the footpath and into the front wall of a restaurant. Two of the occupants, a man and woman in their 30s, had to be cut out of the vehicle, and three of the occupants were taken to hospital, including the 24-year-old taxi driver who sustained serious injuries. The accused man has been charged with making a threat to do an unlawful act, grievous bodily harm and endangering the life or safety of a person. He is due to appear before the Perth Magistrates Court today. Here’s what has made headlines this morning: Good morning all and welcome to the first live blog for the week. Making news locally, two sprawling, dilapidated Chinese-style mansions have sold sight unseen for just $1.95 million apiece to a yet to...

title: Guillermo Francos reveló un cruce con Santiago Caputo y Adorni, en la previa al Presupuesto 2025
creator: Daniel Quilodrán
content: El jefe de Gabinete, Guillermo Francos , reapareció tras su internación para participar de la presentación del Presupuesto 2025 . Habló sobre peleas con Santiago Caputo y Manuel Adorni , y negó su renuncia. «Ya estoy totalmente recuperado . Pasé por la oficina un rato el jueves y el viernes, y hoy a la noche voy a estar en Diputados donde el presidente va a exponer sobre el Presupuesto 2025. Y a continuar con la tarea después de un pequeño alto. Ya estoy bien, me siento perfecto «, comentó sobre su estado de salud el funcionario durante una entrevista en radio Mitre. Francos permaneció internado en observación dos días, tras una supuesta lipotimia —según se dijo en un primer momento—. «Lo que tuve fue una infección. Una infección urinaria, fundamentalmente. Que normalmente las infecciones atacan de distinta forma, y a mí me hizo perder un poco el conocimiento y ese fue el motivo por el que estuve internado desde el sábado a la noche hasta el lunes a la noche», explicó. El jefe de Gabinete aseguró que previo a su internación hubo un cruce con el asesor presidencial Santiago Caputo y con el portavoz Manuel Adorni . Algunos medios de comunicación aseguraron que este escenario propició la internación. «No se si habrá sido un estresazo, la verdad. Esta tarea demanda mucho empeño ¿no? Mucho trabajo, mucha tensión. Y genera mucha tensión, también. Supongo que eso puede haber tenido algo que ver. Cuando uno tiene un proceso infeccioso, eso puede impactar...

title: BINGE greenlights The Twelve Season 3 from Warner Bros. International Television Production Australia and Easy Tiger
creator: Jasper Baumann
content: BINGE and Screenwest have revealed Season 3 of The Twelve has been commissioned and is now in production in Western Australia. The Twelve focuses on twelve jurors as they wrestle with their duty to deliver a verdict while navigating their own personal issues. Sam Neill will return to the anthology series to reprise his role of Brett Colby SC, as the lives of the jury unravel throughout a cold case murder trial. Season 2 was the biggest-ever production to take place in WA, as well as being the first series to kick off the WA Production Attraction Incentive (WAPAI). Following the success of Seasons 1 and 2, Season 3 will be set in the Margaret River region and Perth surrounds, including Parliament House and the ABC Studios. Sam Neill as BRETT COLBY, The Twelve Season 2 BINGE, Warner Bros. International Television Production Australia and Easy Tiger’s partnership with Screenwest delivered $9.6m to the WA economy and created more than 650 jobs as part of The Twelve Season 2. With the continued partnership it is anticipated that Season 3 will deliver a $10m injection into the WA economy and provide a similar number of jobs. With a run of 8 x 1-hour episodes, Season 3 of The Twelve is written by Sarah L. Walker, Matt Cameron, Mia Lethbridge, Adele Vuko and Sam Meikle. The series will be set up and directed by Madeleine Gottlieb ( Erotic Stories, Latecomers ) and Mark Joffe ( Jack Irish ), with casting by Kirsty McGregor and Will Pearce. The producers are Hamish Lewis and Michael...

title: Gabriel Castellón celebra su record por U de Chile: "No cualquiera se pone en este arco"
creator: Cristián Fajardo C.
content: Un importantísimo triunfo consiguió Universidad de Chile , luego de vencer por 1-0 a Palestino por la fecha 24 del Campeonato Nacional, lo que le permite estirar ventajas en el primer lugar de la tabla de posiciones. Dentro del compromiso jugado en el Estadio Nacional, también hubo un histórico momento para el club, luego de que el portero Gabriel Castellón logró superar la marca de la meta menos vencida. En ese sentido, el arco dejó en el pasado lo realizado en este punto a Johnny Herrera y Sergio Vargas, lo que le permite meterse con todos en los libros de estadística de la U. Algo que fue celebrado en las redes sociales del club, además por el jugador y sus compañeros: “Gabriel Castellón superó los 626 minutos sin recibir goles, el último récord de imbatibilidad del arco de la U, superando a al gran Sergio Bernabé Vargas, por Campeonatos de Primera División”. ver también El arco de U de Chile en las manos de Gabriel Castellón Universidad de Chile sigue encaminada para lograr el objetivo de la lucha por el título del Campeonato Nacional, donde esta nueva marca los acerca más a una gran celebración. “Feliz, uno se enfoca en lo grupal, el equipo se lleva el premio, pero aporto mi granito en que no nos hagan goles y eso ayuda a que podamos ganar. Feliz de poder estar en la historia de la U y queremos lograr más cosas”, comentó Castellón. title: Gouvernement et ban syndical de l’ESU signent un protocole d’accord
creator: Radio Okapi
content: Un protocole d’accord a été conclu samedi 14 septembre à Kinshasa, en entre le Gouvernement et le ban syndical, pour l’amélioration des conditions de travail et de salaire du personnel de l’Enseignement supérieur, universitaire et recherche scientifique (ESU). « Les présents travaux ont abouti à un protocole d’accord constituant un addendum à l’accord de 2022, dit « accords de bibwa 1 ». Le succès de tout accord réside dans la volonté des parties de l’appliquer de bonne foi ; c’est ici que devra entrer en action le comité interministériel permanent, de suivi et d’évaluation », a affirmé Marie-Thérèse Sombo Ayanne Safi, ministre de l’Enseignement supérieur et universitaire. Elle a salué l’engagement de délégués syndicaux, qui accepté de travailler en sourdine aux termes des travaux de la Commission paritaire entre les deux parties, lancés depuis le 02 septembre 2024 à Bibwa, en attendant une réponse appropriée aux préalables qu’ils avaient posés. Ces travaux paritaires avaient pour objectif d’évaluer le niveau d’exécution des engagements pris par le Gouvernement et le ban syndical en avril 2022. Une feuille de route a été présentée au Gouvernement, à cette occasion, portant des propositions concrètes qui visent à garantir la paix à la rentrée académique 2024-2025. Au total, 204 experts des bans gouvernemental et syndical de l’ESU, venus de différentes provinces de la République démocratique du Congo, ont pris part à ces travaux.

title: Ghaziabad News: क्रेन पर टूट कर गिरा एचटी लाइन का तार फैक्टरी मालिक और ऑपरेटर की गई जान
Sandro, un ‘romperredes’ dolido
creator: Fernando Canellada
content: Palco 21 Sandro, delantero de la UD Las Palmas. / EFE Fernando Canellada Sandro marcó un golazo de falta de auténtico especialista en pegada . El gran canario disfruta de un buen momento aunque se confiesa «jodido» por las derrotas del equipo . Sandro, con tres goles ya, sobresale por la potencia de su pegada , tanta que el balón hizo un extraño en la falta y dejó al portero rojiblanco boquiabierto. Recordaba el derechazo, según la historia futbolística, al hombre que rompió la red. Paulino Alcántara Riestra, nacido en Filipinas en 1896, y pese a que se retiró en 1927, fue un goleador del Barça solo destronado por Messi. Se encumbró en un partido de España en 1922, en Burdeos, en un amistoso, como capitán, y en el que compartía alineación, entre otros, con Zamora, Samitier y Meana. Desde aquel día le apodaron ‘romperredes’ por un chutazo que quebró la portería. No será el caso de Sandro, pero el delantero se ha ganado el prestigio con el golpeo. El viaje a la historia del balompié nacional no evita volver a la dura realidad. Otra derrota y van 219 días sin conocer la victoria. Dos escenas vistas desde este palco reflejan la diferencia entre los conjuntos sobre el terreno. Un balón de Kirian que ya se colaba en la portería visitante salió de la misma línea al lanzarse el defensa Paredes. Por el contrario, en el último gol del Athletic, cuatro defensas amarillos quedaron clavados y dos atacantes solos antes Cillesen. LA CRÓNICA: La UD se inmola,...

title: Campbellville man nabbed with unlicensed gun, ammo
creator: INEWS
content: See below for the full police report: At about 01:25 hrs today (Sunday), Police ranks arrested Jamal Rollox, a 37-year-old Miner from Campbellville, Georgetown, after he was found to be in possession of an unlicensed Smith & Wesson Springfield Glock 40 pistol, which contained ten (10) live rounds of 9MM ammunition. title: شركة الكهرباء تعلن فصل التيار احترازيًا عن بعض المناطق والمنازل في سبها، لتجنيب المواطنين خطورة التعرض للصعقات الكهربائية .
creator: وكالة الأنباء الليبية
content: سبها 15 سبتمبر 2024 ( وال ) – أعلنت الشركة العامة للكهرباء اليوم الاحد فصل التيار احترازيًا عن بعض المناطق والمنازل في سبها، لتجنيب المواطنين خطورة التعرض للصعقات الكهربائية . وذكر المكتب الاعلامي للشركة في بيان له أن مجلس ادارة الشركة يتابع عن كثب الوضع الدائر بالمدينة على مدار الساعة ، مع كافة الجهات المعنية، ودوائرها العاملة هناك . واوضح البيان انه تمكنّا من إعادة التيار لغالبية المناطق المتضررة ، واضطررنا للفصل الاحترازي عن بعض المناطق والمنازل لتجنيب المواطنين بها خطورة التعرض للصعقات الكهربائية . ودعا البيان كافة المواطنين لعدم التردد بالاتصال والإبلاغ عن أي أعطال كهربائية في منازلهم ، نظرًا لتسرب المياه لغرف كهرباء بعض الشبكات المنزلية ، ونُحذرهم من التعامل مع الأعطال المنزلية بشكل فردي، لما تشكله من خطورة بالغة على حياتهم . وقدم رئيس وأعضاء مجلس إدارة الشركة العامة للكهرباء بخالص العزاء لذوي ضحايا هذه الأمطار ، سائلين المولى عز وجل أن يتغمدهم بواسع رحمته ويلهم ذويهم الصبر والسلوان ، وأن يمن على المصابين بالشفاء العاجل يشار إلى الأمطار الغزيرة غير المسبوقة التي شهدتها مدينة سبها وضواحيها الليلة الماضية وما خلفته من أضرار بمكونات الشبكة الكهربائية ببعض مناطق المدينة أدت لفصلها عن الشبكة العامة . .. ( وال ) .. يمكنك ايضا قراءة الخبر في المصدر من وكالة الانباء الليبية

title: Названо имя покушавшегося на Трампа, он был одержим конфликтом на Украине
content: Как уточняет New York Post , Раут часто хвастался своими добродетельными качествами и отстаивал левые идеи в социальных сетях. Известно, что учился он в Государственном сельскохозяйственном и техническом университете Северной Каролины и переехал на Гавайи примерно в 2018 году. Между тем конгрессвумен Марджори Тейлор Грин уже заявила, что задержанный был "одержим" конфликтом на Украине. Она напомнила, что Трамп не раз заявлял, что положит вооруженному противостоянию конец. "Человека, который пытался убить его сегодня, зовут Райан Уэсли Раут. Люди публикуют эти фотографии. Это тот самый потенциальный убийца? Если это так, то он одержим войной на Украине, которая финансируется США", - написала Грин на своей странице в Х (бывший Twitter, заблокирован в РФ). Республиканка разместила в соцсети скриншоты со страницы Раута. На одном из запечатлено, как он позирует на майдане Незалежности (площадь Независимости) в Киеве. По остальным фото мужчины можно сделать вывод, что он активно поддерживает Украину в конфликте и, по всей видимости, пытался вербовать людей для участия в боевых действиях на стороне Киева. При этом РИА Новости уточняет, что официально эта информация пока не подтверждена. Напомним, попытка покушения на Трампа произошла в воскресенье в гольф-клубе во Флориде. Агенты секретной службы заметили вооруженного человека и открыли по нему огонь . Подозреваемый попытался сбежать, но был задержан полицейскими, при нем обнаружили длинноствольное оружие....

title: “이재명과 싸우랬더니 손을 잡아”... 추락하는 한동훈 지지율
content: “이재명이랑 싸우라고 뽑아놨더니 협치를 하고 있다.” 복수의 국민의힘 관계자들이 취임 두 달을 맞는 한동훈 대표에 대해 내놓은 평가다. 4·10 총선 참패 후 7·23 전당대회 이전까지 무기력함이 지배했던 당내에서는 한 대표에 대한 기대감이 감돌았다. 소위 친한(친한동훈)계가 아닌 당 관계자들 역시 한 대표가 ‘이재명 대항마’로 활약하면 당 지지율 상승이 가능하다고 했다. 하지만 현실은 윤석열 대통령, 국민의힘은 물론 한 대표의 지지율까지 동반 추락하고 있다. 총선 이전 윤 대통령의 지지율이 하락했지만, 당시 비상대책위원장이었던 한 대표와 당 지지율은 올랐던 ‘디커플링’ 현상이 일어났던 것과 사뭇 다른 모습이다. 6개월 전까지 차기 대통령감을 묻는 조사에서 이 대표와 어깨를 나란히 했던 한 대표는 최근 들어 이 대표에게 확실한 1위 자리를 내주기도 했다. 지난 3∼5일 전국 만 18세 이상 유권자 1001명을 대상으로 한 한국갤럽 9월 1주 조사(95% 신뢰 수준에 표본오차 ±3.1%포인트)에서 ‘장래 대통령감으로 누가 좋다고 생각하는지’를 물은 결과 이 대표는 26%, 한 대표는 14%를 차지했다. 총선 1달 전이었던 3월 1주 조사와 비교하면 이 대표는 23%에서 3%포인트 올랐고, 한 대표는 24%에서 10%포인트 떨어졌다. 한 대표 취임 전후를 비교하면 19%(7월 4주)에서 5주 만에 5%포인트 하락했다. (자세한 내용은 중앙여론조사심의위원회 홈페이지 참조) 최근 여론조사 결과를 두고 이강윤 한국사회여론연구소 고문은 13일 MBC 라디오에서...

title: 충남 홍성 전신주서 불...604세대 3시간 정전
creator: 김덕진 기자
content: [홍성=뉴시스]김덕진 기자 = 15일 충남 홍성군 홍성읍 월산리의 한 아파트 주변 전신주에서 불이 났다. 16일 홍성소방서에 따르면 전날 오후 10시 넘어서 이 아파트 앞쪽 전신주에서 화재가 발생해 604세대가 3시간 가까이 정전이 되는 사고가 발생했다. 소방 관계자는 "전신주 케이블 헤드가 노후된데다 요즘 날씨가 더워 전기 사용량이 많아져 스파크가 발생, 불이 난 것으로 추정하고 있다"며 "오늘 오전 1시 넘어서 복구가 된 것으로 알고 있다"고 밝혔다. ◎공감언론 뉴시스

title: Kayıp sağlık çalışanı aracında ölü bulundu
content: Olay, Yunus Mahallesi Dereköy yolu üzerinde akşam saatlerinde meydana geldi. Aktarılan bilgilere göre 37 yaşındaki sağlık çalışanı Şahin Caner’e ulaşamayan ailesi polise kayıp başvurusunda bulundu. Çalışmalara başlayan polis ekipleri Şahin Caner’in aracının en son Yunus Mahallesi’nde görüldüğünü belirledi. Arama çalışmalarını o bölgede yoğunlaştıran polisler aracı Dereköy yolu üzerinde park halinde buldu. Aracın yanına giden ekipler Şahin Caner’i kapıları kilitli olan araçta hareketsiz vaziyette görünce, olay yerine sağlık ve itfaiye ekibi istedi. Otomobilde hareketsiz halde duran Caner'e müdahale etmek için aracın camı itfaiye gelmeden kırılarak kapıları açıldı. Sağlık ekibi araçta silahla kalbinden tek kurşunla vurulmuş halde olan Caner’in çoktan yaşamını yitirdiğini belirledi. Haber alarak olay yerine gelen Şahin Caner’in yakınları ise sinir krizi geçirdi. Cumhuriyet savcısının olay yerinde yaptığı incelemenin ardından Şahin Caner’in cesedi otopsi yapılmak üzere görev yaptığı hastanenin morguna sevk edildi.

title: Así cayó la 'torre de Babel' que llevaba marihuana desde la Región de Murcia a Reino Unido y a Europa
content: Un sueco, un irlandés, dos británicos, un granadino y dos murcianos. Parece el inicio de un chiste malo, pero no lo es. El servicio de inteligencia de la Policía Judicial de la Guardia Civil de Madrid investigaba a este grupo porque, según sus informaciones, esta especie de 'torre de Babel' se dedicaba al tráfico internacional de cannabis, que tenía su origen en países del norte de África, donde conseguían parte de la droga. Luego la trasladaban a España, desde donde la transportaban por carretera a países de Europa y Reino Unido, previo encargo de los clientes. Tal información fue alimentándose durante el año 2017 con datos de confidentes e indicios que eran los resultados de los seguimientos que los agentes habían hecho de los supuestos traficantes. El informe fue trasladado al Equipo de Delincuencia Organizada y Antidroga (Edoa) de Murcia, que situó bajo su radar una nave industrial en el Polígono Industrial Oeste de San Ginés, en Alcantarilla. La organización utilizaba, supuestamente, una 'empresa fachada' de distribución de pescado para encubrir sus actividades ilegales, logrando mover importantes cantidades de cannabis y hachís por distintas rutas desde el sur y el levante del país. Según el último 'soplo' que recibieron, el entramado empresarial que investigaban iba a realizar un inminente transporte de marihuana. La droga estaba almacenada en la nave industrial de Alcantarilla que había sido alquilada por el murciano L. O. V., de 45 años, y...

title: Toàn cảnh khu vực sẽ được đầu tư 5 tỷ USD để xây dựng cảng trung chuyển quốc tế rộng 50 km2 tại Hải Phòng
content: Thành phố Hải Phòng có vị trí đặc biệt quan trọng khi là trung tâm của chuỗi hành lang đô thị; cửa ngõ giao thương quốc tế chính ra biển của miền Bắc Việt Nam... Với nhiều lợi thế trong phát triển kinh tế biển thì việc xây dựng những cảng trung chuyển tại Hải Phòng là hợp lý và rất cần thiết. Vào năm 2023, UBND thành phố Hải Phòng cùng Tổng Công ty Phát triển Đô thị Kinh Bắc (KBC), CTCP Công nghệ Viễn thông Sài Gòn (Saigontel, SGT), Công ty Energy Capital Vietnam (ECV) với Cảng Los Angeles - Hoa Kỳ (POLA) đã cùng thỏa thuận hợp tác nghiên cứu phát triển dự án Cảng tổng hợp Nam Đồ Sơn tại thành phố Hải Phòng. Trong ảnh là vị trí Cảng trong quy hoạch. Thông qua thỏa thuận hợp tác này, các bên sẽ cùng nhau nghiên cứu phát triển dự án Cảng tổng hợp Nam Đồ Sơn tại thành phố Hải Phòng, xây dựng cảng Nam Đồ Sơn trở thành cảng cửa ngõ hiện đại, nơi trung chuyển hàng hóa nội địa và quốc tế của Việt Nam. Trong ảnh là khu vực xây cảng. Dự án xây dựng Cảng Nam Đồ Sơn sẽ có tổng vốn đầu tư dự kiến khoảng 5 tỷ USD, tương đương 120.000 tỷ đồng (tính theo tỷ giá 1 USD = 24.000 đồng). Số tiền này gần bằng mức đầu tư của sân bay Long Thành giai đoạn một, và gấp khoảng 1,5 lần giá trị đường vành đai 4 Vùng...

title: Nhận đền bù gần 7 tỷ đồng, cụ bà viết di chúc trao cho con gái, 2 người con trai không có tên chẳng dám trách nửa lời
content: Bài viết dưới đây là chia sẻ của bà Thương ( Trung Quốc ) đang được nhiều người quan tâm trên Toutiao. Sau 10 năm kết hôn, vợ chồng tôi sinh được 3 người con. May mắn, 2 người con trai của tôi có cuộc sống vô cùng khá giả. Còn cô con gái có điều kiện khó khăn hơn chút. Sau khi lấy nhau được khoảng 5 năm, con rể phải ngồi xe lăn vĩnh viễn sau 1 tai nạn ô tô. Mọi chuyện trong nhà đều 1 tay con gái tôi lo toan. Thấy thực tế đó, chúng tôi vô cùng đau lòng nhưng cũng không thể giúp đỡ được gì nhiều. Để không tạo quá nhiều gánh nặng và áp lực cho các con, tôi và chồng đã thống nhất vẫn đi làm thêm sau khi nghỉ hưu. Tôi thường nhận giúp việc cho 1 số gia đình giàu có trong làng. Còn chồng tôi đi theo các chủ thầu để xây dựng các công trình. Nhìn chung, những công việc này có mức lương không cao. Song chúng tôi xem đây là cách vơi đi nỗi buồn thay vì chỉ mãi quanh quẩn ở nhà. Ngày hôm đó, tôi bất ngờ nhận được cuộc điện thoại thông báo ông xã bị ngã từ trên giàn giáo, phải cấp cứu. Tôi đã bỏ hết công việc để vào viện ngay lập tức. Sau khi kiểm tra, bác sĩ cho biết chồng tôi cần phẫu thuật càng sớm càng tốt, nếu không khó có thể cứu sống. Tuy nhiên, ca mổ này có phi phí rất cao, lên...

title: Канада сломи Великобритания и се класира сред последните осем на Купа “Дейвис”
content: Тимът на Канада се наложи над домакините от Великобритания с 2:1 в група "D" на Купа "Дейвис" и се класира за четвъртфиналите в Малага през месец ноември, предаде Ройтерс. В същото време защитаващият титлата си тим на Италия победи Нидерландия в Болоня и завърши на първо място в Група "А". Денис Шаповалов от Канада се наложи над британеца Дан Еванс с 6:0, 7:5, като отпразнува успеха си със слабодел на корта. "Не беше лесно да играя срещу толкова много британци", каза той, визирайки 15-хилядната публика в залата. Феликс Оже-Алиасим донесе успеха на шампионите от Канада от 2022, като надигра Джак Дрейпър със 7:6 (8), 7:5. На двойки Великобратиня все пак записа малък успех, като Хенри Патън и Нийл Скупски надиграха Габриел Диало и Алексис Галарно със 7:5, 6:4. Отборите на Италия, Испания, Австралия, САЩ, Германия, Канада и Аржентина се класираха за финалния турнир в Малага, който ще се проведе между 19 и 24 ноември, а жребият ще бъде теглен през следващата седмица. Световният номер 1 Яник Синер изгледа мачовете в Болоня, като Италия поведе на Нидерландия с 2:0. Матео Беретини спечели срещу Ботик ван де Зандшулп с 3:6, 6:4, 6:4, а Флавио Коболи надигра Талон Грикспоор със 7:6 (4), 4:6, 6:3. Нидерландия също може да се класира за финалите, ако спечели срещата на двойки. Тимът на Испания даде почивка на Карлос Алкарас, но взе трудна победа над Австралия с 2:1 във Валенсия. На двойки Марсел Гранойерс и Педро Мартинес победиха Матю Ебдън и Макс Пърсел с 5:7 6:4, 6:4,...

title: 2000 Beds Shortage as $4.46bn Needed to Provide Best Services
creator: Fiji Sun News
content: Fiji hospitals are short of 2000 beds to be able to cater for the country’s population. This was highlighted by the outgoing president of the Fiji Medical Association Dr Basharat Munshi during the 63rd Annual Conference of the Fiji Medical Association at the Hilton Resort on Saturday. He said for Fiji’s current population we need 3000 beds. “We are short by 1500 to 2000 beds if I have to overestimate,” he said. “If one has to do the math to see how much it is to build to the standard that we want to build to be able to provide the best of care there is, the cost $4.46billion. “To get to where we need that amount.” Challenges at CWM He said the recurring theater problem at CWM is a challenge. “We are not able to utilize our full potential, I know solutions are coming but we are unable to do elective cases. We only have enough theater space to focus on emergency cases while elective cases are usually on waiting list. “We have had some cases where elective operations are done at Oceania Hospital which is helping with the backlog however it costs money. “When our CT scan breaks down we outsource it and that puts a strain on our budget. “While I understand Rome was not built in a day we hope the CWM master plan that was launched a month ago will address these issues.” Minister for Health Dr Atonio Lalabalavu said the CWM Master plan would look into addressing these issues. Feedback: inoke.rabonu@fijisun.com.fj

title: FCT gets new CP
creator: Abubakar Sadiq Isah
content: The Police Service Commission (PSC) has approved the posting of Mr Peter Ukachi Opara as the new Commissioner of Police of the FCT. In a... By Abubakar Sadiq Isah The Police Service Commission (PSC) has approved the posting of Mr Peter Ukachi Opara as the new Commissioner of Police of the FCT. In a statement, the spokesman of PSC, Ikechukwu Ani, said Opara was replacing Mr Benneth Igwe who had been promoted to an Assistant Inspector General of Police (AIG). He said Opara, until his appointment, was the CP, Force Secretary’s Office, and former DCP, Administration and Finance, Imo State Police Command. content: [신안=뉴시스]김혜인 기자 = 전남 신안 갯바위에서 낚시하던 50대 남성이 바다에 빠져 숨지는 사고가 발생했다. 16일 목포해양경찰서 등에 따르면 전날 오후 12시 4분께 신안군 비금면 갈마도 한 갯바위에서 50대 남성 A씨가 물에 빠진 것 같다는 신고가 접수됐다. 소방 당국에 의해 발견된 A씨는 병원으로 옮겼지만 숨졌다. 해경은 A씨가 갯바위에서 낚시 중 떠내려간 어망을 건지려다 사고를 당한 것으로 보고 정확한 경위를 조사하고 있다. ◎공감언론 뉴시스

title: 늘어나는 독거노인... “사회적 안전망 확대해야”
content: 충남 천안 외곽에서 살고 있는 김모(78) 할머니는 3년째 ‘혼자’ 생활하고 있다. 남편과 둘이 살다가 혼자가 된 뒤 자연스럽게 혼자 살게 됐다. 자녀들과 왕래가 잦은 편도 아니고, 같이 살 다른 식구도 없었기 때문이다. 김 할머니는 “살던 곳을 떠나 자식들에게 신세지는 것도 싫고, 그냥 혼자 사는 게 편하다”라며 “나라에서 주는 연금 받고, 있는 돈 쪼개쓰면 밥은 굶지 않을 것”이라고 말했다. 혼자 사는 고령층이 급증하고 있다. 우리나라 전체적으로 1인 가구가 늘어나는데다 고령화가 심화하면서 ‘독거노인’ 비중이 급증하는 추세다. 30여년 뒤에는 전체 1인 가구 중 절반 이상이 65세 이상 ‘고령 1인가구’가 될 것이란 전망이다. 통계청이 최근 발표한 ‘장래가구 추계:2022∼2052년’ 자료에 따르면 2022년 2166만4000가구였던 우리나라 전체 가구 수는 매년 늘어 2041년 2437만2000가구로 정점을 찍게 된다. 이후 2042년부터 마이너스로 전환돼 2052년에는 2327만7000가구까지 줄어든다. 가구형태도 크게 바뀐다. 전체 가구에서 1인 가구가 차지하는 비중은 2022년 34.1%에서 2052년에는 41.3%로 올라간다. 특히 1인 가구는 고령인구를 중심으로 빠르게 증가한다. 2022년에는 1인 가구 중 20대 비중이 18.7%로 가장 많았지만, 2052년에는 1인 가구 중 80세 이상이 23.8%로 가장 큰 비중을 차지한다. 65세 이상 1인가구는 51.6%에 달한다. 2022년 26%에서 두 배 가까이 늘어나는 셈이다. 아울러 가구주가 65세 이상인 ‘고령자 가구’는 2038년(1003만 가구) 처음으로 1000만 가구를...

title: AP Sports SummaryBrief at 7:41 p.m. EDT
creator: AP
content: Butker hits a 51-yard winner for KC after penalty on Bengals safety keeps Chiefs alive KANSAS CITY, Mo. (AP) — Harrison Butker kicked a 51-yard field goal as time expired and the Kansas City Chiefs, kept alive by a pass interference call on Bengals safety Daijahn Anthony on fourth down in the final minute, rallied to beat Cincinnati 26-25. Patrick Mahomes threw for 151 yards with two touchdowns and two interceptions. But it was his incomplete pass to Rashee Rice on fourth-and-16 from the Kansas City 35 that turned out to be decisive. Anthony arrived a split-second early and hit Rice from behind, and the penalty gave Kansas City a chance. A few plays later, Butker kicked the winner. Joe Burrow threw for 258 yards and two touchdowns, both to Andrei Iosivas, for the Bengals. Carr, Kamara help Saints end Cowboys' 16-game home win streak in regular season with 44-19 win ARLINGTON, Texas (AP) — Alvin Kamara scored four touchdowns, including a 57-yarder on a screen pass, and the New Orleans Saints ended Dallas’ 16-game home win streak in the regular season with a 44-19 victory. Derek Carr threw for 243 yards and two TDs with a 1-yard sneak for a score. The Saints got touchdowns on their first six drives a week after setting a franchise record by starting the season with points on nine consecutive possessions in a 47-10 rout of Carolina. It was actually the second straight loss at AT&T Stadium for the Cowboys after the 48-32 wild-card shocker against Green Bay last January. Sam...

title: US-Wahlkampf: FBI geht von versuchtem Attentat auf Trump aus
content: Der Secret Service hat nach eigenen Angaben anscheinend ein versuchtes Attentat auf den republikanischen US-Präsidentschaftskandidaten Donald Trump vereitelt. Laut dem Sicherheitsdienst, der in den USA für den Schutz hochrangiger Politiker zuständig ist, befindet sich Trump in Sicherheit und ist unverletzt. Nach Polizeiangaben fielen Schüsse, als Trump gerade Golf im Bundesstaat Florida spielte. Auch Stunden später war ungeklärt, ob nur die Personenschützer geschossen haben oder auch der mutmaßliche Attentäter. Die Polizei nahm einen Verdächtigen fest, den sie für den Angreifer hält. Der Secret Service habe am Sonntagnachmittag (Ortszeit) in West Palm Beach auf den mutmaßlichen Täter geschossen, sagte Rafael Barros, ein Sprecher des Sicherheitsdienstes. Der bewaffnete Mann habe sich an der Grundstücksgrenze zu Trumps Golfklub aufgehalten und sei anschließend geflohen, hieß es. Auf einer Autobahn in der Nähe des Tatorts Palm Beach sei ein Auto gestoppt und der Fahrer in Gewahrsam genommen worden, sagte William D. Snyder von der zuständigen Polizei . Der Mann habe ruhig und gelassen gewirkt. Verdächtiger nur wenige Hundert Meter von Trump entfernt Viele Fragen waren zunächst ungeklärt - erste Details gaben die Behörden bei einer Pressekonferenz bekannt: So habe ein Agent des Secret Service am Tatort einen aus dem Zaun ragenden Gewehrlauf erkennen können, sagte der zuständige Sheriff Ric Bradshaw. Der Bewaffnete habe sich etwa 270 bis 450 Meter entfernt von...

title: US-Wahlkampf: FBI geht von versuchtem Attentat auf Trump aus
creator: dpa
content: Der Secret Service habe am Sonntagnachmittag (Ortszeit) in West Palm Beach auf den mutmaßlichen Täter geschossen, sagte Rafael Barros, ein Sprecher des Sicherheitsdienstes. Der bewaffnete Mann habe sich an der Grundstücksgrenze zu Trumps Golfklub aufgehalten und sei anschließend geflohen, hieß es. Auf einer Autobahn in der Nähe des Tatorts Palm Beach sei ein Auto gestoppt und der Fahrer in Gewahrsam genommen worden, sagte William D. Snyder von der zuständigen Polizei. Der Mann habe ruhig und gelassen gewirkt. Verdächtiger nur wenige Hundert Meter von Trump entfernt Viele Fragen waren zunächst ungeklärt - erste Details gaben die Behörden bei einer Pressekonferenz bekannt: So habe ein Agent des Secret Service am Tatort einen aus dem Zaun ragenden Gewehrlauf erkennen können, sagte der zuständige Sheriff Ric Bradshaw. Der Bewaffnete habe sich etwa 270 bis 450 Meter entfernt von Trump aufgehalten, der in seinem Club gerade Golf spielte. Bradshaw sagte, es sei unklar, ob der Verdächtige ebenfalls geschossen habe - oder nur der Secret Service. Nach der Flucht des Mannes seien im Gebüsch unter anderem ein Sturmgewehr des Typs AK-47 mit Zielfernrohr sowie eine Kamera gefunden worden. Der Sheriff sagte außerdem, dass ein Zeuge einen aus dem Gebüsch rennenden Mann gesehen und ein Foto von dessen Fahrzeug gemacht habe. Das habe zur Festnahme des Verdächtigen auf einer Autobahn in der Nähe des Tatorts geführt, sagte Sheriff Bradshaw weiter. "Es besteht keine Gefahr mehr",...

title: FBI geht von versuchtem Attentat auf Trump aus
content: In der Nähe des republikanischen Präsidentschaftskandidaten Donald Trump fallen Schüsse. Das FBI geht von einem mutmaßlichen Attentatsversuch aus. Ein Verdächtiger wird festgenommen. Der Secret Service hat nach eigenen Angaben anscheinend ein versuchtes Attentat auf den republikanischen US-Präsidentschaftskandidaten Donald Trump vereitelt. Laut dem Sicherheitsdienst, der in den USA für den Schutz hochrangiger Politiker zuständig ist, befindet sich Trump in Sicherheit und ist unverletzt. Nach Polizeiangaben fielen Schüsse, als Trump gerade Golf im Bundesstaat Florida spielte. Auch Stunden später war ungeklärt, ob nur die Personenschützer geschossen haben oder auch der mutmaßliche Attentäter. Die Polizei nahm einen Verdächtigen fest, den sie für den Angreifer hält. Der Secret Service habe am Sonntagnachmittag (Ortszeit) in West Palm Beach auf den mutmaßlichen Täter geschossen, sagte Rafael Barros, ein Sprecher des Sicherheitsdienstes. Der bewaffnete Mann habe sich an der Grundstücksgrenze zu Trumps Golfklub aufgehalten und sei anschließend geflohen, hieß es. Auf einer Autobahn in der Nähe des Tatorts Palm Beach sei ein Auto gestoppt und der Fahrer in Gewahrsam genommen worden, sagte William D. Snyder von der zuständigen Polizei. Der Mann habe ruhig und gelassen gewirkt.
