title: Сильное землетрясение произошло у берегов Канады
creator: Ирина Зражевская
content: Землетрясение магнитудой 6,6 произошло у побережья Канады. По данным Геологической службы США, его эпицентр располагался в 268 километрах от города Принс-Руперт с населением около 14,7 тысячи человек. Очаг же залегал на глубине 33 км. Отмечается, что данных о пострадавших к настоящему моменту не поступала.

title: Packers fans sad QB Love sidelined against Colts but confident in team roster
creator: Tahleel Mohieldin
content: GREEN BAY, Wis. — At the epicenter of Packers football, few things match the level of dedication fans bring to Lambeau Field. Even before the green and gold secured a win against the Indianapolis Colts Sunday, Packers fans’ optimism and winning spirit were not easily shaken despite being down a QB. TMJ4’s Tahleel Mohieldin asked fans how they felt about starting quarterback Jordan Love being sidelined with a knee injury. “Honestly the Colts are a really good team but I’m not worried about it,” Quinn Rainville said. “Malik Willis can take care of them Josh Jacobs is gonna do what he does and our defense is gonna have to stay strong.” “We’re not happy about it, we’re so sad about Jordan Love being out,” Tess Coclasure, “but we — I think everyone I know believes in Malik Willis and is happy that he’s playing so we’re going to believe in the Packers no matter what.” “This is the beauty of pro football,” Pat Horn said. “The coach has to prepare them for every game no matter who the personnel is.” “I’m sorry Love is hurt,” he added. “He’s really — I think is great potentially for the future.” Love is expected to remain off the field, at least for a few weeks, after injuring his knee during a match-up against the Philadelphia Eagles, which ended in a loss for the Packers. The QB isn’t the only player nursing an injury. Wide receiver Jayden Reed stayed in the game Sunday, despite dealing with shin and calf injuries. Packers fans at Lambeau Sunday said they chose to focus on the...

title: Jon Hamm and Wife Anna Osceola Are So in Love on 2024 Emmys Red Carpet
creator: Shelby Stivale
content: Jon Hamm and wife Anna Osceola were all loved up as they walked the 2024 Emmy Awards red carpet on Sunday, September 15. The couple showed off their stunning looks as they posed together when arriving at the Peacock Theatre in Los Angeles. While Hamm opted for a classic black tuxedo, looking like a silver fox with a touch of gray in his hair, Osceola shined like one of the Emmy statues in a gold gown. Hamm, 53, attended the Emmys on Sunday as a member of two separate ensemble casts — The Morning Show and Fargo . He nabbed nominations for his roles in both series. For his role as tech billionaire Paul Marks in The Morning Show season 3, Hamm received a nod in the Outstanding Supporting Actor in a Drama Series category. He made headlines for his role after a hot and heavy sex scene with Jennifer Aniston ’s Alex Levy. Hamm also nabbed a nomination in the Outstanding Lead Actor in a Limited or Anthology Series or Movie category after playing Sheriff Roy Tillman in Fargo season 5. For this character, Hamm famously — or infamously — wore prosthetic pierced nipples . Yes, he talked about it at length during the show’s press tour late last year. Since Hamm kicked off his relationship with Osceola, 36, she’s been by his side on various red carpets , whether he was nominated or not. Hamm and Osceola met in 2015 when she played the role of Clementine in the series finale of Mad Men . They were briefly linked in 2017, but Us Weekl y confirmed their romance in 2020. title: मुंबईकरांमुळे हिंदुस्थान ‘अ’ चा मोठा विजय
creator: सामना ऑनलाईन
content: शम्स मुलानी आणि तनुष कोटियन या मुंबईकर फिरकीने हिंदुस्थान ‘ड’चा दुसरा डाव 301 धावांत गुंडाळून हिंदुस्थान ‘अ’ संघाला 186 धावांनी दुलीप ट्रॉफी स्पर्धेत दणदणीत विजय मिळवून दिला. पहिल्या सामन्यात पराभूत झालेल्या ‘अ’ संघाने दुसरा सामना जिंकत आपले जेतेपदाचे स्वप्न कायम राखले आहे. आता तिसऱ्या आणि अखेरच्या सामन्यात जो संघ निर्णायक विजय नोंदवेल त्यालाच दुलीप ट्रॉफीवर आपले नाव कोरता येईल. आता सलग दोन पराभवांमुळे जेतेपदाच्या लढतीतून हिंदुस्थान ‘ड’ संघ बाहेर फेकला गेला आहे. पहिल्या डावात 89 धावांची दणकेबाज खेळी आणि सामन्यात 4 विकेट घेणारा शम्स मुलानी ‘सामनावीर’ ठरला. हिंदुस्थान ‘अ’ संघाने 290 धावसंख्या उभारल्यानंतर हिंदुस्थान ‘ड’ संघाला 183 धावांवर रोखून पहिल्या डावात 107 धावांची आघाडी घेतली होती. त्यानंतर हिंदुस्थान ‘अ’ संघाने दुसऱया डावात 3 बाद 380 धावसंख्या उभारून हिंदुस्थान ‘ड’ संघाला विजयासाठी 488 धावांचे कठीण लक्ष्य दिले होते. मात्र, त्यांचा डाव 80.2 षटकांत 301 धावांवरच संपुष्टात आल्याने हिंदुस्थान ‘अ’ संघाला 186 धावांनी मोठा विजय मिळाला. दरम्यान, हिंदुस्थान ‘ड’ संघाने तिसऱ्या दिवसाच्या 1 बाद 62 धावसंख्येवरून रविवारी सकाळी पुढे खेळायला सुरुवात केली. यश दुबे (37) व निकी भुई (113) यांनी दुसऱ्या विकेटसाठी शंभर धावांची भागीदारी करीत चांगला प्रतिकार केला होता. मात्र, दुबे बाद झाल्यानंतर मधल्या फळीतील फलंदाज अपयशी ठरल्याने हिंदुस्थान ‘ड’ संघाला हा कसोटी सामना वाचविता आला नाही. देवदत्त पडिक्कल (1), कर्णधार श्रेयस अय्यर (41) व संजू सॅमसन (40) या स्टार फलंदाजांपैकी कोणीही शेवटपर्यंत खेळपट्टीवर उभे राहू शकले नाही. त्यातच निकी भुईही सातव्या फलंदाजाच्या रूपाने बाद झाला. त्याने 195 चेंडूंत...

title: Taylor Swift's nemesis Scooter Braun has unexpected reaction to Donald Trump's 'hate' comment after the singer endorsed Kamala Harris
content: Taylor Swift's nemesis Scooter Braun has unexpected reaction to Donald Trump's 'hate' comment after the singer endorsed Kamala Harris READ MORE: Donald Trump tears into Taylor Swift after Harris endorsement Have YOU got a story? Email tips@dailymail.com By Brian Marks For Dailymail.com and Katelyn Caralle, Senior U.S. Political Reporter In Washington, D.C. Published: 00:35, 16 September 2024 | Updated: 00:41, 16 September 2024 e-mail View comments Scooter Braun suggested he was on Taylor Swift 's side when it comes to the upcoming presidential election in a social media response to Donald Trump . The 43-year-old talent manager shared a response to the Republican presidential nominee in his Instagram Stories on Sunday after Trump lashed out at Swift, 34, on his social media platform, Truth Social. 'I HATE TAYLOR SWIFT!' Trump seethed on Sunday, after the songstress shared an endorsement shortly after his poorly reviewed debate performance in which she put her support behind Democratic Presidential Nominee Kamala Harris . Despite Swift's long history of feuding with Braun due to his purchase of most of her old master recordings, the record executive appeared to defend her against Trump while reemphasizing his own endorsement for the presidential election. 'Shake it off Donald,' Braun wrote in his post while including a screenshot of Trump's original post. title: 북, 내달 7일 최고인민회의...'통일삭제' 헌법개정 논의
creator: 남빛나라 기자
content: [서울=뉴시스] 남빛나라 기자 = 북한은 다음달 한국의 국회 격인 최고인민회의를 연다고 16일 밝혔다. 김정은 북한 국무위원장 지시대로 헌법에서 '통일'을 삭제하는 방향으로 개정이 이뤄질 것으로 보인다. 이날 북한 노동당 기관지 노동신문에 따르면 15일 평양 만수대의사당에서 최고인민회의 상임위원회 제14기 제32차전원회의가 최룡해 상임위원장 사회하에 열렸다. 전원회의는 최고인민회의 제14기 제11차 회의를 소집하는 상임위 결정을 전원찬성으로 채택했다. 회의는 10월7일 평양에서 열리며, 대의원 등록은 회의 전날인 6일에 진행된다. 신문은 "조선민주주의인민공화국(북한) 사회주의헌법 수정보충과 관련한 문제, 경공업법·대외경제법 심의채택과 관련한 문제, 품질감독법 집행검열 감독정형과 관련한 문제를 토의한다"고 밝혔다. 현재까지 김정은이 예고한 헌법 개정 사항을 정리하면 ▲한국 주적 명기 ▲통일 관련 표현 삭제 ▲영토 조항 반영 등 세 가지다. 김정은은 6월28일부터 7월1일까지 열린 노동당 중앙위원회 제8기 제10차 전원회의 연설에서 "최고인민회의 상임위원회에서는 사회주의 헌법을 개정하며 국가의 존위를 더욱 높여야 한다"고 말했다. 1월에 이어 헌법 개정 의지를 거듭 피력한 것이다. 1월 최고인민회의에서 김정은은 헌법에 있는 '자주, 평화통일, 민족대단결' 표현을 삭제하고, 헌법에 대한민국을 '제1의 적대국'으로 명기하라고 지시했다. 북한 헌법에는 영토, 영해, 영공에 대한...

title: التحقيق مع 50 شخصاً بسبب المشاجرات واطلاق النار خلال الانتخابات
content: خبرني - تنظر النيابة العامة في أكثر من 50 قضية تتعلق بالمشاجرات وإطلاق العيارات النارية التي وقعت أثناء وبعد صدور نتائج الانتخابات النيابية وملاحقة كل من ظهر من خلال مواقع التواصل الاجتماعي او بالشكاوى المقدمة ايضا قضائيا. وفي سياق متصل، فان النائب الذي تم توجيه تهمة جناية الرشوة هو من محافظة البلقاء ولم تكن التهمة جناية، بل جنحة نظرا لصلاحيات محكمة جزاء عمان، بحسب الرأي. ويحق للمتهم استئناف الحكم خلال عشرة أيام من صدور الحكم وفي حال أيد الاستئناف الحكم فانه لن يكون إمام النائب المتهم إلا الحصول على الموافقة على إذن تمييز خطي وفي حال أصبح الحكم قطعيا فإن المحكمة ستخاطب الهيئة المستقلة للانتخاب وحينها يتم اسقاط النيابة عنه ومعها الحصانة القضائية. ومن خلال القانون الجديد للانتخابات فانه قد تم تغليظ العقوبات وتسريع إجراءات التقاضي، حيث كانت تتعالى الأصوات بالتحذير ونشر الوعي ضد جريمة الرشوة الانتخابية. من جهة اخرى، مثل أمين عام حزب منحل امام محكمة الجنايات الصغرى للنظر في عدد من الشكاوى المتعلقة بالاشتراك في الحزب قدمها عدد من الاشخاص يدعون، بأن أسماءهم مسجلة بالحزب دون علمهم. وتقدم المشتكون للنيابة العامة بشكوى حيث نسب المدعي العام تهمة التزوير المعنوي لأمين عام الحزب المنحل. وبعد انتهاء الجلسة قرر القاضي تأجيل المحاكمة إلى الرابع والعشرين من الشهر الحالي إلى حين الاستماع لبقية الشهود الآخرين.

title: బైబై గణేశా..
creator: bharath kumar
content: చెన్నూర్‌ టౌన్‌, సెప్టెంబర్‌ 15 : పట్టణంలో గణేశ్‌ విగ్రహాల నిమజ్జనోత్సవం ప్రశాంతంగా ముగిసింది. ఆదివారం మధ్యాహ్నం నుంచి ప్రారంభమైన శోభాయాత్ర సోమవారం ఉదయం వరకూ కొనసాగింది. స్థానిక మున్సిపాలిటీలో మున్సిపల్‌ చైర్‌ పర్సన్‌ అర్చన గిల్దా, వైస్‌ చైర్మన్‌ నవాజొద్దీన్‌, కమిషనర్‌ గంగాధర్‌, కౌన్సిలరు జోడు శంకర్‌, కో ఆప్షన్‌ మెంబర్లు, బీఆర్‌ఎస్‌ నాయకులు రాంలాల్‌ గిల్డా, నాయిని సతీశ్‌, కో ఆప్షన్‌ మెంబర్‌ కేయం శ్రీనివాస్‌, ఏఈ సాయి అర్చకులు, హిందూ ఉత్సవ సమితి, వివిధ పార్టీల నాయకులు ప్రత్యేక పూజలు చేసి శోభాయాత్ర ప్రారంభించారు. మున్సిపాలిటీ ఆధ్వర్యంలో నిర్వహించిన గణేశ్‌ విగ్రహాల నిమజ్జన కార్యక్రమంలో విద్యుత్‌, పోలీస్‌, అటవీశాఖ, వైద్య శాఖలు సంయుక్తంగా పాల్గొన్నాయి. మహంకాళివాడ, గెర్రెకాలనీ, బలిజవాడతో పాటు పట్టణంలోని పలు కాలనీల్లో వినాయులను నిమజ్జనం చేశారు. ప్రధాన వీధుల్లో భక్తులు కోలాటాలు, నృత్యాలు, భజనలతో సందడి చేశారు. గాంధీచౌక్‌లో చెన్నూర్‌ మున్సిపాలిటీ, హిందూ ఉత్సవ సమితి ఆధ్వర్యంలో వేదిక ఏర్పాటు చేశారు. పెద్ద చెరువు వద్ద గజ ఈతగాళ్లతో పాటు బోటును అందుబాటులో ఉంచారు. పెద్ద చెరువులో భారీ క్రేన్‌ సాయంతో పెద్ద విగ్రహాలను నిమజ్జనం చేశారు. ఎలాంటి ఘటనలు జరగకుండా పోలీసులు భారీ బందోబస్తు ఏర్పాటు చేశారు. స్థానిక చానళ్లలో శోభాయాత్రను ప్రత్యక్ష ప్రసారం చేశారు. కెరమెరి, సెప్టెంబర్‌ 15 : మండలంలోని జ్యోతిన గర్‌(ఝరి) గ్రామంలో వినాయక నిమజ్జనాన్ని ఆదివారం ఘనంగా నిర్వహించారు. ప్రధాన వీధులగుండా శోభాయాత్ర సాగింది. ఖైరి పెద్ద వాగులో గణనాథుని నిమజ్జనం చేశారు. పలుచోట్ల భక్తులకు అన్నదానం చేశారు.

title: Fuerte operativo de seguridad en el Congreso esperando la llegada de Javier Milei
content: Las fuerzas de seguridad ya preparan un fuerte operativo para la llegada del presidente Javier Milei al Congreso para presentar el proyecto de Presupuesto 2025 ante la Cámara de Diputados. Decenas de efectivos de la Policía Federal ya ingresaron al edificio para hacer controles exhaustivos , incluyendo cacheos en la entrada y hasta perros sabueso para la búsqueda de elementos peligrosos. Además, el ingreso al Palacio Legislativo por la Avenida Rivadavia ya está vallado y custodiado por un cordón policial, a más de una hora para el comienzo del acto. Este no es el único punto custodiado. Todos los alrededores del Congreso cuentan con fuerte presencia policial de de Gendarmería . En la esquina de Callao y Rivadavia también se encuentra un camión del Ministerio de Seguridad porteño, con agentes de la Policía de la Ciudad. En el hall de ingreso, la Policía Federal asumió las funciones de control que convencionalmente realizan los empleados de seguridad de la Cámara baja , quienes este domingo solamente desempeñan tareas de apoyo. Una vez superados los molinetes y luego de pasar las pertenencias por los escáneres, alrededor de diez efectivos se encargan del cacheo de objetos persona por persona. El mismo procedimiento se repite en la entrada oficial de los legisladores e invitados especiales, ubicada a solo 15 metros. A su vez, en el marco del operativo, por primera los periodistas acreditados no podrán estar en el palco de prensa por motivos de seguridad. A la...

title: Esguinces: Cinco consejos clave para prevenir lesiones y mantenerse activo
creator: Redacción Diario Correo
content: Para muchas personas, especialmente quienes practican deportes o llevan un estilo de vida activo, los esguinces representan una amenaza constante. De acuerdo con el Ministerio de Salud, son una de las lesiones musculoesqueléticas más comunes en Perú. Según el Dr. David Torres Manrique, traumatólogo de la Clínica Anglo Americana, sede La Molina y San Isidro, conocer cómo prevenir estas lesiones y reaccionar adecuadamente cuando ocurren, es esencial para mantener la salud y la movilidad a largo plazo. Los esguinces, que se producen por el estiramiento o desgarro de los ligamentos alrededor de las articulaciones, son lesiones que pueden variar en gravedad, desde un simple estiramiento hasta una ruptura completa. El Dr. Torres subraya que “identificar correctamente un esguince y su gravedad es crucial para iniciar el tratamiento adecuado y prevenir lesiones futuras”, comenta. Estos se clasifican en tres grados: Grado I, con estiramiento leve de los ligamentos; Grado II, con desgarro parcial del ligamento; y Grado III, con desgarro completo. Cada uno presenta síntomas distintos, desde dolor leve y mínima hinchazón hasta dolor severo, hinchazón significativa y una inestabilidad marcada de la articulación. “Fortalecer los músculos alrededor de las articulaciones y mejorar la estabilidad son fundamentales para reducir el riesgo de esguinces”, añade el especialista. Además, el uso de técnicas adecuadas y una preparación física adecuada son medidas preventivas clave....

title: Un contrabandista de cigarrillos arrolló y mató a un gendarme que participaba de un control en Misiones
content: El cabo primero Robert David Barreto tenía 31 años y hace 12 había ingresado en la Gendarmería Nacional. Prestaba servicio en el Escuadrón 11 San Ignacio, en Misiones. Ayer, durante un control rutero, fue arrollado por un contrabandista que manejaba una camioneta 4x4 y quiso eludir el operativo de la fuerza de federal de seguridad. El uniformado, padre de un niño, murió poco después en el hospital donde había sido trasladado . Así lo informaron a LA NACION fuentes de la Gendarmería Nacional. “Asesinó a un gendarme cuando intentó escapar de un control y evitar que lo descubrieran contrabandeando. ¡No tiene perdon y responderá por sus delitos y la vida que quitó!” , sostuvo la ministra de Seguridad de la Nación, Patricia Bullrich , en su cuenta de la red social X. Todo sucedió ayer en la ruta provincial 103, en proximidades al Parque Temático de la Cruz, situado sobre el cerro Santa Ana, cuando personal de la Gendarmería Nacional hacía un control vehicular. “Los gendarmes le hicieron señas al conductor de una camioneta Volkswagen Amarok para que detuviera la marcha. Pero el conductor hizo caso omiso e intentó eludir a los uniformados y arrolló a Barreto, que estaba parado en la banquina”, dijeron las fuentes consultadas. El cabo primero fue trasladado de urgencia al hospital Ramón Madariaga de la ciudad de Posadas, donde murió como consecuencias de las graves heridas sufridas. title: "불황에도 명품 잘 팔리네"...고액 사치품 소비 5년 새 두배 ↑
creator: 유지희
content: 보석이나 명품 시계 등 고액 사치품의 지난해 소비액이 5년 만에 두 배 이상으로 늘어난 것으로 나타났다. 국회 기획재정위원회 소속 신영대 더불어민주당 의원은 16일 기획재정부로부터 '최근 5년간 고액 사치품 개별소비세 부과 현황' 자료를 제출받아 분석한 결과 지난해 고액 사치품 과세액은 3197억원으로 집계됐다고 밝혔다. 이는 5년 전인 2019년 1362억원의 2.35배에 달하는 수치다. 정부는 현재 보석은 개당 500만원, 고급 시계·고급 가방은 개당 200만원 등으로 기준을 정해 이를 초과하는 액수에 대해 20%의 개별소비세를 적용하고 있다. 지난해 가장 많이 과세가 된 품목은 고급 시계로 과세액은 1398억원에 달했다. 5년 사이 세수가 가장 큰 폭으로 증가한 품목은 고급 가방으로 186억원에서 3.72배 늘어난 692억원으로 조사됐다. 보석 및 귀금속 제품의 지난해 과세액은 942억원으로, 5년 전(343억원)의 2.75배였다. 신 의원은 "코로나19 팬데믹과 고금리, 고물가에도 불구하고 최근 5년간 고액 사치품 소비는 늘었다"며 "기재부와 국세청, 관세청은 세수 확보를 위해 고액 사치품 미신고 사례를 면밀히 감시해야 한다"고 밝혔다. 유지희 한경닷컴 기자 keephee@hankyung.com

title: MSNBC Anchor Says Trump Should Tone Down Rhetoric After Potential Second Assassination Attempt
creator: Harold Hutchison
content: MSNBC anchor Alex Witt questioned whether former President Donald Trump should consider “toning down” his rhetoric Sunday following what may have been an assassination attempt on the former president. Secret Service agents evacuated the former president from the Trump International Golf Club in West Palm Beach, Florida after Secret Service agents reportedly fired at a man carrying a semi-automatic rifle who got within 500 yards of Trump, who was playing a round of golf. Witt and MSNBC political analyst Elise Jordan discussed whether Trump would urge his supporters to “take the temperature down.” (RELATED: Liberal Media Botches Initial Headlines, Downplaying Trump Assassination Attempt) “We have seen, Alex, just the cycle of political extremism at play, unfortunately, over the last, you know, really, decade of American politics. Polling, the Lincoln Democracy Institute did a great poll on political extremism last year and one of the findings was that over 50% of Americans no longer see the political opposition as trustworthy opponents, they see them as untrustworthy enemies,” Jordan told Witt hours before law enforcement confirmed that Trump was the target of an assassination attempt. “And so, on the scales of radicalization by what, you know, after 9/11, the scales that were used to gauge radicalism and extremism in the Middle East, by that criteria, almost 13% of Americans are actually political extremists that are radicalized and it’s very scary.” WATCH: “How have we...

title: ದೇವಸ್ಥಾನಗಳಲ್ಲಿ ಗಂಟೆ ಬಾರಿಸುವುದರ ಧಾರ್ಮಿಕ- ವೈಜ್ಞಾನಿಕ ಮಹತ್ವ ಏನು ಗೊತ್ತಾ?
creator: TV9 Web Team
content: ನೀವು ದೇವಸ್ಥಾನಕ್ಕೆ ಹೋದಾಗಲೆಲ್ಲಾ ಮುಖ್ಯ ದ್ವಾರದಲ್ಲಿ ಗಂಟೆ ಇರುವುದನ್ನು ನೋಡಿರುತ್ತೀರಿ. ಜನರು ಪೂಜೆಗೆಂದು ದೇವಸ್ಥಾನಕ್ಕೆ ಹೋದಾಗಲೆಲ್ಲ ಆ ಗಂಟೆಯನ್ನು ಖಂಡಿತ ಒಮ್ಮೆಯಾದರೂ ಬಾರಿಸುತ್ತಾರೆ. ಸಾಮಾನ್ಯವಾಗಿ ದೇವಸ್ಥಾನವನ್ನು ಪ್ರವೇಶಿಸಿದಾಗ ಗಂಟೆಯನ್ನು ಬಾರಿಸಿ ದೇವಸ್ಥಾನದ ಮುಖ್ಯ ದ್ವಾರವನ್ನು ಪ್ರವೇಶಿಸುತ್ತೇವೆ. ಆದರೆ ದೇವಸ್ಥಾನದಿಂದ ಹೊರಡುವಾಗ ಕೂಡ ಕಡ್ಡಾಯವಾಗಿ ಗಂಟೆ ಬಾರಿಸಬೇಕು ಎನ್ನುವುದು ನಿಮಗೆ ತಿಳಿದಿದೆಯೇ..? ಹಾಗಾದರೆ ಗಂಟೆ ಬಾರಿಸುವುದರ ಪ್ರಯೋಜನಗಳ ಬಗ್ಗೆ ಇಲ್ಲಿ ತಿಳಿದುಕೊಳ್ಲೋಣ. ದೇವಾಲಯದ ಗಂಟೆಯನ್ನು ಬಾರಿಸುವುದು ದೇವರ ಪ್ರವೇಶಕ್ಕೆ ಅನುಮತಿಯ ಕೇಳಿಕೊಳ್ಳುವುದರ ಸಂಕೇತವಾಗಿದೆ. ದೇವಸ್ಥಾನದಲ್ಲಿ ನಾವು ಗಂಟೆಯನ್ನು ಬಾರಿಸಿದಾಕ್ಷಣ ಆ ಗಂಟೆಯ ಸದ್ದು ನಮ್ಮ ಮನಸ್ಸು ಮತ್ತು ಮೆದುಳಿನ ಎಲ್ಲಾ ಚಕ್ರಗಳನ್ನು ಸಕ್ರಿಯಗೊಳಿಸುತ್ತದೆ. ಅದೇ ಸಮಯದಲ್ಲಿ, ಎಲ್ಲಾ ದೇವರುಗಳು ನಮ್ಮ ಕಡೆಗೆ ಆಕರ್ಷಿತರಾಗುತ್ತಾರೆ. ದೇವಾಲಯದಲ್ಲಿ ಗಂಟೆಯನ್ನು ಬಾರಿಸಿದರೆ ಅದು ನಿಮ್ಮ ಸುತ್ತ ಇರುವ ನಕಾರಾತ್ಮಕ ಶಕ್ತಿಯನ್ನು ತೆಗೆದುಹಾಕುತ್ತದೆ. ಹಾಗೂ ನಿಮ್ಮ ಸುತ್ತ ಸಕಾರಾತ್ಮಕ ಅಥವಾ ಧನಾತ್ಮಕ ಶಕ್ತಿಯ ಕಂಪನವನ್ನು ಹರಡುತ್ತದೆ. ಹೆಚ್ಚಿನವರು ದೇವಸ್ಥಾನಕ್ಕೆ ಭೇಟಿ ನೀಡಿದಾಗ ಅಲ್ಲಿ ಧನಾತ್ಮಕ ಅನುಭವವನ್ನು ಪಡೆದುಕೊಂಡಿದ್ದೇವೆ ಎಂದು ಹೇಳುವುದನ್ನು ನೀವು ಕೇಳಿರಬಹುದು. ದೇವಸ್ಥಾನದಲ್ಲಿ ಅವರಿಗೆ ಧನಾತ್ಮಕ ಶಕ್ತಿಯನ್ನು ನೀಡಿದ ಅಂಶಗಳಲ್ಲಿ ಗಂಟೆಯೂ ಒಂದು ಎಂಬುದನ್ನು ಗಮನಿಸಿ. ದೇವಾಲಯದ ಗಂಟೆಯನ್ನು ಬಾರಿಸುವ ಮೂಲಕ ದೇವರನ್ನು ಜಾಗೃತಗೊಳಿಸಬಹುದು. ಗಂಟೆ ಬಾರಿಸುವ ಮೂಲಕ ದೇವತೆಗಳು ಸಂತುಷ್ಟರಾಗುತ್ತಾರೆ. ಈ ಕಾರಣದಿಂದ ನಾವು ದೇವಸ್ಥಾನವನ್ನು ಪ್ರವೇಶಿಸಿದಾಗ ಮತ್ತು ದೇವಸ್ಥಾನದಿಂದ ಹಿಂದಿರುಗಿದಾಗ ಗಂಟೆಯನ್ನು ಬಾರಿಸಬೇಕು. ದೇವರನ್ನು ಜಾಗೃತಗೊಳಿಸುವ ಮೂಲಕ ನಾವು ನಮ್ಮ ಇಚ್ಛೆಯನ್ನು ದೇವರ ಬಳಿ ಹೇಳಿಕೊಳ್ಳುವುದರಿಂದ ಅವುಗಳೆಲ್ಲಾ ಶೀಘ್ರದಲ್ಲೇ ದೇವರಿಗೆ ತಲುಪುತ್ತದೆ. ದೇವಾಲಯದ ಗಂಟೆಯನ್ನು ಬಾರಿಸಿದರೆ, ಅದರಿಂದ ಹೊರಹೊಮ್ಮುವ ದೊಡ್ಡ ಶಬ್ದವು ದೇಹದ ಏಳು ಚಕ್ರಗಳನ್ನು...

title: Javier Milei presenta el Presupuesto 2025: qué es el déficit cero
creator: Carlos Morando
content: El presidente Javier Milei presentará en el Congreso de la Nación el proyecto de Presupuesto 2025, con la misión de alcanzar el déficit fiscal cero. Qué significa. El principal eje del plan de Milei es alcanzar un déficit fiscal cero y desde el entorno, sostienen que el plan no solo buscará hacerlo en términos primarios, sino también financieros, incluyendo el pago de los intereses de la deuda pública. Con la esperanza de lograr una significativa reducción del riesgo país, Milei intentará «fomentar la confianza» en la estabilidad económica del país. El plan de déficit cero que Milei incluye tanto el equilibrio del resultado primario (que excluye el pago de los intereses de la deuda) como del resultado financiero total. Esto significa que, para 2025, los ingresos del Estado no solo deberán cubrir los gastos corrientes, sino también los compromisos financieros, logrando así que el país no incremente su deuda pública. Para el presidente ese objetivo es fundamental para devolverle al país una imagen de solvencia fiscal. La estrategia es reducir el riesgo país , un indicador clave que mide la confianza de los inversores internacionales en la capacidad de Argentina para cumplir con sus obligaciones financieras. El viernes pasado, el riesgo país cerró en 1.407 puntos básicos, su nivel más bajo en tres meses. Esto reflejó la expectativa positiva de los mercados ante los primeros indicios del plan económico del Gobierno. Sin embargo, en el entorno de...

title: शासकीय सेवेतील तब्बल पावणेतीन लाख पदे रिक्त, कर्मचारी-अधिकाऱ्यांवर अतिरिक्त कामाचा बोजा
creator: सामना ऑनलाईन
content: सरकारी सेवेतील अधिकाऱ्यांच्या सेवानिवृत्तीचे वय वाढवण्याचा मुद्दा पुन्हा पेटला आहे. सेवानिवृत्तीचे वय वाढवण्याबाबत सरकारसोबत सकारात्मक चर्चा होऊनही यावर निर्णय घेण्यास सरकार टाळाटाळ करीत आहे. सध्या सरकारी कर्मचाऱ्यांची तब्बल पावणेतीन लाख पदे रिक्त आहेत. या पदांमुळे अधिकाऱ्यावर कामाचा अतिरिक्त ताण पडत आहे. त्यामुळे अधिकाऱ्यांमध्ये कमालीची अस्वस्थता असून अधिकारी आंदोलनाच्या भूमिकेपर्यंत येऊन पोहोचले असल्याचा इशारा महाराष्ट्र राज्य राजपत्रित अधिकारी महासंघाने दिला आहे. महाराष्ट्र राज्य राजपत्रित अधिकारी महासंघाने रिक्त पदांबाबत मुख्यमंत्री एकनाथ शिंदे व दोन्ही उपमुख्यमंत्र्यांना पत्र पाठवले आहे. राज्य शासकीय कर्मचाऱ्यांचे सेवानिवृत्तीचे वय केंद्राप्रमाणे 60 करण्याची प्रमुख मागणी केली आहे. या मागणीबाबत वारंवार सकारात्मक चर्चा होऊनही निर्णयासाठी होत असलेला विलंब अनाकलनीय व निराशाजनक असल्याचे महासंघाचे मुख्य सल्लागार ग. दि. पुलथे यांनी म्हटले आहे. दरवर्षी तीन टक्के रिक्त जागांची भर राज्य सरकारी सेवेत 7 लाख 19 हजार मंजूर पदे आहेत. त्यापैकी सुमारे 2 लाख 75 हजार पदे रिक्त आहेत. दरवर्षी सेवानिवृत्त होणाऱ्या कर्मचाऱ्यांमुळे रिक्त पदांमध्ये तीन टक्के रिक्त जागांची भर पडते. नवोदितांचे आर्थिक शोषण या रिक्त जागांवर नवोदितांची भरती करण्याची मागणी केली जाते. पण वेतनाच्या खर्चात बचत करण्यासाठी नवीन भरती न करता सेवानिवृत्तांची मानधनावर तसेच कंत्राटी पद्धतीने भरती होते हा चुकीचा पायंडा असून त्यामुळे सुशिक्षित तरुणांचे करिअरचे नियोजन बिघडते. मुख्य म्हणजे हा प्रकार तरुणांचे आथिक शोषण करणारा आहे. कर्मचाऱ्यांच्या आरोग्यावर परिणाम अतिरिक्त कामाच्या बोजामुळे कर्मचारी वर्ग त्रस्त आहे....

title: Kritische Hochwasserlage in mehreren Nachbarländern
content: Deutschlands Nachbarländer kämpfen gegen die Fluten. Mindestens acht Menschen starben, Tausende müssen in Sicherheit gebracht werden. Im Osten Deutschlands steigen die Pegel, insgesamt ist die Lage hierzulande aber vergleichsweise entspannt. In den von Überschwemmungen betroffenen deutschen Nachbarländern Österreich, Polen und Tschechien bleibt die Lage angespannt. Sintflutartiger Regen hat am Wochenende ganze Landstriche unter Wasser gesetzt, mindestens acht Menschen kamen bis Sonntagabend in den Fluten ums Leben. Vier weitere Menschen wurden in Tschechien noch vermisst. Tausende Menschen mussten evakuiert werden, Hunderttausende waren ohne Strom, Straßen und Zugstrecken mussten gesperrt werden. In Niederösterreich kam am Sonntag ein Feuerwehrmann bei Auspumparbeiten ums Leben. Das Bundesland wurde zum Katastrophengebiet erklärt. Mehr als 25.000 Einsatzkräfte waren unterwegs, unterstützt von rund 1.000 Soldatinnen und Soldaten. Das Militär transportierte bis zum Einbruch der Dunkelheit mit einem Black-Hawk-Hubschrauber große Säcke mit Sand und Kies, um undichte Stellen an Dämmen abzudichten. Besonders dramatisch war die Lage am Fluss Kamp, dort wurde ein Jahrhundert-Hochwasser befürchtet. Ein Nachlassen der Niederschläge in der Nacht zum Montag sollte eine "kleine Verschnaufpause" bringen, sagte Niederösterreichs Ministerpräsidentin Johanna Mikl-Leitner. Damm in St. Pölten gebrochen In St. Pölten in Österreich brach ein Damm. Das gesamte Stadtgebiet ist...

title: Dermot O'Leary pays an emotional tribute to his wife Dee Koppang with rare photograph of them together as he marks 12th wedding anniversary
content: Dermot O'Leary pays an emotional tribute to his wife Dee Koppang with rare photograph of them together as he marks 12th wedding anniversary Have YOU got a story? Email tips@dailymail.com By Carolina Piras For Mailonline Published: 19:31 EDT, 15 September 2024 | Updated: 19:35 EDT, 15 September 2024 e-mail View comments Dermot O'Leary surprised fans by sharing an emotional tribute to his wife Dee Koppang on Instagram as he celebrated their 12th wedding anniversary. The This Morning star, 51, took to his Instagram page on Saturday with a rare snap from their wedding day as they danced the night away together. Dermot, who is usually fairly private about his family life, gave a rare insight by sharing the sweet shot of himself and Dee, 45. Alongside the photograph, he wrote: '12 years!' The couple met when they were both working for the same television corporation and started dating in 2002 when they began a nine-year relationship. title: Usa 2024, l’uomo che mirava a Trump è il 58enne Ryan Routh
content: NEW YORK, 15 SET – L’uomo armato al club di golf diDonald Trump è stato identificato come Ryan Wesley Routh, 58anni. Lo riportano i media Usa. Routh ha frequentato la North Carolina Agricultural andTechnical State University e nel 2018 si è trasferito alleHawaii. Sui suoi social ha postato più volte in merito allaguerra in Ucraina, tentando anche di reclutare soldati per lacausa di Kiev.

title: Pramono Anung Jawab Sindiran Ridwan Kamil Soal Selfie di CFD: Saya Lebih Sering Blusukan
content: Bakal cagub Jakarta , menegaskan bahwa dirinya lebih sering menyerap aspirasi masyarakat, dibanding datang ke car free day (CFD) di Jakarta. Hal itu disampaikannya merespons pernyataan bakal cagub Jakarta yang diusung Koalisi Indonesia Maju (KIM) (RK). Ridwan Kamil menyebut bahwa dirinya ingin lebih fokus untuk mencari permasalahan di Jakarta, ketimbang berswafoto atau dengan masyarakat di . "Saya kan lebih sering," kata Pramono ditemui di GOR Tanjung Duren, Jakarta Barat, Minggu (15/9/2024). Pramono menyebut ajang bisa sekaligus memperkenalkan dirinya sebagai cagub Jakarta. Lantas, dia menyebut jika ada warga yang meminta dengannya di , itu menandakan dirinya telah dikenal oleh masyarakat Jakarta. "Dan itu kalau kemudian di car free day minta foto sama saya, saya juga bangga artinya apa? Udah dikenal bukan lagi nya 0, kalau disurvei sekarang beda banget kan gitu," ucapnya. Lagi pula, ungkap Sekretaris Kabinet itu, dirinya rutin datang ke sebelum maju di Pilkada Jakarta 2024. Sehingga dia menganggap bukan hal yang baru baginya. "Termasuk saya sepedaan seminggu tiga kali kan saya lakukan. Masa sekarang gara-gara saya calon gubernur enggak sepedaan, kan enggalah tetap sepedaan. Jadi car free day bukan sesuatu yang baru," pungkasnya. Sebelumnya, bakal calon gubernur Jakarta, (RK) mengungkap alasan dirinya belum pernah ikut car free day (CFD) di Jakarta. Menurutnya, ia memiliki alasan tersendiri tidak datang ke dahulu. Saat ini dirinya ingin lebih fokus untuk mencari...

title: Atlético Mineiro joga mal e perde para o Bahia fora de casa
creator: Jogada10
content: O Atlético Mineiro perdeu para o Bahia por 3 a 0 na noite deste domingo (15), na Casa de Apostas Arena Fonte Nova, pela 26° rodada do Campeonato Brasileiro. Dessa forma, o Tricolor voltou a vencer após quatro jogos. No entanto, o Galo perde após três partidas de invencibilidade. Os gols foram marcados por Everaldo, Everton Ribeiro e Lucho Rodriguez. Dessa forma, com o resultado, o Atlético Mineiro não pontuou e permaneceu com 33. Assim, a equipe segue na 10° colocação na tabela. Por outro lado, o Bahia somou mais três pontos. O Tricolor chega aos 42 e agora ocupa a 6° colocação. A primeira oportunidade de gol foi do Atlético Mineiro aos quatro minutos. Palacios recebeu um excelente lançamento na beira de campo e finalizou na saída do goleiro. No entanto, o chute foi fraco e Kanu apareceu e tirou o que poderia ser o primeiro gol do jogo. Depois, o Galo teve muita dificuldade de ficar com a bola e, portanto, de levar perigo ao gol de Marcos Felipe. Por outro lado, o Bahia teve a primeira chance clara aos 18, com Thaciano. O atacante recebeu na entrada da grande área e tirou do Everson, mas tirou demais e a bola acabou indo pra fora. A equipe chegou a ter mais algumas oportunidades no ataque, mas na hora de finalizar, também não levava perigo ao gol de Everson. As equipes começaram o segundo tempo buscando mais o ataque e pressionando na marcação. E assim saiu o gol do Bahia aos cinco minutos do primeiro tempo. Palacios fez um passe curto para o Mariano na...

title: 25 ವರ್ಷಗಳ ಹಿಂದೆ | ಅಧಿಕಾರದಾಹಿ ಕಾಂಗ್ರೆಸ್: ವಾಜಪೇಯಿ ಟೀಕೆ
creator: ಪ್ರಜಾವಾಣಿ ವಿಶೇಷ
content: ಹೈದರಾಬಾದ್, ಸೆ. 15– ಶಾಸಕ ಹಾಗೂ ಸಿರ್ಪೂರ್ ವಿಧಾನಸಭಾ ಕ್ಷೇತ್ರದ ಆಡಳಿತಾರೂಢ ತೆಲುಗು ದೇಶಂ ಪಕ್ಷದ ಅಭ್ಯರ್ಥಿ ಪಿ. ಪುರುಷೋತ್ತಮ ರಾವ್ ಹಾಗೂ ಅವರ ಮೂವರು ಅಂಗರಕ್ಷಕರನ್ನು ನಕ್ಸಲೀಯರು ಆಂಧ್ರದ ಅದಿಲಾಬಾದ್ ಜಿಲ್ಲೆಯ ಸಿರ್ಪೂರ್ ಕಾಗದ ನಗರದಲ್ಲಿ ಇಂದು ಮುಂಜಾನೆ ಗುಂಡಿಟ್ಟು ಕೊಂದಿದ್ದಾರೆ. ಈ ಹತ್ಯೆಯ ಹಿನ್ನೆಲೆಯಲ್ಲಿ ಸಿರ್ಪೂರ್ ಕ್ಷೇತ್ರದಲ್ಲಿ ಸೆ. 18ರಂದು ನಡೆಯಬೇಕಾಗಿದ್ದ ಮತದಾನ ರದ್ದಾಗಿದೆ ಎಂದು ಚುನಾವಣಾ ಆಯೋಗದ ಉನ್ನತ ಅಧಿಕಾರಿಯೊಬ್ಬರು ಹೇಳಿದ್ದಾರೆ. ನವದೆಹಲಿ, ಸೆ. 15– ‘ಸಮ್ಮಿಶ್ರ ಸರ್ಕಾರ ಸ್ಥಿರತೆ ನೀಡಲಾರದು ಎಂದು ಹೇಳುವ ಕಾಂಗ್ರೆಸ್ ಪಕ್ಷವು ಅಧಿಕಾರದಾಹಿ ಪಕ್ಷ’ ಎಂದು ಬಣ್ಣಿಸಿರುವ ಪ್ರಧಾನಿ ಅಟಲ್ ಬಿಹಾರಿ ವಾಜಪೇಯಿ, ಸಮ್ಮಿಶ್ರ ಸರ್ಕಾರಗಳು ಪೂರ್ಣಾವಧಿ ಬಾಳಲಾರವು ಎಂಬ ಕಾಂಗ್ರೆಸ್ ನಿಲುವಿಗೆ ತಮ್ಮ ಅಸಮ್ಮತಿ ಸೂಚಿಸಿದ್ದಾರೆ. ‘ವಿಶ್ವದ ಹಲವಾರು ದೇಶಗಳಲ್ಲಿ ಸಮ್ಮಿಶ್ರ ಸರ್ಕಾರಗಳು ಯಶಸ್ವಿಯಾಗಿ ಕಾರ್ಯ ನಿರ್ವಹಿಸುತ್ತಿವೆ. ಭಾರತದಲ್ಲಿಯೂ ಕೆಲವು ರಾಜ್ಯಗಳಲ್ಲಿ ಈ ಪ್ರಯೋಗ ಯಶಸ್ವಿಯಾಗಿ ಸ್ಥಿರ ಸರ್ಕಾರ ಒದಗಿಸಿದೆ’ ಎಂದು ಅವರು ಸಂದರ್ಶನದಲ್ಲಿ ಅಭಿಪ್ರಾಯಪಟ್ಟಿದ್ದಾರೆ. ಪ್ರಜಾವಾಣಿ ಆ್ಯಪ್ ಇಲ್ಲಿದೆ: ಆಂಡ್ರಾಯ್ಡ್ | ಐಒಎಸ್ | ವಾಟ್ಸ್ಆ್ಯಪ್ , ಎಕ್ಸ್ , ಫೇಸ್‌ಬುಕ್ ಮತ್ತು ಇನ್‌ಸ್ಟಾಗ್ರಾಂ ನಲ್ಲಿ ಪ್ರಜಾವಾಣಿ ಫಾಲೋ ಮಾಡಿ.

title: Beauty and the algorithm: online trends reward teens' risky behaviour
creator: Georgina Sebar
content: Molli Johns was exposed to disordered eating content on the internet as young as 13. or signup to continue reading Already facing pressure from her dance and school peers, Ms Johns struggled to find help in her regional town, waiting four years to receive a diagnosis. Now 21, she says seeing trends which encourage similar thinking being pushed to on TikTok is "awful". "It's kind of almost a shock to the system realising how early young children are being exposed to negative information," she says. "I'm looking at it and I'm like, 'Oh my god, I was five years older than some of these kids.'" The pressure to keep up has always been a part of the teenage experience but social media now provides feedback that is free, instantaneous and global. Some social media users are beginning to criticise the algorithm for pushing out a new, hyper-specific insecurity as quickly as every few weeks. In the meantime, however, anything from the length of your philtrum, to the shape of your nailbeds, to the colour of your labia is up for critique. Ms Johns now uses the algorithm to her advantage - by only interacting with body positive content, she is able to avoid trends which could lead to negative self-image. But she says the competitive nature of eating disorders means those dealing with them are unlikely to seek out content that goes against their thinking. "If you're in that mindset, you're not going to be looking towards that." The Butterfly Foundation works with social media platforms to...

title: 추석 연휴 어디가지...울산서 문화와 관광 즐기세요
creator: 구미현 기자
content: [울산=뉴시스]구미현 기자 = 추석 연휴 기간 울산에서 다양한 문화 행사가 펼쳐진다. 울산 동헌에서 오는 18일까지 실경 뮤지컬 ‘울산 임진왜란’이 공연된다. 울산문화예술회관에서는 17일까지 한국구족화가 초대전이 진행된다. 울산박물관과 대공원에서도 연휴 기간에 추석맞이 민속놀이마당이 운영되고 고래문화특구 곳곳에서는 특색있는 공연과 전통놀이, 불꽃쇼 등이 열릴 예정이다. 울산 전역 관광안내소 8곳도 고향 방문객과 관광객의 편의를 위해 정상 운영된다. 관광택시와 울산에서 일하며 여행하기 ‘유케이션’도 사전 예약분에 대해 추석 당일 정상적으로 이용할 수 있다. 또 추석 연휴와 함께하는 ‘2024 대한민국 숙박세일 페스타’를 통해 숙박시설 쿠폰 할인도 이용할 수 있다. 다만 울산대교 전망대, 대왕암공원, 소리체험관, 옹기박물관, 영남알프스 복합웰컴센터, 울산수목원 등은 추석 당일 휴무이며 울산안전체험관과 시티투어는 추석 연휴기간 휴무한다. 울산시 관계자는 “울산에서 많은 분이 추석 연휴 동안 다양한 행사를 즐기고 태화강 국가정원, 장생포 고래문화특구, 영남알프스, 대왕암공원 등 아름다운 울산의 매력을 만끽하도록 힘쓰겠다”고 말했다. ◎공감언론 뉴시스

title: Israel: Täter nach Messerangriff auf Polizisten in Jerusalem erschossen
Abel tenta evitar ansiedade em busca do tri brasileiro do Palmeiras e cita animação da Disney
creator: admin3
content: Com as atenções voltadas exclusivamente para o Campeonato Brasileiro, o técnico do Palmeiras, Abel Ferreira, disse depois da goleada por 5 a 0 sobre o Criciúma, neste domingo, no Allianz Parque, que é preciso pensar jogo a jogo e citou a animação Divertida Mente 2 na busca pelo tricampeonato seguido. “É um jogo de cada vez. Não posso ter esta ansiedade”, afirmou Abel. “Não vou criar esta ansiedade em mim mesmo. Já viram Divertida Mente? Não vou criar a Ansiedade”, completou ele, em referência à personagem da franquia da Disney e da Pixar. O técnico português afirmou ainda que os brasileiros vivem muito melhor. “Aprendi com vocês, brasileiros. Quem pode desfruta a vida”, disse o técnico, acrescentando que não se deve levar o futebol tão a sério. “Futebol tem que ser como parque de diversão, o jogador tem que se divertir. Também tenho direito a desfrutar a vida pessoal e profissional.” Com a goleada sobre o Criciúma, o Palmeiras chegou a 50 pontos, 3 a menos do que o líder Botafogo. A principal diferença entre os dois postulantes ao título é que o time do Rio ainda disputa a Libertadores e na quarta-feira enfrenta o São Paulo pela partida de ida das quartas de final, enquanto o Palmeiras só volta a jogar no domingo, contra o Vasco. Botafogo e Palmeiras se enfrentam na 38a e última rodada do Brasileiro no dia 8 de dezembro, com mando do clube carioca. “A partir do momento que ficamos fora da Libertadores e da Copa do Brasil, eu falei aos...

title: مصر.. فنانو المملكة يزينون معرض "ما وراء الإطار"
creator: واس - القاهرة
content: افتُتحت يوم الأحد في دار الأوبرا المصرية بالقاهرة فعاليات النسخة الثانية من معرض "ما وراء الإطار"، الذي يشارك فيه نخبة من المبدعين في مجال الفن التشكيلي من الدول العربية، من بينها المملكة. حضر الافتتاح نائب سفير خادم الحرمين الشريفين لدى مصر عبدالرحمن بن سالم الدهاس، الذي أجرى جولة في المعرض، اطلع خلالها على مجموعة متميزة من الأعمال التشكيلية التي يقدمها الفنانون السعوديون. ويهدف المعرض الذي يستمر لمدة 5 أيام، إلى توثيق روح التعاون والتبادل الثقافي والفني بين الدول العربية.

title: Где смотреть онлайн матч чемпионата Англии Манчестер Сити – Арсенал
content: В воскресенье, 22 сентября, состоится матч 5-го тура Английской Премьер-лиги, в котором встретятся «Манчестер Сити» и «Арсенал». Игра пройдет в Манчестере на арене «Этихад Стэдиум». Начало поединка – в 18:30 по киевскому времени. В таблице чемпионата Англии после 4-х туров «Манчестер Сити» занимает 1-е место, имея 12 очка. У «Арсенала», цвета которого защищает украинец Александр Зинченко, имеется 10 пунктов и 2-я позиция. Видеотрансляцию матча можно посмотреть на ОТТ-платформе Setanta Sports.

title: Satomi Kataoka, la viuda de Alberto Fujimori, rompe su silencio: “Adiós al presidente que amé como a un padre”
creator: Redacción Trome
content: Satomi Kataoka, quien contrajo matrimonio con el expresidente Alberto Fujimori durante su exilio en Japón, se pronunció después de varios años de guardar silencio sobre el fallecido mandatario. Devastada por la noticia del deceso, se comunicó con el programa Punto Final: “Adiós al presidente que amé como a un padre”, escribió. (ampliación en breve)

title: El impactante accidente en la Fórmula 2 en Azerbaiyán que demoró la carrera 35 minutos
content: La Fórmula 2 vivió un momento dramático en la Feature Race de este domingo en el circuito de Bakú, en Azerbaiyán . En la largada se produjo un estremecedor accidente, que por suerte no dejo consecuencias físicas para sus involucrados. Kush Maini se quedó parado en la partida y fue esquivado por parte del pelotón de la categoría, pero Pepe Martí , Rafael Villagómez y Oliver Goethe no pudieron evitarlo, impactándolo desde atrás. La peor parte fue para Pepe Martí, que salió disparado por los aires y su monoplaza terminó destrozado . Por suerte, el piloto catalán terminó ileso del brutal impacto y pudo salir de su vehículo por sus propios medios. Los comisarios sacaron la bandera roja de forma inmediata ante la cantidad de pedazos sobre el asfalto y ante la necesidad de retirar los autos de la recta de meta del trazado de Bakú. The incident that triggered a red flag at the start of the F2 Feature Race 🚩 Drivers ok #F2 #AzerbaijanGP pic.twitter.com/VFjNA8M3SQ Se tardaron 35 minutos en dejar la pista lista para reanudar la carrera, que finalmente se compitió a 13 vueltas. El propio Pepe Martí pidió disculpas a cámara desde la pista, aunque quedó claro que poco pudo hacer para evitar el impacto con Kush Maini , que recibió tres impactos muy fuertes, pero que también salió sin heridas, lo que demuestra que la seguridad ha aumentado también en la categoría puente de la F1. Los comisarios fueron a ayudar a los pilotos y a retirar los coches y todas las...

title: La ciencia revela cuál es el producto del hogar que elimina las chinches para siempre
content: Un estudio científico en Europa ha demostrado que un producto elimina de manera definitiva a las chinches en solo unos minutos. La plaga, que se ha vuelto difícil de controlar , ahora puede ser erradicada de forma eficaz con esta nueva solución. Suscríbete a nuestro canal de Telegram y lleva la información en tus manos. ¿Qué producto elimina las chinches para siempre? Investigadores del Hospital Universitario de Niza y del Institut Hospitalo-Universitaire (IHU) Méditerranée Infection, en Francia, liderados por el parasitólogo y entomólogo médico Pascal Delaunay, llevaron a cabo un análisis durante un año y medio de dos colonias de chinches . En su estudio, publicado en la revista Parasite , destacaron los compuestos silicato de aluminio y magnesio hidratado . Estos elementos atacan a los insectos a través de la deshidratación y se concentran principalmente en la tierra de Sommières. Delaunay subrayó que, además de tener un efecto rápido —bastando solo tres minutos de exposición para eliminar a las chinches—, el producto también demuestra un efecto no repulsivo y un efecto transversal, donde un insecto contaminado puede transmitir la infección a otros. ¿Qué es la tierra de Sommières que elimina a las chinches? Se trata de una arcilla natural que se extrae de la región de Sommières, en Francia , y se caracteriza por sus propiedades absorbentes. Se utiliza para eliminar manchas y olores, así como para combatir chinches en pocos minutos y para siempre....

title: Council's speed limit changes causing confusion
creator: Dylan Smits
content: Under the city council’s Safe Speed Neighbourhoods programme, speed limits have been lowered on residential streets across the city, but their introduction has at times been inconsistent. Photos: Supplied Avonside Dr is a major route linking the city centre to the eastern suburbs. Its speed limit between Gloucester St and Wainoni Rd was reduced from 50kmh to 30kmh in March. While heading along Avonside Dr at the new limit, The Star car was overtaken by a red Toyota, driven by someone who seemed not to care about the city council’s new expectations. The speed limit on the road was reduced under the council’s Safe Speed Neighbourhoods programme, which aimed to lower speed limits to 30kmh on roads around schools and 30kmh or 40kmh on residential streets. Whether a road is 30kmh or 40kmh is determined through consultation with the local community. The entire north Linwood area and parts of Avonside, including Avonside Dr, have been reduced to 30kmh due to Whītau School. The school on Woodham Rd normally has a 50kmh limit, but this is lowered to 40km/h during school zone times. But the reduced limits near schools have not been implemented at the same time - or with consistency - on similar roads. City council transport operations manager Stephen Wright said this was because all planned speed limit changes had been delayed until the Government finalises its Setting of Speed Limits Rule. Transport Minister Simeon Brown has encouraged city councils nationwide to wait for the new...

title: देश का मानसून ट्रैकर:मध्य प्रदेश-छत्तीसगढ़ चार राज्यों में भारी बारिश का अलर्ट; UP के वाराणसी में गंगा वॉर्निंग लेवल के पार
content: मौसम विभाग ने सोमवार (16 सितंबर) को 9 राज्यों में भारी बारिश का अलर्ट जारी किया है। मध्य प्रदेश, छत्तीसगढ़, बिहार, झारखंड में बहुत भारी बारिश की संभावना जताई है। मध्य प्रदेश में इस मॉनसून सीजन यानी 1 जून से 15 सितंबर तक 1029.4 mm बारिश हो चुकी है। नॉर्मल बारिश 894.4 mm होती थी। मौसम विभाग के मुताबिक, सितंबर में बारिश का तीसरा स्ट्रॉन्ग सिस्टम रविवार से एक्टिव हुआ है। अगले 3 दिन तक मध्यप्रदेश के पूर्वी हिस्से- जबलपुर, रीवा, शहडोल और सागर संभाग में भारी बारिश होगी। 18 सितंबर से प्रदेश में बारिश की एक्टिविटी घट जाएगी। उत्तर प्रदेश में बीते 4 दिन से भारी बारिश जारी है। इसके कारण राज्य की कई नदियां उफान पर हैं। वाराणसी गंगा का जल स्तर रविवार को पहली बार वॉर्निंग लेवल के पार कर गया। इससे 85 घाट गंगा में डूब गए। गंगा का वॉर्निंग लेवल 70.262 m और डेंजर लेवल 71.262 m है। हिमाचल प्रदेश: मौसम विभाग ने 6 जिलों में जारी किया येलो अलर्ट हिमाचल प्रदेश में 21 सितंबर तक बारिश का दौर जारी रहेगा। बुधवार (18 सितंबर) को राज्य के 6 जिलों में भारी बारिश और बिजली गिरने का अलर्ट है। मॉनसून के इस सीजन में राज्य में अबतक बारिश से जुड़ी घटनाओं में 171 लोगों की मौत हो चुकी है। 30 लोग अभी भी लापता हैं। 17 सितंबर को 7 राज्यों में भारी बारिश का अलर्ट देशभर से मौसम की तस्वीरें... इस बार मानसून सामान्य से 16 अधिक दिन एक्टिव रहेगा मानसून के 16 अधिक दिन एक्टिव रहने की वजह राज्यों में मौसम का हाल...

title: No basta con financiar el acceso a la universidad
content: SEÑOR DIRECTOR: El financiamiento universitario a través del CAE ha producido una fuerte discusión entre los partidarios de su condonación total, parcial o eliminación, con aquellos que indican que esta política pondría en riesgo una alternativa importante de financiamiento para miles de estudiantes. Sin embargo, la discusión febril sobre los recursos para el financiamiento universitario nubla un fenómeno aún más complejo: si bien con el CAE casi se duplicó el número de estudiantes universitarios, la productividad del país ha caído persistentemente. En otras palabras: si bien tenemos más capital humano, este mismo capital produce cada vez menos. Este fenómeno contradice una de las recetas que dan los economistas para impulsar el crecimiento per cápita de un país: un trabajador más hábil puede utilizar los otros insumos productivos de manera más eficiente y producir más, accediendo a salarios más altos. Muy por el contrario, la productividad de la economía chilena viene cayendo y el crecimiento potencial roza un impresentable 2%, indicando que la política educativa de formar capital humano con endeudamiento parcial, total o de gratuidad no está funcionando. CAE y principio de autocontención Hace 24 horas La verdadera deuda educativa 13 sep 2024 ¿Son nuestros egresados capaces de producir microchips, computadores, softwares, robots, IA, etc. como lo hace Corea, Taiwán y otros países de modesto pasado económico? La respuesta es que no. O no en la...

title: Pecahkan Rekor MURI, Ratusan Drone Hiasi Langit Samarinda saat Penutupan MTQ Nasional XXX
content: - Atraksi yang menakjubkan sukses memukau warga Kota Samarinda yang hadir dalam penutupan Musabaqah Tilawatil Quran (MTQ) Nasional, Minggu (15/9/2024). Ribuan titik cahaya ini berhasil menghiasi langit Samarinda dengan berbagai pola. Terpantau ada 10 pola yang dibentuk menggunakan 500 dari Asosiasi Pilot Drone Indonesia (APDI) Regional . Pola pertama membentuk maskot Kota Samarinda, yakni Pesut Makaham atau lumba-lumba air tawar. Kemudian muncul pola kedua yang membentuk angka 1-30 yang menunjukan MTQ Nasional 2024 di Kalimantan Timur merupakan perhelatan ke-30. Pola ketiga dan keempat membentuk tulisan Allah dan nama Nabi Muhammad berukuran besar di langit malam Samarinda. Ada pula pola yang membentuk Pulau Kalimantan dan bertuliskan 2024. Selanjutnya pola ketujuh bertuliskan MTQ NASIONAL XXX, pola kedelapan membentuk logo MTQN ke 30 di . Pola kesembilan menunjukan maskot MTQN XXX, yakni Angga dan Anggi. Sedangkan pola terakhir atau kesepuluh membentuk burung Garuda yang menjadi lambang Negara Republik Indonesia. Atraksi ini pun berhasil memecahkan rekor MURI untuk konfigurasi logo terbesar dari susunan dalam acara . "Ini masuk dalam daftar rekor MURI baru," kata Senior Manager MURI, Triyono saat dijumpai usai pemberian rekor. Sementara itu, Kepala Dinas Komunikasi dan Informatika (Diskominfo) , Muhammad Faisal menjelaskan bahwa pertunjukan drome berlangsung selama 10 menit dengan melibatkan 500 . Ratusan itu membentuk pola di ketinggian 300 meter dari permukaan darat....

title: El inesperado mensaje de felicitación de los príncipes de Gales para Harrry en su cumpleaños 40
content: Desde que el príncipe Harry tomó la decisión de independizarse de la Familia Real británica y abandonar Londres, para afianzarse en California, al lado de su esposa, Meghan Markle , y de sus dos hijos, los príncipes Archie Harrison y Lilibet Diana , las relaciones del duque de Sussex con algunos miembros de su familia no han sido del todo cercanas . Sin embargo, eso no ha impedido que este 15 de septiembre hayan enviado sus felicitaciones a Harry, con motivo de su cumpleaños 40, dejando en claro así que, a pesar de sus diferencias, el cariño sigue presente. El primer mensaje para Harry en su día especial llegaba de parte de los reyes, Carlos III y Camila, quienes a través de la cuenta oficial de la Familia Real expresaron sus buenos deseos al también hijo de la difunta princesa Diana. "¡Le deseamos hoy al duque de Sussex un muy feliz 40 cumpleaños!", escribieron al pie de una fotografía en la que se puede ver al esposo de Meghan Markle de lo más sonriente, sentado sobre una mesa y vistendo un saco gris con camisa blanca. Por su lado, los príncipes de Gales, el príncipe William y Kate Middleton, también se pronunciaron a través de sus historias de Instagram, donde retomaron la publicación de la cuenta de la Familia Real y agregaron unas lindas palabras para el cumpleañero. "Deseamos un feliz 40 cumpleaños al duque de Sussex", expresó la pareja real. La despedida del príncipe Harry a su adorada abuela, la reina Isabel II El segundo día de los Invictus...

World News | Hundreds March in Brazil to Support Religious Freedom as Cases of Intolerance Rise
content: Rio De Janeiro, Sep 16 (AP) Practitioners of different religious traditions marched down Rio de Janeiro's iconic Copacabana Beach on Sunday to support religious freedom in Brazil, where cases of intolerance have doubled over the past six years. Hundreds of men, women and children from more than a dozen faiths participated in the event, known as the March for the Defense of Religious Freedom. Many of the participants were practitioners of Afro-Brazilian religions that have recently faced attacks from members of Christian groups. Brazil's recently appointed Minister for Human Rights Macaé Evaristo also joined the march, which was held for the 17th consecutive year. Also Read | Russia-Ukraine War: 2 People Die in Odesa After Moscow and Kyiv Exchange Drone, Missile Attacks (Watch Videos). “The great challenge today in our country is to reduce inequality," Evaristo told the state-run Agencia Brasil news agency. "So for me it is very important to be present in this march, because the people here are also struggling for many things like decent work and a life free from hunger." In Rio de Janeiro state, which is home to a quarter of the practitioners of Afro-Brazilian religions, there's been a proliferation of evangelical Christianity, particularly neo-Pentecostal churches founded since 1970 that focus on spreading their faith among non-believers. title: Một trong những sai lầm lớn nhất trên dòng iPhone 16
content: Sau khi ra mắt dòng iPhone 16, Apple cho biết cả bốn mẫu trong năm nay đều được trang bị 8GB RAM. Đây là một động thái hiếm hoi khi Apple không tạo ra sự khác biệt về thông số kỹ thuật trong danh mục bộ nhớ giữa các phiên bản. Nâng cấp RAM cho iPhone 16 và iPhone 16 Plus đồng nghĩa với việc tất cả các thiết bị trong dòng sản phẩm này có thể chạy mượt với các tính năng AI sinh tạo của Apple Intelligence và còn dư không gian cho các tính năng mở rộng trong tương lai. Tuy nhiên, theo Wccf Tech, đây được coi là một cơ hội bị bỏ lỡ khi Apple không tạo ra sự khác biệt rõ ràng giữa các mẫu, đặc biệt là với iPhone 16 Pro và iPhone 16 Pro Max. Việc trang bị RAM 12GB cho hai mẫu này sẽ là bước đột phá đáng chú ý. Những người theo dõi Apple đều biết rằng iPhone 15 và iPhone 15 Plus chỉ được trang bị 6GB RAM, khiến cho chúng không thể chạy các tính năng AI của công ty. Điều này có thể làm người dùng cảm thấy khó chịu vì các mẫu cơ bản của năm ngoái chỉ mới ra mắt chưa đầy một năm. Người dùng sẽ phải chờ thêm một năm để thấy iPhone được nâng cấp lên RAM 12GB, và điều này có thể chỉ xuất hiện trên các mẫu "Pro" của năm 2025. Kết hợp giữa một Neural Engine mạnh mẽ và RAM đủ lớn là điều cần thiết để chạy Apple...

title: Hamas raps Zionist recruitment of African asylum seekers for war
content: According to IRNA, quoting the Palestinian media, Hamas in a statement on Sunday accused the Israeli army of recruiting African asylum seekers to fight in Gaza in exchange for residency rights, a move that highlights the moral crisis faced by the Zionist entity. The recruitment confirms the Israeli violation of "the most basic rules of human rights by exploiting the need of immigrants and asylum seekers", the statement said, adding that the Israeli army is blackmailing African asylum seekers by offering the incentive of permanent residency status to them. The movement called on the international community and human rights organizations to condemn what it described as a “racist” act and to take the necessary measures to hold the criminal leaders of this occupying regime accountable for grossly violating the laws of war and international human rights. According to several reports, in the past months, the regime’s army has used foreign mercenaries to participate in the massacre of Palestinians in the Gaza Strip. The recruitment of African asylum seekers started amid the refusal by ultra conservative Jews to the request of the Zionist cabinet for compulsory service to participate in the genocidal war in Gaza. There are currently around 30-thousand African asylum seekers living in Israel. According to Israeli media, the regime uses asylum seekers in dangerous operations in Gaza. 4399

title: Lando Norris has taken another chunk out of Max Verstappen's lead in drivers' championship standings by finishing above him in Baku Grand Prix
content: Lando Norris hails his 'flying' McLaren and says he's 'surprised' he overtook Max Verstappen as Brit closes gap on title rival after storming from 15th to finish fourth at Azerbaijan GP Lando Norris' fourth-placed finish to Max Verstappen's fourth helped cut the gap Norris' finish also lifted McLaren to the top of the constructors' championship By Jonathan McEvoy Published: 00:31, 16 September 2024 | Updated: 00:38, 16 September 2024 e-mail View comments L ando Norris said he was 'flying' after taking another nibble into Max Verstappen 's world championship lead by finishing ahead of him in Baku. The British driver's fourth place, to Verstappen's fifth, also lifted McLaren to the top of the constructors' standings by 20 points. There was much delight at the British-based team's paddock because of that landmark achievement, and the fact their other driver, Oscar Piastri , pulled off a dazzling win. Norris, though never in contention for victory, was delighted with his day, after starting 15th but still managing to trim his deficit to Verstappen to 59 points. Lando Norris will be delighted to have cut the deficit in the drivers' championship after Baku A maximum of 206 more points are on offer between now and the closing race in Abu Dhabi on December 8. 'I don't think we could have asked for a lot more today,' said Norris. 'It was a good start, good strategy and a great result to be ahead of Max. 'The car was flying. title: A missile fired by Yemen’s Houthi terrorists lands in Israel and triggers airport sirens
creator: Natalie Melzer and Ohad Zwigenberg The Associated Press
content: JERUSALEM — A missile fired by Yemen’s Iran-backed Houthi terrorists landed in an open area in central Israel early Sunday and triggered air raid sirens at its international airport, in the latest reverberation from the nearly yearlong war in Gaza. Israel hinted that it would respond militarily. There were no reports of casualties or major damage, but Israeli media aired footage showing people racing to shelters in Ben Gurion International Airport. The airport authority said that it resumed normal operations shortly thereafter. A fire could be seen in a rural area of central Israel, and local media showed images of what appeared to be a fragment from an interceptor that landed on an escalator in a train station in the central town of Modiin. Israel’s army said the surface-to-surface missile was intercepted by Israel’s defense system, which hit and fragmented the target but did not destroy it. The military said the sound of explosions in the area came from interceptors. The Houthis have repeatedly fired drones and missiles toward Israel since the start of the war in Gaza, but nearly all of them have been intercepted over the Red Sea. In July, an Iranian-made drone launched by the Houthis struck Tel Aviv, killing one person and wounding 10 others. Israel responded with a wave of airstrikes on Houthi-held areas of Yemen, including the port city of Hodeidah, a Houthi stronghold. Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu hinted at a similar response in remarks at a Cabinet...

title: Nếu ăn sáng như thế này, con bạn sẽ thông minh hơn, chiều cao tăng thêm 10cm và điểm số bứt phá
content: Vào năm học mới, bạn có thực sự dự định cho con mình ăn một bữa sáng thịnh soạn, giúp con mở rộng không gian phát triển, phát huy tối đa năng lượng và cho phép con cống hiến hết mình cho việc học hay không? Năm 1927, chính quyền Oslo, Na Uy đã đặc biệt mời một chuyên gia dinh dưỡng nổi tiếng . Một nghiên cứu của Đại học Leeds ở Anh cho thấy những Một cuộc khảo sát do tỉnh Chiết Giang ở Trung Quốc thực hiện cũng cho thấy, Nói cách khác, . Bây giờ là lúc bạn cần chú ý đến bữa sáng của con mình! Trước khi bắt đầu tập luyện, các vận động viên sẽ thực hiện các bài tập khởi động để thư giãn cơ thể, cơ bắp và cải thiện quá trình lưu thông máu. Ăn sáng tương đương với việc tập thể dục khởi động cho não và cơ thể. Chỉ khi được cung cấp đầy đủ dinh dưỡng, chúng ta mới có thể duy trì được thể trạng tối ưu. Não là cơ quan tiêu thụ rất nhiều năng lượng, tuy não chỉ chiếm khoảng 2% trọng lượng cơ thể nhưng lại tiêu tốn khoảng 20% năng lượng của toàn cơ thể. Nguồn năng lượng chính của não là glucose, tiêu thụ khoảng 100 gram mỗi ngày. Đến sáng, trẻ đã ăn tối được 9-10 tiếng, lượng đường trong máu đã cạn kiệt từ lâu. Cho trẻ ăn bữa sáng đầy đủ dinh dưỡng vào buổi sáng...

title: Công ty liên quan đến Chủ tịch Chứng khoán Nhất Việt muốn gom hơn 20 triệu cổ phiếu VFS
content: Ông Trần Anh Thắng – Phó Chủ tịch thường trực HĐQT kiêm Tổng Giám đốc CTCP Chứng khoán Nhất Việt (mã: VFS) vừa đăng ký bán 7,61 triệu cổ phiếu VFS trong thời gian 18/09 - 17/10. Nếu hoàn tất, ông Thắng sẽ hạ sở hữu từ 15,61 triệu cổ phiếu (tỉ lệ 13,01%) xuống còn 8 triệu cổ phiếu (tỉ lệ 6,66%). Giao dịch dự kiến thực hiện từ ngày 18/9 - 17/10/2024. Ông Trần Anh Thắng sinh năm 1984, tốt nghiệp Thạc sĩ Tài chính - Ngân hàng tại Đại học Latrobe (Úc). Ông trở thành Thành viên HĐQT VFS từ tháng 2/2017. Đến tháng 4/2021, ông Trần Anh Thắng giữ chức Phó Chủ tịch HĐQT kiêm Tổng Giám đốc cho đến hiện tại. Ngoài các vai trò chủ chốt tại VFS thì ông Trần Anh Thắng còn đang là thành viên HĐQT độc lập tại Ngân hàng TMCP Xuất nhập khẩu Việt Nam (Eximbank, mã: EIB). Ông Thắng từng là Chủ tịch HĐQT tại CTCP Amber Capital Holdings. Amber Capital Holdings hiện còn là cổ đông lớn sở hữu 8,8 triệu cổ phiếu VFS, tương ứng tỷ lệ 10,97% vốn. Ở chiều ngược lại, CTCP Đầu tư Tài chính Hòa An mới thông báo đăng ký mua mới 20,5 triệu , tương ứng tỉ lệ 17,08% vốn Chứng khoán Nhất Việt. Giao dịch dự kiến thực hiện trong giai đoạn ngày 16/09 - 15/10. Về mối liên hệ, cả Chứng khoán Nhất Việt và Đầu tư Tài chính Hòa An đều...

title: Người trường thọ thường có 6 đặc điểm dễ nhận thấy trên cơ thể: Sau 50 tuổi có đủ thì xin chúc mừng!
content: Sống trường thọ là mong ước của rất nhiều người nhưng tuổi thọ thường phụ thuộc vào nhiều yếu tố chẳng hạn như gen, môi trường, thói quen, lối sống. Thông thường, từ độ tuổi 50 trở đi, các dấu hiệu lão hóa sẽ bắt đầu xuất hiện trên cơ thể. Quá trình trao đổi chất trong cơ thể bắt đầu diễn ra chậm hơn, các bệnh lý liên quan đến tuổi già cũng dần xuất hiện, gây ảnh hưởng tới sức khỏe. Tuy nhiên, những người trường thọ thường sẽ không gặp quá nhiều vấn đề sức khỏe ở tuổi 50. Chúng ta thậm chí còn có thể dễ dàng nhận thấy các dấu hiệu khỏe mạnh thông qua các đặc điểm trên cơ thể họ. 6 đặc điểm của người trường thọ 1. Vết thương nhanh lành Liền vết thương là cơ chế tự bảo vệ của cơ thể, xảy ra mỗi khi cơ thể gặp những dạng tổn thương khác nhau. Để vết thương lành, cơ thể cần trải qua các giai đoạn là viêm - tăng sinh - tạo sẹo. Tuy nhiên, quá trình liền vết thương sẽ diễn ra chậm hơn từ sau tuổi 50 do hệ miễn dịch suy yếu, quá trình chuyển hóa và tái tạo kém hiệu quả. Do đó, nếu sau 50 tuổi, nếu vết thương nhanh lành thì đây là dấu hiệu chứng tỏ chức năng của các cơ quan trong cơ thể vẫn hoạt động hiệu quả, cơ thể vẫn khỏe mạnh. 2. title: El país de América Latina con el mejor pan del mundo y que venció al más rico de Perú y Francia
creator: Luis Chumbiauca
content: En un nuevo ranking mundial del reconocido portal gastronómico Taste Atlas un país de América Latina se llevó el reconocimiento de tener el pan más rico del mundo , superando a naciones como Perú, Francia y Estados Unidos . La distinción destaca la calidad de la gastronomía latinoamericana y, en especial, de un país de Sudamérica. ¿Cuál es? El país de América Latina con el mejor pan del mundo De acuerdo a un último ranking mundial de Taste Atlas , que echó a votación para conocer qué país tiene el pan más rico del mundo , el resultado fue que Colombia es la nación con la mejor creación panadera. Específicamente, el pan de bono se coronó como el mejor, por encima de creaciones de Francia, Perú y Estados Unidos. El delicioso pan de bono, originario del Valle del Cauca, ha conquistado a los expertos gastronómicos gracias a su exquisito sabor y su textura delicadamente suave. Esta receta, que combina almidón de yuca, harina de maíz y queso, representa a la perfección la versatilidad y autenticidad de la cocina colombiana. ¿Cómo se prepara el pan de bono?

title: Es titular con el América, no aprovechó su oportunidad y ahora perdería el puesto por Víctor Dávila
creator: Jhon Guiñan
content: América dio un golpe de autoridad con la victoria contra Chivas, quedándose con tres puntos muy valiosos en el Apertura 2024. Ahora las Águilas quieren seguir creciendo con el pasos de los partidos y además cuentan con el fichaje de Víctor Dávila , quien ya se incorporó al equipo. El chileno llega para solucionarle un problema a André Jardine, quien necesitaba un extremo de garantías para cubrir la baja de Julián Quiñones. A pesar de que Víctor Dávila puede desempeñarse en varios puestos, lo cierto es que al menos en principio llega para ocupar la banda izquierda. Y esto conlleva a decisiones muy radicales por parte de André Jardine, quien tendrá que realizar cambios en el once inicial. El timonel brasileño pondrá de arranque a Víctor Dávila, con lo cual dejará sin sitio en la alineación a Brian Rodríguez de cara a lo que viene en el Apertura 2024. El Rayo estuvo mucho tiempo como la única opción para la banda izquierda, primero con la salida de Julián Quiñones y luego con la lesión de Alejandro Zendejas . Sin embargo, Brian Rodríguez no aprovechó la oportunidad para consolidarse en su puesto y ahora iría a la banca. ¿Qué número utilizará Víctor Dávila? Luego de varios días de mucha incertidumbre sobre las negociaciones por Víctor Dávila, el América finalmente destrabó la situación y anunció su incorporación. El chileno utilizará el número 11 , según se aprecia en el registro del futbolista ante la Liga MX para el Apertura 2024.

title: ‘Smiley face’ crater on Mars could hold signs of life, scientists say
creator: Postmedia News
content: The fourth planet from the sun appears to be having fun. Astronomers have discovered a smiley face-shaped structure on Mars and researchers believe that it might indicate signs of past life on the Red Planet. The grinning formation is made up of a pair of crater eyes as well as rings of ancient salt deposits. The deposits are the remains of a long-ago dried-up ancient body of water, which left behind the emoji-life remnant that is only visible when viewed with an infrared camera. The European Space Agency (ESA) captured the photo. “These deposits, remnants of ancient water bodies, could indicate habitable zones from billions of years ago,” the ESA said, per the U.K. Daily Mail . Scientists aren’t sure how big the smiley face is, but it is one of 965 other salt deposits recently catalogued on Mars’ surface that range from 1,000 to 10,000 feet in size. Salt deposits are accumulations of salt or chloride found on a planetary surface. On Mars, they’re remnants of ancient bodies of water that dried up when the planet underwent a climatic shift eons ago. The ESA said before the last puddles of Mars’ liquid water disappeared, they may have been a “haven” for microbial life. The puddles would have been extremely salty and the remains of microbes that once lived in them might still be preserved to this day, hiding in deposits such as this smiley face. The ESA captured the image using their ExoMars Trace Gas Orbiter, a measuring device in use since 2016. Salt deposits on Mars’ surface...

title: Glen Powell, after conquering Hollywood, tells us why he’s coming for your ears next
creator: Andy Meek
content: Glen Powell’s megawatt smile, leading man charisma and that chiseled-by-the-gods jawline have made him one of Hollywood’s breakout stars of 2024. HIs increasingly well-honed ability to pick winning projects — including films like , , and Netflix’s — hasn’t hurt, either. Of course, even movie stars get a little creative wanderlust now and then, which is how Powell recently ended up in a climate-controlled audio booth after rounding up a bunch of his famous friends like Nicholas Braun and Ashley Park to co-star with him in a new Audible Original podcast. Powell is the producer and star of Audible’s newly released , a 10-episode comedy about a man who ghostwrites wedding speeches. Because it’s an audio show, that also makes this one a rather unique addition to Powell’s increasingly hit-filled IMDb page: For his newest project, unlike with his hit movies, Powell’s aim is to literally get inside your head. “I’m always down to try new things,” he told me in a Zoom interview, the same day that became available on VOD. “Especially when it comes to entertaining audiences. Sign up for the most interesting tech & entertainment news out there. By signing up, I agree to the and have reviewed the “We’re in a time for humanity where it’s very hard to get people’s attention. title: Árboles frutales que debes podar en septiembre para que crezcan hermosos
content: Podar árboles frutales es una labor indispensable para garantizar su salud y mejorar su rendimiento. El mes de septiembre ofrece condiciones óptimas para realizar este proceso, preparándolos para la próxima temporada de crecimiento. Suscríbete a nuestro canal de Telegram y lleva la información en tus manos. En este contexto, la Universidad Autónoma de Puebla (UAPA) señala que una poda bien ejecutada no solo mejora la estructura del árbol, sino que también potencia la calidad y cantidad de la cosecha. Por eso, se recomienda realizar la poda en especies como el cerezo, el durazno y el ciruelo durante este período, lo que puede aumentar su longevidad, estética y productividad. ¿Cómo y cuándo se podan los cerezos? La poda de los cerezos en septiembre es crucial para mantener su salud y productividad. Este mes es ideal para realizar las siguientes acciones: Eliminar ramas muertas y enfermas: Retirar estas ramas ayuda a prevenir la propagación de enfermedades y a mantener el árbol vigoroso. Despejar la copa: Cortar ramas que cruzan o crecen hacia el interior del árbol permite una mejor circulación de aire y exposición al sol. Consejo adicional: Usa herramientas de poda afiladas y realiza cortes limpios para minimizar el riesgo de infección. ¿Cómo y cuándo podar un árbol de durazno? En el caso del durazno , la poda en septiembre facilita un crecimiento robusto y una fructificación abundante, según datos de PortalFruticola . Aquí algunos consejos...

title: Lions insist Lachie Neale will play preliminary final against Geelong despite weeks-long foot problem
creator: Rob Forsaith
content: Lachie Neale will enter Brisbane’s AFL preliminary final under an injury cloud, although coach Chris Fagan insists the dual Brownlow medallist will be fit to tackle Geelong . Neale was in obvious discomfort during the final minutes of the Lions’ remarkable semi-final victory over GWS in Sydney on Saturday, as his side somehow prevailed by five points after trailing by 44 late in the third quarter. Neale, well tagged by Toby Bedford at Engie Stadium, grabbed at his left foot during the chaotic finish. Know the news with the 7NEWS app: Download today The gun midfielder had his foot in a moonboot as Fagan and the team debriefed after one of the greatest wins in club history. “He’s had a bit of a sore foot for quite a few weeks now, so his training has been modified,” Fagan said. “If you come down and watch us train, you probably won’t see him on a Tuesday. You’ll see him on a Thursday and he’ll look not very good. “Then by the time we get to a game, he’s good to go. He’s tough.” Fagan added Neale would “be right” to play Saturday night’s MCG showdown against Geelong. “He’s not in any danger of not playing next week,” he said. “He’s fine, he’s just like he always is after a game. It’s been like that for quite some time now.” Neale finished with 19 possessions and seven clearances. The 31-year-old notably had just one possession in the final quarter on Saturday night, when his influence was curbed by Bedford. “I don’t think I touched it in the last,” Neale quipped to Channel 7....

title: Avrupa'da doğan Türk genci Osmanlı'nın giyim tarzını yaşatmak istiyor
content: Annesi İsviçreli, babası İstanbullu olan Pars Osmanoğlu 1992 yılında Basel'de dünyaya geldi. Osmanoğlu çocukken babasının eski aile fotoğraflarında Osmanlı dönemine ilişkin dedesi ve yanındakilerin fotoğraflarını gördü. Bu fotoğraflara hayran kalan Osmanoğlu, yaklaşık 1 yıl önce, Osmanlı'nın son dönemlerine ait halkın giyim tarzını benimsemeye karar verdi. Fes takan, baston kullanan, tespih çeken ve o dönemin kesimlerine benzer takım elbiseler giyen genç, günlük hayatında bu tarzını sürdürmeye devam ediyor. GENELDE POZİTİF TEPKİLER ALIYOR Kıyafetleriyle İsviçre, Almanya, Belçika ve Çekya sokaklarında dolaşan Osmanoğlu, kendisine gelen pozitif tepkilerden memnun. Osmanoğlu, AA muhabirine yaptığı açıklamada, İstanbul'da da birçok kişinin kendisiyle fotoğraf çektirdiğini, genelde pozitif tepkiler aldığını, yaşamı boyunca bu tarzı sürdürmek istediğini söyledi. " 'BİZ NEDEN ARTIK FES TAKMIYORUZ?' DİYE MERAK ETMİŞİMDİR' Hayranlığının çocukken baktığı fotoğraflarla başladığını dile getiren Osmanoğlu şöyle konuştu: "İsviçre'nin Basel kentinde doğdum. Türk eşim var. Birkaç yıldır İstanbul'da yaşıyorum, ticaretle uğraşıyorum. Oxford'da okudum. Çocukluğumdan beri eski fotoğraflara bakıyorum. O fotoğraflara baktıkça hoşuma gitmeye başladı. 'Biz neden artık fes takmıyoruz?' diye hep merak etmişimdir. Ben de artık günlük hayatımda fes takmaya karar verdim. İş dolayısıyla hep takım elbise giyiyordum....

title: ComexPerú: desde el 2021 un ministro de salud permanece un promedio de 167 días
creator: Redacción Gestión
content: redacciongestion@diariogestion.com.pe El sistema de salud peruano enfrenta diversos desafíos que han sido detallados en el informe “Situación actual del sistema de salud peruano”, elaborado por Videnza Consultores para la Sociedad de Comercio Exterior del Perú (ComexPerú). El informe examina cuestiones vinculadas a la gestión, el financiamiento, la calidad del servicio y el abastecimiento de medicamentos, factores que impactan directamente en la atención sanitaria del país. En el ámbito de la gestión, se ha señalado que el Ministerio de Salud (Minsa) experimenta inestabilidad en sus altos mandos, lo que afecta la continuidad de las políticas públicas. Según el informe, desde 2021, un ministro de salud ha permanecido en el cargo por un promedio de 167 días. Esta rotación frecuente de autoridades ha generado dificultades para implementar estrategias a largo plazo y ha afectado el desarrollo de mejoras en el sistema. El financiamiento del sistema de salud también es un punto crítico. El gasto en salud per cápita en Perú es de S/ 523, una cifra considerablemente menor en comparación con otros países de la región, como Colombia, que gasta S/ 1,248, y Chile, con S/ 1,679. Los países de la OCDE, por su parte, promedian un gasto de S/ 3,882 por habitante. El informe resalta que, aunque un incremento en el presupuesto es necesario, no será suficiente sin una planificación adecuada que asegure que los fondos se traduzcan en una mejora de los servicios de...

title: 황희찬 교체로 뛴 울버햄튼, 뉴캐슬에 1-2 역전패
creator: 안경남 기자
content: [서울=뉴시스]안경남 기자 = 축구 국가대표 공격수 황희찬이 교체로 뛴 잉글랜드 프로축구 프리미어리그(EPL) 울버햄튼 원더러스가 뉴캐슬 유나이티드에 역전패했다. 울버햄튼은 16일(한국시각) 영국 울버햄튼의 몰리뉴 스타디움에서 열린 2024~2025시즌 EPL 4라운드 홈 경기에서 뉴캐슬에 1-2로 졌다. 개막 후 4경기 연속 무승(1무 3패·승점 1) 부진에 빠진 울버햄튼은 강등권인 18위까지 처졌다. 황희찬은 홍명보 감독이 이끄는 한국 대표팀에 차출돼 9월 A매치 기간 치러진 2026 북중미 월드컵 아시아 3차 예선에 나서 지난 10일 오만전에서 전반 10분 선제골을 넣었다. 하지만 뉴캐슬전에선 벤치에서 경기를 시작했고, 팀이 1-0으로 앞선 후반 26분 장크리너 벨레가르드 대신 그라운드를 밟았다. 황희찬은 경기가 끝날 때까지 뛰었지만, 공격포인트를 창출하진 못했다. 통계사이크 소파스코어는 황희찬에게 평점 6.5점을 부여했다. 울버햄튼은 전반 36분 역습 찬스에서 마리오 르미나의 선제골로 앞서갔다. 하지만 후반 내리 두 골을 허용하며 무너졌다. 뉴캐슬은 후반 30분 파비안 셰어의 중거리 슈팅으로 균형을 맞춘 뒤 후반 35분 하비 반스의 원더골로 승부를 뒤집었다. 개막 4경기 무패(3승 1무·승점 10)를 질주한 뉴캐슬은 리그 3위에 올랐다. ◎공감언론 뉴시스

title: Venezuela y Turquía firman alianza para impulsar la economía y el turismo
creator: Estefani Dos Reis
content: Representantes del estado La Guaira de Venezuela y la ciudad de Gaziantep de Turquía, firmaron una acuerdo de cooperación estratégica para marcar un nuevo capítulo en la relación entre ambos países. Este alianza refuerzas áreas clave como la economía, la cultura, el sector turístico y la política. El gobernador de La Guaira, José Alejandro Terán, fue el encargado por Venezuela de estampar su firma y destacó la importancia de esta alianza, para la construcción de la ciudad y ciudadanía en ámbitos como la familia, organización, turismo, economía y educación. “Estos son conceptos claves para el desarrollo del bienestar humano”, manifestó. Con esta nueva alianza, la número 26 para La Guaira, Terán expresó su orgullo y entusiasmo por iniciar esta etapa de cooperación con Gaziantep. “Nos llena de mucho orgullo poder comenzar esta nueva etapa de relaciones de hermanamiento y cooperación con nuestra hermana mayor Gaziantep, de la que tenemos mucho que aprender”. El gobernador también resaltó el papel de la Zona Económica Especial (ZEE) de La Guaira, creada por el presidente de la Nicolás Maduro, como un motor para impulsar la economía y otros ámbitos de la sociedad. “Hoy estamos dando un importante paso gracias a la ZEE de La Guaira. ¡Viva La Guaira! ¡Viva Gaziantep!”, dijo. Las relaciones entre Turquía y Venezuela han sido caracterizadas por una cooperación estratégica en diversas áreas, y este nuevo acuerdo fortalece aún más estos lazos, para...
