title: Власти сообщили о работе ПВО в Киеве
content: В Киеве сработали системы ПВО, заявил глава городской военной администрации Сергей Попко. Он попросил жителей находиться в укрытиях до отбоя воздушной тревоги. О работе ПВО также сообщали в Киевской областной военной администрации. Суспільне и ТСН писали о взрывах в Кривом Роге Днепропетровской области, а также в Хмельницкой и Житомирской областях. Минобороны России подчеркивает, что удары наносятся только по военным и энергетическим объектам Украины и связанной с ними инфраструктуре.

title: A.J. Brown will miss Eagles' home opener with hamstring injury
content: Superstar receiver A.J. Brown will miss the Eagles' home opener Monday night vs. the Falcons, the Eagles announced in an updated injury report. Brown, who suffered a hamstring injury in practice on Friday, sat out practice on Saturday and was initially listed as questionable. But the Eagles downgraded him on Sunday, which means he'll miss a regular-season game for the first time since he joined the Eagles in 2022. Brown, who had five catches for 119 yards in the opener vs. the Packers, has the 3rd-most receiving yards in the NFL since opening day 2022 with 3,071, trailing only Tyreek Hill (3,663) and CeeDee Lamb (3,169). With Brown out, the Eagles plan to start recent acquisition Jahan Dotson, the 16thpick in the 2022 draft. Dotson had 84 catches for 1,041 yards and 11 touchdowns in two seasons with the Commanders. The Eagles acquired... Reuben Frank

title: 'You can't flip the switch': Bowa, Manuel know importance of momentum heading into postseason
content: Entering the middle innings on a postcard-perfect afternoon, the Mets had just grabbed an early lead over the Phillies. This did not sit well with two baseball lifers who were sitting in the back of the press box at Citizens Bank Park. Charlie Manuel and Larry Bowa combined to manage 1,117 Phillies victories. To put that in perspective, it represents more than 10 percent of all the wins ever for a franchise that opened for business in 1883. At that moment, the topic of conversation was the importance of having momentum going into the postseason. The Phillies appeared to be headed toward their second consecutive loss and the franchise icons were just a trifle nettled. "You can't flip the switch," said Bowa, repeating an admonition he'd uttered often in his managerial career. "You've got to be on all cylinders, man, until you clinch. You can't be BSing." Get top local stories in Philly delivered to you every morning. Sign up for NBC Philadelphia's News Headlines newsletter. Maybe the Phillies didn't flip a switch Saturday. But they did come back to win, 6-4, on the strength of Bryce Harper's first two homers in a month and yet another huge off-the-bench contribution. This time the Hero for a Day was outfielder Cal Stevenson, who doubled in the tying and winning runs with two outs in the bottom of the seventh and also made two... Paul Hagen

title: 'I'm extremely comfortable:' Jahan Dotson will take on expanded role Week 2 with A.J. Brown out
content: Last time we saw Jahan Dotson, back in October, he had eight catches for 108 yards against the Eagles at FedEx Field in a game the Eagles won. The Eagles would take that. Dotson, who played 30 snaps without a catch in his Eagles debut Friday night in São Paulo, will have to take on an expanded role Monday night when the Eagles face the Falcons at the Linc. Superstar wide receiver A.J. Brown, who has the 3rd-most yards in the NFL since he joined the Eagles in 2022, has been ruled out for the Falcons after suffering a hamstring injury at practice on Friday. Get top local stories in Philly delivered to you every morning. Sign up for NBC Philadelphia's News Headlines newsletter. "I'm extremely comfortable," Dotson said after practice Saturday. "We're preparing right now as if A.J. is playing. That's the goal. But if my opportunities do come, I'm going to take full advantage of them. That's what I was pretty much brought here to do. Take advantage of every single opportunity that's given to me." The Eagles have gone through a number of third receivers over the past few years with limited success – Quez Watkins, Zach Pascal, Olamide Zaccheaus, Julio Jones. When John Ross and Parris... Reuben Frank

title: ESPN and other channels return to DirecTV with new Disney deal after 2-week blackout
content: DirecTV announced Saturday it had reached a deal with Walt Disney Co. that will restore ESPN and ABC-owned stations to its service after a nearly 2-week dispute that blacked out those networks for millions of viewers across the U.S. The end of the impasse came in time for sports fans to watch ESPN's slate of college football games on DirecTV. It also will ensure that ABC's telecast of the Emmy Awards on Sunday night will be available in more major markets where viewers subscribe to DirecTV's pay service. ABC had been unavailable since Sept. 1 on DirecTV in several markets where the station is owned by Disney. Those were located in the San Francisco Bay Area; Fresno, California; New York; Chicago; Philadelphia; Houston; and Raleigh, North Carolina. DirecTV's 11 million subscribers abruptly lost access to ESPN, the... Michael Liedtke | The Associated Press

title: Bohm back with Phillies and in lineup for series finale vs. Mets
content: There was a change in the lineup for Triple A Lehigh Valley on Sunday. Designated hitter Alec Bohm was scratched. Because he was starting at third base for the Phillies against the Mets at Citizens Bank Park instead. It was announced Sunday morning that the 2024 All-Star, who was originally scheduled to play two rehab games for the IronPigs after going on the injured list with a left hand strain, had been reinstated. Catcher Aramis Garcia was designated for assignment. "He did well (2-for-4 including a double) and felt really good," manager Rob Thomson... Paul Hagen

title: Stevenson delivers game-winner, then robs a HR to lead Phillies past Mets
content: Four nights ago, he called it the biggest at-bat of his life. This was the biggest game of his life. Cal Stevenson delivered his second late game-winner of the week, hitting a go-ahead two-run double in the seventh inning Saturday, then leaping over the wall in center field to rob J.D. Martinez of a game-tying homer 10 minutes later. Stay in the game with the latest updates on your beloved Philadelphia sports teams! Sign up here for our All Access Daily newsletter. Stevenson perfectly tracked and timed Martinez' deep flyball to begin the top of the eighth, catching it in the palm of his glove to preserve the Phillies' lead in a 6-4 win over the Mets. "It kinda moves in slow motion just because when it's up there, you know you have time," he said. "Thank god I squeezed onto it. I think I almost over-jumped to catch it." The 28-year-old reserve outfielder was also the hero on Tuesday night, hitting the game-winning two-run double with one out in the eighth against the Rays. Stevenson was recalled last week from Triple A and is making the most of increased playing time with Austin Hays sidelined by a kidney infection. "That one tops it, that one for sure tops it," Stevenson said of Saturday compared to Tuesday. "It's been a good (week). It feels good to contribute this late in the year to this team. We're fighting for a 1-seed and the best record in baseball. Obviously, I don't get a whole lot of opportunities, so when I do get in there, you want to make the most of them." The...

title: Andrae shows why he's 'a hell of a kid' and D-man to still watch with Flyers
content: ALLENTOWN, Pa. — Ian Laperriere had a question as he made his way to the postgame press conference table. "Do you want the BS or you want the honest truth?" the head coach asked. In the second of two rookie games at PPL Center, the Flyers didn't exhibit the same juice or edge they had Friday night against a Rangers team featuring some towering prospects. They also didn't have 2023 first-round picks Matvei Michkov or Oliver Bonk. But they hung in there and found a way to win in overtime Saturday night, 3-2, splitting the weekend series at the home of AHL affiliate Lehigh Valley. Stay in the game with the latest updates on your beloved Philadelphia sports teams! Sign up here for our All Access Daily newsletter. Laperriere, the Phantoms' bench boss who runs Flyers rookie training camp, felt his team played better the night before when Michkov had all eyes on him and didn't disappoint. The Flyers lost, though, in a shootout, 4-3. "We looked afraid tonight," Laperriere said. "I hate to say it. Some of the guys didn't, that fourth line, they showed up physically. [Jett] Luchanko did, too. [Elliot Desnoyers] did, too. Other guys, they need to realize that it's pro hockey and if they want to play for me or they want to play for the next guy above me, they're going to have to be a little bit braver I guess." Samu Tuomaala flushed the OT winner off a great feed from Emil Andrae. Luchanko started the sequence by using his speed to make a play toward the net. The burst was commendable...

title: Ugandan athlete who died after her partner set her on fire gets a military funeral
content: Thousands of mourners in Uganda paid respects to Rebecca Cheptegei, the Olympic athlete who died last week in Kenya after her partner set her on fire, at a military funeral in a remote town near the Kenyan border. Military officers played a prominent role in the funeral because Cheptegei held the rank of sergeant in Uganda's army, said military spokesman Brig. Felix Kulayigye, adding that she deserved a "gun salute that befits her rank." Athletes, family members and others delivered their eulogies before thousands in a sports field in the district of Bukwo. Cheptegei, who was 33, will be buried later on Saturday. Get top local stories in Philly delivered to you every morning. Sign up for NBC Philadelphia's News Headlines newsletter. She died after her body suffered 80% burns in the attack by Dickson Ndiema, who doused her in gasoline at her home in western Kenya's Trans-Nzoia County on Sept. 3. Ndiema... title: McLaren's Oscar Piastri wins dramatic Azerbaijan GP over Charles Leclerc
content: Battles for the lead, a dramatic late crash, a championship contender's comeback. Oscar Piastri won an instant Formula 1 classic that had it all at the Azerbaijan Grand Prix on Sunday. Sergio Perez and Carlos Sainz Jr. collided while fighting for podium places and title challenger Lando Norris battled his way from 15th on the grid to finish fourth — crucially ahead of standings leader Max Verstappen. McLaren's Piastri started second behind Leclerc but took the lead with a daring swoop past the Ferrari driver into the first corner on lap 20 of 51. Get top local stories in Philly delivered to you every morning. Sign up for NBC Philadelphia's News Headlines newsletter. Red Bull's Sergio Perez tried to attack Leclerc for second late on but ended up colliding with the second Ferrari of Carlos Sainz Jr., who was close behind. George Russell ended up third for Mercedes as the race finished under speed restrictions. "That was probably the most stressful afternoon of my life," Piastri, who took his second career win, told his team over the radio just after the race. Norris was... The Associated Press

title: Falcons host the football team from Apalachee High School, where a shooter killed four
content: The high school players watched practice Friday from the sideline at the Falcons' training complex in Flowery Branch. "I think it's incredible that you get a chance to see some young kids going through some tough stuff," said Jerry Gray, the Falcons' assistant head coach for defense. "I always look and say, 'Man, what are they going through?' They've got to go back to the school where it happened." Among the victims of the Sept. 4 shooting rampage was a teacher who served as an assistant coach for the Apalachee football team. Nine others were injured.... The Associated Press

title: Arch Manning throws 4 TDs in No. 2 Texas' win over UTSA after starter Ewers leaves with injury
content: Arch Manning passed for four touchdowns and ran 67 yards for another score after taking over for injured starter Quinn Ewers in the second quarter, leading No. 2 Texas to a 56-7 win over UTSA on Saturday night. Texas (3-0) led 14-0 when Ewers left with what coach Steve Sarkisian described as a strained abdomen. Manning threw a 19-yard touchdown to DeAndre Moore on his first play, then broke off the long sprint for another touchdown on Texas' next possession, as several UTSA (1-2) defenders chased him. Manning and Isaiah Bond connected for a 51-yard TD on Texas' first series in the third quarter that made it 35-7. His next throw was a 75-yard deep strike TD to Ryan Wingo. Manning finished 9 of 12 passing for 223 yards. He... Jim Vertuno | Associated Press

title: Taylor Swift arrives in Kansas City for Sunday's Chiefs-Bengals game
content: Taylor Swift capped a headline-grabbing week that included her endorsement of Kamala Harris for president and seven trophies from the MTV Video Music Awards by showing up at Arrowhead Stadium to watch the Kansas City Chiefs on Sunday. Swift arrived about 90 minutes before kickoff to see her boyfriend, Chiefs tight end Travis Kelce, and the two-time defending Super Bowl champions play the Cincinnati Bengals in a rematch of two of the past three AFC championship games. Even Taylor Swift can't wait for 4:25 ET BENGALS CHIEFS CBS | @paramountplus pic.twitter.com/CwKxwLsnNt — NFL on CBS 🏈 (@NFLonCBS) September 15, 2024 It will be the 15th Chiefs game that Swift has attended, with the team going 11-3 with her in the building. And that led to some controversy this week after the 14-time Grammy winner said she supported Harris over Donald Trump in the November election. title: Tua Tagovailoa has no plans to retire after latest concussion: Report
content: Despite suffering another concussion, Tua Tagovailoa reportedly has no plans to retire. NFL Network's Ian Rapoport reported Sunday that the Miami Dolphins quarterback has already seen concussion specialists and will continue to do so until he's cleared to play. As of now, there's no timeline for a return. Tagovailoa suffered a concussion late in Thursday's loss to the Buffalo Bills when he was scrambling for a first down and barreled into Damar Hamlin. It's the latest head injury in the 26-year-old quarterback's career. He made it through last season unscathed, but Tagovailoa suffered two concussions in 2022 -- including one when he was stretchered off the... Logan Reardon

title: Indiana Fever star Caitlin Clark breaks the WNBA's single-season record for assists
content: It was another record-breaking night for Indiana Fever star Caitlin Clark. The rookie guard set the WNBA's single-season record for assists Friday night. She had 18 points — all in the second half — nine assists and eight rebounds in a 78-74 loss to the Las Vegas... The Associated Press

title: Report: CMC to be placed on IR, will miss next four 49ers games
content: The 49ers will place star running back Christian McCaffrey on injured reserve because of calf tightness and Achilles tendinitis, ruling him out for their next four games, ESPN's Adam Schefter and NFL Media's Ian Rapoport reported Saturday, citing sources. ESPN sources: 49ers officially are placing All-Pro RB Christian McCaffrey on injured reserve due to his calf tightness and Achilles tendinitis. McCaffrey now will miss the next four games, at least, before the team assesses whether he can return in mid-October. pic.twitter.com/VV9GRihDrL — Adam Schefter (@AdamSchefter) September 14, 2024 Sources: The #49ers are placing RB Christian McCaffrey on Injured Reserve today, with hopes that his Achilles tendinitis fully heals by the time it's time to return in four games. title: Bucs DE, Detroit native ‘definitely’ sees Lions rematch in playoffs
content: DETROIT -- Tampa Bay Buccaneers coach Todd Bowles didn’t offer much of an answer when asked if he thought his team would face the Detroit Lions in a rematch for a second consecutive postseason showdown in January. His focus is on getting his team there first, as he’s sure the Lions will be. William Gholston, however, had no issues answering the question directly following the Bucs’ 20-16 win over the Lions at Ford Field on Sunday. “Definitely, man,” Gholston told MLive. “You see how hard they fight. You see the coaches that he’s created over there. I wouldn’t be shocked if we had to play these guys again.” After meeting last year during the regular season, when the Lions picked up a 20-6 victory over the Bucs in Week 6 in Tampa Bay, both teams met again during the divisional round. The result was the same, with the Lions securing a 31-23 victory to advance to the NFC title game against the San Francisco 49ers. As a native Detroiter who played high school football at Detroit Southeastern and collegiately at Michigan State, Gholston said his loved ones poured salt in his wounds following the Bucs’ playoff loss in Detroit. Being able to return home and avenge last season’s defeat made the win that much sweeter for him. “You know how many family members I had to talk to for that whole year up until now, even last night?” Gholston said. “So it’s huge to be able to come back and get a win, especially against an opponent like that. A great offense and great team.” Tampa Bay’s...

title: Mindy Kaling Looks Sleek in Structural Black Dress on 2024 Emmys Red Carpet
creator: Nicole Massabrook
content: Mindy Kaling turned heads as she hit the red carpet at the 2024 Emmy Awards on Sunday, September 15. Kaling, 45, wore a black Gaurav Gupta gown with a sculpted off-the-shoulder detail and cascading beading as she stepped out at the Peacock Theater in Los Angeles. She topped off the look with sleek, straight hair and minimal silver jewelry, keeping focus on the structural dress. The actress, who was nominated for six Emmys during her time on The Office , was among the many former sitcom stars tapped to present at this year’s ceremony. Jesse Tyler Ferguson (Modern Family), Zach Braff (Scrubs), Damon Wayans (My Wife and Kids) and Allison Janney (Mom) are just a few of the other funny faces presenting trophies on Sunday. Kaling’s Emmys appearance comes seven months after she gave birth to her third baby , daughter Anna. The Sex Lives of College Girls creator announced in June that she secretly gave birth several months prior — she never revealed she was pregnant — while thanking fans for their birthday messages. “In late February I gave birth to my daughter, Anne. She’s the best birthday present I could’ve ever imagined,” Kaling shared via Instagram. “When things are hard, whenever I veer towards cynicism, my three kids are such a great reminder of the pure joy in my life. I’m so lucky I live in a place where I could do this by myself, on my own timeline. Thanks for all the birthday wishes!” She similarly never revealed she was pregnant with her second child, son Spencer, now 4,...

title: Willis thrives with help from the Packers' defense and running game in a 16-10 victory over Colts
creator: By STEVE MEGARGEE - AP Sports Writer
content: GREEN BAY, Wis. (AP) — Malik Willis acknowledges he wasn’t ready the last time he had to start an NFL game. The Green Bay Packers quarterback knew he’d be more prepared the next time an opportunity arose. With plenty of help from his new teammates, Willis went out and proved it Sunday by helping the Packers beat the Indianapolis Colts 16-10 on Sunday. Acquired by Green Bay on Aug. 27 in trade from Tennessee, Willis threw his first career touchdown pass to help the Packers withstand the absence of the injured Jordan Love . “I don’t think you guys can appreciate or even comprehend the task that Malik Willis (faced)," Packers coach Matt LaFleur said. “This guy got here three weeks ago.” Love didn’t play after injuring his left medial collateral ligament during the final series of a 34-29 season-opening loss to the Philadelphia Eagles on Sept. 6 in Brazil. It was the first game Love missed since taking over as Green Bay’s starting quarterback last year. The Packers (1-1) relied on an all-around effort to win without Love. Josh Jacobs ran for 151 yards on 32 carries to lead Green Bay's 261-yard rushing attack. The defense hounded Anthony Richardson into three interceptions. But the Packers might not have won without Willis' steadiness. Willis had made three previous career starts – all in 2022 – and hadn’t thrown for as many as 100 yards in any of them. Tennessee dealt Willis for a seventh-round pick after he couldn't beat out Mason Rudolph for the right to back up Titans starter...

title: जम्मू-कश्मीर में पहले फेज में NC-कांग्रेस भारी:अलायंस को 24 में से 12-13, BJP को 4-6 सीट, PDP जीत सकती है 4-5 सीटें
content: ‘जम्मू-कश्मीर में बेरोजगारी सबसे बड़ा मुद्दा है। यूथ परेशान है। यहां न सरकारी नौकरियां मिल रही हैं। ना प्राइवेट सेक्टर इतना आगे बढ़ा है कि जॉब मिल जाए। मैं पोस्ट ग्रेजुएट हूं। नौकरी नहीं मिली। इस वजह से कार एसेसरीज की छोटी सी दुकान चला रहा हूं।’ ये सिर्फ जम्मू-कश्मीर के अनंतनाग में रहने वाले इरफान अहमद सोफी की परेशानी नहीं है। यहां का हर युवा इसी मुश्किल का सामना कर रहा है। युवा मुजैर कहते हैं, ‘यहां बेरोजगारी सबसे बड़ा मुद्दा है। PHD करने वाले भी घर बैठे हैं। मैंने नर्सिंग की पढ़ाई की है। नौकरी नहीं मिली, इसलिए मंडी में काम करने जाता हूं।’ जम्मू-कश्मीर की लोकल पार्टियों के लिए चुनाव में बेरोजगारी नहीं, बल्कि आर्टिकल-370 को वापस कराना सबसे बड़ा मुद्दा है। जबकि बेरोजगारी दूसरे नंबर पर है। हालांकि राजनीतिक जानकारों की मानें तो आर्टिकल-370 बेशक कश्मीर के लोगों की भावनाओं से जुड़ा है। पर इसकी वापसी का रोडमैप क्या होगा, इस पर बात नहीं हो रही है। जम्मू-कश्मीर की 24 सीटों पर पहले फेज में 18 सितंबर को वोट डाले जाएंगे। इनमें 16 सीटें कश्मीर की हैं, जबकि 8 जम्मू की। यहां हवा का रुख समझने के लिए दैनिक भास्कर ने पॉलिटिकल पार्टियों, एक्सपर्ट्स और लोकल लोगों से बात की। इन 4 पॉइंट्स में समझिए रुझान और सियासी समीकरण... 1. पहले फेज में नेशनल कॉन्फ्रेंस-कांग्रेस अलायंस सबसे मजबूत बनकर उभर सकता हैं। उसे 12-13 सीटों पर जीत मिल सकती है। दूसरे नंबर पर BJP और PDP रह सकती हैं। दोनों को 4-6 सीटें मिल सकती हैं। निर्दलीय को 1-2 सीटें मिलने की उम्मीद है। साउथ कश्मीर से NC-कांग्रेस अलांयस को सबसे ज्यादा सीटें मिलती दिख रही हैं। 2. पहले फेज में साउथ कश्मीर की सीटों पर चुनाव हो रहे हैं। यहां महबूबा मुफ्ती...

title: El amor está en el aire de la casa de 'Gran Hermano': las primeras confesiones de los concursantes
creator: Míriam Bocanegra
content: La casa de ya está , y no son pocos. Son varias las parejas que han estado hablando o aclarando la situación que tienen dentro de la casa, así como los . Durante la noche del domingo, en el debate conducido por , los espectadores pudieron ver ( ). "Tienes los ojos preciosos", le decía ella al gallego. "Tú también y eres muy guapa", le respondió. "Y tú", añadió ella. "Me tienes un poco descolocado, pero no puedo hablar", se confesaba Edi, que . "Prefiero esperar y ver cuando puedo estar contigo al 100%", concluyó. Por otra parte, . title: Gol de Gabriel sentencia triunfo de Arsenal
creator: Estefani Dos Reis
content: Arsenal se marchó del estadio de su archirrival Tottenham con la victoria por tercera temporada consecutiva después que el cabezazo del brasileño Gabriel Magalhaes en el segundo tiempo sentenció el triunfo 1-0 en un ríspido clásico del norte de la Liga Premier. Tottenham encerró a Arsenal durante la mayor parte del encuentro pero no supo capitalizar sus ocasiones. Los visitantes supieron resistir hasta que Gabriel se elevó en el corazón del área para cabecear el tiro de esquina de Buyako Saka a los 64 minutos. “Es un derbi muy trascendental y estamos felices de llevarnos la victoria de aquí”, dijo Gabriel, quien celebró eufórico frente a la zona de la grade donde estaban los hinchas visitante. “Hay que disfrutarlo”. Fue una vital victoria para Arsenal, poniéndose a dos puntos del líder y campeón defensor Manchester City de cara a la visita al estadio Etihad el próximo fin de semana. Los Gunners la sacaron barata en los primeros compases ante un Tottenham que sacó provecho de un mediocampo de Arsenal mermado por las bajas del suspendido Declan Rice y el lesionado Martin Odegaard. Sin sus dos referentes en la zona media, Arsenal sufrió ante la presión de Tottenham y no pudo tener fluidez en sus pases. Pero el arquero de Arsenal David Raya se lució con un par de intervenciones al comienzo del partido para mantener a raya a Tottenham, cuyo delantero Dominic Solanke desperdició un par de buenas de ocasiones. “Tuvimos que emplearnos a fondo, sabiendo que era...

title: Former Adult film star Emily Willis 'may never move again' as doctors fear locked-in syndrome
creator: Abigail Hunt, Susan Knox
content: is facing a bleak future as doctors fear she may be suffering from "locked-in syndrome" and might never move again, according to medical experts. In May, was revealed after her family confirmed that she had come out of a "vegetative coma" induced by a cardiac arrest in February. On February 5, Emily was rushed to a hospital in Thousand Oaks, , after becoming seriously ill. She slipped into a coma but has since woken up from it. Despite regaining consciousness, Emily remains unable to speak and can only track objects with her eyes, as the latest GoFundMe update indicates. Dr Gareth Nye, Programme Lead for Medical Science at the University of Chester, has provided insight into Emily's current mysterious condition. Dr Nye explained that while it's unclear what caused her sudden illness, the path to recovery after such a "traumatic event such as this and recovery from a coma is even more difficult" and emerging from a coma is incredibly challenging, reports . Speaking to the Dr Nye said: "What we are seeing here is the damage to the brain following a lack of oxygen after the cardiac arrest," adding, "It is encouraging to see that she seems to be conscious, recognises people and can track with her eyes. However, it is highly likely she is suffering from a condition called locked-in syndrome." A doctor has revealed the unsettling reality of locked-in syndrome, where patients are trapped within their bodies, fully awake but unable to move or speakexcept through eye movements....

title: 2024 Emmys: Jesse Tyler Ferguson Debuts Subtle Transformation
content: Here’s a modern new look. Jesse Tyler Ferguson walked the red carpet at the 2024 Emmy Awards Sept. 15 without his signature accessory: his facial hair. Rather, the Modern Family alum arrived at the Peacock Theater in Los Angeles with a clean shaven face. He completed his look with a blue Paul Smith suit with matching tie, finishing off the ensemble with burgundy shoes. ( See every star on the red carpet here. ) He made the 76th annual award show—hosted by Eugene Levy and Dan Levy —a family affair arriving alongside husband Justin Mikita , 39, who wore a navy jacket and matching pants. It’s not the first time the 48-year-old—who is presenting at this year’s show—has changed up his trademark scruffy look. In 2022, he shaved his beard into a classic moustache during his Broadway run in Take Me Out alongside Jesse Williams . And it’s certainly not the first time he’s been taken out to the Emmys, either. After all, he earned five nominations through Modern Family ’s run for his role as Mitchell Pritchett. And since they took their final bow in 2020, the cast—including Julie Bowen , Ty Burrell , Ed O’Neil , Eric Stonestreet and Sofia Vergara —have remained close. In fact, they reunited 2024 Screen Actors Guild Awards in February. "This really brings back memories," Ty admitted on stage at the time. "You guys ever miss it?" As Julie said, "Oh, hell yeah. But of course, we had a good great time. Eleven seasons, 250 episodes, c'mon, that never happens!" To which Jesse jumped in with,...

title: Очередная сессия парламента КНДР начнется 7 октября
content: СЕУЛ, 16 сентября. /ТАСС/. 11-я сессия Верховного народного собрания (парламента) КНДР 14-го созыва начнется 7 октября 2024 года в Пхеньяне. Об этом сообщило Центральное телеграфное агентство Кореи . На предстоящей сессии будет вынесен вопрос о поправках к конституции, о принятии закона о легкой промышленности, депутаты обсудят закон о внешнеэкономических делах. Регистрация депутатов назначена на 6 октября. В январе лидер КНДР Ким Чен Ын предложил конституционно закрепить за Южной Кореей статус главного врага, а также допустить "возвращение южнокорейской территории" в состав КНДР в случае войны. Тогда он призвал внести в основной закон положения о территории КНДР и отказаться от упоминания мирного объединения Севера и Юга.

title: “추석연휴 응급상황엔 비대면 진료 중개서비스 플랫폼 활용하세요”
content: KB헬스케어 비대면 진료 중개서비스 플랫폼 ‘올라케어’ 명절 연휴 기간 동안 비대면 진료 응급의료기관·약국 정보 제공 서비스 정상 운영 명절에 주로 발생하는 질환 예방 및 대응 방법도 소개 [마이데일리 = 황상욱 기자] 추석 연휴 기간 응급실 이용이 원활하지 않을 때는 비대면 진료 중개서비스 플랫폼을 활용해보자. KB손해보험의 자회사 KB헬스케어는 비대면 진료 중개서비스 플랫폼 ‘올라케어’ 에서 추석 연휴 기간인 오는 18일까지 비대면 진료 서비스와 무료 건강상담을 포함한 커뮤니티, 고객센터를 정상 운영해 의료 공백 최소화에 힘쓴다고 16일 밝혔다. 올라케어 앱에서는 고객이 진료과목 또는 병원을 직접 지정하고 해당 전문의에게 영상통화를 통한 진료를 받을 수 있다. 특히 지난 설 연휴 기간 비대면 진료 이력 분석 결과 감기몸살·호흡기 질환이 44%, 두통·복통 등의 일반 진료가 15% 순으로 많았던 점을 반영해 추석 명절 기간 동안 감기, 배탈 등 주요 질환에 대한 원활한 비대면 진료가 이뤄질 수 있도록 제휴병원들과 협력해 철저한 준비를 갖췄다. 또 고객들이 연휴 기간 중에도 의료 긴급 상황에 신속히 대처하고 필요한 의료 서비스를 원활히 이용할 수 있도록 ‘올라케어 명절 건강 가이드’를 통해 응급실을 가장 많이 찾는 경증 질환 및 예방 방법을 소개하고, 즉시 응급실 방문이 필요한 증상 안내와 연휴에도 운영하는 응급의료기관 및 약국 정보를 제공한다. 올라케어 앱에서 의사가 추천하는...

title: ‘우리 동재’ 드디어 주인공 됐다! 지금은 스핀오프 열풍 [MD픽]
content: [마이데일리 = 박로사 기자] 계절이 변해가는 9월, 안방극장에 스핀오프(spin-off) 바람이 불고 있다. 스핀오프란 기존의 영화, 드라마에서 등장인물이나 설정을 가져와 새롭게 이야기를 만들어 내는 것. 주인공에 가려져 빛을 보지 못했던 인물이거나, 해당 작품의 열렬한 시청자라면 손꼽아 기다렸을 만큼 반가운 소식이다. 그중에서도 ‘비밀의 숲’의 스핀오프 ‘좋거나 나쁜 동재’가 대표적이다. tvN ‘비밀의 숲’은 2017년 시즌1로 시작해 2020년 시즌2까지 제작된 인기작 중의 인기작. 배우 조승우가 감정을 느끼지 못하는 검사 황시목으로, 배두나가 형사 한여진으로 분해 검찰 내부의 적폐를 파헤쳐 짜릿함을 선사한 바 있다. 이준혁은 황시목과 대척점에 선 비리 검사 서동재 역을 맡아 맹활약을 펼쳤다. 시즌1에서는 얄미움을 사 ‘느그 동재’로 불렸고, 시즌2에서는 ‘우리 동재’리고 불리며 주인공 못지않은 인기를 얻었다. 선역이라기엔 어딘가 미심쩍고, 악역이라기엔 짠 내를 폴폴 풍기는 오묘한 매력의 캐릭터다. 종영 후 4년 만에 ‘우리 동재’가 주인공이 되어 돌아오다니. ‘비밀의 숲’ 애청자라면 기다리지 않을 수가 없다. 10월 10일 티빙 공개. 10월 14일 tvN 공개. tvN ‘손해보기 싫어서’의 스핀오프 ‘사장님의 식단표’도 제작된다. 현재 방영 중인 ‘손해보기 싫어서’의 서브 커플 남자연(한지현)과 복규현(이상이)의 서사를 그려낼 것으로 기대를 모은다. 남자연은 본편에서 ‘사장님의 식단표’라는 19금 웹소설을 집필한 작가. 자신이 쓴 소설...

title: "이강인 꼬투리잡기! 영향력 제한적, 더 나은 폼 보여줘야"...선발 풀타임 대승에도 '평가절하'→팀 내 최저 평점 2위(5점)
content: [마이데일리 = 최용재 기자]선발 풀타임, 팀의 대승에도 꼬투리잡기를 시도한 프랑스 언론이다. 이강인을 평가절하했다. 프랑스 파리 생제르맹(PSG)의 이강인이 위기에 몰렸다는 추측이 나왔지만 추측일 뿐이었다. 이강인은 PSG의 핵심임을 증명했다. 이강인은 2024-25시즌 프랑스 리그1 개막전 르아브로전에 선발로 나서 전반 3분 만에 선제골을 작렬시켰다. PSG의 시즌 시작을 알리는 축포였다. 이강인은 후반 26분 교체되며 총 71분을 소화했다. 팀은 4-1로 이겼다. 이후 이강인은 선발에서 밀려났다. 2라운드 몽펠리에전에서 이강인은 벤치 대기했고, 후반 17분 우스만 뎀벨레 대신 교체 투입됐다. 3라운드에서도 후반 29분 교체 투입됐다. 이강인은 올 시즌 71분으로 시작해 28분, 그리고 16분으로 갈 수록 경기 시간이 줄어들고 있는 상황이었다. 이런 상황에서 위기설이 돌았고, 이강인은 실력으로 위기설을 잠재웠다. 15일 프랑스 파리의 파르크 데 프랭스에서 펼쳐진 리그1 4라운드 브레스투아와 경기에서 PSG는 3-1 역전 승리를 거뒀다. 상대 로만 델 카스티오에 선제골을 내줬지만 뎀벨레의 2골, 파비안 루이스의 1골을 더해 3-1 승리를 챙겼다. PSG는 4연승을 달리며 리그 1위를 유지했다. 지난 2경기 연속 벤치로 밀란 이강인은 다시 선발로 돌아왔고, 올 시즌 첫 풀타임을 소화했다. 이강인은 중원의 한 자리를 차지했다. 주앙 네베스, 루이스와 호흡을 맞췄다. 한국 대표팀으로 A매치에서 좋은 활약을 펼친 흐름이 이어졌다. 축구 통계업체...

title: 혜성특급 없는 프리미어12 2루 괜찮을까...신민재·고승민 플랜B? 이 선수 소환해야 하지 않을까
content: [마이데일리 = 김진성 기자] ‘혜성특급’ 김혜성(25, 키움 히어로즈) 없는 대표팀 2루는 어떻게 꾸려질까. 예비엔트리를 보면 누구도 김혜성의 공백을 완벽히 메울 수 없을 듯하다. KBO가 지난주에 발표한 프리미어12 예비엔트리 60인의 가장 큰 특징은 ‘대표팀 단골’ 김혜성과 강백호(KT 위즈)가 사라졌다는 점이다. 두 사람은 이 대회 기간 공교롭게도 기초군사훈련을 소화한다. 조정도 가능하지만, 두 사람 모두 프리미어12에 나가지 않고 그대로 기초군사훈련을 받을 것이라는 게 대다수 관측이다. 특히 근래 꾸준히 대표팀 중앙내야를 지켜온 김혜성의 이탈은 꽤 커 보인다. 류중일 감독과 KBO 기술위원들이 어쩌면 김혜성 공백을 메우는데 애를 먹을 수 있다. 수년간 KBO리그 최고 공수주 겸장 중앙내야수로 활약해왔다. 일단 예비엔트리에 2루수가 가능한 선수들이 있다. 신민재(LG 트윈스)와 고승민(롯데 자이언츠)는 소속팀에서 주전 2루수로 뛴다. 신민재는 올 시즌 121경기서 타율 0.298 40타점 74득점 32도루 OPS 0.759다. 고승민은 올 시즌 109경기서 타율 0.300 11홈런 76타점 71득점 5도루 OPS 0.802다. 신민재는 주루에 강점이 있고, 고승민은 공수밸런스가 좋은 유형이다. 둘 다 성인대표팀 경력은 없다. 류중일 감독이 두 사람 중 한 명을 과감하게 주전 2루수로 쓸 것인지를 지켜봐야 한다. 신인 내야수 박지환(SSG 랜더스)나 2루수가 가능한 송성문(키움 히어로즈)의 기용 가능성도 있다. 그러나 박지환은 최종엔트리에 들어갈 정도로 검증된 카드라고...

title: Секретная служба США была обеспокоена безопасностью Трампа, пишут СМИ
content: МОСКВА, 16 сен - РИА Новости. Безопасность экс-президента США Дональда Трампа во время его нахождения на площадках для игры в гольф давно является предметом беспокойства Секретной службы США, сообщает телеканал CNN со ссылкой на источники. "Поля для гольфа, в особенности те, что принадлежат Дональду Трампу, давно вызывают беспокойство у сотрудников Секретной службы, которым поручено обеспечивать безопасность на территории, пока главнокомандующий играет", - говорится в сообщении телеканала. Как поясняет CNN, гольф-площадки часто находятся у общественных дорог, на их территории есть деревья, холмы, где могут скрыться потенциальные киллеры, что осложняет обеспечение безопасности экс-президента. Телеканал подчеркивает, что нахождение Трампа на поле для игры в гольф не подразумевает закрытие клуба для широкой общественности или перекрытия находящихся рядом дорог. Стрельба произошла в воскресенье у гольф-клуба во Флориде , где находился Трамп. По данным правоохранителей, сотрудники Секретной службы открыли огонь по злоумышленнику, который прятался в кустах. Мужчина сбежал и попытался скрыться на автомобиле, но был задержан. На месте, где его заметили, обнаружены автомат АК-47 с оптическим прицелом, два рюкзака и экшн-камера GoPro. К расследованию подключилось ФБР , американские власти расценивают произошедшее как попытку покушения на Трампа.

title: S대 출신 아나운서 정다은 “동서 때문에 시댁 가기 싫어” 동서 누군가 했더니
creator: 매일경제
content: 아나운서 정다은 씨가 “동서 때문에 시댁에 가기 싫다”는 속사정을 털어놨다. 지난 14일 방송된 MBN 예능프로그램 ‘속풀이쇼 동치미’에 출연한 정다은은 “행복하게 잘 살고 있지만 시댁에만 가면 작아질 때가 있다”고 입을 열었다. 서울대 졸업 후 KBS 아나운서로 재직했던 정다은은 동료 아나운서인 조우종 씨와 지난 2017년 결혼했다. 정다은은 “결혼 1년 뒤 도련님이 결혼해 손아래 동서가 들어왔다. 동서는 골프선수”라며 “대단한 동서가 들어와서 좋은데 시어머니께서도 너무 대단하다고 여겨 자랑하신다. 결혼 1년 뒤 미국여자프로골프(LPGA) 우승까지 했다”고 밝혔다. 그의 동서는 세계적인 프로골퍼 박희영 선수다. 정다은은 박희영 선수의 LPGA 우승 후 시댁에 갔던 때를 떠올리며 “제가 방송에 나와도 제 사진을 붙여둔 적 없는데 신문을 스크랩해 붙여 놓으셨더라”면서 “동서가 대단하다고 칭찬하니 ‘그냥 대단한 게 아니지. 걔는 세계 1등이야’라고 했다. 왠지 주눅이 드는 건 어쩔수가 없더라”고 말했다. 정다은은 또 다른 일화로 “동서가 결혼 후 첫 명절이 됐다. 동서가 오기 전엔 어머니께서 식사 준비 많이 하시고 저랑 남편이 저녁에 가서 함께 식사하는 명절 분위기였다”며 “제가 평소처럼 저녁에 갔더니 (동서가) 이미 와있었는데, 아침부터 와 있었다더라. 동서가 시어머니 도와 음식하고 명절 준비를 하고 있었다. 저녁만 먹으러 간 제가 초라하고 그랬다”고 전했다. 또한 “동서가 운동선수라 체력도 좋고 전혀 지친 기색이 없더라. 시댁에 뭐가...

title: 박서준, 강렬함과 온화함 사이 [화보]

title: LPA off Aurora may become a storm on Monday; rains seen in most parts of PH
content: STORMY DAY. Passengers wait for rides in Elliptical Road, Quezon City amid rains on Monday (Sept. 2, 2024). Classes and work in government offices were suspended while some private companies sent their employees home earlier than usual due to Tropical Storm Enteng. (PNA file photo by Robert Oswald Alfiler) MANILA, Philippines — The low pressure area (LPA) inside the Philippine area of responsibility off Aurora may become a tropical cyclone on Monday, according to state meteorologists. As of 3:00 a.m., the LPA was spotted 400 kilometers east of Tuguegarao, Cagayan, said Obet Badrina, weather specialist of the Philippine Atmospheric, Geophysical and Astronomical Services Administration (Pagasa). “Ngayong araw ay malaki ang tyansa na maging bagyo ang LPA na nasa silangan ng Tuguegarao,” Badrina said in a weather forecast. (Today, there is a big chance that the LPA east of Tuguegarao will become a typhoon.) “Inaasahan natin na posibleng lumapit sa ating kalupaan itong LPA na maaaring maging bagyo sa araw na ito,” he also said. (We expect that this LPA may come near our landmass, which may develop into a typhoon today.) Once it becomes a tropical cyclone, Badrina said Pagasa will also hoist a Tropical Cyclone Wind Signal in parts of Cagayan Valley. Most parts of the country, including Metro Manila, are expected to experience rain. Overcast skies with scattered rains and thunderstorms are forecast in Ilocos Region, Cordillera Administrative Region, Cagayan Valley and Aurora due to...

title: Defesa Civil encerra quinto dia de combate ao incêndio na Serra da Bocaina
content: As chamas começaram na quarta-feira (11), em uma área próximo à Rodovia Sebastião Diniz de Moraes, e se espalharam pela mata. A Defesa Civil ainda não tem a dimensão de toda área atingida e as causas de origem do fogo. A princípio, três focos de incêndio estavam sendo combatidos. Neste domingo (15) há apenas um foco ativo, mas em uma região de difícil acesso. Mais de 50 pessoas entre membros da Defesa Civil, Corpo de Bombeiros e voluntários atuam para apagar os focos de incêndio. Além do combate por terra, a operação conta com o apoio aéreo de três helicópteros. As equipes voltam ao combate ao incêndio na manhã de segunda-feira (16) — Foto: João Mota/TV Vanguarda Somente neste final de semana, os helicópteros despejaram cerca de 100 mil litros de água na vegetação. Além de todo o combate que já está sendo feito, membros da Defesa Civil e da Fundação Florestal vão iniciar rondas noturnas por estradas que passam pela Serra da Bocaina. A ideia é vistoriar a região e proteger a mata de possíveis ações criminosas. A expectativa é que os trabalhos de combate ao fogo voltem a serem feitas às 7h desta segunda-feira (16). Helicóptero usado no combate ao fogo em Bananal — Foto: TV Vanguarda/Reprodução Fogo em Bananal Em Bananal, são usados três helicópteros para combater o fogo em área de mata, jogando água nos locais mais críticos. As chamas começaram na última quarta-feira (11), em uma área de mata na Serra da Bocaina....

title: Hơn 30 trường công bố điểm chuẩn bổ sung
content: Tính đến hiện tại, đã có hơn 30 trường công bố điểm chuẩn bổ sung năm 2024. Điểm chuẩn xét tuyển bổ sung ngành Sư phạm Lịch sử - Địa lý tại Trường Đại học Hồng Đức cao nhất đến thời điểm hiện tại với 28,89 điểm. Điểm chuẩn bổ sung ngành sư phạm tại các trường khác cũng ở ngưỡng rất cao, trên 26 điểm. Trong khi đó, ở chiều ngược lại, đa số các ngành khác có điểm chuẩn chỉ từ mức 15 điểm. Tức thí sinh chỉ cần đạt trung bình 5 điểm/môn có thể trúng tuyển. 31. Trường Đại học Tài nguyên và Môi trường Hà Nội Điểm chuẩn đợt bổ sung Trường Đại học Tài Nguyên và Môi trường Hà Nội dao động từ 15 - 22,5 điểm, xét theo điểm thi tốt nghiệp THPT và 18 - 24,5 điểm, xét theo điểm học bạ THPT. 30. Trường Đại học Văn Lang Điểm chuẩn bổ sung theo phương thức xét điểm thi tốt nghiệp THPT dao động từ 16 đến 22,5 điểm (thang điểm 30). Hai ngành có điểm chuẩn cao nhất Trường Đại học Văn Lang là y khoa và răng hàm mặt là 22,5 điểm. 29. Khoa giáo dục thể chất - Đại học Huế Điểm chuẩn bổ sung Khoa giáo dục thể chất, Đại học Huế là 26,76 điểm (xét điểm học bạ THPT) và 27,1 điểm (đối với điểm thi tốt nghiệp THPT). 28. title: 밀어쳐서 ‘퐁당’ SF 라모스, 오라클파크 역사 썼다
creator: 매일경제
content: 샌프란시스코 자이언츠 외야수 헬리엇 라모스가 역사에 이름을 남겼다. 라모스는 16일(한국시간) 오라클파크에서 열린 샌디에이고 파드리스와 홈경기 9회말 솔로 홈런을 터트렸다. 선두타자로 나선 그는 샌디에이고 마무리 로베르트 수아레즈를 맞아 7구 승부 끝에 100.2마일 포심 패스트볼이 가운데 몰린 것을 밀어칠 수 있었다. 타구 속도 103.8마일의 강한 타구가 30도 각도로 날아갔다. 그대로 구장 우측 담장을 넘겨 구장 바깥에 있는 바다에 빠졌다. 비거리 394피트. ‘MLB.com’ 등 현지 언론은 라모스의 이 홈런이 오라클 파크에서 우타자가 우측 장외로 날린 최초의 홈런이라고 소개했다. 오라클파크의 우측 외야 바깥 바다는 구단 레전드 1루수 윌리 맥코비의 이름을 따서 ‘맥코비 코브’라 불리고, 이곳에 떨어지는 홈런 타구를 ‘스플래시 히트(splash hit)’라 부르고 있다. 지금까지 이 ‘스플래시 히트’는 우측 외야라는 특성상 좌타자의 전유물이었다. 라모스의 이날 홈런전까지 홈팀 선수가 104회, 원정팀 선수가 77회 기록했다. 샌프란시스코 선수중에는 배리 본즈가 35차례 기록했고 브랜든 벨트(10회) 파블로 산도발(8회) 마이크 야스트렘스키(6회) 라몬테 웨이드 주니어(6회) 데나드 스팬(5회) 브랜든 크로포드(4회) 작 피더슨(4회)이 4회 이상 기록했다. 원정 선수중에는 카를로스 델가도, 애덤 라로쉐, 카를로스 곤잘레스, 커티스 그랜더슨, 맥스 먼시, 그리고 피더슨이 3회씩 기록했다. 피더슨은 라이언 클레스코와 함께 홈팀과 원정팀 선수로서 모두 스플래시 히트를 기록한 타자로 남았다....

title: Workers swoop on pension savings to acquire homes
content: Number of successful applicants rise 1,271% PFAs grant N28.9bn to 2,971 pension contributors Bureaucracy, corruption frustrated previous scheme – Experts By Rosemary Iwunze Workers currently operating in the Contributory Pension Scheme, CPS, have swooped on their pension accounts for mortgage loans, apparently in preparation for living in their own houses at retirement. Industry stakeholders have attributed the development to the huge housing deficit in the country and with the failure of the National Housing Fund, NHF, to bridge the gap over the years. Financial Vanguard findings reveal that within the first year of the implementation of the pension mortgage scheme the number of workers using part of their retirement savings to invest in personal homes, as allowed under the scheme, rose by 1,271 per cent barely nine months after the scheme’s take off. The scheme which commenced last year is based on the 2022 National Pension Commission, PenCom’s Guidelines on Accessing Retirement Savings Account, RSA, balance for the purpose of equity contribution in acquisition of residential mortgage by RSA holders. The pension mortgage scheme was also aimed at addressing the national housing deficit estimated at 28 million housing units with estimated market value of N21 trillion as at December 2023. Data from PenCom show that Pension Funds Administrators, PFAs, released N28.9billion to 2,971 RSA holders for equity contribution towards acquisition of residential mortgage between second...

title: Kein Zoff um Kanzlerkandidatur: Wüst schickt klares Warnsignal an Söder
content: Das erbitterte Duell zwischen Söder und Laschet um die Kanzlerkandidatur der Union könnte 2021 zum Wahlsieg von Olaf Scholz geführt haben. Nordrhein-Westfalens Ministerpräsident Wüst mahnt seinen bayerischen Amtskollegen, eine Neuauflage diesmal zu unterlassen. Nordrhein-Westfalens Ministerpräsident Hendrik Wüst nimmt den CSU-Vorsitzenden Markus Söder für die Geschlossenheit der Union in der Frage der Kanzlerkandidatur in die Pflicht. "Er weiß sehr genau, dass es wichtig ist, dass wir jetzt als Union gemeinsam uns so aufstellen, dass die Menschen so schnell es geht eine bessere Bundesregierung bekommen", sagte der CDU-Politiker in der ARD-Sendung "Caren Miosga". "Und er weiß auch, dass das '21 nicht so gut war." Im Bundestagswahlkampf 2021 hatte Söder sich mit dem damaligen CDU-Chef Armin Laschet ein hartes Ringen um die Kanzlerkandidatur geliefert, in dem er zwar unterlag, aber danach keine Ruhe gab; am Ende verlor die Union die Bundestagswahl. Gleichwohl zeigte sich Wüst gelassen: "Meine Sorge ist einigermaßen überschaubar." Der Ministerpräsident des bevölkerungsreichsten Bundeslandes und Chef des größten CDU-Landesverbands wird selbst als ein potenzieller - wenn auch derzeit nachrangiger - Anwärter auf die Kanzlerkandidatur der Schwesterparteien gehandelt. Als Favorit gilt der CDU-Vorsitzende Friedrich Merz. Der bayerische Ministerpräsident Söder hat aber mehrfach seine Bereitschaft für die Kandidatur erklärt. Beide haben verabredet, die K-Frage im...

title: Ciudad de las Artes Indígenas traerá exhibiciones de las etnias de otros Estados y países
content: Tepic, Nayarit (OEM - Informex).- Pese a que se aclaró que la Ciudad de las Artes Indígenas no sería un mercado artesanal, en este espacio si se podrá exponer y vender los productos de este sector, aún cuando no hay cubículos especiales para esta actividad. Así lo señaló la directora del Instituto de Arte y Cultura de Tepic, Julieta Maldonado Grano, quien explicó que este proyecto que fue posible gracias al Gobierno Federal, encabezado por Andrés Manuel López Obrador, albergará a artesanos, así como exhibiciones, colecciones y talleres relacionados con los pueblos originarios. Podría interesarte: Local Gobierno Federal no mintió a artesanos sobre la Ciudad de las Artes Indígenas que habrá en Nayarit La servidora dijo que la manera en como funcionará este lugar, dependerá del Patronato que se encargará de su administración y que deberá de tomar en cuenta las voces de los indígenas, para un manejo adecuado del mismo, ya que la edificación tiene como vocación mostrar la cultura de las distintas etnias de la Entidad. Te recomendamos → Nayarit: Ciudad de las Artes Indígenas sigue sin fecha de inauguración Para concluir, Julieta Maldonado Grano, añadió que incluso se planea que en este sitio también se reciban artesanos y artesanías de otros Estados de la república y también de otros países, dado que se necesita en el Estado un espacio de vinculación con otras culturas. → Únete a nuestro Canal de WhatsApp y recibe las noticias más relevantes...

title: Le président du Comité militaire de l'OTAN soutient l'utilisation par l'Ukraine d'armes à longue portée
content: L'amiral Rob Bauer a déclaré que l'Ukraine disposait d'un droit juridique et militaire solide pour frapper l'intérieur de la Russie. Le président du Comité militaire de l'OTAN a déclaré samedi 14 septembre 2024 que l'Ukraine avait le droit légal et militaire de frapper profondément la Russie pour obtenir un avantage au combat. "Toute nation attaquée a le droit de se défendre. Et ce droit ne s'arrête pas à la frontière de votre propre pays", a déclaré Rob Bauer à l'issue de la réunion annuelle du Comité. L'amiral de la Marine royale néerlandaise a toutefois ajouté que les nations avaient le droit de limiter les armes envoyées à l'Ukraine. Karel Řehka, chef de l'état-major général des forces armées tchèques, a lui clairement indiqué que son pays n'imposait aucune restriction à Kyiv en matière d'armement. "Nous pensons que les Ukrainiens doivent décider eux-mêmes de l'utilisation de ces armes", a déclaré M. Řehka. Mais il a également souligné les risques politiques et le potentiel d'escalade : "Il est important de prendre en considération tous les aspects, y compris le potentiel d'escalade." Ces déclarations interviennent alors que le président américain Joe Biden réfléchit à la possibilité d'autoriser l'Ukraine à utiliser des armes à longue portée fournies par les États-Unis pour frapper la Russie en profondeur. Pas de changement visible de politique pour l'instant Malgré les appels incessants de l'Ukraine à l'Occident pour...

title: Teletón Perú 2024: Las razones por las que América TV tuvo la exclusiva ese año
content: Alberto Fujimori . Premios Emmy . Alianza Lima vs Mannucci . Incendios forestales . Fonavi . Dólar en Perú . Ley Soto . Metro de Lima . Horóscopo . Dolar BCV . DolarToday . ÚLTIMAS NOTICIAS POLÍTICA ECONOMÍA SOCIEDAD MUNDO PERÚ DEPORTES ESPECTÁCULOS CINE Y SERIES DÓLAR SUSCRÍBETE Últimas Noticias La Teletón Perú 2024 sorprendió al público al ser transmitida solo por América TV, lo que dejó fuera a canales tradicionales como Latina, ATV y Panamericana TV , lo que generó diversas especulaciones. Este año, la Teletón Perú 2024 tuvo una particularidad que no pasó desapercibida : fue transmitida exclusivamente por América TV, lo que marcó la primera vez que otros grandes canales como Latina, ATV y Panamericana TV no participaron. Este cambio sorprendió al público, que estaba acostumbrado a la colaboración conjunta de diversos canales para la cobertura del evento solidario destinado a recaudar fondos para la clínica San Juan de Dios. Excluidos Latina, ATV y Panamericana TV: ¿Por qué solo América TV? El sábado 14 de septiembre de 2024, la Teletón dio inicio como cada año , con el objetivo de recaudar fondos para la clínica San Juan de Dios . Sin embargo, a diferencia de ediciones pasadas, esta vez la cobertura estuvo únicamente a cargo de América TV . content: Shakira abruptly EXITS stage after fans 'filmed up her dress' in shock video Have YOU got a story? title: Yağmur kazaları da beraberinde getirdi: Aracın taklalar attığı kaza kamerada
content: Bartın'da akşam saatlerinde başlayan yağışın ardından 2 ayrı kazada 3 kişi yaralandı. Bir kişinin yaralandığı kazada, sürücüsünün kontrolünü kaybettiği araç taklalar attı. Kaza anları saniye saniye güvenlik kameralarına yansıdıBartın'da akşam saatlerinde başlayan yağışla kayganlaşan yollarda 2 ayrı kaza meydana geldi. Bartın-Potbaşı yolunda seyir eden ve sürücüsünün kontrolünü kaybettiği motosiklet yoldan çıkarak devrildi. Yolun kaygan olması nedeniyle meydana gelen kazada motosiklette bulunan iki kişi yaralandı. Yaralılar, ilk müdahalenin ardından olay yerine sevk edilen ambulanslarla hastaneye kaldırıldı. Gece meydana gelen kazada ise Amasra'dan Bartın şehir merkezine seyir eden 74 AAB 399 plakalı araç, Arıt yol ayrımındaki kavşağı alamadı. Sürücüsünün direksiyon hakimiyetini kaybettiği araç, refüjdeki kaldırım taşına çarparak taklalar attı. Elektrik direğini de altına alan araç ters dönerek durabildi. Feci kaza anı ise olay yerinin çevresindeki bir iş yerinin güvenlik kamerasına yansıdı. Araç içerisinde sıkışan yaralı sürücü, itfaiye ekiplerinin çalışması ile kurtarılarak hastaneye kaldırıldı.Kaygan yol nedeniyle direksiyon hakimiyetini kaybettiği iddia edilen her iki aracın sürücüsünün de alkollü olduğu belirlendi.Öte yandan şehirde etkili olan yağmur nedeniyle bazı yollarda su birikintileri oluşurken, çok sayıda maddi hasarlı kazanın da meydana geldiği öğrenildi. İHA

title: Winding cranberry highway: Wisconsin towns put spotlight on the crimson fruit
content: It’s a winding road past century old bogs and marshes bobbing with red globes of cranberries waiting to be harvested and small towns with names like Nekoosa, Babcock, Pittsville, Wisconsin Rapids and Port Edwards. Download the map (visitwisrapids.com/cranberry-highway) for the self-guided tour, making sure to stop in Warrens, the latter considered to be cranberry central. Time your journey exactly right and you can celebrate all things cranberry at the three-day 51st Warrens Cranberry Festival, the largest cranberry fest in the world. By the way, Warrens, with a year-round population of 540 people which swells to more than 120,000 people during the three-day festival, holds the title of Cranberry Capital of the World. Held this year from Sept. 27 to 29, there are marsh tours to watch cranberry gathering, a parade, contests such as biggest berry, craft and flea markets and vendors selling cranberry food products such jams, jellies, salsas and syrups. Of course, no festival is complete without creative—if not outrageous-- fair food. At the Warrens Cranberry Festival there’s seemingly no end to the offerings for both traditional and trendy takes on cranberries. Under traditional, think jams, jellies, sauces, cranberry elephant ears and kettle corn. Or go for the more esoteric like fried cranberries on a stick, cheesecake on a stick with a hot fudge cranberry drizzle, and cranberry cream puffs just to name a few. At breakfast, pour cranberry syrup on your pancakes. And to snag...

title: Tìm thấy thêm 2 thi thể trong vụ sạt lở đất cuốn xe khách và nhiều xe ôtô, xe máy xuống suối
content: Tối 15/9, thông tin từ huyện Nguyên Bình, tỉnh Cao Bằng cho biết lực lượng chức năng đã tìm thấy thêm 2 thi thể trong vụ sạt lở đất cuốn xe khách và nhiều xe ôtô, xe máy xuống suối làm hơn 30 người chết và mất tích tại xã Ca Thành vào ngày 9/9. Theo đó, trong ngày 15/9, lực lượng chức năng đã tìm thấy đã tìm thấy 1 thi thể nạn nhân tại địa phận xã Đình Phùng, huyện Bảo Lạc; 1 thi thể ở địa phận xã Ca Thành, cách điểm sạt lở khoảng 5 km. Một điểm sạt lở đất tại xã Ca Thành do mưa bão Trong ngày 15/9, mưa to đã khiến một số điểm trên địa bàn xã Ca Thành tiếp tục bị sạt lở. Lực lượng chức năng đã chủ động khuyến cáo, di dời những hộ dân trong khu vực nguy hiểm đến nơi an toàn. Được biết, do ảnh hưởng của bão số 3 trên địa bàn tỉnh Cao Bằng có mưa lớn gây ra nhiều vụ sạt lở đất. Tính đến 18 giờ ngày 15/9, tại các điểm sạt lở, lực lượng chức năng đã tìm thấy 54 thi thể nạn nhân. Trước đó, tại địa phương, cũng đã có 15 người bị thương trong mưa lũ, sạt lở đất do ảnh hưởng của bão số 3. Hiện, chính quyền địa phương đang khẩn trương tìm kiếm những nạn nhân còn mất tích cũng như giúp người dân khắc phục hậu quả, sớm ổn định cuộc sống.

title: All About Reese Witherspoon’s New Boyfriend, Oliver Haarmann
creator: Elle
content: This summer, Reese Witherspoon was seen out with financier Oliver Haarmann in New York City at L’Artusi restaurant in the West Village. A source initially told that the pair were just “friends,” as star was taking “things slow when it comes to dating.” (In March 2023, Witherspoon announced her divorce from Jim Toth after 12 years together, with whom she shares one son, Tennessee.) “She enjoys it but doesn’t want it to be a big focus. She’s busy with work and her son,” said the insider. “These are her biggest priorities.” But in September 2024, Witherspoon and Haarmaan were seen again. An insider told , “They’re friends and it’s just casual.” However, multiple sources told the outlet that the couple is indeed dating. Here’s everything to know so far about Haarmaan and his connection to Reese Witherspoon. Haarmann is a very successful financier who began his career in London at global investment firm KKR. He was a graduate of Brown University and went on to Harvard University for a master’s in business administration, according to , per . In 2010, he founded Searchlight Capital Partners. Haarmann was previously married to Mala Gaonkar, who began her hedge fund SurgoCap Partners in 2022. The former couple started called a charity together , which focuses on the analysis of global problems to find functional solutions. The financier is also very interested in sports—he’s so interested, in fact, that he bought 10 percent of the New York Islanders in early 2024, according to The...

title: Margaret Qualley reveals 'thrilling' one-year family plans with Jack Antonoff
content: Margaret Qualley really seems to have it all planned out with Jack Antonoff. The Substance star revealed her family plans and how many kids she wants with the 40-year-old Bleachers frontman in a new interview with The Sunday Times published on Sep. 15. “I’d be thrilled with two. I want one and then I want the other one to have a friend,” Qualley told the outlet. “My brother and sister are my best friends, so I can’t imagine not having that.” Qualley, who is a sister to older siblings Rainey, 35, and Justin, 38, tied the knot with Antonoff in August 2023 in New Jersey. Her family plans come more than a year after the couple celebrated their nuptials with lots of prominent friends and family in attendance, including Qualley's mom Andie MacDowell, Taylor Swift, Channing Tatum, Zoë Kravitz, Lana Del Rey, and Cara Delevingne. The 29-year-old actress also recalled Antonoff’s proposal to her, which happened during the filming of her new movie. “I was so excited that I tackled him and he cut his knee, and I flipped over a chair, but it was cute,” Qualley told The Sunday Times.

title: نخوابیدن طولانی مدت چه اثرات خطرناکی می‌تواند داشته باشد
content: بسیاری از ما با آن احساس کسل کننده و گیج کننده خستگی پس از یک شب کم‌خوابی آشنا هستیم. با این حال، برخی از کاربران شبکه‌های اجتماعی با شرکت در آنچه «چالش بی‌خوابی» می‌خوانند، این خستگی را به حد افراط رسانده‌اند. یک فعال ۱۹ ساله در یوتیوب به نام نورم(Norme) تلاش خود را برای شکستن رکورد جهانی برای روزهای متوالی بدون خوابیدن به صورت زنده پخش کرد. ظرف ۲۵۰ ساعت پس از آغاز این چالش، بینندگان نگرانی‌های خود را در مورد سلامتی و تندرستی نورم ابراز کردند، اما او در نهایت نتوانست بیش از ۲۶۴ ساعت و ۲۴ دقیقه دوام بیاورد. این تلاش نورم باعث محرومیت او از فعالیت در شبکه‌ اجتماعی یوتیوب شد، اما با وجود ادعای او مبنی بر شکستن رکورد جهانی، تلاشش برای شکست آخرین رکورددار گینس کافی نبود، چرا که فردی به نام رابرت مک‌دونالد(Robert Mcdonald) در سال ۱۹۸۶ توانست ۴۵۳ ساعت یعنی تقریبا ۱۹ روز را بدون خوابیدن پشت سر بگذارد. در سال ۱۹۹۷ بود که نهاد رکوردهای جهانی گینس به دلایل ایمنی، رکوردگیری از طولانی‌ترین زمان بدون خواب را متوقف کرد و این کار کاملاً درست بود، چرا که نخوابیدن برای مدت طولانی می‌تواند بسیار خطرناک باشد. بزرگسالان باید بیش از هفت ساعت خواب در شبانه‌روز را به طور منظم هدف قرار دهند. ناتوانی مزمن در داشتن خواب کافی با افزایش خطر ابتلا به چندین بیماری مانند افسردگی، دیابت، چاقی، حمله قلبی، فشار خون بالا و سکته همراه است. خواب بخش مهمی از برنامه روزانه ماست و بسیاری از سیستم‌های بدن ما را قادر می‌سازد تا استراحت کنند و بر تعمیر و بازیابی تمرکز کنند. در طول سه مرحله اول خواب، سیستم عصبی پاراسمپاتیک که استراحت و هضم غذا را تنظیم می‌کند، کنترل را به دست می‌گیرد. این موجب کاهش ضربان قلب و...

title: ‘The Bear’s Liza Colón-Zayas Cried When She Read Her Emmy-Nominated Episode (Exclusive)
LPA approaching Luzon may develop into tropical depression within 24 hours
creator: N/A (Ellalyn De Vera-Ruiz)
content: The Philippine Atmospheric, Geophysical and Astronomical Services Administration (PAGASA) warned that tropical cyclone wind signals may be raised over parts of Cagayan Valley as the Low Pressure Area (LPA) near Luzon has a “high” chance of developing into a tropical depression on Monday, Sept. 16. If it strengthens into a tropical depression, it will be given the name “Gener.” As of 3 a.m., the LPA was located 385 kilometers (km) east-northeast of Casiguran, Aurora, or 400 km east of Tuguegarao City, Cagayan. There is a possibility that the potential cyclone could move close to land, PAGASA Weather Specialist Obet Badrina warned. He added that once the LPA becomes a tropical depression, wind signals will be raised, particularly in parts of Cagayan Valley. He also warned of moderate to heavy rainfall (50 to 100 millimeters) in Ilocos Region, Cagayan Valley, Cordillera Administrative Region (CAR), and Aurora. ‘Habagat’ persists Aside from the LPA, Badrina said the western parts of the country are expected to experience rainy weather due to the southwest monsoon, or “habagat,” over the next 24 hours. From Monday to Tuesday, Sept. 17, heavy to intense rainfall (100 to 200 millimeters) may affect northern Palawan, Occidental Mindoro, Aklan, Antique, and Negros Occidental. Meanwhile, moderate to heavy rainfall may persist in the rest of Palawan, Oriental Mindoro, Marinduque, Romblon, Western Visayas, and Negros Island Region (NIR). title: 特朗普打高球期間場外發生槍擊無人傷 疑犯被捕FBI稱似乎是企圖暗殺
creator: auto_generator
content: 美國共和黨總統候選人、前總統特朗普在他擁有的佛羅里達州西棕櫚灘高爾夫俱樂部打球期間,附近發生槍擊事件,特朗普安全,聯邦調查局發表聲明說,這宗似乎是針對特朗普的企圖暗殺。 事發在當地星期日下午1時半左右,執法部門表示,特勤局人員在高爾夫球場外,發現一名男子隔著圍欄以步槍瞄準球場,當時男子距離特朗普大約400至500碼,特勤局人員隨即向對方開槍,疑犯駕駛一輛黑色汽車逃走,其後被截停制服,警方在球場附近草叢發現一支AK-47步槍、兩個背包和一部運動相機。 白宮表示,總統拜登與副總統、民主黨總統候選人賀錦麗,已聽取有關事件的簡報,得悉特朗普平安無事,拜登與賀錦麗都鬆一口氣。賀錦麗強調,暴力在美國沒有容身之處。 北角錦屏街警員開槍擊斃襲警精神病男子事件,警方指警員多次警告無效後,別無擇下在1.5米距離開槍打中男子心口,男子中槍後已即時施以急救,又指事件屬不幸、警員做法適當專業冷靜。 警方表示,15日晚上9時許接獲男子太太報案,指丈夫當時精神病復發,襲擊母親。衝鋒隊警員到達現場的天台屋時,母親已離開單位,而太太及兩名分租客戶分別反鎖在房間內,當時男子兩隻手分別手持剪刀、以及一把大約30厘米長、刀鋒18厘米的菜刀。 港島總區刑事總部警司冼國明表示,警員當時多次警告無效,男子企圖衝向警員利用武器襲擊,一名警員在別無選擇下向男子開槍並打中胸口,而另一名警員亦有拔槍戒備,在男子倒下後,警員迅速移走武器並進行急救、要求增援,男子送院治理,在晚上約10時半搶救無效死亡,相信子彈仍留在死者身上。 冼國明表示,男子患有精神病多年,有在公立醫院接受治療,並有社工跟進,又提到最近家人發覺男子的精神狀態有復發及漸趨嚴重的跡象。他又表示,男子在案發前曾毆打68歲母親,導致對方頭部受傷、手部骨折,其後送院治理,現時情況穩定。 冼國明又指事件屬於不幸,對死者家人致以深切慰問,但認為警員在事件中表現冷靜、堅定,使用武力符合原則,對此予以肯定,又指警方會再作更深入、全面調查。他表示,當時情況危急,男子雙手持有武器衝向警員,警員為保障所有人的生命安全,別無選擇下開槍,認為相關做法專業。他表示,警員接受訓練時的準則是開槍要瞄向身體最大部分,認為做法適當。 警方表示,開槍的警員是任職8年的衝鋒隊警員,當時沒有配戴盔甲,但手中持有盾牌,開槍的距離約1.5米。

content: We are live for , taking place at Peacock Theater in Los Angeles. Fans are hoping Jessica Gunning will win Best Supporting Actress in a Limited or Anthology Series or Movie for her role as Martha in the show. Her co-star Nava Mau has made history as the first trans-Latina actress to be nominated in the category as well. Selena Gomez is nominated for the first time as an actress for her work in She will also be presenting an award tonight. title: Lachie Neale reveals he’s been battling heel issue for months but won’t miss preliminary final
creator: News Corp Australia
content: Brisbane Lions star Lachie Neale has revealed he’s been dealing with a “fairly significant” heel issue for the past two months but has declared he’s “not in any doubt” for Saturday’s preliminary final against Geelong. Neale, who was kept to just 19 disposals in his team’s stunning come-from-behind semi-final win over GWS, walked through Brisbane airport on Sunday morning wearing a moon boot. He looked to have injured his ankle in the final few minutes of the game, grabbing at it after being tackled over the boundary line. Lions coach Chris Fagan said after the win that Neale could often look like he’s in trouble during the week but would always get up to play. Neale confirmed he had been dealing with a heel issue for months, and didn’t train early in the week, but with “painkilling stuff” he’s been able to play and would take on the Cats. “Certainly not in any doubt, but probably over the last 8-10 weeks I have had a fairly significant issue with my heel but on game day it feels 100 per cent most of the time,” he told SEN on Monday morning. “It was probably the first game where it flared up a bit (against GWS). Obviously, take some painkilling stuff to help that and it must have worn off a bit and I must have moved in a different way and it was grabbing a bit more than usual. “I don’t do much (training) early in the week and Thursdays if you watch training you probably think I am not going to play, that is how badly I have been moving. But game day I feel 100 per cent. (I...

title: Suspenden desfiles patrios en Tocoa ante protesta por muerte del ambientalista Juan López
creator: Proceso Digital
content: Tegucigalpa – Los desfiles patrios 2024 fueron suspendidos en el municipio de Tocoa, Colón ante la indignación que causó entre la población el asesinato del defensor de los derechos humanos, Juan López . Cuando transcurrían los tradicionales desfiles del 15 de septiembre, el centro de la ciudad fue tomado por pobladores en exigencia de justicia por el crimen ocurrido en las últimas horas. “Ya basta, cuál independencia, si no se respeta ni siquiera la libertad de expresión en este país”, reclamó un líder local quien recriminó que el país cuando alguien levanta la voz es asesinado, como ocurrió con López. Honduras es uno de los países más peligrosos para los defensores de derechos humanos. En su último Informe Anual “Situación de los Derechos Humanos en Honduras y la Gestión Institucional”, el Comisionado Nacional de los Derechos Humanos (Conadeh) señaló que, durante el 2023, se registró el asesinato de 16 defensores de derecho humanos en el país; de los cuales 15 se dedicaban a la defensa del ambiente, tierra y territorio. El departamento de Colón fue escenario de siete asesinatos entre ellos el de Aylin Domínguez, Jairo Bonilla, Óscar Oquelí Domínguez, integrantes del Comité de Defensa de Bienes Comunes, Omar Cruz Tomé, Sandy Martínez Murillo, de la Cooperativa “Los Laureles”, Santos Hipólito Rivas, Javier Rivas, de la Empresa Asociativa Campesina de Producción “Gregorio Chávez”. Además, José David Fortín, Secretario General de la...

title: Lachie Neale reveals he’s been battling heel issue for months but won’t miss preliminary final
creator: News Corp Australia
content: Brisbane Lions star Lachie Neale has revealed he’s been dealing with a “fairly significant” heel issue for the past two months but has declared he’s “not in any doubt” for Saturday’s preliminary final against Geelong. Neale, who was kept to just 19 disposals in his team’s stunning come-from-behind semi-final win over GWS, walked through Brisbane airport on Sunday morning wearing a moon boot. He looked to have injured his ankle in the final few minutes of the game, grabbing at it after being tackled over the boundary line. Lions coach Chris Fagan said after the win that Neale could often look like he’s in trouble during the week but would always get up to play. Neale confirmed he had been dealing with a heel issue for months, and didn’t train early in the week, but with “painkilling stuff” he’s been able to play and would take on the Cats. “Certainly not in any doubt, but probably over the last 8-10 weeks I have had a fairly significant issue with my heel but on game day it feels 100 per cent most of the time,” he told SEN on Monday morning. “It was probably the first game where it flared up a bit (against GWS). Obviously, take some painkilling stuff to help that and it must have worn off a bit and I must have moved in a different way and it was grabbing a bit more than usual. “I don’t do much (training) early in the week and Thursdays if you watch training you probably think I am not going to play, that is how badly I have been moving. But game day I feel 100 per cent. (I...

title: B&M shoppers race to snap up mugs scanning in for just 10p that are perfect to put away for Christmas
creator: Sophie Warburton
content: B&M customers are racing to stores to snap up Christmas mugs priced as low as 10p. It would appear the bargain retailer is selling a couple of festive favourites for very reasonable prices. A savvy shopper took to The Extreme Couponing and Bargains UK Facebook group to spread the word. " Christmas mugs scanning for 10p each!" "Table cloth good value for £5 too!", they wrote. In the post, the shopper included a couple of photos. Read more in Money One showed the white and green woodland mug with matching tablecloth. And the other was proof that these mugs really are what they say on the receipt: 10p. However, this shopper nabbed two. Undoubtedly, these bargains could be perfect to put away for Christmas. Most read in Money It would appear several other shoppers think so too as the Facebook post has received almost 200 likes. One person shared their approval: "That's a nice table cloth." While another took a guess as to why the mugs are so cheap: "They will have had last year's code on them. "I have them, they will be mixed in with the new codes, good find." A third person simply commented: "Amazing." It comes after another eagle-eyed bargain hunter revealed a hack on TikTok that can make your shopping even cheaper. “One of my friends used to work in B&M and they told me that they would rarely update the sale prices on items”, said the shopper. In response, one intrigued shopper commented: “So what, do you show them the app prices on the till or how does it work?” To which...

title: Deciphering “Raja” and “outsiders”
creator: Daily Excelsior
content: Shiban Khaibri “When they cannot find anything wrong with you, they create it , hence never try to destroy someone with a lie when yours can be destroyed with the truth...” We used to hear and with a great sense of patriotism, a song filmed in a Hindi movie written by a famous poet and songwriter Pradip , “Hum layen hain toofan say kishti nikal kay , iss desh ko rakhna mere bachoo sambhal kay.” Poets play a unique role and their poems generally are highly motivating, touching our hearts , feelings and emotions and besides loaded with the perspective of the present , poetry can give us the glimpse of future that could emerge to our advantage or to our peril depending upon the nature of our actions . Therefore, do we all in this country , sincerely speaking so, have the courage and determination to follow what the poet in this famous song advises- – “Iss desh ko rakhna mere bachoo sambhal key ” . Well, while doing a serious analysis, one’s fingers are bound to remain crossed. Politics, politics and politics– generally of very low standard ,is what we are virtually fated to see around in this country for the last many years. Most of the politicians having emptied their quivers of all the “permissible ” political arrows , now such political missiles are shot by them that either whatever the gains hard earned, are bound to be feared to be reversed and lost or the sovereignty and the integrity of this partitioned country is feared slowly to be greatly jeopardised and even...

title: El agua que tienen las presas del centro del estado no alcanza ni para el riego de auxilio: JLSVVC
creator: Ignacio Aguirre
content: Culiacán, Sinaloa. El almacenamiento de agua que tienen la s presas Adolfo López Mateos, Sanalona y José López Portillo en la zona centro del estado, no alcanza para dar el riego de asiento en los valles de Culiacán y Navolato, comunicó el presidente de la Junta Local de Sanidad Vegetal del Valle de Culiacán, Miguel Manuel Palazuelos Arenas. Comentó que lo s desprendimientos de la tormenta tropical y Ileana favoreció con bastante humedad la tierra, de ahí la importancia de tener trabajadas las parcelas para sembrar con l as lluvias que se esperan para este mes de septiembre y octubre, que son para los cultivos de frijol y garbanzo en una primera etapa. Te sugerimos: Espera alcalde que “Ileana” mejore el almacenamiento de las presas y pide a población estar prevenidos “Sí andamos muy lejos, no tenemos agua ni para el riego de asiento. Actualmente la presa Sanalona se encuentra al 53 por ciento de su capacidad de almacenamiento, la Adolfo López Mateos (El Varejonal) al 22, y la José López Portillo (El Comedero) al 28 por ciento, con lo cual no se garantiza ni el riego de auxilio para la siembra”, detalló Miguel Palazuelos Arenas explicó que para tener un ciclo agrícola normal otoño- invierno 2024-2025 se requiere que la Sanalona tenga un 70 por ciento, López Mateos un 40 por ciento y la López Portillo también 40, y dando preferencia al garbanzo y algo de frijol. El presidente de la Junta Local de Sanidad Vegetal del Valle de Culiacán (JLSVVC), Miguel...

title: Earthquakes recorded on back-to-back days in SC as rumbling returns to Columbia area
creator: The State
content: Earthquakes hit the Columbia area of South Carolina on back-to-back days over the weekend. A 2.4 magnitude in Kershaw County, according to the U.S. Geological Survey. It was the second confirmed earthquake in the Midlands region of South Carolina’s in as many days. A , the USGS reported. Sunday’s , the South Carolina Emergency Management Division said. Saturday’s earthquake was also in the Elgin area, and was recorded at 2:46 p.m., the USGS said. Both weekend earthquakes happened about half 3.5 miles beneath the surface, according to the USGS. These were the 13 and 14 confirmed earthquakes this year in South Carolina, after , according to the state Department of Natural Resources. The last time seismic activity was recorded in South Carolina was on as a 2.1 magnitude earthquake in McCormick County, state Department of Natural Resources data shows. History of earthquakes in SC It has been uncommon for earthquakes to hit outside of the Midlands area of the Palmetto State, specifically beyond Kershaw County, where since the end of June 2022, according to the South Carolina DNR. That’s also where South Carolina’s most powerful recent earthquakes were recorded on June 29, 2022. On that day, two earthquakes — one a 3.5 magnitude and the other 3.6 — were included in a flurry of tremors and aftershocks. Those were the two largest quakes to hit South Carolina in nearly a decade. A 4.1-magnitude quake struck McCormick County in 2014. Anyone who felt tremors and shaking or heard...

content: A suspect connected to a shooting incident at Trump International Golf Course in West Palm Beach, was taken into custody on September 15, Florida authorities confirmed. In a press conference, Palm Beach County sheriff Ric Bradshaw said his office was informed at around 1:30 pm on Sunday that shots were fired by the Secret Service at the golf course where former President Donald Trump was playing. A Secret Service agent spotted a rifle barrel with a scope sticking out of a fence and “engaged” with the suspect. “We are able to catch a witness that came to us and said, Video Transcript The rules of the road like we are going to give you, let's say we have a representative from the FBI from the secret service from the state of German office. title: Снегопады, лавины и наводнения: циклон «Борис» обрушился на Европу
content: Александр Куманев Циклон «Борис» пришел в Восточную и Центральную Европу несколько дней назад, сменив аномальную жару. На данный момент известно о семи погибших, растет число пропавших без вести. Одной из первых под удар стихии попала Польша. 12 сентября начались ливни, что привело к стремительному росту уровня воды в реках. В городе Глухолазы, расположенном на юго-западе Польши, спасатели возводили заграждения из мешков с песком, чтобы сдержать разлившуюся реку. Жителей Клодзко и других населенных пунктов вдоль рек эвакуировали. Синоптики предупреждали, что количество осадков уже превысило показатели разрушительного наводнения 1997 года, когда под воду ушел Вроцлав. В результате разгула стихии в Польше погиб как минимум один человек, а железнодорожное сообщение с Чехией было приостановлено. Особенно пострадали Есеницкий, Карновский и Опавский края, граничащие с Польшей. Из-за угрозы затопления эвакуированы тысячи людей. В Праге подняли защитные барьеры от наводнений. Перекрыты набережные и приостановлена работа некоторых учреждений. Угроза наводнения объявлена в 38 населенных пунктах. В некоторых районах Чехии выпало до 25 сантиметров осадков, и синоптики прогнозируют ухудшение ситуации. Разрушительный эффект непогоды усиливает штормовой ветер. Более 250 тыс. домохозяйств страны остались без света. Сообщалось о четырех пропавших без вести. Власти мобилизовали все экстренные службы для помощи пострадавшим и борьбы с последствиями наводнения. Стихия обрушилась...

title: Polymarket: букмекеры повысили шансы Трампа на победу после «покушения»
creator: Вера  Логинова
content: Букмекеры из Соединённых Штатов увеличили шансы Дональда Трампа на победу на предстоящих выборах президента страны после второго «покушения», информирует ресурс . Согласно данным сервиса, республиканец одержит победу на выборах с вероятностью в 50 процентов. При этом шансы вице-президента и кандидата на посте президента от Демократической партии Камалы Харрис оцениваются в 49 процентов. Кроме того, из данных ресурса следует, что ставки на событие превышают сотни миллионов долларов. Ранее член Палаты представителей Конгресса Соединённых Штатов Марджори Тейлор-Грин , что на Трампа совершено новое покушение. Позже выяснилось, что стрельба произошла неподалёку от резиденции республиканца. Трамп не пострадал.
