title: Miss Charity International 2024 Jessie Zou to conduct more charity events in PH, China
creator: N/A (Manila Bulletin Entertainment)
content: The Philippines holds a special place in her heart, as it was the site of her pageant victory and has become a “home away from home” for her. In an unprecedented achievement for Chinese women and a remarkable moment in global pageantry, Jessie Zou has been crowned Miss Charity International 2024. The prestigious title, awarded at the international competition held in the Philippines recently, marks Zou as the first Chinese woman to win this honor and the first Chinese contestant to secure a global pageant crown in 2024. Zou’s advocacy for women’s independence has been a key aspect of her campaign. She is well-positioned to leverage her new title to further her mission. One of her major plans includes participating in international fashion shows. In addition to her involvement in fashion, Jessie Zou plans to conduct more charity work in both China and the Philippines. The Philippines holds a special place in her heart, as it was the site of her pageant victory and has become a “home away from home” for her. Zou intends to strengthen her connections with both countries by engaging in charitable projects, addressing local needs, and fostering international solidarity.

title: Josh Kelly Will Now Face Ishmael Davis, Who Replaces Ailing Liam Smith on Riyadh Season UK Show
creator: Jake Donovan
content: Josh Kelly’s calculated risk has paid off. The Ring has learned that Kelly (15-1-1, 8 knockouts) will now face countryman Ishmael Davis. Davis (13-0, 6 KOs) replaces Liam Smith (33-4-1, 20 KOs), who fell ill and was forced to withdraw. The bout will take place as part of Riyadh Season’s UK launch this Saturday at Wembley Stadium in London. Kelly is due a shot at the WBO junior middleweight title previously held by Smith. The 2016 Great Britain Olympian was willing to risk that status just to appear on this show. Every fight on Saturday’s lineup are all-UK matchups. That status remained in place when Davis agreed to abandon his already scheduled plans. The unbeaten 29-year-old from Leeds was due to face Uisma Lima (12-1, 9 KOs) on the Oct. 24 Jack Catterall-Regis Prograis DAZN show in Manchester. His schedule is now bumped up by six weeks, though Davis will be properly compensated for the concession. Kelly has won five straight fights since a Feb. 2021 knockout loss to David Avanesyan. Among his win streak is a common opponent with Davis. Both hold separate unanimous decision wins over Troy Williamson (20-3-1, 14 KOs). Kelly defeated an unbeaten version of the Darlington native in Dec. 2022. Davis topped Williamson in his most recent outing on March 23 in Sheffield. Kelly-Davis is one of six fights on a DAZN Pay-Per-View show. The event is headlined by IBF heavyweight titlist Daniel Dubois (21-2, 20 KOs), who faces former two-time unified titleholder Anthony Joshua (28-3, 25...

title: Jeep 新款大切诺基 4xe SUV 车型 9 月 20 日上市:定位年度改款,现款 64.99 万元起
content: IT之家 9 月 16 日消息,Jeep 宣布旗下新款大切诺基 4xe SUV 车型将于 9 月 20 日正式上市,该车定位年度改款。作为比较,目前国内共有两款在售车型, 指导价分别为 64.99 万元和 74.99 万元 。 外观方面,新款大切诺基 4xe 车型沿用现款车型设计语言,整体风格大气,前脸带有 Jeep 家族化的七孔式格栅造型,后部带有双边共两出式排气造型。 官方目前并未曝光新款大切诺基 4xe 的座舱信息,作为比较,现款车型配备 10.1 英寸中控屏与 10.1 英寸液晶仪表,其中高配版本支持手机无线充电,拥有前排座椅 12 向电动调节、前排座椅按摩、第二排座椅通风等配置。 规格方面, IT之家获悉新款大切诺基 4xe SUV 车型长宽高分别为 4912x1979x1798 毫米,轴距为 2964 毫米 ,搭载由 2.0T 发动机和前 / 后双电机组成的插电混动系统,综合功率 276 千瓦,系统综合扭矩 637 牛・米。 广告声明:文内含有的对外跳转链接(包括不限于超链接、二维码、口令等形式),用于传递更多信息,节省甄选时间,结果仅供参考,IT之家所有文章均包含本声明。

title: Encuesta Olé: Boca vs. River, ¿quién ganará el Superclásico en la Bombonera?
content: El superclásico del fútbol argentino regresa a la Bombonera , luego de más de un año desde la última vez que Boca y River se enfrentaron en ese escenario. El último duelo en La Boca fue el primero de octubre del año pasado, cuando el equipo de Martín Demichelis superó a los dirigidos por Jorge Almirón con un 2-0. Desde entonces, los equipos se vieron las caras en el Monumental, donde empataron 1-1, y también en Córdoba, donde Boca eliminó a River en la Copa de la Liga. ¿Cómo saldrá este cruce? El Superclásico de esta Liga Profesional tendrá lugar el próximo sábado 21, desde las 16, en la Bombonera . El partido podrá verse por ESPN Premium y TNT Sports , en vivo y en directo. Y también estará el minuto a minuto, el resumen, los goles y lo más destacado en Olé , por supuesto. Aquellos que quieran asistir al Súper tendrán que tener un 70% de asistencia en los últimos 12 meses . A partir de ahí, este este jueves desde las 12 los hinchas podrán confirmar su presencia en la página soysocio.bocajuniors.com.ar : hasta el día siguiente a la misma hora. El resto podrá reservas desde el viernes 20 a las 13. Por otro lado, los abonados ingresan directamente con su abono. Y quienes deseen ceder y/o comprar un lugar en la zona de palcos o plateas podrán hacerlo a través del Abono Solidario, que se podrá hacer desde este lunes a las 14. Lo que sí, todavía no hay información de cómo será la reserva para los socios adherentes . Requisito importante...

title: Jon Rahm holds on to win the LIV Golf event in Bolingbrook — and an $18 million bonus for the season points title
creator: Associated Press
content: Jon Rahm ended his first year in the LIV Golf league by closing with a 4-under 66 to win the final individual event Sunday and the season points title with its $18 million bonus. Rahm missed a pair of short birdie putts on the back nine that kept Joaquin Niemann and Sergio Garcia in the mix. But he holed a 12-foot birdie putt on the 17th hole that gave him a three-shot lead going to the last hole at Bolingbrook Golf Course. Rahm won for the second time in the Saudi-funded league, adding to his title in England last month. In between those wins, he lost in a playoff to Brooks Koepka. Niemann, a two-time winner at the start of the season, was the only player who could have challenged Rahm for the season title. He opened with two early birdies but never could get ahead, closing within two shots after a birdie on the 15th and a big par save on the 16th. Niemann shot a 66, while Garcia shot a 68. They tied for second. “I wanted to do a good show and get it over the line. I’m really happy,” said Rahm, who said he was nervous on the practice range. “To go bogey-free on the weekend, it’s quite spectacular. I’m very proud of the putt on the 17th, which made 18 a lot easier.” Crushers won the team title and will go to the team championship in the Dallas area next week that closes out the third season. Rahm, who finished at 11-under 199, won $4 million from the tournament and $18 million for capturing the season race. He was the biggest name to join the Saudi-backed league last...

title: Andrew Scott and Hiroyuki Sanada lead arrivals at 2024 Emmy Awards
creator: Ellie Iorizzo
content: Emmy-nominated actors Andrew Scott and Hiroyuki Sanada have led arrivals at the star-studded awards ceremony celebrating the best in television. Hollywood stars have begun to descend upon the Peacock Theatre in Los Angeles for the second time this year, as the September 2023 ceremony was delayed until January 2024 because of the US writers’ and actors’ strikes. Father and son duo Eugene and Dan Levy are set to host the 76th awards ceremony, with the biggest contenders including Shogun, The Bear, Only Murders In The Building, True Detective: Night Country, The Crown and Baby Reindeer. Japanese historical drama Shogun, based on James Clavell’s best-selling 1975 novel of the same name about the events and figures of 1600 Japan, is the most nominated series with 25 nods. Sanada, nominated for outstanding lead actor in a drama series, told People on the red carpet: “It’s an amazing experience for me, first nomination, and so proud of our crew and cast, happy to be here.” The 63-year-old said they attempted to keep the show as “authentic” as possible. “We believed the audience are intelligent and (have), imagination, and it worked,” he said. “After we finished the shooting, as a producer we spent one year and a half on the post production, so every single version of editing... I checked everything.” He added that following the “great reaction” they decided to create a second series and are “now preparing the script and another new crew and casting” with “another long journey just...

Father and son duo Eugene and Dan Levy are set to host the 76th awards ceremony, with the biggest contenders including Shogun, The Bear, Only Murders In The Building, True Detective: Night Country, The Crown and Baby Reindeer. Japanese historical drama Shogun, based on James Clavell’s best-selling 1975 novel of the same name about the events and figures of 1600 Japan, is the most nominated series with 25 nods. Sanada, nominated for outstanding lead actor in a drama series, told People on the red carpet: “It’s an amazing experience for me, first nomination, and so proud of our crew and cast, happy to be here.” The 63-year-old said they attempted to keep the show as “authentic” as possible. “We believed the audience are intelligent and (have), imagination, and it worked,” he said. “After we finished the shooting, as a producer we spent one year and a half on the post production, so every single version of editing... I checked everything.” He added that following the “great reaction” they decided to create a second series and are “now preparing the script and another new crew and casting” with “another long journey just...

title: PHOTOS: Farmington Fair opens to great weather, with much to see and do
content: Fifteen-month-old twins Rhett, left, and Stella Langlain of Livermore look Sunday at sheep during opening day of the Farmington Fair, which runs through Saturday at 292 High St. Pam Harnden/Livermore Falls Advertiser Dylan Granquist of Dixfield, left, selects freeze-dried strawberries Sunday afternoon from Kate Spardello, co-owner of Eve’s Garden in Kingfield, at her booth in the Starbird Building during opening day of the Farmington Fair, which runs through Saturday at 292 High St. This is the first year the Spardellos have had a booth at the fair, where their offerings include freeze-dried fruit, candy and more. Pam Harnden/Livermore Falls Advertiser Officials Faylene Nile, left, and Maggie Cook check entries Sunday at the Exhibition Hall during opening day of the Farmington Fair, which runs through Saturday at 292 High St. Pam Harnden/Livermore Falls Advertiser The Farmington Fair opens Sunday to warm, sunny weather, with much to see and do. Above, Laylah Cox of Bangor and her horse, JK French Star, knock over a barrel during a barrel racing class put on by the Maine Barrel Racing Association. The fair runs through Saturday at 292 High St. Pam Harnden/Livermore Falls Advertiser Comments are not available on this story. Send questions/comments to the editors.

EEUU: Emiten advertencia de tormenta tropical para partes de las Carolinas
creator: AP
content: MIAMI (AP) — Se ha emitido una alerta de tormenta tropical para una franja de la costa suroriental de Estados Unidos tras surgir una amenaza de clima agitado en el mar frente a las Carolinas, informó el Centro Nacional de Huracanes el domingo. Meteorólogos del NHC (siglas en inglés del centro) indicaron que se emitió una alerta de tormenta tropical desde la localidad de Edisto Beach, Carolina del Sur, hacia el norte hasta la ensenada Ocrakoke, cerca del extremo sur de la cadena de islas Outer Banks de Carolina del Norte. En un aviso emitido el domingo a las 5 de la tarde, tiempo del este, señalaron que el área con clima tormentoso se ubicaba a unos 200 kilómetros (125 millas) al este-sureste de la ciudad de Charleston, Carolina del Sur. Tenía vientos máximos sostenidos de 75 kilómetros por hora (45 millas por hora) y se desplazaba en dirección noroeste hacia la costa a 11 km/h (7 mph). Los meteorólogos dijeron que la tormenta incrementa el riesgo de que en los próximos días haya inundaciones urbanas y repentinas, inundaciones menores provocadas por ríos y olas altas en el sureste del país.

title: Gustavo Álvarez y la victoria de la U: “Esto demuestra la madurez y el carácter del plantel”
content: Universidad de Chile sacó una victoria al extremo. Recién cuando comenzaban a jugarse los descuentos, Leandro Fernández pudo marcar el único tanto en el triunfo sobre Palestino. Tres puntos que dejan a los azules más cerca del título, tras quedar como líder absoluto del Campeonato Nacional, a seis fechas del epílogo de la competición. “Sabíamos que sería un partido complicado. Palestino se cerró, intentó salir rápido, nosotros teníamos que encontrar en espacios reducidos. Encontramos la claridad suficiente para llegar al gol en una de las últimas jugadas”, destacó el técnico de los azules, Gustavo Álvarez. Consultado sobre la importancia de jugar tres partidos contra el mismo rival en diez día s, el DT explicó que “los partidos anteriores son historias diferentes. Lo similar al segundo partido fue cómo ellos trabajaron defensivamente. Se agruparon en el segundo tercio, bien cerrados. Teníamos claro que sería así porque les había resultado en Santa Laura. Asimismo, resaltó que “siempre hay que ser constantes, el gol puede llegar en la primera o en la última jugada. El tema está en sostener la idea, la concentración y la determinación, tener paciencia” . Minutos antes del inicio, el equipo universitario decidió no incluir a Fabián Hormazábal por una molestia física, situación que no cambió la dinámica del juego, según el entrenador. “La lesión de Hormazábal no nos cambió el sistema, sí alguna característica. Son cosas que pueden...

title: Η Χαμάς δηλώνει πως διατηρεί «υψηλές» δυνατότητες και μπορεί να συνεχίσει τον πόλεμο με το Ισραήλ
content: Ανώτερο στέλεχος της Χαμάς διαβεβαίωσε χθες Κυριακή ότι οι δυνατότητες του παλαιστινιακού ισλαμιστικού κινήματος ως προς τη συνέχιση του πολέμου με το Ισραήλ παραμένουν «υψηλές», παρά τις απώλειες που έχει υποστεί κατά τη διάρκεια των ένδεκα και πλέον μηνών του πολέμου στη Λωρίδα της Γάζας. «Οι δυνατότητες της αντίστασης συνεχίζουν να είναι υψηλές», υπογράμμισε ο Οσάμα Χαμντάν κατά τη διάρκεια συνέντευξης που παραχώρησε στο Γαλλικό Πρακτορείο. «Υπήρξαν μάρτυρες και θυσίες όμως, από την άλλη, υπήρξε συσσώρευση εμπειριών και στρατολογήθηκαν νέες γενιές στην αντίσταση», εξήγησε. Οι δηλώσεις του καταγράφονται προτού συμπληρωθεί μια εβδομάδα από εκείνες του ισραηλινού υπουργού Άμυνας Γιοάβ Γκάλαντ, ο οποίος διαβεβαίωσε πως πλέον η Χαμάς «δεν υπάρχει» ως στρατιωτικός σχηματισμός στη Λωρίδα της Γάζας. Η υπόσχεση Νετανιάχου Ο ισραηλινός πρωθυπουργός Μπενιαμίν Νετανιάχου ορκίστηκε πως θα αφανίσει το παλαιστινιακό ισλαμιστικό κίνημα μετά την άνευ προηγουμένου έφοδο που εξαπέλυσε στο νότιο τμήμα της ισραηλινής επικράτειας την 7η Οκτωβρίου, όταν έχασαν τη ζωή τους 1.205 άνθρωποι στην ισραηλινή πλευρά, στην πλειονότητά τους άμαχοι, σύμφωνα με καταμέτρηση του Γαλλικού Πρακτορείου βασισμένη σε επίσημα δεδομένα. Από τους 251 ανθρώπους που απήχθησαν εκείνη την ημέρα, 97 παραμένουν στα χέρια της Χαμάς στον θύλακο, όμως οι 33 από αυτούς έχουν κηρυχθεί νεκροί από τον...

title: PDIP: Peluang 1 Putaran di Jakarta Besar karena Paslon Independen Lemah
content: PDIP: Peluang 1 Putaran di Jakarta Besar karena Paslon Independen Lemah Isal Mawardi - detikNews Senin, 16 Sep 2024 06:20 WIB Hendrawan Supratikno (Foto: Ari Saputra/detikcom) Jakarta - Politikus senior PDIP Hendrawan Supratikno mengatakan peluang satu putaran di Pilkada Jakarta lebih besar ketimbang 2 putaran. Hendrawan berpendapat peluang 1 putaran terbuka lebar karena pasangan calon independen, Dharma Pongrekun dan Kun Wardana, dinilai lemah. "(Pilkada Jakarta) Bisa satu atau dua putaran. Peluang satu putaran lebih besar karena masyarakat menilai paslon independen lemah," ujar Hendrawan kepada detikcom, Minggu (15/9/2024). Menurutnya, saat ini posisi RIDO dan Pramono Anung-Rano Karno sama kuat. RIDO didukung banyak partai sementara Pramono-Rano, kata Hendrawan, didukung emosional warga. ADVERTISEMENT SCROLL TO CONTINUE WITH CONTENT "Bila satu putaran, peluangnya sampai hari ini masih sama kuat. Pramono-Rano mendapat dukungan kultural-emosional warga kota, sedang Kamil-Suswono didukung banyak elite struktural partai," lanjut Hendrawan. "Mudah-mudahan pemilih DKI semakin cerdas dan matang, mengutamakan rasionalitas, dalam memilih," sambungnya. title: Gran convocatoria en la Fiesta Municipal del Tamal
content: 15 de septiembre de 2024 - 20:20 La cuarta edición de la Fiesta Municipal del Tamal que se realizó este domingo convocó en Fray Mamerto Esquiú a miles de vecinos del Valle Central en un gran evento Gastronómico. La Fiesta se realizó en la cancha del Club Defensores de Esquiú y convocó a 13 tamaleras del departamento que le pusieron todo el sabor a la jornada. Se vendieron más de 550 docenas de tamales. La misión estadounidense de astronautas no profesionales regresó con éxito a la Tierra Al menos 40 civiles murieron por un ataque de paramilitares en Sudán La ganadora de la jornada fue Johana Monjes del emprendimiento " La Nona" quien elaboró el tamal más rico. Johana se hizo acreedora a un premio de $200.000, el segundo premio fue para Adriana Ramayo quien se hizo acreedora a un premio de $160.000 y la tercera ganadora de la jornada fue María Baigorri que ganó $100.000. El premio para la novedad fue para la Sociedad Sirio Libanesa. image.png La Intendenta Alejandra Benavidez destacó el gran impacto en la economía local generado a partir de esta fiesta, que fortalece a las familias emprendedoras de Fray. Señaló además, que el objetivo fue el de proponer una fiesta para toda la familia, revalorizando nuestras tradiciones, y acompañando al sector emprendedor local. El evento contó con la visita del vicegobernador de la provincia Rubén Dusso que entregó en nombre del Senado un decreto que declara de Interés Cultural la cuarta edición de la Fiesta del...

title: Vance says Trump in ‘good spirits’ after second assassination attempt
content: Sen. J.D. Vance (R-OH) reacted to the second assassination attempt on his running mate, former President Donald Trump , saying he is grateful Trump is safe. "I'm glad President Trump is safe," Vance posted on X. "I spoke to him before the news was public and he was, amazingly, in good spirits. Still much we don't know, but I'll be hugging my kids extra tight tonight and saying a prayer of gratitude." I'm glad President Trump is safe. I spoke to him before the news was public and he was, amazingly, in good spirits. Still much we don't know, but I'll be hugging my kids extra tight tonight and saying a prayer of gratitude. — JD Vance (@JDVance) CLICK HERE TO READ MORE FROM THE WASHINGTON EXAMINER The FBI said they're investigating "an attempted assassination of former President Trump" after Secret Service shot at a man who was suspected of having a long gun at Trump International Golf Club in West Palm Beach, Florida. The man fled the scene and there were no injuries reported.

title: 100 patients evacuate as fire hits portion of PGH
creator: N/A (Diann Ivy C. Calucin)
content: Around 100 patients of the Philippine General Hospital (PGH) were temporarily evacuated after a portion of it was gutted on Monday morning, September 16. The Bureau of Fire Protection (BFP) said the fire started at 6:07 a.m. inside the hospital's audio-visual room (AVR). It was raised to second alarm at 6:21 a.m. Fire responders said the fire reached the back portion of Ward 3, as well as the Out Patient Department. Some affected patients were transferred to other wards and units within the PGH compound. Firefighters are still trying to contain the blaze, as of this writing. This is a developing story.

title: Manuel Gayone y Axel Guevara se titulan campeones del FIP Rise de La Serena
content: El binomio argentino integrado por Manuel Gayone y Axel Guevara se quedó con el título del FIP Rise de La Serena tras vencer a sus compatriotas Tomás Luco y Pablo Egea por 6-2, 4-6 y 7-5. La pareja Gayone y Guevara -la séptima mejor sembrada del torneo- comenzó imponiendo autoridad en el primer set, pasando por arriba de sus adversarios y ganando 6-2. Pero en el segundo, Luco y Egea demostraron por qué fueron la tercera mejor pareja del certamen al anotar un 6-4 a su favor. Y solo en la manga final, la dupla de las dos “G” se impuso en un reñido trámite por 7-5. Lo realizado por Luco y Egea en La Serena, de todos modos, fue meritorio ya que en las semifinales dejaron fuera a la mejor pareja sembrada del torneo: los españoles Miguel Melero y Pablo Pastor . Tras la obtención del título, en la dupla ganadora no ocultaron su emoción. Axel Guevara declaró que este FIP Rise de La Serena es “ un torneo que lo voy a guardar por siempre . Es mi primera final ganada en un FIP. Estoy muy contento. En el torneo vinimos de menos a más . Yo arranqué mal. Manolo me levantó muchas veces”. Revive la final del FIP Rise de La Serena hace 23 minutos Las figuras del pádel llegan al FIP Rise de La Serena 11 sep 2024 Manuel Gayone , por su parte, alabó a su compañero: “un gran deportista y mejor persona. Primera final que ganamos. Seguir entrenando y buscar más objetivos ”. “Fuimos ganando los partidos con cabeza, como gran equipo que somos ”, complementó. De esta manera,...

title: 風評:從非核到核電是寶貴資產─瑞士啟示錄
creator: 主筆室
content: 對把核電機組停機後,三不五時要傳出「開黑電」的賴政府而言,從非核到把核電視為「寶貴資產」、更進而要新建核電機組的瑞士,應該是一個值得、更是必須參照的案例。 [啟動LINE推播] 每日重大新聞通知 瑞士的能源政策一直依外在環境與內在民情的變化而不斷改變,核電一直是瑞士供電的主力之一,1990年瑞士曾舉辦公投,有半數支持在10年內不新建核電,但2003年再針對是否延長不新核電廠時,只得到4成的支持。到2011年福島事件後,瑞士就要訂定新的能源計劃,以其「跨越核電時代」。 到2017年公投有近6成支持通過了新能源法案《能源戰略2050》,內容除了要增加再生能源外,也規劃在2020年至2030年的使用期限到期之後,核電就不再運轉。 但現在,瑞士聯邦委員會完成新能源戰略規劃,不僅把原先「漸近廢核」的法令廢除,更將核電廠視為珍貴資產,不可輕言廢止,根據新法,它們都有無限制的營運許可權,只要確定安全,就可以繼續運作。官方給出的理由也非常簡單又明確:氣候目標和電力需求,燃氣發電廠不再是一種選擇,這又涉及到地緣政治的不確定性。 瑞士從非核立場反轉為視核電為珍貴資產的理由,台灣其實是完全適用。 台灣是否跟瑞士一樣,必須因應氣候變遷、減碳的要求?當然需要;但台灣現在的作法,卻是不斷增加火力發電的比重,廢核後火電的占比會在8-9成之間。蔡政府一直宣傳的綠電,占的比重只有1成多,最高大概不會超過2成。瑞士官方就說「不清楚再生能源的擴張,是否足以彌補核電停機的電力損失」,因此必須續用與重用核電。 顯然,瑞士更謹慎、也把減碳放在優先位置,不像台灣在綠電占比仍低時,就不計後果的廢核,結果讓火電占比增加、排碳上升。未來隨著用電需求持續增加,待明年核三的2號機停機後,火電的比重就會「穩定」的占85%左右,總量則持續增加。這代表的就是排碳也會持續增加。 其實,從電力結構看,瑞士比台灣更有行「非核家園」的條件。瑞士水力資源豐富,水力發電佔比可高達62%之多,4座核電廠則供應約3分之1的電力,化石燃料和其它綠能佔近1成左右。 換句話說,即使瑞士實現非核家園,用化石燃料的火電替代核電,還是會有高達6成多是低碳電力。但台灣去年的低碳電力比重只有近17%,比2015年的19%還低,蔡政府8年吹噓大幅增加的綠電根本看不到影子,原因就是在廢核,增加的綠電只能頂替核電而非火電,因此無助增加台灣低碳電力的比重。而且,這種情況將持續,沒太多改善的空間。 瑞士還有另一個優勢:地處歐洲電網,萬一缺電可向外購買。瑞士冬季需向他國購電,主要是向德國與法國購買。瑞士本身的電力結構幾乎已實現百分之百的低碳電力,相較之下,廢核的德國雖然花大錢拚命增加綠電,但還是有超過4成以上的電來自化石燃料,雖然比台灣來自化石燃料電力占8成以上優秀多了,但在歐洲先進國家中則是劣等生。 至於瑞士「燃氣發電廠不再是一種選擇,這又涉及到地緣政治的不確定性」同樣適用於台灣,只是瑞士的考量俄烏戰爭、對俄的天然氣依賴過深的風險;台灣要考慮的則是海島地形、卻把半數供電押注在完全仰賴船運的天然氣(LNG),對岸可輕易讓台灣「斷氣」進而斷電。 而從瑞士毅然從非核家園轉向「核電是寶貴資產」,也可看出其實「事在人為」,只要專業評估、認清事實、決定要作,調整能源政策不是那麼難、更不是毫無可能,民進黨政府與台電的那些理由,實在毫無說服力。...

title: Hồ sơ tính thuế nhà đất: Không phát sinh nghĩa vụ tài chính cũng bị 'treo'
content: Không hẹn ngày trả kết quả Phản ánh đến Báo Thanh Niên , ông Hoàng Tuấn cho biết trước đây mẹ ông có đứng tên trên hợp đồng mua một căn biệt thự ở TP.Thủ Đức. Nay do không đủ tiền đóng nên mẹ ông ra phòng công chứng sang tên cho ông bằng hình thức cho tặng để ông tiếp tục thực hiện hợp đồng mua bán với chủ đầu tư. Ngày 12.9, ông đến Chi cục Thuế TP.Thủ Đức (TP.HCM) nộp hồ sơ xác nhận nghĩa vụ thuế cho hợp đồng công chứng cho tặng giữa mẹ và con. Tuy nhiên, trong phiếu hẹn trả kết quả giải quyết hồ sơ thuế, Chi cục Thuế TP.Thủ Đức không ghi ngày trả hồ sơ cụ thể mà ghi chung chung: "Do luật Đất đai 2024 có hiệu lực từ ngày 1.8, Chi cục Thuế đang chờ hướng dẫn. Khi nào có hướng dẫn, Chi cục Thuế sẽ liên hệ và thông báo đến người nộp thuế để nhận kết quả". Ông Tuấn bức xúc: "Tôi có trình bày hồ sơ này là thuế 0 đồng nên đâu cần tính thuế và có thể giải quyết được ngay vì không liên quan đến bảng giá đất. Tuy nhiên cán bộ tiếp nhận hồ sơ không đồng ý, cũng không giải thích mà chỉ đưa giấy hẹn với nội dung trên và yêu cầu tôi về chờ kết quả. Việc giam hồ sơ người dân không giải quyết khiến những người như tôi bị thiệt hại nặng nề. Theo đúng hợp đồng mua...

title: 'Cơn mê cuối cùng': Thế lưỡng nan của phận người
content: Trước và sau mốc năm 2012, Cơn mê cuối cùng đã có một đời sống riêng khá đa dạng về thể loại trước khi được tái dựng (đáng chú ý vào năm 2015, vở này chuyển thể cải lương thành công với tên Cơn mê cuối cùng , do NSƯT Trần Minh Ngọc chỉ đạo, sau đó phát lại trên chương trình Hòa điệu đất chín rồng vào năm 2016). Sau quãng thời gian khá dài, bản tái dựng Cơn mê cuối cùng vẫn khiến người xem bàng hoàng với những vấn đề muôn thuở: dục vọng và sự tha thứ. Nghệ sĩ Trí Quang, Ái Như và Tuyết Thu trong Cơn mê cuối cùng ẢNH: THẾ SANG Nghệ sĩ Ái Như - Trí Quang vào vai vợ chồng ông bà Hai, sống bằng nghề chài lưới ở một cù lao hẻo lánh. Nghệ sĩ Thành Hội ngày xưa từng đóng ông Hai, nay đảm nhận vai cậu Út từ chiến trường về, nửa tỉnh nửa mê. Rồi Mận (do nghệ sĩ Tuyết Thu đảm nhận), một cô gái mồ côi, được ông bà Hai nhận nuôi cho đến khi lớn và có hẹn ước với con trai ông Hai (Đoàn Minh Tài đóng). Trong một đêm oan nghiệt, Mận bị một gã hại đời đến mang thai. Gia đình ông Hai thay đổi mãi mãi sau khi đứa bé chào đời. Bằng ngôn ngữ kịch vừa trực diện vừa mềm mại, đạo diễn - nghệ sĩ Ái Như đã làm cuộc "phẫu thuật" rất sâu vào thế lưỡng nan của con người: đứng trước...

title: Thủ tướng chia sẻ về '6 điểm tựa Việt Nam' góp phần khắc phục hậu quả siêu bão số 3
content: Phát biểu tại chương trình "Điểm tựa Việt Nam", Thủ tướng Phạm Minh Chính đã chia sẻ về 6 điểm tựa để góp phần khắc phục hậu quả siêu bão số 3, góp phần xây dựng đất nước Việt Nam hùng cường, thịnh vượng, nhân dân ta ngày càng hạnh phúc, ấm no.

title: Cambriolage à Keur Ndiaye Lo: le cerveau et trois autres membres de la bande arrêtés
creator: Cheikh Sadibou Fall
content: Du nouveau dans l’affaire du cambriolage qui a eu lieu la nuit du vendredi 13 au samedi 14 septembre 2024 à Keur N’diaye Lo. La bande qui se mettait à l’œuvre aux environs de 3h 58mn (comme l’indiquaient les caméras de surveillance)dans une boutique de multi services, s’est emparée d’une vingtaine de millions de francs CFA. Selon les informations de Dakaractu, la bande de cambrioleurs a été cernée et des têtes faisant partie de ce gang sont tombées. Il s’agit du cerveau et trois autres membres de la bande qui faisait 8 personnes au total. Ils ont été interpellés à Keur Ndiaye Lo par la gendarmerie qui s’est lancée par ailleurs, aux trousses des quatre autres personnes de la mafia.

title: استعفای سخنگوی باشگاه نساجی پس از تغییرات
content: به گزارش "ورزش سه"، بعد از شکست نساجی مقابل چادرملو، تغییرات مدیریتی در این باشگاه رسانه‌ای شد و مالک باشگاه، علی خطیر را به‌عنوان مدیرعامل جدید معرفی کرد. در همین راستا و پس از اعلام خبر تغییرات، علی عالی، معاون رسانه و سخنگوی باشگاه نساجی در صفحه اینستاگرامش پایان همکاری با نساجی را بعد از این تغییرات مدیریتی اعلام کرد. سخنگوی سابق باشگاه نساجی در گفت‌وگو با "ورزش سه" اعلام کرد: «از آقای حدادیان و بایندریان بابت اعتمادی که در این چند ماه کردند سپاسگزارم و خوشحالم بخشی از تاریخ نساجی در روزهای سخت لیگ برتر بودم. من به این دو عزیز پیش از این هم گفته بودم حاضر به ادامه همکاری با نساجی تحت هر شرایطی نیستم. به‌هرحال نساجی نام بزرگی است و افراد می‌آیند و می‌روند و امیدوارم این باشگاه به آرامش برسد».

title: Sunday Night Football: Chicago Bears @ Houston Texans Open Live Thread & Game Information
content: This evening’s Sunday Night Football matchup features a rematch from this summer's Hall Of Fame game. The obvious difference, besides the game being held on a neutral field and not counting, is that this game will feature both team's starters. One of the two teams this evening, the Chicago Bears , feature the number one pick in this year's draft, starting quarterback Caleb Williams. Williams won his first start in the NFL last week despite throwing for only 93 yards and leaving the game with a poor 55.7 quarterback rating. This evening, the team on the other side of the ball will be the Houston Texans . Many pre-season predictions have the Texans as the AFC representative in the upcoming Super Bowl . Much of the optimism surrounding the Texans comes from the play last year of their then-rookie quarterback CJ Stroud. Stroud burst onto the scene, throwing for over 4,000 yards with 23 touchdowns against only 5 interceptions, giving him an excellent quarterback rating of 100.8 for the season. Stroud picked up right where he left off, throwing for 234 yards, 2 touchdowns, and no interceptions last weekend for a great QB rating of 115.9. Please use this thread to follow this evening’s Sunday Night Football game between the Chicago Bears and the Houston Texans. Please follow all site rules in the live threads and other posts on The Phinsider. Please remember that SBNation is strictly against the sharing of illegal game streams. Sharing, discussing, or requesting illegal game...

title: Thượng Hải nín thở chờ bão Bebinca
content: Thời báo Hoàn cầu ngày 15-9 cho biết Thượng Hải đã hủy bỏ các sự kiện ngoài trời và yêu cầu tàu thuyền ở lại cảng để chuẩn bị ứng phó với bão Bebinca. Cơn bão này có thể trở thành một trong những cơn bão mạnh nhất đổ bộ vào thành phố kể từ năm 1949. Bão Bebinca hình thành vào tối 14-9, dự kiến đổ bộ giữa các khu vực phía Bắc Qidong thuộc tỉnh Giang Tô và phía Nam Ninh Ba thuộc tỉnh Chiết Giang, tất cả đều nằm ở phía Đông Trung Quốc. Dự báo đường đi của bão Bebinca vào miền Đông Trung Quốc. Nguồn: Trung tâm Cảnh báo bão Ấn Độ - Thái Bình Dương Theo tờ , khả năng bão Bebinca đổ bộ Thượng Hải đang gia tăng. Cơn bão mạnh nhất đổ bộ vào Thượng Hải là cơn bão số 6 năm 1949, Gloria. Mức độ nghiêm trọng của Bebinca được dự báo có thể gần bằng Gloria. Cục Khí tượng Trung Quốc đã ban hành cảnh báo bão màu cam (tương đương cấp II) vào sáng 15-9, đồng thời thực hiện các biện pháp phù hợp để giảm thiểu tác động của bão. Một số chuyến tàu hoạt động trên tuyến đường sắt xuyên đồng bằng sông Dương Tử sẽ bị đình chỉ vào ngày 15 và ngày 16-9 do điều kiện thời tiết khắc nghiệt. Các hãng hàng không đã đình chỉ các chuyến bay đến Thượng Hải và một số thành phố khác ở khu...

title: Gassed Giants defense just not good enough in loss to Commanders
content: LANDOVER, Md. — The good news for Giants fans is that their team’s defense showed glimpses of being clutch against the Commanders. In six red zone opportunities, Washington’s offense went 0-for-6, settling for a field goal each time. Now for the bad news: They completely fell on their face just when it mattered most.

title: ‘Bridget Jones’: Hugh Grant REESCREVEU cenas do 4o filme antes de se juntar ao elenco
creator: Nefferson Taveira
content: Em entrevista ao , revelou que chegou a reescrever algumas cenas de seu personagem, Daniel Cleaver, na aguardada sequência ‘ ‘ (Bridget Jones: Mad About The Boy). O ator, que é um grande fã do material de origem, queria fazer justiça ao seu personagem, e suas alterações sobreviveram ao corte final do filme. Ele revelou que chegou a , que acabaram entrando para o corte final do novo filme. Sobre o que podemos esperar do próximo capítulo da franquia, o ator não poupou elogios: Vale lembrar que o astro não retornou no terceiro filme, ‘ ‘. Questionado sobre sua ausência, ele simplesmente declarou: O novo filme será lançado nos cinemas nacionais no dia . Além de , (‘Wonka’) e (‘Boa Sorte, Leo Grande’) também estão confirmados para retornar. Entre os novos integrantes do elenco estão (’12 Anos de Escravidão’), (‘The White Lotus’), (‘Truque de Mestre’), (‘Anatomia de um Escândalo’), (‘The Last of Us’) e (‘I Hate Suzie’). , , e retornam como os amigos da Bridget, e como os pais da Brigdet, além de , e . não retorna. O novo filme é baseado no terceiro livro da série de , , que acompanha Bridget em seus primeiros cinquenta anos, enfrentando os desafios da vida moderna e conciliando as responsabilidades da maternidade. e , produtores de todos os filmes da saga, estão de volta para assumir a produção, desta vez ao lado de conhecida por seu trabalho em . title: Sunwoda Inside na veľtrhu RE+ 2024: Predstavenie komplexných riešení skladovania energie v rámci celého priemyselného reťazca
content: ANAHEIM , Kalifornia , 16. september 2024 /PRNewswire/ -- Na veľtrhu RE+ 2024 zanechala spoločnosť Sunwoda výrazný dojem v rámci témy „Sunwoda Inside". Podčiarkla tak svoje vedúce postavenie v poskytovaní komplexných riešení na skladovanie energie. S 27-ročnými skúsenosťami v technológii batérií vyvinula spoločnosť Sunwoda komplexný ekosystém, ktorý zahŕňa batériové články, batériové jednotky, systémy správy batérií (BMS), systémy správy energie (EMS) a plne integrované riešenia skladovania energie. Vystavené články na skladovanie energie Vďaka svojim dlhoročným odborným znalostiam dokáže Sunwoda poskytovať integrované riešenia skladovania energie, ktoré určujú štandardy v odvetví. Na veľtrhu RE+ 2024 predstavila spoločnosť Sunwoda svoje najmodernejšie články s ultraveľkou kapacitou 314 Ah a 600 Ah+. 314 Ah články, široko používané v batériovom systéme skladovania energie NoahX 5MWh Battery Energy Storage System (BESS), sa môžu pochváliť viacerými certifikáciami a vyššou hustotou energie, čo zvyšuje ich spoľahlivosť v rôznych aplikáciách. Nové články s kapacitou 600 Ah+, navrhnuté pre 20-stopové kontajnerové skladovacie systémy energie nad 6,5 MWh, predstavujú v skladovaní energie technologický skok. Tieto články poskytujú presnú reguláciu napätia a kompatibilitu s vysokonapäťovými systémami 2000 V s očakávaným dodaním v roku 2025. Komplexné riešenia pre rôzne...

title: Украинцам будут платить по 2 тыс. грн за за каждый гектар земли: кто может рассчитывать на помощь от государства
content: Украинские аграрии будут получать от государства по 2 тыс. грн за 1 га угодий – однако только при условии работы на территории боевых действий. Правительство утвердило соответствующий порядок предоставления поддержки для сельскохозяйственных производителей. Об этом сообщил премьер-министр Денис Шмыгаль . Он отметил:поддержка будет оказана также тем аграриям, которые работают на территории возможных боевых действий. Впрочем, они будут получать меньше – размер помощи составит 1 тыс. грн за 1 га угодий. Премьер объяснил: помощь будет предоставляться в рамках механизма предоставления специальных субсидий для аграриев, работающих в этих прифронтовых регионах. Соответствующее постановление было принято в середине августа. "Мы понимаем, как тяжело сеять и убирать урожай на этих землях и в этих общинах. Поэтому будем поддерживать наших людей, которые там работают", – сказал глава правительства. В Украине существенно подорожала земля В то же время, в Украине выросла цена на землю . Во II квартале 2024 года (апрель-июнь) она подорожала до средних 43,5 тыс. грн за гектар, что на 3,7% превышает цену I квартала (январь-март) и сразу на 15,3% IV квартала 2023 года (октябрь-декабрь). Стоимость же т.н. "товарной земли" (сельхозназначания) составила еще больше – средние 44,8 тыс. грн/гектар. "Если сравнивать средневзвешенные цены июня 2024 года до декабря 2023 года, то средневзвешенная цена для всех земель выросла на 18,6% – с 37 тыс. грн за гектар до 44 тыс. грн. Даже несмотря...

title: Українцям платитимуть по 2 тис. грн за кожен гектар землі: хто може розраховувати на допомогу від держави
content: Українські аграрії отримуватимуть від держави по 2 тис. грн за 1 га угідь – проте лише за умови роботи на території бойових дій. Уряд затвердив відповідний порядок надання підтримки для сільськогосподарських виробників. Про це повідомив прем'єр-міністр Денис Шмигаль . Він зазначив: підтримку буде надано також тим аграріям, які працюють на території можливих бойових дій. Втім, вони отримуватимуть менше – розмір допомоги складатиме 1 тис. грн за 1 га угідь. Прем'єр пояснив: допомога надаватиметься в рамках механізму надання спеціальних субсидій для аграріїв, які працюють у цих прифронтових регіонах. Відповідна постанова була прийнята в середині серпня. Ми розуміємо, як важко сіяти та збирати врожай на цих землях та в цих громадах. Ттому будемо підтримувати наших людей, які там працюють", – сказав глава уряду. В Україні суттєво подорожчала земля Водночас, в Україні зросла ціна на землю . У II кварталі 2024 року (квітень-червень) вона здорожчала до середніх 43,5 тис. грн за гектар, що на 3,7% перевищує ціну І кварталу (січень-березень) та одразу на 15,3% IV кварталу 2023 року ( жовтень-грудень). Вартість же т.зв. "товарної землі" (сільгосппризначення) склала ще більше – середні 44,8 тис. грн/га. "Якщо порівнювати середньозважені ціни червня 2024 року до грудня 2023 року, то середньозважена ціна для всіх земель зросла за цей час на 18,6% з 37 тис. грн за гектар до 44,0 тис. грн за гектар. Навіть попри те, що ціна у червні скоротилася на 3% стосовно цін у травні...

title: NOVI DETALJI Izraelska vojska se oglasila o smrti taoca: Postoje dve mogućnosti kako su nastradali

title: Con nuevo look Georgina Rodríguez confirma fecha de estreno de la tercera temporada de su reality show
content: Comenzó la cuenta regresiva para el estreno de la nueva y tercera temporada del reality show , donde , , comparte su vida extravagante. PUBLICIDAD Tras el éxito del proyecto, la famosa vuelve a la plataforma y decidió anunciarlo de una forma muy ingeniosa. Con nuevo look, ahora de larga cabellera rubia y vestido ajustado, reveló la fecha de su llegada al streaming con una sesión de fotos donde mostró la fecha en sus lujosos vestuarios. “Ella luce hermosa con este cabello”, “Estoy contando los segundos”, “Acabo de ver el avanza y no puedo esperar a velor. También encontraron similitudes con otras estrellas de la farándula. “Todas parecen la misma mujer. Giorgina, Kim Kardashian, Beyonce”. La diva de la moda tiene mucho material para mostrar en la nueva temporada del realit show ahora que además estrenó el canal de Youtube de su pareja y futbolista, que en pocos minutos sumó millones de suscriptores. Además cuenta con las mejores postales y anécdotas de sus viajes elegantes junto a la familia, el más reciente a Mónaco donde se lució con un diminuto bikini y sus infaltables joyas. donde la modelo muestra sus lujos y extravagancias, desató polémica en sus dos primeras temporadas y esta tercera no será la excepción. Varios de los seguidores consideraron a la famosa como una persona “frívola” y “superficial” al solo presumir de sus gustos, ropas caras y viajes exclusivos. “Que triste, y se supone que eso es una teaser?, El ego se le ha subido a las nubes,...

title: Gov. Yusuf donates N100 million to Borno flood victims
creator: Mustapha Usman
content: The Kano State Government has donated N100 million to victims of the recent floods in Borno. The News Agency of Nigeria reports that the cheque was presented by information commissioner, Baba Dantiye, and his humanitarian affairs and poverty eradication counterpart, Amina Sani, on behalf of Governor Abba Yusuf. NAN reports that the presentation was made at the Borno Government House in Maiduguri, and was received by Governor Babagana Zulum. Mr Yusuf expressed deep sympathy for the victims, describing the humanitarian crisis as “catastrophic”. He called for widespread support for the affected people, and emphasised the need for collective efforts to address such disasters. Mr Yusuf reaffirmed Kano State’s solidarity with Borno in the current difficult time. The governor prayed for the repose of the souls of those who lost their lives in the flood, and wished a speedy recovery to the injured. He highlighted the longstanding, brotherly and cordial relationship between Kano and Borno States. In his response, Mr Zulum expressed profound gratitude to the Kano State Government for its generous support. He assured the donors that the money would be used judiciously for the benefit of the flood victims. “The donation exemplifies the unity and shared commitment of Nigerian states in times of crisis,” he said. NAN

title: الاتحاد دمّر الوحدة
creator: احمد الشمراني
content: • هي كانت متوقعة كفوز لكن كنتيجة لا، والأسباب ليست منها الروح فحسب، بل اعتبارات أخرى! • كانت سهرة الفتك بالتاريخ والجيرة والزمالة! • الاتحاد من زمان وكعبه عالٍ على فرسان مكة، والأسباب قد تكون من زود المحبة! • مدرج الاتحاد كان متحمساً لهذه المباراة، وربما استشعر هذا الحماس اللاعبون فكانت الشراكة على أرض الميدان خيالية. • بعد الخامس سحب المدرب بعض العناصر وزجّ بأخرى، واستمر الضرب من جانب الاتحاد لتصل النتيجة إلى سبعة! • لا مجال للحديث عمّا حدث للوحدة، فهذا أمر يجب أن يتحدث عنه أهل الوحدة، إذا بقي لها أهل يغارون على هذا النادي العريق! • جميل هذا الاتحاد عندما يغني له مدرجه «شيلوها شيلة»، والأجمل أن الحياة عادت لـ«السير بنزيمه» كلاعب وقائد ومدرب في الملعب. • حزين على الوحدة، ليس من الخسارة، بل من النتيجة الثقيلة. • فرحت للنبلاء من الاتحاديين، وأولهم هذا المدرج الجميل. • كرة القدم تغيرت وظننت معها أن مثل هذه النتيجة لن نراها في دورينا الذي يمثل الأقوى عربياً وآسيوياً، ومن دوريات النخبة عالمياً! أما وقد صار فربما يكون ضحايا مثل هذه الأرقام كُثُرَاً. • من يا تُرى يستطيع فك أسرار هذه السبعة؟ بعد أن أخذتنا إلى قراءة نقدية لما يُسمى مباريات الطرف الواحد. • مبروووووووك للنمور وآه يا وحدة. < Previous Page Next Page >

title: Steelers WR Calvin Austin III Leaves Game with Injury
creator: Chris Ward, Steelers Now
content: DENVER — Pittsburgh Steelers wide receiver Calvin Austin III took a brutal shot from Denver Broncos safety P.J. Locke late in the fourth quarter of Sunday’s game. Locke was penalized for unnecessary roughness. Austin was able to get up on his own power and went into the blue medical tent to get evaluated. The Broncos thought they made a third-down stop but P.J. Locke got nabbed for hitting Austin as a defenseless receiver. Locke tossed his helmet in disagreement after the play. It was a tough break for Locke as he was running full speed to break up a pass and just ran into Austin’s head. That’s going to get called every time in today’s NFL, however. Austin has one reception for 6 yards in the game. Pat Freiermuth is the leading receiver with four receptions for 39 yards. After missing his rookie season with a foot injury that required surgery and a sophomore campaign that didn’t live up to his expectations, Austin is putting in the work to make sure that 2024 is his best campaign yet . “I’ve definitely improved each year but I hate to make it seem like it’s something drastic. I’m still me. I still work really hard and I’m the same person,” Austin. said. The entire offense is going through a massive schematic shift under new offensive coordinator Arthur Smith, who has had some success with smaller receivers with similar frames in the past, such as Kalif Raymond in Tennessee and Olamide Zaccheaus during their time together in Atlanta. So far, Smith has made a good impression...

title: Tadej Pogačar confirms favourite status for Zürich World Championships with masterclass in Montréal
creator: James Moultrie
content: Tadej Pogačar (UAE Team Emirates) laid down a final ominous marker before he heads to the Zürich UCI Road World Championships as the favourite for the road race, riding solo to his 22nd win of the year at the Grand Prix Cycliste de Montréal after a blistering attack 23.3km from the finish. Such was his dominance that the Slovenian even had time to high-five Grand Prix Cycliste de Québec winner and close friend Michael Matthews (Jayco-AlUla) as he powered up the Avenue du Parc one final time, with soigneurs and team manager Mauro Gianetti following suit as the Emirati team celebrated past the line. Pogačar has already brought UAE Emirates the Giro d'Italia and reclaimed the Tour de France title in 2024 and his evident form looks to he strengthening the odds on adding a rainbow jersey, the final part of the puzzle to becoming the third men's 'Triple Crown' winner after Eddy Merckx (1974) and Stephen Roche (1987). With the GP Montréal wrapped up successfully, the extra motivation is there for him to become Slovenia's first road race world champion after their previous best as a national team being third, through Pogačar in 2023 and one of his sports directors at UAE Team Emirates, Andrej Hauptman, in 2001. "For sure, today gave me a lot of confidence and motivation," said Pogačar in his winner's press conference, taking place just hours before he'd get back on a plane to Europe and begin the final push for Zürich. "[In] two weeks you cannot do really a lot in terms of...

title: "옆집이 60억이래"...국평 최고가 '이 단지'에서 팡팡 터졌다
creator: 유지희
content: 올해 서울에서 거래된 최고가 '국민평형' 아파트 10개 중 9개가 서울 서초구 반포동 소재 아파트인 것으로 나타났으며 10개중 7개는 반포 소재 래미안원베일리 단지에 속한 것으로 밝혀졌다. 16일 부동산 플랫폼 직방이 올해 서울에서 거래된 전용면적 84∼85m2 아파트(국민평형)의 거래가를 분석한 결과, 가장 비싸게 거래된 아파트는 지난달 2일 60억원에 거래된 래미안원베일리다. 래미안원베일리는 처음으로 국평이 60억원을 찍었으며 이는 3.3m2(1평)당 가격이 1억7600만원에 이르는 셈이다. 2위도 지난달 18일 55억원에 거래된 래미안원베일리가 차지했다. 3위는 래미안 원베일리와 맞붙어 있는 아크로리버파크로, 지난달 7일 51억원에 거래됐다. 각각 50억원에 거래된 래미안원베일리와 아크로리버파크는 공동 4위에 올랐다. 서울에서 국평이 50억원을 웃도는 가격에 거래된 것은 이들 2개 단지가 유일하다. 특히 래미안원베일리는 계속 국평 최고가 기록을 갈아치우고 있다. 이어 6, 7, 9, 10위 모두 래미안원베일리가 차지하며 거래가 상위 10위에 오른 아파트 가운데 7개에 이름을 올렸다. 래미안원베일리와 아크로리버파크를 제외하고는 지난 6일 47억원에 거래된 강남구 압구정동 현대14차 아파트가 유일하게 거래가 상위 10위에 올랐다. 순위를 20위까지 넓혀봐도 상황은 크게 다르지 않다. 11∼20위에는 래미안원베일리 4개와 아크로리버파크 4개, 압구정 현대14차 2개가 포함돼 강남권 고가 거래가 이들 3개 단지에서 집중적으로 이뤄지는 것으로 나타났다. 래미안원베일리와...

title: Priscila Flor da Silva reportará con América Femenil en los próximos días
creator: Rubén Beristáin
content: La aventura de Brasil en el Mundial Femenil Sub-20 terminó antes de lo esperado. En la ronda de cuartos de final, el país sudamericano de Medellín, por lo que la refuerzo americanista Priscila Flor da Silva tendrá que reportar con las Águilas del América, donde ya la esperan como uno de los refuerzos ofensivos más esperados y de talla mundial para este Apertura 2024. La delantera brasileña llegará a Coapa en la justa mundialista de categoría menor que se llevó a cabo en Colombia, debido a que marcó un total de tres goles en los cinco partidos que disputó desde fase de grupos hasta las rondas finales de la competencia. El primer gol que marcó fue en la goleada 9-0 sobre Fiji en su primer partido. Priscila cobró desde los once pasos y venció a la portera de Oceanía. En el segundo partido marcó uno más ante Francia para el 2-0 de su equipo y lo hizo en la ronda de octavos de final ante Camerún, también desde los once pasos que la confirmaron como una de las futbolistas cariocas más importantes a la ofensiva de su nación. La nueva jugadora azulcrema sólo estuvo por debajo de lo que hizo Natália Thalia Vendito, quien marcó , y de la mediocampista Vitória Amaral Santana, quien produjo dos tantos y tres asistencias. Hace unos días, el técnico Ángel Villacampa declaró que esperaría cuanto antes a su nueva jugadora en cuenta terminara su participación en el Mundial Sub-20, por lo que ya eliminada, para que Priscila da Silva llegue a México y pueda...

title: China’s Retail Sales rises 2.1% YoY in August, Industrial Production up 4.5%
content: China’s Retail Sales rose 2.1% YoY in August from 2.7% in July, worse than the 2.5% expected. The nation’s Industrial Production increased 4.5% YoY in the same period versus 4.8% anticipated and 5.1% recorded previously. The official data was published by the National Bureau of Statistics (NBS) on Saturday. Meanwhile, the Fixed Asset Investment rose 3.4% YTD YoY in August versus the 3.5% expected and 3.6% seen in July. Market reaction to Chinese data The pair is adding 0.07% on the day to trade at 0.6708, as of writing. Australian Dollar FAQs One of the most significant factors for the Australian Dollar (AUD) is the level of interest rates set by the Reserve Bank of Australia (RBA). Because Australia is a resource-rich country another key driver is the price of its biggest export, Iron Ore. The health of the Chinese economy, its largest trading partner, is a factor, as well as inflation in Australia, its growth rate and Trade Balance. Market sentiment – whether investors are taking on more risky assets (risk-on) or seeking safe-havens (risk-off) – is also a factor, with risk-on positive for AUD. The Reserve Bank of Australia (RBA) influences the Australian Dollar (AUD) by setting the level of interest rates that Australian banks can lend to each other. This influences the level of interest rates in the economy as a whole. The main goal of the RBA is to maintain a stable inflation rate of 2-3% by adjusting interest rates up or down. Relatively high interest rates compared to...

title: Saoirse Ronan and Jack Lowden Attend 2024 Emmys as a Married Couple
creator: Shelby Stivale
content: Saoirse Ronan stepped out to support husband Jack Lowden on the 2024 Emmy Awards red carpet. The event, hosted on Sunday, September 15, at the Peacock Theater in Los Angeles, marked the first time the couple have walked a red carpet together since they got married earlier this year. Scottish civil marriage records confirmed that Ronan, 30, and Lowden, 34, tied the knot in July after six years together. The couple, who generally keep a low profile, appeared to coordinate their looks for Emmys night , with Ronan wearing a navy blue Louis Vuitton gown that showed off her bare midriff. She accessorized with Bulgari jewelry. Lowden, for his part, looked dapper in a navy blue black Louis Vuitton tuxedo. Lowden is up for Outstanding Supporting Actor in a Drama Series for the Apple TV+ series Slow Horses , which he stars in alongside Gary Oldman . While the nomination is for the drama series’ third season, which premiered in December 2023, the show’s fourth season hit the streamer earlier this month. “A lot of people still get the name wrong,” Lowden told Vulture late last month, discussing Slow Horses ’ recent jump in popularity. “I’ve had, ‘You’re in Sea Horse’; ‘You’re in Fast Horse’; ‘You’re in the horse thing.’ People are starting to get it right, but it’s taken a bit.” Sunday’s red carpet appearance is rare for Ronan and Lowden, who have previously kept their romance out of the spotlight. The pair met in 2018 when they starred in Mary Queen of Scots , playing husband and wife....

title: Шольц зустрівся із президентом Узбекистану: про що домовилися лідери країн
content: Поїздка Шольца до Центральної Азії є частиною зусиль його уряду щодо зміцнення зв’язків із регіоном Німеччина та Узбекистан уклали угоду про міграцію та трудову мобільність, а також підписали низку інших угод, спрямованих на поглиблення співпраці в таких сферах, як стратегічні сировинні матеріали та боротьба зі зміною клімату. Про це повідомляє Bloomberg. Угоди були підписані в неділю в Самарканді за присутності президента Узбекистану Шавката Мірзійоєва та канцлера Німеччини Олафа Шольца, який вперше відвідує Центральну Азію. Шольца супроводжує делегація підприємців, ця поїздка є частиною зусиль його уряду щодо зміцнення зв’язків із країнами Центральної Азії в таких сферах, як промисловість , енергетика та охорона довкілля, а також у галузі безпеки та оборони. Це також важливо для поточних зусиль із диверсифікації джерел енергії та сировини Німеччини від країн, таких як Росія та Китай . За даними уряду Німеччини, угода про міграцію з Узбекистаном допоможе країні залучити кваліфікованих працівників, хоча невідомо, наскільки це допоможе вирішити постійний дефіцит робочої сили в найбільшій економіці Європи. Угода також встановлює механізм співпраці щодо повернення мігрантів, які не мають права залишатися в обох країнах. «Ми залучаємо робітників та кваліфікованих працівників до нашої країни, яких ми терміново потребуємо у виробництві, малому бізнесі, догляді та багатьох інших сферах», – сказала міністерка внутрішніх справ Німеччини Ненсі Фезер, яка...

title: ¡Hoy más que nunca la lucha por la libertad continúa!
creator: Mariana Gómez del Campo
content: Opinión comentarios ¡Hoy más que nunca la lucha por la libertad continúa! Estamos en un momento crítico, donde la aprobación de la reforma al Poder Judicial es una de las señales más alarmantes de lo que estamos viviendo Grito de Independencia de México Grito de Independencia de México (PEDRO PARDO/AFP) Por Mariana Gómez del Campo 15 de septiembre 2024 a las 17:19 hrs. Hace más de 200 años, los mexicanos nos unimos para luchar por nuestra independencia. Nos liberamos de un sistema opresivo que no respetaba nuestra dignidad como pueblo. Aquella lucha no fue fácil; costó sangre y años de resistencia, pero al final logramos nuestra libertad y construimos el México que hoy conocemos. Sin embargo, parece que esa lucha por la independencia y la libertad vuelve a comenzar. Hoy, en pleno 2024, nos enfrentamos nuevamente a la opresión y el autoritarismo. Estamos en un momento crítico, donde la aprobación de la reforma al Poder Judicial es una de las señales más alarmantes de lo que estamos viviendo. Se nos está arrebatando la autonomía de uno de los poderes más importantes para la democracia. Se está consolidando una estructura de poder que no quiere ser cuestionada y pretende decidir por encima de la ley, sin rendir cuentas. Parece que la historia se repite, aunque esta vez no nos enfrentamos a una potencia extranjera. Hoy debemos hacer frente a decisiones autoritarias que amenazan la democracia, la libertad y los derechos por los que nuestros antepasados...

title: Marvin Harrison Jr. se estrena con 2 touchdowns en la NFL y Cardinals aplastan 41-10 a Rams
creator: Por DAVID BRANDT
content: GLENDALE, Arizona, EE.UU. (AP) — Kyler Murray lanzó para 266 yardas y tres touchdowns, el receiver novato Marvin Harrison Jr. consiguió sus primeras dos recepciones de anotación y los Cardinals de Arizona arrollaron 41-10 a los Rams de Los Ángeles el domingo. La ofensiva de los Cardinals — encabezada por la conexión Murray-a-Harrison — sorprendió en camino a tomar una ventaja de 24-3 al medio tiempo. Murray encontró a Harrison para un touchdown de 23 yardas en la primera serie ofensiva, otra anotación ahora de 60 yardas en la segunda posesión y después de alguna manera evitó ser derribado por tres defensivos de los Rams antes de conectar con el tight end Elijah Higgins con un envío de TD de 18 yardas en la tercera serie para tomar ventaja de 21-0. Arizona (1-1) se sacudió una racha perdedora de nueve juegos ante los Rams (0-2) en el State Farm Stadium, y ganó por tercera vez en 16 intentos en la rivalidad del Oeste de la NFC. James Conner corrió para una anotación de cinco yardas en la primera posesión del tercer periodo, entrando a la zona prometida con pasos altos a modo de celebración para una ventaja de 31-3. El running back terminó con 122 yardas por tierra y el veterano de 29 años superó las 5.000 yardas en su carrera. Harrison acabó con 130 yardas por recepción.

title: Rock In Rio 2024: Planet Hemp une rock, crítica e cantoria com Pitty
content: O público que havia começado a tarde aplaudindo o Barão Vermelho no palco Sunset e os Paralamas no palco Mundo voltou em peso ao Sunset, no final da tarde deste domingo, 15, para seguir a rota musical unindo rock nacional e crítica política. Foi a vez do Planet Hemp, banda que desde sua criação, em 1993, defende a legalização da maconha, a liberdade de expressão e os direitos das classes sociais menos abastadas. PUBLICIDADE Bastou a primeira frase do show para que qualquer eventual desavisado soubesse da principal bandeira da banda: em meio a sons do decolar de um avião, uma voz eletrônica anunciou, como se fosse o comandante de um voo prestes a partir: “É permitido fumar a bordo”. A primeira canção foi Fazendo a Cabeça . Antes de Legalize Já , os músicos lançaram para a plateia um inflável em forma de cigarro de maconha, que passou a circular pelo público. Na parte final do show, o Planet Hemp recebeu a roqueira baiana Pitty, que entoou clássicos como Admirável Chip Novo . A participação do Planet Hemp no Rock in Rio era uma cobrança de 23 anos: a banda era esperada na edição de 2001, porque no ano anterior havia lançado um disco que fez muito sucesso, mas não foi convidada, o que decepcionou o público de então. Passadas duas décadas, agora não há o que reclamar. Neste domingo foi só aplaudir. Planet Hemp Rock in Rio música Os comentários são exclusivos para assinantes do Estadão.

title: Buescher pounces on SVG's error to win at Watkins Glen
content: In a largely chaotic race – action-packed literally from the drop of the green flag, it was Roush Fenway Keselowski Racing’s Chris Buescher who prevailed in overtime in Sunday’s Go Bowling at The Glen – passing road course ace Shane van Gisbergen in a bumper-to-bumper last lap duel to claim his first career road course victory at the famed Watkins Glen (N.Y.) International. Van Gisbergen took the lead from the second row in a daring three-wide move on an overtime restart, but Buescher chased him down. Buescher’s No. 17 RFK Racing Ford and van Gisbergen’s No. 16 Kaulig Racing Chevrolet made contact in the course’s famous Bus Stop, then Buescher slid his Mustang inside van Gisbergen’s Camaro in the Esses and motored off to a 0.979s win over the Kiwi superstar in the second Playoff race of the season. “We came here to be spoiler. We’re going to do that.” Chris Buescher walked through his race-winning move on Shane van Gisbergen. #NASCAR pic.twitter.com/HYj4B7aw46 — NASCAR on NBC (@NASCARonNBC) September 15, 2024 Spire Motorsports’ Carson Hocevar, Trackhouse Racing’s Ross Chastain and Spire’s Zane Smith rounded out the top five. Stewart-Haas Racing’s Chase Briscoe finished sixth, followed by Front Row Motorsports’ Michael McDowell, Spire’s Corey LaJoie, SHR’s Ryan Preece and Team Penske’s Austin Cindric. Briscoe and Cindric were the only two Playoff drivers to finish among the top 10 in what was a perpetually dramatic day for the 16 Playoff drivers racing for the NASCAR Cup...

title: బేగంపేట టు సికింద్రాబాద్
creator: ABN Andhrajyothy
content: సోమాజీగూడ పుల్లారెడ్డి బస్ స్టాప్: పగలంతా నేతి వాసన తాగీతాగీ రాత్రిపూట మత్తుగా తూలుతోంది చివరి సికింద్రాబాద్ బస్సు చినుకుల మధ్య నుంచి రివ్వున దూసుకొచ్చి దేహాన్ని వెచ్చగా తాకింది ఎక్కీఎక్కగానే పాతికేళ్ల క్రితం ఆకలితో తిరిగిన రోజులన్నీ ఖాళీ సీట్ల మీద చెల్లాచెదురుగా కనిపించాయి పోలీస్ లైన్ బస్ స్టాప్: నీరసంగా ఎక్కిన ముసలామె సంచిలో రేపటి బతుకు తండ్లాట ఆమె నీరసస్వరంలో ఏదో విశ్వాసం నా గుండెకింద ధైర్యంగా వినపడింది రసూల్ పుర బస్‌ స్టాప్‌: ఈదురుగాలికి ముడుచుకొని కుంటి కుక్కతో కలిసి కునుకు తీస్తోంది ఆకలేసి ఆర్డర్ క్యాన్సిల్ చేసుకున్న స్విగ్గి కుర్రాడు వచ్చిన కలెక్షన్ ఎంతో పోయిన కమిషన్ ఎంతో లెక్కలేసుకుంటున్నాడు ప్యారడైజ్: నాగరికత దుప్పట్లో దూరి సాయంత్రం అమ్మగా మిగిలిన మల్లెపూలని వుండగా చుట్టి తలకింద పెట్టుకుని నిద్ర నటిస్తోంది ప్యాట్నీ: ఎంతకీ రక్తి కట్టని దారుల్లో హరేక్ మాల్ బండి ఒకటి భంగపడి టార్పాలిన్ చుట్టుకుని పక్కకు ఆగిపోయింది ఆకలి మంటతో బీడీ వెలిగించుకొని అతడు బెంజ్ కారుకి దారిచ్చి తొలగిపోయాడు సికింద్రాబాద్: బడుగు జీవులను మోసీ మోసీ అలసిన బస్సు దూరంగా నడుం వాల్చింది రేపటి కోసం మెహిదీపట్నం బోర్డును తగిలించుకొని నిద్రలోకి జారుకుంది

title: Rossy de Palma, la 'chica Almodóvar' que cumple 60 en busca del renacer: su increíble historia y sus "dos ángeles"
content: El mundo del cine está este lunes, 16 de septiembre, de celebración. Rosa Elena García Echave, conocida artísticamente como Rossy de Palma , cumple 60 años y lo hace con las intenciones claras de cara a su futuro. La polifacética artista siempre ha demostrado ser dueña de su vida y en este inicio de década personal lo va a volver a hacer. Nunca ha dejado que nadie le encasillara y, precisamente por eso, es un personaje único . Pese a su popularidad, la actriz siempre se ha mostrado muy reservada en lo que respecta a su vida privada. Son contadas las ocasiones en las que ha dado detalles personales y hasta entonces desconocidos. Sus orígenes humildes y sus inicios en el mundo de la moda le han sido suficientes para elevarse hasta el estrellato . Rossy de Palma en una imagen de archivo. Gtres Nacida en Mallorca, Rossy es hija de un albañil asturiano y una artista navarra . Decidió abandonar los estudios y ponerse a vender ropa en el rastro del Mallorca. Estas prendas, que estaban diseñadas y fabricadas por ella, y su estilo personal le ayudaron a que todo el mundo se fijase en ella. Lo intentó en el mundo de la música con su propio grupo musical que alternaba pop con punk, Peor Imposible , sin mucho éxito. Ella era la vocalista y aunque no sonaban del todo mal, la falta de apoyo en una década donde había cientos de artistas emergentes les llevó a disolverse. Pero gracias a esta formación consiguió llamar la atención de la persona que le abriría la puerta...

title: Neville: 'Arsenal đá như một nhà vô địch Ngoại hạng Anh'
content: "Arsenal vắng hai cầu thủ hay nhất Martin Odegaard và Declan Rice. Nhưng họ vào trận với bộ tứ hậu vệ rất tốt và hệ thống phòng ngự chắc chắn, khiến Tottenham không thể xuyên phá", Neville bình luận trên Sky Sports . Hậu vệ Arsenal Gabriel ngăn một cú dứt điểm của Dominic Solanke trong trận thắng Tottenham 1-0 ở vòng 4 Ngoại hạng Anh ngày 15/9. Ảnh: AP Cựu hậu vệ người Anh ca ngợi Arsenal chơi khôn ngoan, không ngây thơ, non nớt. "Chúng ta từng chỉ trích Arsenal rất nhiều suốt 10 đến 12 năm qua về việc họ thi đấu lỏng lẻo, ngây thơ và dễ để thủng lưới. Nhưng đây là màn trình diễn hoàn toàn trái ngược", Neville nhấn mạnh. "Đó là kinh nghiệm, trưởng thành và là màn trình diễn của CLB đã giành được nhiều danh hiệu. Arsenal chưa vô địch, nhưng đó là màn trình diễn rất tốt". Arsenal vào trận derby bắc London với nỗi lo về nhân sự khu trung tuyến. Tân binh Mikel Merino rạn xương vai, Declan Rice bị treo giò vì thẻ đỏ tranh cãi trong trận hòa Brighton 1-1 ở vòng 3, còn đội trưởng Martin Odegaard chấn thương khi hội quân cùng tuyển Na Uy và chưa rõ ngày trở lại. Không có lực lượng mạnh nhất, "Pháo thủ" nhường thế trận cho Tottenham , khi chỉ kiểm soát bóng 36%, tìm kiếm cơ hội từ những pha phản công và cố định....

title: Emmys: Lamorne Morris Blasts This New Girl Star for Not Wanting Reboot
content: Hey Jake Johnson , whatcha' doing? After all, the New Girl actor is the reason why the cast hasn't reunited for a reboot of the series, as his former costar Lamorne Morris revealed at the 2024 Emmys in Los Angeles on Sept. 15. ( See all the celebrities at the Emmys here .) "Everybody is on the same page that we want to, except for Jake Johnson," Morris exclusively told Heather McMahan on Live From E!: Emmys on the red carpet. "Jake Johnson, man, you've been a problem." But Morris—who is nominated for Outstanding Supporting Actor in a Limited or Anthology Series or Movie for his role in Fargo —is not letting Johnson off the hook as he hopes to see him reprise his role as Nick Miller on New Girl , which ran for seven seasons from 2011 to 2018. "We all love the fans so much that we want to give them what they want. What's wrong, Jake? You don't love the fans?" Morris joked on the red carpet. "Jake Johnson hates the fans!" Although Morris doesn't yet have plans to reunite with Johnson, Zooey Deschanel and Max Greenfield on the small screen, he is basking in the success of his latest show Fargo , in which he plays North Dakota State Trooper Witt Farr. And earning an Emmy nomination is just the cherry on top. "It was early in the morning and me and my daughter were eating," Morris told E!, "and obviously 20-something years in this business, to get a call like that, to get the recognition, you're sometimes overwhelmed with tears of joy." However, his 4-year-old daughter Lily was...

title: Jane Lynch Likes Being “Only Murders in the Building” Victim Because She's 'Leo Rising': 'I Want to Be the Focus'
creator: People
content: "You're the focus of everything," the star said of her latest role ahead of the 2024 Emmys Steve Granitz/FilmMagic isn't afraid to be the center of attention. The , 64, stars as Sazz Pataki on Hulu's , and though her character was killed at the end of the third season, Lynch told E! News during the pre-show that she enjoys being the victim for the season-long mystery. "John Hoffman, who's a showrunner, came up to me the season before and he said, 'You're our murder victim,' and I'm like, 'Oh!' I was really happy because what that means is that you get to be in a lot of the next season because they have to do flashbacks, and you're the focus of everything," she said. "So I like that. I have Leo rising. I love that. I want to be the focus!" Patrick Harbron/Hulu Related: This isn't the first time Lynch, who was born on July 14, has referred to her love for all things zodiac. She that while she doesn't "think it's going to happen," she would one day "want to do an astrology podcast." The Emmy winner also noted how much she loves working alongside costar Steve Martin, as her character Sazz serves as the stunt double for Martin's actor character, Charles. "The great thing about it is when we do a rehearsal for the scene, I just watch what he does and when he does this, when he does that, and if he changes it up, I have to stay on my toes," she said. Kevin Winter/Getty Related: "But usually, he'll set it so that I can mirror it. So that's always a lot of fun. We don't kill that...

title: Jason Heyward, Astros beat Angels for fourth straight W
creator: Field Level Media
content: Jason Heyward went 3-for-3 with a home run and two RBIs to help the Houston Astros sweep the Los Angeles Angels with a 6-4 win on Sunday in Anaheim, Calif. Houston starting pitcher Ronel Blanco (11-6) held Los Angeles scoreless on four hits and struck out five over six innings. The Astros (81-68) have won four straight, while the Angels (60-89) dropped their fifth in a row. Los Angeles trailed 6-0 in the eighth before Taylor Ward got the Angels on the board with a solo home run in the bottom of the frame, mashing his 24th home run of the season 420 feet off Kaleb Ort to the center field seats. The Angels narrowed the deficit further in the ninth. Reliever Caleb Ferguson walked Logan O'Hoppe to lead it off, then Mickey Moniak was hit by a pitch and Jordyn Adams hit a one-out single to load the bases. Ferguson was then replaced by closer Josh Hader. O'Hoppe scored on Gustavo Campero's groundout to cut it to 6-2 and Charles Leblanc's single drove in Moniak and Adams to pull the Angels within two. But Hader struck out Zach Neto for the save. Angels starter Caden Dana (1-2), making his third start in the majors, was perfect through the first two innings before Heyward's leadoff homer gave the Astros a 1-0 lead. Dana struggled in the fourth inning, and the Astros capitalized. Kyle Tucker drew a leadoff walk, Victor Caratini followed with a double and Jeremy Pena drove in Tucker with a single to double Houston's lead. Then, with runners on the corners and nobody out, Heyward...

Cập nhật giá vàng sáng 16.9: Vàng nhẫn neo cao, thế giới bứt phá
content: Giá vàng miếng SJC Giá vàng nhẫn 9999 Tính đến 6h00, giá vàng nhẫn tròn 9999 Hưng Thịnh Vượng tại DOJI niêm yết ở ngưỡng 77,9-79,1 triệu đồng/lượng (mua vào - bán ra); giữ nguyên. Bảo Tín Minh Châu niêm yết giá vàng nhẫn ở ngưỡng 77,88-79,08 triệu đồng/lượng (mua vào - bán ra), giữ nguyên. Nhiều phiên gần đây, giá vàng nhẫn thường biến động cùng chiều với thị trường thế giới. Nhà đầu tư có thể tham khảo thị trường thế giới cùng nhận định của chuyên gia trước khi đưa ra quyết định đầu tư. Giá vàng thế giới Tính đến 6h00 ngày 16.9, giá vàng thế giới niêm yết trên Kitco ở ngưỡng 2.577,7 USD/ounce, giữ nguyên. Dự báo giá vàng Giá vàng thế giới neo cao trong bối cảnh chỉ số USD giảm xuống. Ghi nhận lúc 6h00 ngày 16.9, chỉ số US Dollar Index đo lường biến động của đồng bạc xanh với 6 đồng tiền chủ chốt ở ngưỡng 101,120 điểm (giảm 0,23%). Tuần qua, vàng đã “xô đổ” kỷ lục đạt được vào cuối tháng 8 và liên tiếp chinh phục các mốc mới khi kỳ vọng một động thái mạnh mẽ từ Cục Dự trữ Liên bang Mỹ (FED) ngày càng tăng cao. Các chuyên gia cho rằng, kim loại quý này đã trải qua một chặng đường dài và đầy trở ngại, và quyết định chính sách tiền tệ sắp tới sẽ đánh dấu sự khởi đầu của...

title: British ministers head to Gulf for talks on new trade deal
creator: malawi
content: LONDON: Britain’s new trade ministers visited the Gulf region on Monday in a first joint visit for talks on a possible trade deal, the government said. Trade secretary Jonathan Reynolds and minister for trade policy Douglas Alexander will meet their counterparts from the Gulf Cooperation Council, which comprises Bahrain, Kuwait, Oman, Qatar, Saudi Arabia and the United Arab Emirates. Trade has been a weak point in Britain’s economy in recent years — with business groups pointing to Brexit as one cause. The government, elected after a landslide win for Prime Minister Keir Starmer’s Labour Party in July, is also targeting trade deals with India, Switzerland and South Korea as part of its plan to boost economic growth. “I want to see a high-quality trade deal that supports jobs, helps UK companies sell their products to the region and increases choice for consumers — so it’s great to be here to discuss exactly that,” Reynolds said in a statement. Britain’s Business and Trade Department estimates a free trade deal with the Gulf Cooperation Council could boost the UK economy by 1.6 billion pounds ($2.10 billion) over the long run. Out of the Group of Seven advanced economies, Britain ranks bottom for growth in goods and services exports since 2019, even when accounting for the country’s large precious metals trade, according to national accounts data.

title: Cuenta atrás para la boda de Irene Villa y David Serrato: del "desmontable" vestido de novia al tradicional rol de sus padres
content: Cuenta atrás para la boda de Irene Villa (45 años) y el coach David Serrato . El próximo sábado, 21 de septiembre, en apenas una semana y cuando estaría a punto de cumplirse tres años desde el día en el que se conocieron, se darán el 'sí, quiero', rodeados de familiares y amigos. Para ella será su segundo matrimonio, pues hasta 2018 estuvo casada con Juan Pablo Lauro, padre de sus tres hijos. Carlos, Gael y Eric , los vástagos de la presentadora, precisamente tendrán un rol especial en el enlace de su madre. Así lo ha revelado ella misma en algún acto público. Aunque todavía queda una semana para la celebración del enlace, Irene Villa ha descubierto ciertos detalles de la celebración. En sus redes sociales o en ciertos eventos a los que ha acudido de invitada, la periodista ya ha compartido algunas pistas. La última, relacionada con los avances de su look nupcial. Irene Villa y David Serrato en una imagen compartida por ella en Instagram Instagram 1. El vestido de novia Es el secreto mejor guardado de la novia, pero Irene, desde el primer momento, desveló quién sería la encargada de llevarlo a cabo. Se trata de la diseñadora Silvia Fernández , una referente en el sector nupcial, en la que también han confiado otras conocidas figuras, como Lidia Bedman (39). "La paz de estar en buenas manos. En la cuenta atrás", escribió la periodista en un story de Instagram este pasado jueves, 12 de septiembre. Sobre el diseño no han trascendido mayores detalles,...

title: [속보] “트럼프 암살시도 용의자, 58세 웨슬리 루스...체포 때 침착”
content: 15일(현지시간) 도널드 트럼프 전 대통령에게 총구를 겨눈 용의자가 하와이 출신의 라이언 웨슬리 루스(58세)라고 현지 언론이 전했다. 뉴욕타임스(NYT)는 이날 익명의 수사 당국 관계자를 인용, 플로리다주 소재 트럼프 전 대통령이 소유한 웨스트팜비치 소재 골프장에서 체포된 용의자의 신원에 대해 이같이 보도했다. NYT는 "이 관계자는 수사가 계속 진행 중이기 때문에 익명을 전제로 말했다"라고 전했다. 데일리메일은 마틴 카운티의 보안관 월리엄 D. 스나이더를 인용해 용의자가 체포됐을 당시에 침착하고, 감정 변화가 없었다고 전했다. 매체는 용의자가 비무장 상태로 붙잡혔으며, 그가 현장을 탈출할 때 두고 간 배낭과 고프로 카메라, AK-47 소총이 발견됐다고 보도했다. 용의자가 도주로로 택한 고속도로의 상당 부분을 폐쇄한 뒤 용의자가 탄 차를 안전하게 정차시켰다고 덧붙였다. 연방수사국(FBI) "암살 시도로 보이는 사건을 수사 중"이라고 밝혔으나 용의자의 이름을 밝히지 않은 상태다. [c 세계일보 & Segye.com, 무단전재 및 재배포 금지]

title: Australian actor Alexander ‘Lex’ Marinos dead at 75
creator: Georgie Kearney
content: Australian actor Alexander “Lex” Marinos has died at 75 following a 20-year battle with cancer. Marinos is best remembered for his role as Bruno Bertolucci on Channel 7’s hit sitcom Kingswood Country, which aired from 1980 to 1984. WATCH THE VIDEO ABOVE: Lex Marinos on Kingswood Country. Know the news with the 7NEWS app: Download today He also starred in the 2011 ABC miniseries The Slap, based on the bestselling novel. His family confirmed the news of his death in a brief statement to social media. “It is with heavy hearts we let you know that Lex passed away peacefully on Friday morning,” the statement read. “He died at home, surrounded by family and the sounds of Bob Dylan, with so much love in the room.” Born in Wagga Wagga, New South Wales and of Greek heritage, Marinos enjoyed a distinguished fifty-year career as an actor, writer, and TV director. His portrayal of the Italian son-in-law Bruno Bertolucci opposite Ross Higgins’ conservative Ted Bullpitt created many memorable moments on Kingwood Country and he quickly became a fan favourite. Marinos was diagnosed with leukemia in 2005 and managed the disease for 20 years. Despite his health challenges, he continued to work, with his final role appearing in a 2023 episode of NCIS: Sydney, alongside Olivia Swann and Todd Lasance. A passionate advocate for diversity in Australian television, Marinos took pride in breaking away from stereotypical roles. He once reflected on his role in Kingswood Country, telling...

title: Emmy Awards 2024: Complete list of nominations
content: Selena Gomez arrives at the 76th Primetime Emmy Awards on Sunday, Sept. 15, 2024, at the Peacock Theater in Los Angeles. (Photo by Richard Shotwell/Invision/AP) LOS ANGELES –“Shogun,” FX’s tale of 17th century Japan based on James Clavell’s novel, will enter tonight’s Emmy Awards already holding the record for most wins by a drama series in a single year, and it is widely expected to pad that mark, while the network’s “The Bear” could also eclipse a record for comedy series. The two shows were the top nominees heading into Emmy season, with “Shogun” collecting 25 overall nominations, and “The Bear” earning 23, the most ever received by a comedy series in a single season (besting the 2009 mark of 22 set by NBC’s “30 Rock”). Here is a complete list of nominations for the 76th Primetime Emmy Awards that will be presented tonight at the Peacock Theater in Los Angeles: Subscribe to our daily newsletter By providing an email address. I agree to the Terms of Use and acknowledge that I have read the Privacy Policy .
