title: Former superintendent to get $56K payout for unused vacation, sick time
creator: By ADAM DRAPCHO Laconia Daily Sun
content: LACONIA — Former Laconia Superintendent Steve Tucker, who abruptly resigned on Aug. 20, will receive one more paycheck from the school district — and it’ll be a big one. As a result of a unanimous vote taken in a special board meeting held Friday, the district will pay Tucker a total of $56,284.80 as compensation for accumulated vacation days and unused sick time. The motion was made by School Board Chair Jennifer Anderson, seconded by board member Nick Grenon, and approved by board members LaToya Beck, Laura Dunn, Karin Salome and Jennifer Ulrich without discussion. Tucker’s contract afforded him 30 vacation days each year, and permitted him to carry over unused paid time from previous years, up to a maximum of 60 days. He began the current contract year on July 1 with 60 days carried over, and the value of those, as well as the days he accumulated over the summer, amounted to $42,799.90. Tucker also built up a bank of 67.25 sick days. Per terms of his contract, the district pays out unused sick time at one-third value, which worked out to another $13,484.90. Tucker can thank Bob Champlin, former Laconia superintendent who agreed to serve as interim following the August resignation, for being able to realize the full value of his payout. Tucker’s contract states he may only resign without liability if he provides 90 days of notice — but his resignation letter was given to the board only a few hours before he left his post. However, according to both Champlin and Anderson,...

title: Obtiene Ella Bucio 2 títulos en Copas del Mundo de Parkour 2024
creator: Redacción/Quadratín Deportes
content: MORELIA, Mich., 15 de septiembre de 2024.- La seleccionada nacional Ella Bucio Dovali logró este domingo la medalla de bronce en la modalidad estilo libre femenil en el cierre de la Copa del Mundo de Parkour en Coímbra, Portugal, llevando la bandera tricolor al podio en el circuito situado a las orillas del río Mondego. De acuerdo a la Conade, la deportista de 27 años finalizó en el tercer lugar de la prueba con un total de 25.60 puntos, mientras que la estadounidense Audrey Johnson se quedó con la primera posición al sumar 27.90 unidades y la checa Adela Merkova obtuvo el segundo sitio con 27.80. Aunado a su medalla de bronce, Ella Bucio cerró la competición con un par de títulos que suma a su destacada trayectoria, luego de proclamarse como la mejor deportista femenil del año en las modalidades estilo libre y velocidad dentro del serial de Copas del Mundo de Parkour 2024. La nota completa en Conade

title: Giảm lãi, cơ cấu nợ, cho vay mới với khách hàng bị ảnh hưởng bão lũ
content: Giảm lãi suất cho vay từ 0,5 - 2%/năm Ngân hàng (NH) đầu tiên quyết định giảm lãi suất (LS) cho vay đối với khách hàng bị ảnh hưởng bão số 3 là VPBank với mức giảm từ 0,5 - 1% cho khách hàng cá nhân. Cụ thể, LS cho vay trung - dài hạn giảm 1%/năm và ngắn hạn giảm 0,5%/năm đối với khách hàng cá nhân triển khai từ ngày 13.9 đến hết 31.12.2024. Bên cạnh giảm LS cho vay, VPBank cũng điều chỉnh mức ưu đãi LS từ 6,5%/năm cố định 12 tháng đầu tiên cho toàn bộ khách hàng có nhu cầu vay trả nợ trước hạn tại NH khác hoặc vay mua bất động sản, vay xây dựng sửa chữa nhà. Tương tự, MSB thông báo giảm 1% LS vay đối với doanh nghiệp nhỏ, hộ kinh doanh chịu ảnh hưởng bão lũ, nhằm chung tay tháo gỡ khó khăn, khôi phục sản xuất kinh doanh sau bão. TPBank giảm tối đa 50% số tiền lãi hiện tại cho khách hàng cá nhân hiện hữu chịu ảnh hưởng bởi cơn bão Yagi ở các tỉnh thành phía bắc và giữ cố định mức LS giảm này đến muộn nhất ngày 31.1.2025. Ngân hàng đang triển khai các biện pháp giảm lãi vay, cho vay mới hỗ trợ khách hàng bị ảnh hưởng bởi bão lũ Ảnh: NGỌC THẮNG Trong khối NH thương mại có vốn nhà nước, Vietcombank công bố giảm LS vay 0,5%/năm cho gần 20.000 khách hàng cá nhân, doanh nghiệp bị ảnh hưởng bão Yagi từ...

title: Limonlu su bu xəstəliklərə səbəb ola bilər
content: Bir çox insanın gündəlik olaraq istifadə etdiyi limonlu suyun faydaları ilə yanaşı, zərərləridə var. Day.Az metbuat.az-a istinadən limonlu suyun zərərlərini təqdim edir: - Yüksək turşuluq səbəbindən diş sağlamlığınız zədələnə bilər. Zamanla diş minasında qıcıqlanmanı artıra bilər - Ac qarına limonlu su içmək mədə turşuluğunun artmasına səbəb olur. Reflüks, xoralar və qastrit kimi ciddi xəstəliklər yaranır - Çox limonlu su istehlak etmək ağız yaralarını artıra bilər - Migreni artırır.

title: 두 번의 암살 시도... '박빙' 美대선 영향 미칠까
content: 도널드 트럼프 전 미국 대통령을 겨냥한 2번째 암살 시도로 추정되는 사건이 발생하면서 약 50일 앞으로 다가온 미국 대통령 선거(11월5일)에 미칠 영향이 주목된다. 전현직 대통령 경호를 담당하는 미국 비밀경호국(SS)과 현지 경찰에 따르면 15일 오후(현지시간) 플로리다주 웨스트팜비치에 있는 트럼프 소유 '트럼프 인터내셔널 골프클럽' 인근에서 총격이 발생했다. 트럼프 대선 캠프의 스티븐 청 대변인은 성명에서 "트럼프 대통령은 그의 인근에서 총격이 있은 뒤로 안전하다"고 밝혔고, SS도 그의 안전을 확인했다. 앞서 7월 13일 트럼프 전 대통령이 펜실베이니아주 버틀러에서 유세 도중 명백한 암살시도였던 20세 외톨이 청년의 총격을 받고 귀를 다친지 2개월여만에 벌어진 사건이었다. 용의자는 일단 하와이 출신의 58세 남성으로 확인됐다 사건의 전모는 물론 범행 동기는 아직 밝혀지기 전이지만 사법당국은 일단 트럼프 전 대통령에 대한 또 한차례의 암살 시도 사건으로 규정하고 수사하고 있어 주목된다. 암살시도 사건으로 최종 규정된다면 단일 선거 시즌에 특정 후보를 겨냥한 두번째 암살 시도가 된다는 점에서 파장이 클 전망이다. 지난 7월 사건 당시 범인은 현장에서 대응 사격을 받고 사망했기에 구체적인 동기나 배경 등은 여전히 물음표로 남았다. 그러나 이번 사건의 경우 용의자가 체포됐다는 점에서 사건의 전모가 드러나면 파장은 더 클 수 있을 것으로 보인다. 암살 시도 동기와 배후 등이 앞으로 대선...

title: 황정민X정해인 추석 꽉 잡았네, '베테랑2' 개봉 3일 만에 209만 돌파 [공식]
Cristian Romero hits out at Tottenham with deleted social media post after Arsenal loss
creator: Ben Fleming
content: Cristian Romero claimed he was tired during Tottenham ’s defeat against Arsenal and blamed the club’s travel arrangments for the issue in a since-deleted social media post. Romero was partially to blame for Tottenham’s 1-0 home defeat to Mikel Arteta’s side when he was easily shrugged aside by Gabriel who rose highest to power home a second-half header. However, the Argentine seemingly believes that the club was also culpable for his disappointing display after they did not provide a private jet to return him from international duty. Unlike other clubs, Spurs do not often lay on private transport to bring players back quicker from international duty and instead leave it to the various national federations. However, Romero was seemingly not left happy by the decision and voiced his disapproval by sharing a post from Argentinine TV reporter Gaston Edul which said: ‘Tottenham lost to Arsenal again. They weren’t able to fight until the end because they weren’t across the details. ‘It was the only Premier League club that made their international players return, on their own and without proper logistics, on the decision of the club’s leadership. ‘They gave away the advantage because their players arrived with less rest than the others: Cuti Romero played with tiredness.’ To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a webbrowser that supports HTML5video Romero later deleted the repost before sharing his own message after the defeat. ‘It hurts to lose a...

title: Who is Andrei Iosivas? Meet Bengals WR and fantasy sleeper garnering praise for speed, route-running skills | Sporting News
creator: David Suggs
content: Speed kills in the NFL, and few players have as many accolades related to their velocity as Bengals wideout Andrei Iosivas. The 24-year-old WR entered the big leagues to little fanfare, having to wait until the sixth round to hear his name called in the 2023 NFL Draft. Through two years, he's fared pretty well, however. Iosivas has established himself as one of Joe Burrow's most effective targets in Cincinnati, providing a nice contrast to the likes of Ja'Marr Chase and Tee Higgins. A two-touchdown outing against the Chiefs in Week 2 was further evidence that Iosivas had arrived, even if his name hasn't yet graced marquees across the country. With that, here's what you need to know about Iosivas, one of the NFL's fastest players. MORE: Meet Chiefs OL named after Boyz II Men singer who caught touchdown pass vs. Bengals Who is Andrei Iosivas? The golden shores of Honolulu served as the perfect backdrop for Iosivas' burgeoning athletic career: the Punahou School alum starred for the Buff n' Blue, earning first-team all-conference honors on the gridiron while also lettering on the track and basketball teams. His hulking build — 6-3 and 200 pounds with legs cut from oak — certainly didn't hurt matters. Some film for the truthers cuz i know its hard to find stuff of me online. title: Se lleva a cabo la tradicional Carrera de la Libertad
content: Son 35 los corredores que participan en la tradicional Carrera de la Libertad, un evento que celebra su 72a edición como parte de los festejos patrios y que se celebra este 15 de septiembre. Se trata de la realización de un recorrido simbólico, que une a los pueblos de Querétaro y Dolores Hidalgo , busca mantener viva la memoria histórica de la lucha por la Independencia de México. Local Mantienen operativo para evitar venta y transportación de pirotecnia Durante el evento, encabezado por el secretario de Gobierno del Estado de Querétaro, Carlos Alberto Alcaraz Gutiérrez, se destacó la importancia histórica de la carrera, recordando que hace 214 años fue en Querétaro donde se descubrió la conspiración insurgente. "Ignacio Pérez Álvarez, siguiendo la encomienda de La Corregidora, Josefa Ortiz de Domínguez, llevó el mensaje que cambiaría la historia de México, alertando a los padres de la Patria, Miguel Hidalgo e Ignacio Allende", comentó el funcionario. La carrera, que ha trascendido tres generaciones, simboliza el hermanamiento entre Querétaro y Guanajuato, dos pueblos clave en la historia del México independiente. "Es un símbolo de la entrega patriótica que marcó el inicio de la lucha por la independencia, y que sigue inspirando a nuevas generaciones de mexicanos a luchar por la libertad y la democracia", expresó Alcaraz. El secretario subrayó que más allá de ser un evento deportivo, la Carrera de la Libertad representa los valores de...

title: Quinta Brunson Brings Big Bow Energy in Gorgeous Gown on 2024 Emmys Red Carpet
creator: People
content: Brunson is nominated for outstanding actress in a comedy series Frazer Harrison/Getty Quinta Brunson gets an A-plus for her look. The comedian arrived at the Sept. 15 awards show in a chic gown showing off her glam style. Brunson wore a shiny black strapless Georges Chakra FW24 couture that flared out at her knee into a dramatic train that would feel right at home on the dance floor. The bodice of the dress was accented by two big bows for a little extra pizzazz. Brunson wore her hair slicked back and rocked vampy glam to keep the look evening-ready. And while the look debuted with opera gloves on the runway, she went without for the Emmys, which allowed her to showcase plenty of Tiffany & Co. jewels. Frazer Harrison/Getty Brunson's past Emmys ensembles have included a magenta pink Dior Gown and bronze Dolce & Gabbana design that accomplished her goal of wanting to look like a This year, Brunson — who's earned nine nominations and since 2022 — is recognized in three categories: outstanding lead actress in a comedy series, outstanding writing for a comedy series and outstanding comedy series, all for Brunson, who plays Janine Teagues, has been starring in, executive producing and writing for the teacher-inspired series, which she also created, since it debuted in 2021. will be back for a fourth season on Oct. 9 and Brunson told PEOPLE this month that fans can expect " " At the 2023 Emmys in January, the star made a stylish mark at the event in a pink crushed satin Dior dress...

title: Alba Díaz ha encontrado las botas altas y de caña ancha que llevaba tiempo buscando
content: Cada temporada otoño-invierno se presenta el mismo dilema: encontrar las botas perfectas con las que lucir cualquier estilismo en estos próximos meses. Una tarea que se complica para muchas chicas que, al tener el gemelo ancho, no pueden llevar este tipo de prendas y tienen que conformarse con botines. Alba Díaz (24 años) siempre utiliza sus redes sociales para mostrarse comprometida con las causas sociales y dar su opinión de temas que afectan a muchas mujeres. Hace meses denunció la dificultad para encontrar botas altas, pero parece que por fin se ha hecho con un modelo ideal. "Llevo botas altas y tengo que decir que me entra el gemelo . ¡Olé!", ha escrito en sus stories. Además, ha querido compartir todos los detalles de esta nueva adquisición para que muchas más chicas puedan hacerse con este modelo antes de que se agote en tienda. Una publicación compartida de ALBA (@albadiazmartin) Se trata de unas botas que pertenecen a la nueva colección de Zara y que prometen ser un must este invierno. En concreto, ha optado por el modelo Bota caña ancha piel. Así lo definen en su página web: "Zapato tipo bota con tacón fino. Detalle de cierre con botón en la parte trasera. Caña ancha y acabado en punta redonda". Además, cuenta con una altura del tacón de 7,5 centímetros . Tiene un precio de 119 euros y se encuentra disponible tanto en tienda como en su página web desde la talla 35 hasta la 42 , aunque algunas de estas ya empiezan a estar agotadas después de...

title: "트럼프 암살시도 용의자는 하와이 출신 58세 남성"
Стрельба у гольф-клуба в США произошла на расстоянии менее 500 метров от Трампа
content: На расстоянии не более 500 метров от кандидата в президенты США произошла стрельба у гольф-клуба в штате Флорида. Об этом рассказал шериф округа Палм-Бич . Он уточнил, что подозреваемый прятался в кустах на расстоянии от 270 до 450 метров от места, где Трамп играл в гольф. Сразу после выстрелов территорию гольф-клуба оцепили. Шериф добавил, что подозреваемый прятался в кустах. В дальнейшем на его месте обнаружили автомат AK-47 с оптическим прицелом, два рюкзака с керамическими пластинами и экшен-камеру. Как передавало , Дональд Трамп подтвердил инцидент со стрельбой в гольф-клубе. Он заявил, что не пострадал и находится в безопасности. Политик подчеркнул, что его и он никогда не сдаётся. Также Трамп выразил благодарность своим сторонникам за поддержку. По данным телеканала CNN, стрельбу рядом с гольф-клубом, где был Трамп, устроил один человек, целью которого являлся политик. Подозреваемого задержали. В заявлении офиса шерифа округа Мартин отмечалось, что автомобиль его остановили недалеко от места стрельбы. В Федеральном бюро расследований инцидент назвали покушения.

title: Edo 2024: Group absolves police officer over alleged illegal arrests
412 state quota seats left before second round of med counselling
creator: Hemanta Pradhan
content: Bhubaneswar: After the first round of medical counselling for MBBS and BDS courses , only 412 out of 1,863 state quota seats are left for the second round. Counselling for the second round will be completed by Sept 27. The Medical Counselling Committee (MCC) under the Ministry of Health and Family Welfare is responsible for conducting online counselling for 15 per cent of All India Quota (AIQ) seats for undergraduate (UG) courses. In Odisha, the remaining 85 per cent of medical seats offered by state-run medical colleges will be managed by the Odisha Joint Entrance Examination ( OJEE ) under the skill development and technical education department. Odisha has 12 govt medical colleges, one state-run dental college, three private medical colleges, and one private dental college, with a total of 1,950 MBBS seats and 163 BDS seats. OJEE is conducting medical counselling for 1,709 MBBS seats and 154 BDS seats. In the first round, 1,451 MBBS and BDS seats were filled. OJEE authorities have issued a notice for choice filling and locking for the second round of medical counselling, which will open at midnight on Monday. We also published the following articles recently 412 out of 1863 UG seats left after first round medical counselling After completing the first round of medical counselling for MBBS/BDS courses in Odisha, only 412 out of 1863 state quota seats remain available for the second round. The Medical Counselling Committee is responsible for managing 15 percent of all India...

title: Partai Perindo: Ridwan Kamil-Suswono Mengidentifikasi Masalah Begitu Detail
content: - Ketua Bidang Media Massa DPP Partai Perindo Sylviana Pravita menghadiri Rapat Konsolidasi Pertama Tim Pemenangan Ridwan Kamil-Suswono (RIDO). Rapat itu turut dihadiri langsung oleh Bakal Pasangan Calon Gubernur-Wakil Gubernur Jakarta dan Suswono. Dalam rapat itu, Sylviana menyebut Ridwan Kamil (RK) memaparkan visi-misinya secara detail. Visi misi itu direncanakan akan membuat Jakarta menjadi kota yang baru dan maju. "Pasangan RK dan Suswono mengidentifikasi masalah-masalah dan dalam visi misi beliau itu sampai ada 65 halaman yang di dalamnya betul-betul detail bagaimana Jakarta menjadi kota yang baru dan maju," kata Sylviana di Kantor DPD Partai Golkar, Cikini, Minggu (15/9/2024). Dalam rapat yang sama, kata dia, RK juga memberikan motivasi sekaligus tata cara bagaimana tim pemenangan bergerak. Hal itu terutama menyampaikan gagasan dan program kepada masyarakat Jakarta. "Disampaikan kepada kader partai-partai, 15 partai pendukung dan kemudian dari sisi kawan-kawan yang memang bertugas menyosialisasikan bagaimana visi dan misi mereka," ucap dia. Perindo memastikan akan mengerahkan segala dukungan untuk memenangkan RK dan Suswono pada Pilkada 2024. Sylviana juga memastikan bahwa mesin partai politik sudah bergerak. "Harapan untuk pasangan RK-Suswono kita betul-betul berharap bahwa pasangan ini adalah yang terbaik bagi Jakarta global, bahwa tata kota menjadi suatu hal yang penting dalam solusi mengatasi dari kemacetan ibu kota, itu sangat menarik," pungkasnya.

title: Rekor Spesial Mikel Arteta setelah Arsenal Kalahkan Tottenham, Arsene Wenger Mah Lewat
content: Kemenangan atas Hotspur di pekan keempat pada Minggu (15/9/2024) menghadirkan satu rekor spesial bagi . Arsenal menang 0-1 saat bermain di kandang Spurs, di Hotspurs Stadium lewat gol semata wayang dari Gabriel. Ketidakhadiran Martin Odegaard dan Declan Rice di lini tengah ternyata bukan menjadi masalah besar bagi Arteta. Meski sedikit kalah dalam penguasaan bola, kejelian memanfaatkan peluang yang ada akhirnya bisa membuat mereka menang. Spesialnya dari hasil ini adalah itu menjadi kemenangan tandang ketiga saat melawan Spurs dalam tiga musim terakhir di . Ya, selalu menang saat bertandang ke Hotspurs Stadium tiga kali beruntun. Catatan itu cukup langka karena sudah lama tidak pernah diulangi sejak 36 tahun silam atau terakhir kali pada 1988. Lebih spesialnya lagi, seperti dikutip dari Opta, tiga kemenangan terbaru Arsenal di kandang Spurs ini terjadi ketika The Gunners dipimpin satu orang saja, tak lain adalah Mikel Arteta. Sebelum Arteta, belum ada pelatih yang bisa mengukir catatan tiga kemenangan beruntun di kandang Spurs ini. Sekelas pun tidak pernah meraih tiga kemenangan beruntun di kandang Spurs. Di bawah kepemimpinan Arteta, bak menjadikan kandang Spurs bak taman bermain dan tak ada kesan angker lagi di Hotspurs Stadium. Adapun dua pertemuan sebelumnya di kandang Spurs, berakhir dengan skor 0-2 pada musim 2022/2023. Pasukan meriam London menang setelah Hugo Loris bunuh diri dan satu gol dari Odegaard. Lalu, pada musim 2023/2024, menang dengan skor 2-3 setelah...

title: Vicky Martín Berrocal confirma cuál va a ser una de las tonalidades que va a arrasar esta temporada
content: Vicky Martín Berrocal (51 años) ha demostrado ser una inspiración para todas las mujeres. Desde hace ya varias temporadas, la diseñadora es una estrella de las redes sociales gracias a su estilo personal y las propuestas que comparte cada semana en su perfil de Instagram. Su firma de moda, Victoria Colección, se ha convertido en una de las favoritas para muchas mujeres gracias a sus diseños de invitada diferentes y elegantes . Ya se han conocido las nuevas prendas de esta temporada de otoño que está a punto de empezar y lo ha hecho por todo lo alto. Para un evento celebrado esta semana, la madre de Alba Díaz ha estrenado una de estas propuestas que confirma cuál va a ser uno de las tonalidades que vienen para quedarse y que van a ser un must en cada armario. Una publicación compartida de Vicky Martín Berrocal (@vickymartinberrocal) Vicky Martín Berrocal ha escogido un dos piezas que es perfecto para las citas de estos próximos meses. En concreto, ha optado por el modelo Timbu . Para la parte de arriba, se ha decantado por un kaftán de crepé con manga raglan larga, cruzado en el cuerpo con cuello subido de tafeta que cierra con una gran lazada sobre el hombro. Tiene un precio de 299 euros y está disponible desde la talla 36 hasta la 46 . Destaca por la tonalidad berenjena. Para el pantalón ha optado por el modelo a juego que es de tiro alto en crepé con cinturilla en tafeta. Tiene un precio de 195 euros y está disponible desde la 36 hasta la 46 . Ambas...

title: 'People think I don't care about set-pieces' - Ange
creator: George Sessions
content: Ange Postecoglou has dismissed a narrative that he "doesn't care about set-pieces" after his Tottenham side were beaten 1-0 by rivals Arsenal. As in last season's home derby, Spurs were undone by a set-piece on Sunday as Arsenal claimed three successive derby wins at Tottenham for the first time since 1988. The result left Spurs with just one win from four matches so far this season under former Socceroos boss Postecoglou. Spurs had started strongly with Dejan Kulusevski denied by David Raya before Dominic Solanke sent a header wide. Arsenal also had moments on the break with Gabriel Martinelli squandering a good opening not long after Kai Havertz had a header saved by Guglielmo Vicario. The second period followed a similar pattern initially with a Solanke header deflected wide and Micky van de Ven able to test Raya, but Tottenham's set-piece kryptonite hurt them just after the hour. After Saka saw a shot blocked by Pedro Porro, his in-swinging delivery from a corner found Gabriel, who brushed past Cristian Romero to head home what proved the winner in the 64th minute. "I know for some reason people think I don't care about set-pieces and it's a narrative that you can keep going on for ages and ages," Postecoglou said. "We work on them all the time, like we do for every other team. "You know that they're a threat. As I said, for the most part, we handled them really well today, but we switched off for one and we paid a price and you learn from that and you move on. "It's my...

title: '어휴 X신' 기안84, 썸女가 허리 잡자 '도망'..유태오에 로맨스 뺏겼다 ('음악일주')[종합]
creator: 정유나 기자
content: [스포츠조선닷컴 정유나 기자] 기안84, 빠니보틀, 유태오가 텍사스에서 잊지 못할 여행의 한 페이지를 장식했다. 어제(15일) 방송된 MBC 예능 프로그램 '태어난 김에 음악일주(연출 김지우, 이하 '음악일주')' 5회에서는 기안84의 핑크빛 만남부터 유태오의 로망이었던 카우보이의 리얼한 삶까지 다채로운 텍사스 에피소드가 펼쳐졌다. 텍사스에서 빠니보틀, 유태오와 재회한 기안84는 카우보이들이 있는 바에서 정겨운 현지 분위기에 빠져들었다. 기안84는 텍사스에 온 걸 환영하는 의미의 웰컴주를 건네받고 사람들과 스몰 토크도 나누더니 브루클린 쿠퍼 패밀리의 블록 파티 때처럼 어머니뻘인 현지인과 함께 춤을 추며 한국어로 응원과 격려의 메시지를 전해 눈길을 끌었다. '음악일주'를 '로맨스일주'로 뒤바꾼 기안84와 독일에서 여행 온 여성의 썸 기류가 흥미를 더했다. 특히 유태오가 중간에서 큐피트 역할을 톡톡히 해낸 덕분에 기안84는 여성과 이야기를 나누고 함께 춤을 추자고 제안해 몰입을 높였다. 손을 잡으라는 빠니보틀의 코칭을 받아 쑥스러움을 감수하고 용기를 낸 기안84는 영화 '여인의 향기'에서 탱고를 췄던 알 파치노처럼 잠시 조선의 알 파치노로 변신했다. 그러나 극도의 부끄러움을 견디지 못하고 밖으로 뛰쳐나갔고 스튜디오에서 자신의 답답한 모습을 다시 본 기안84는 "꺼져 어휴 병X"이라고 셀프욕을 날려 폭소를 자아냈다. 이후 기안84가 다시 들어왔지만, 갑자기 사라진 기안84를 대신해 유태오가 여성과 춤을 추고 있었다. 다음 날, 이른...

title: Guy Evans’ Book Beyond Nitro Set For November Release
creator: Jeremy Thomas
content: Guy Evans’ latest book is titled Beyond Nitro: Untold Stories from the WCW Era and is set for release in November. GuyEvansBooks.com sent along the following press release noting that the new book will release on November 29th. The book is available for pre-order here . New WCW book solves nWo logo mystery, tells story of Dusty Rhodes in the world of motorsports + much more! After several years of development, Guy Evans’ long-awaited follow-up book to NITRO is set for release on 11/29. Famously, Evans’ original book provided the inspiration for the recent Who Killed WCW series on VICE TV, and in his new book – Beyond Nitro: Untold Stories from the WCW era – he returns with an array of incredible untold stories, engrossing personal profiles, and detailed reflections on the enduring legacy of WCW. Always engaging – and frequently revelatory – the stories featured in Beyond Nitro are interspersed with additional chapters on a wide variety of incisive subjects, including the importance of WCW to fans in the South, the ‘dream match’ that never was, and a look at wrestling nostalgia in its contemporary form. Some of the questions answered in Beyond Nitro include: * Who REALLY designed the iconic nWo logo? * How did a teenage WWF fan get on WCW payroll? * What (or who) is the unlikely thread connecting WCW...and the CIA??? * How did Dusty Rhodes – at the height of the Monday Night Wars, no less – become an announcer for...*checks notes* swamp buggy racing in Florida? * What was the...

title: Premios Emmy 2024: la lista completa con todos los ganadores
creator: Jorge Álvarez
es
content: El de Los Ángeles se convertirá este domingo el epicentro mundial del entretenimiento con la celebración de los . Con las series , con 25 nominaciones, y también de , con 23 candidaturas, parten como las grandes favoritas de una noche en la que las estrellas de la pequeña pantalla brillarán como nunca, tanto en la alfombra roja como en la recogida de premios. Además de las dos grandes favoritas, que hace una semana arrasaron el entrega de los premios técnicos, en la noche de los Premios Emmy 2024 también se escucharán los títulos de otras series y películas de televisión. , de Disney completa el podio de las tres ficciones con más nominaciones, acumula 21 candidaturas, a las que se suma la miniserie , de , con 19 opciones. Esta edición promete una noche repleta de emoción, con una de las competiciones más reñidas que se recuerdan en los últimos años. La ceremonia de los Premios Emmy 2024 arrancará a la 1:00 de la madrugada en España, donde se podrá ver a través de Movistar+, que emite la señal que distribuye la cadena estadounidense ABC. A continuación, te presentamos la lista completa de los nominados en las categorías principales de los Premios Emmy. A medida que vayan saliendo el nombre de los ganadores, lo resaltaremos en negrita.

title: Конгрессвумен Грин: покушавшийся на Трампа был одержим конфликтом на Украине
creator: RT на русском
content: Конгрессвумен Марджори Тейлор Грин заявила, что предполагаемый подозреваемый в покушении на на экс-президента США Дональда Трампа Райан Уэсли Раут был «одержим» конфликтом на Украине. По словам политика, Трамп неоднократно заявлял, что положит конец вооружённому конфликту на Украине. «Человека, который пытался убить его сегодня, зовут Райан Уэсли Раут. Люди публикуют эти фотографии. Это тот самый потенциальный убийца? Если это так, то он одержим войной на Украине, которая финансируется США», — написала Грин в соцсети Х. При этом конгрессвумен опубликовала скриншоты со страницы Раута в соцсети, на одном из которых он позирует на главной киевской площади Независимости. 15 сентября на Трампа совершили ещё одну попытку покушения. Позже New York Post сообщили, что предполагаемым подозреваемым в покушении на Трампа является 58-летний Райан Уэсли Раут.

title: Kirby pitches 7 strong innings and Garver homers in 3 to lift Mariners over Rangers 7-0
content: SEATTLE -- George Kirby faced the minimum number of batters and gave up one hit in seven sparkling innings, and the Seattle Mariners shut out the Texas Rangers 7-0 to earn a series victory and keep pace in the AL West and wild-card races. Mitch Garver hit a three-run home run against his former team in the first inning and Randy Arozarena added a solo shot in the seventh. The homers helped Seattle remain four games behind the Astros in the AL West with 12 games to play. They face Houston to finish a six-game road trip next weekend. The Mariners also remained 2.5 games behind the Minnesota Twins in the AL wild-card race. Kirby (12-11) was not overpowering, notching the first of three strikeouts in the fifth inning. But he was dominant, inducing 11 groundouts and giving up one hit, a single to Ezequiel Duran in the second. The Mariners wiped it away with a double play. Kirby also had his own back, participating in four putouts, including completing the day’s most oddball play in the fourth inning. Josh Smith hit what appeared to be a routine grounder to Justin Turner at first base. But the ball bounced off Turner’s glove and ricocheted directly to second baseman Dylan Moore standing about 10 yards away. Moore quickly threw to Kirby, who made a feet-first leap to get the force out at first. It was Kirby’s sixth consecutive win over the Rangers. He’s 6-0 in eight starts over his three-year career with 41 strikeouts and five walks, and pushed his career ERA against the AL West...

title: Rohtak News: रेलवे का बुकिंग कार्यालय होगा शिफ्ट
Malik Willis Outduels Anthony Richardson in Packers Win
creator: Jacob Brockhoff
content: During the Green Bay Packers' Week 1 loss, they lost their starting quarterback, Jordan Love, to an injury. As a result, Green Bay had to turn to their backup, Malik Willis, to face Anthony Richardson and the Indianapolis Colts on Sunday. Despite joining the Packers just a few weeks ago, Willis managed to outduel Richardson and lead the Packers to a win. In Week 1, the Green Bay Packers lost a close affair to the Philadelphia Eagles . Perhaps even more devastating than the loss was the fact that their young, promising quarterback Jordan Love went down with an injury late in the game. That would cause him to miss their matchup in Week 2 against the Indianapolis Colts . As a result, Green Bay turned to their backup, Malik Willis . With Willis making his first start with his new team, the Packers seemed to have a tough game ahead of them, especially since they had to face Anthony Richardson . Richardson, one of the younger, brighter prospects in the game, made some electric plays in the Colts' Week 1 loss to the Houston Texans . However, despite joining the Packers just weeks ago , Willis managed to lead his team past the Colts, and grab Green Bay's first win of the 2024 season. The Green Bay Packers made NFL history on Sunday with their 16-10 win over the Colts. How Did Willis Outduel Richardson? This was a game that featured a lot of defense, and not a ton of offense. Green Bay got the ball first, and Willis led a pretty solid opening drive, which eventually resulted in a...

title: 2 Nuapada women hurt in bear attack
content: Bhubaneswar: Two women sustained injuries on Sunday after a bear attacked them while they were attending to nature’s call near Kotribahal village in Nuapada district. The injured women, Jini Bhoe, 45, and Chaumani Ketki, 44, were admitted to the district headquarters hospital. Their condition is reported to be stable. Ajiz Khan, the divisional forest officer (DFO) for the Khariar territorial division, said that there is a provision for a Rs 5,000 compensation for bear attack injuries that result in less than seven days of hospitalisation. “Bears keep straying into the area where the incident took place since it is close to the sanctuary,” said Ajiz. The DFO added that the bear seems to have retreated back into the forest. “However, we are using drones equipped with thermal cameras to monitor the area for any further bear activity near human settlements,” he added. TNN We also published the following articles recently Black bear attacks in Himachal Pradesh's Chamba raise concerns; Forest Department launch awareness campaign A fatal black bear attack on a woman in Chamba and several sightings in Dalhousie have heightened concerns about human-bear interactions. The Forest Department has initiated an awareness campaign, urging people to travel in groups and use firecrackers to deter bears from approaching human habitats, aiming to prevent further incidents. title: ‘True Detective: Night Country’ Showrunner Issa López Is Still Obsessed with Season 1 and Its Sense of a ‘Darker World Beneath the Surface’
creator: Indiewire
content: Much of the ongoing appeal of “True Detective” can be attributed to the show’s elasticity. introduces new characters and settings, and the writers brought in to oversee it have had the creative freedom to put their own stamp on the franchise. “True Detective: Night Country” was a perfect example, as showrunner Issa López was able to put a shot of adrenaline into the series with her , which is nominated for 19 Emmys tonight. But while the fourth season earned high marks for its originality, López maintains that she owes a great creative debt to Nic Pizzolatto’s original season. Speaking to IndieWire on the red carpet of the 76th Primetime Emmy Awards, López heaped praise on Pizzolatto and explained that she hopes her upcoming Season 5 will be another extension of his creative legacy. “The most important thing for me is, number one, understanding why that show was so powerful,” López said. “People can’t forget it. Me, myself, can’t forget it. It created a feeling that there is a darker world beneath the surface of our everyday world. And I wanted to tap into that. So my whole message was, this is happening in the same world. The events that happened in the first season happened in the world of my ‘True Detective.’ It’s a continuation of the atmosphere and the feelings and the themes that were explored in the first season. That’s what I want to do with the next one.” López confirmed that her work on Season 5 has forced her to put her film career on the back burner, but she...

title: 消息称华为 Sound X4 音箱新增悦动白色,没有帝瓦雷
content: IT之家 9 月 16 日消息,博主 @看山的叔叔 昨日发文爆料,华为 Sound X4 音箱拥有 2 种配色,跟 Sound X 2021 基本一样, 新增悦动白色 ,保留韵律黑色。音箱 没有帝瓦雷 , 但有华为悦彰 。 博主还在评论区中针对网友的问题进行解答:针对配置升级、迭代方面,博主称“ 没了帝瓦雷,敞开生产 ”;关于售价方面,博主称“ 估计一样 ”,预计与前代起售价相似。 IT之家此前报道, 华为还未发布的新品 包括华为路由 BE7 系列、nova 13 系列手机等。新品详情如下: 广告声明:文内含有的对外跳转链接(包括不限于超链接、二维码、口令等形式),用于传递更多信息,节省甄选时间,结果仅供参考,IT之家所有文章均包含本声明。

title: El primer Grito de Independencia se efectuó en Huichapan
creator: Redacción
content: El estado de Hidalgo se erige como un pilar de la historia nacional, especialmente en el municipio de Huichapan, donde ocurrió uno de los acontecimientos más trascendentales de México: el primer Grito de Independencia. Este municipio fue el escenario de la primera conmemoración de la Independencia de México en 1812, una tradición que ha perdurado y que se conmemora en todo el país. En Huichapan, específicamente en El Chapitel, una casona de dos plantas con un balcón que da a la plaza principal del pueblo, se reunieron Ignacio López Rayón y Andrés Quintana Roo para dar el primer Grito de Independencia. Hoy en día, El Chapitel es un museo que alberga pinturas, objetos y documentos significativos, entre ellos una réplica de la campana de Dolores, atrayendo a cientos de visitantes y turistas de toda la república mexicana. Puedes leer: ¡No te pierdas el Grito en Plaza Juárez! Conoce el programa completo Este lugar es uno de los complejos más visitados de la Red Estatal de Museos, no solo por su valor histórico, sino también por su ubicación en un Pueblo Mágico. Reconocido a nivel nacional como la «Segunda Cuna de la Independencia», un título otorgado por Benito Juárez, Huichapan sigue siendo un destino esencial para quienes desean revivir la historia de México. Las actividades en Huichapan no se limitan a la historia. Los visitantes también pueden disfrutar de su rica gastronomía, adquirir artesanías y recorrer las impresionantes construcciones...

title: Will look into rly division demand: Bittu
content: Bhagalpur: Minister of state for railways, Ravneet Singh Bittu , on Sunday assured to look into the long-pending demands for establishment of railways division in Bhagalpur and running of long-distance trains from the “silk city”. Talking to mediapersons at Bhagalpur railway station, Bittu said, “I will look into the past proposals related to setting up of railways division at Bhagalpur. I will discuss with the railways officials about introduction of Amrit Bharat express train, a low-cost superfast train, that connect cities with more than 800km or take more than ten hours from Bhagalpur.” He further said that additional coaches in the existing long-distance trains from Bhagalpur to Delhi would also be added. Besides, length of the platforms at Bhagalpur railway station would be increased, and other infrastructures under the redevelopment scheme would be improved, he said. Meanwhile, the Railways officials inspected the ongoing work at Bhagalpur railway station premises on Sunday. The demand for a separate railways division in Bhagalpur has growing louder since the establishment of Eastern Railways in 1952. Whereas railways division in Malda (West Bengal), under which Bhagalpur railway station comes, was created in 1984. It has been alleged that Malda division was created by overlooking the criterion fulfilled by Bhagalpur railway station, the highest revenue earner for Malda railways division and third major railway station after Howrah. Source said then railways minister,...

title: షార్ట్‌-టర్మ్‌ ఆరోగ్య బీమా
creator: bharath kumar
content: షార్ట్‌-టర్మ్‌ ఆరోగ్య బీమా తాత్కాలిక కవరేజీని కల్పిస్తుంది. దీన్నే టర్మ్‌ మెడికల్‌ ఇన్సూరెన్స్‌ అని కూడా పిలుస్తారు. సాధారణంగా ఇది కొద్ది నెలల నుంచి ఏడాదిదాకే ఉంటుం ది. ఎవరైతే స్టాండర్డ్‌ హెల్త్‌ ఇన్సూరెన్స్‌ పాలసీలతో వచ్చే దీర్ఘకాలిక ఆరోగ్య బీమాలు కాకుండా తక్షణ కవరేజీలను కోరుకుంటారో వారినుద్దేశించినదే ఈ పాలసీ. సమగ్ర కవరేజీని కొనలేనివారికి కూడా ఇది ఉపయుక్తంగా ఉంటుంది. కంపెనీల్లో గ్రూప్‌ ఇన్సూరెన్స్‌ కోసం వేచిచూస్తున్న ఉద్యోగులు, నిరుద్యోగులకు దీని అవసరం ఎక్కువని చెప్పవచ్చు. షార్ట్‌-టర్మ్‌ హెల్త్‌ ఇన్సూరెన్స్‌లు తక్షణ అవసరాలకే పనికొస్తాయి. కాబట్టి లాంగ్‌-టర్మ్‌ హెల్త్‌ ఇన్సూరెన్స్‌లకే ప్రాధాన్యం ఇవ్వాలి. అప్పుడే దీర్ఘకాలిక ఆరోగ్య ప్రయోజనాలను పొందుతాం. ప్రీమియంలు ఎక్కువైనప్పటికీ క్లెయిములు లేకపోతే కవరేజీలు పెరిగే ప్రయోజనం ఉంటుంది. మెటర్నిటీ, మెంటల్‌ హెల్త్‌ తదితర అవసరాలు, సమస్యలకూ స్టాండర్డ్‌ హెల్త్‌ ఇన్సూరెన్స్‌లే లాభదాయకం అని స్పష్టంగా చెప్పవచ్చు. అందుకే సమగ్ర ప్యాకేజీని తీసుకోవడం మరువద్దు.

title: La obra para abrir una senda de acceso al Guggenheim de Urdaibai arrancará en otoño
creator: Josu García
content: Necesitas ser para acceder a esta funcionalidad. Lunes, 16 de septiembre 2024, 01:18 Necesitas ser para acceder a esta funcionalidad. Opciones para compartir Copiar enlace WhatsApp Facebook X (antes Twitter) LinkedIn Telegram Threads El Gobierno vasco empezará a construir este otoño una senda peatonal muy cerca de los astilleros de Murueta, el emplazamiento donde se aspira a levantar una de las dos sedes en Urdaibai del museo Guggenheim. Apenas serán 370 metros de recorrido, pero el proyecto tiene gran importancia porque este camino se habilitará sobre la propia marisma y supone el primer eslabón de un posible acceso al futuro equipamiento, avanzando en la idea de que una pista para viandantes conecte Gernika y el centro cultural. El proyecto, que el Ejecutivo autonómico no ha vinculado en ningún momento al Guggenheim, tiene también una marcada trascendencia simbólica, ya que los grupos ecologistas y sociales que se oponen la han encajado como la «primera agresión a la Reserva de la Biosfera» ya sobre el terreno. El plan se va a llevar adelante pese a que contó en su momento con el rechazo frontal de la Diputación, lo que generó tensión entre ambas instituciones. Hace tres años, la administración vizcaína advirtió de que la senda podría provocar graves consecuencias en el entorno, en especial sobre algunas especies que están en peligro de extinción, como el pez espinoso o el visón europeo. La Diputación dice apoyar ahora el proyecto porque, asegura, ha...

title: Стала известна личность подозреваемого в покушении на Трампа
creator: Мария Чернышова
content: Райан Уэсли Раут является подозреваемым во втором покушении на кандидата на должность президента США Дональда Трампа. Об этом со ссылкой на источники в правоохранительных органах пишет Fox News. «Подозреваемый во втором покушении на бывшего президента Дональда Трампа был идентифицирован как Райан Уэсли Раут. Он находился в 300-500 ярдах (275-460 метров — при URA.RU) от Трампа», — пишет Fox News. Раут, предположительно, был вооружен штурмовой винтовкой. Он смог просунуть дуло пистолета сквозь сетчатую ограду за пределами международного гольф-клуба, когда Трамп играл там на пятой лунке в воскресенье днем. Секретная служба заметила Раута и открыла огонь, говорится в статье издания. Рауту удалось вырваться, но позже власти смогли его арестовать. У Раута при себе были найдены два рюкзака и камера GoPro. Винтовку нашли в кустах за пределами поля для гольфа. Это второе покушение на жизнь Трампа за два месяца. Стрельба произошла, когда Трамп покидал гольф-клуб в Уэст-Палм-Бич. Агенты секретной службы заметили у подозрительного мужчины предмет, похожий на оружие, и открыли по нему огонь. Позже Дональд трамп подтвердил факт стрельбы рядом с ним. Он заявил, что не получил травм . Сохрани номер URA.RU - сообщи новость первым! Подписка на URA.RU в Telegram - удобный способ быть в курсе важных новостей! title: Cụ bà qua đời để lại tài sản 5 tỷ đồng cho con rể, các con ruột không được xu nào: Biết được lý do mọi người còn gật gù ủng hộ
content: Câu chuyện của một gia đình ở Trung Quốc đến nay vẫn nhận được nhiều sự quan tâm và sự đồng cảm khi được đăng tải trên trang tin Sohu. Người con rể bị gọi là “kẻ ăn bám nhà vợ” Chồng tôi sinh ra trong một gia đình nghèo khó, bố mẹ lần lượt qua đời từ sớm, anh là con cả nên phải quán xuyến hết mọi việc trong gia đình, kiếm tiền nuôi các em. Còn tôi sinh ra trong một gia đình trí thức, khá giả, bố mẹ đều là giáo sư đại học. Sau thời gian yêu đương và quyết định đi đến hôn nhân, tôi đưa anh về gặp gia đình mình nhưng bị bố mẹ kịch liệt phản đối. Trước sự kiên quyết của tôi, bố mẹ cũng đồng ý cho cả hai kết hôn, nhưng yêu cầu chồng tôi phải ở rể, vì sợ tôi về nhà chồng sẽ vất vả. Suốt thời gian sống ở nhà tôi, mặc dù có công việc đầu bếp và chăm chỉ làm việc, chồng tôi vẫn thường phải chịu những lời nói gièm pha là “ăn bám nhà vợ” từ những người họ hàng hay hàng xóm. Thời gian đầu,cả bố mẹ và các anh chị em của tôi đều đối xử với chồng tôi rất lạnh nhạt, cũng thường yêu cầu anh phải giúp đỡ cả những việc vặt trong gia đình. Nhưng lâu dần, sự chịu thương chịu khó và thật thà của chồng tôi đã cảm hóa được mọi người. Bố bắt đầu ngồi uống trà và nói...

title: Khi diễn viên bị 'vạ lây' vì vai diễn
content: Ghét nhân vật, "ném đá" luôn diễn viên Trong nhiều phim truyền hình Việt, nhân vật bị "ghét cay ghét đắng" thường là vai phản diện. Nhưng mới đây vai nữ chính do Thu Hà Ceri đóng trong Đi giữa trời rực rỡ đang phát sóng cũng bị khán giả công kích. Điều đáng nói là từ vai diễn, họ lăng mạ sang nữ diễn viên và cả người thân, gia đình cô, đến mức cô phải viết tâm thư trên trang cá nhân mong khán giả thôi dùng những lời lẽ khiếm nhã với cô cùng người thân. Nữ diễn viên người Tày cho biết có một bộ phận khán giả đã lập nick ảo rồi để tên, hình ảnh người thân, bạn trai của cô để đăng những phát ngôn tiêu cực, thậm chí nhiều người còn ghép cả những video sai thực tế để thóa mạ. "Nhiều khán giả quá khích đã tấn công, lăng mạ, sỉ nhục cả những người thân yêu của tôi bằng lời lẽ khiếm nhã đến mức tôi không thể im lặng, phải lên tiếng bảo vệ họ", Thu Hà bức xúc chia sẻ. Nữ chính Thu Hà Ceri trong phim Đi giữa trời rực rỡ Ảnh: Chụp màn hình Thực tế khi mạng xã hội bùng nổ, thông qua trang cá nhân của diễn viên và các trang fanpage của phim, khán giả dễ dàng tương tác, tiếp cận, giao lưu với nghệ sĩ. Vì vậy họ cũng có thể bày tỏ cảm xúc dành cho nhân vật, nội dung của bộ phim,...

title: William Byron gets jammed in Brad Keselowski's window in chaotic Watkins Glen finale
creator: Jeremy Goldstein
content: Two drivers in the NASCAR Cup Series playoff picture found themselves in an awkward jam late in Sunday's thrilling Go Bowling at the Glen race at the famous Watkins Glen International Course. William Byron , the 2023 winner at the Glen, was angling with Joey Logano for position. Logano gently nicked Brad Kaselowski 's car right in front of him, causing him to veer directly into Byron's path. Byron tried to gingerly avoid Logano while also dealing with the Glen's signature S-curves. Logano managed to turn away and avoid the fracas but Kaselowski could not. NASCAR Watkins Glen result in full as favorite facing playoff exit Denny Hamlin put into wall to leave NASCAR playoff hopes hanging by thread Byron, with nowhere to go, bounced up onto Kaselowski's car. As Kaselowski attempted to become unstuck, Byron was temporarily lodged between Kaselowski and the wall. Ryan Blaney, Denny Hamlin, Kyle Busch, and others all had incidents in a wild race overall, opening the door for the unheralded Chris Buescher to snag the victory. Buescher fought off a brave effort from Shane Van Gisbergen to earn the sixth race of his NASCAR Cup Series career. He finished outside the playoff picture this season. For Byron, the crash was not great for his cup standings. He entered the day in fifth and although his 34th-place showing at the Glen won't help, Byron has likely done enough to advance in the top-12 to the next round of the playoffs. The crash will certainly have a bigger impact on Keselowski's...

creator: Natalia Vitela
content: Pasajeros del Aeropuerto Internacional de la Ciudad de México (AICM) consideran que son incómodos, injustos e inseguros los puntos establecidos para abordar taxis por aplicación.

title: Hasil Liga Italia Serie A Monza vs Inter Milan: Denzel Dumfries Selamatkan Nerazzurri dari Kekalahan
content: Inter Milan harus puas bermain imbang 1-1 saat mengunjungi markas Monza di Stadion Brianteo dalam pekan keempat Liga Italia 2024/2025 pada Senin (16/9/2024) dini hari WIB. Kedua tim bermain alot, dengan gol pembuka baru tercipta pada menit 81 lewat aksi penggawa tuan rumah, Dany Mota. Inter lantas menghindarkan diri dari kekalahan setelah Denzel Dumfries mencetak angka penyeimbang 7 menit berselang. Dengan hasil ini, Nerazzurri bertengger di peringkat 2 klasemen sementara Liga Italia. Klub besutan Simone Inzaghi mengumpulkan 8 poin dari 4 pertandingan, tertinggal 1 angka dari Napoli di puncak klasemen. Advertisement Sementara itu Monza harus puas menduduki urutan 15 dengan torehan 3 poin dari 4 laga. Mereka belum sekali pun memetik kemenangan di Serie A musim ini, dengan capaian terbaiknya hanyalah bermain imbang 3 kali, sementara 1 pertandingan berujung kekalahan. Menilik jalannya laga , kedua tim sejatinya langsung beradu serang di awal paruh pertama. Peluang didapat Nerazzurri lewat Dimaro usai melakukan di luar kotak penalti, tetapi tembakannya masih belum tepat sasaran. langsung membalas lewat aksi Maldini semenit berselang. Keuntungan bagi tim tamu lantaran bola mamp dimentahkan oleh Sommer. Ancaman kembali diberikan , kali ini lewat Lautaro Martinez pada menit ke-14. Sayangnya, lagi-lagi menjadi problem, dengan tandukan pemain internasional Argentina masih tidak Beberapa peluang sempat tercipta lagi hingga mendekati turun minum. title: এ পর্যন্ত ৭ জেলের মৃতদেহ উদ্ধার, এখনও নিখোঁজ ২০
creator: Swarup
content: কক্সবাজার সমুদ্র উপকূলে মাছ ধরার ট্রলারডুবির ঘটনায় নিখোঁজ আরও এক জেলের মরদেহ ভেসে এসেছে। গতকাল রোরবার সকালে কক্সবাজার শহরের পশ্চিম কুতুবদিয়া পাড়া সমুদ্র উপকূলে এই মরদেহটি ভেসে আসে। নিহত জেলে ইউনুছ মাঝি ( ৭২ ) কক্সবাজার শহরের উত্তর নুইন্নাছড়া ঠুইট্টাপাড়া এলাকার শামীম আহমদ কালামনুর মালিকানাধীন এফবি লতিফ ফিশিং ট্রলারের মাঝি। নিহত জেলের বাড়িও একই এলাকায়। গত শুক্রবার সকালে দূর্যোগপূর্ণ আবহাওয়ার কারণে বঙ্গোপসাগরের কক্সবাজার উপকুলে ৮টি ট্রলারডুবির ঘটনা ঘটে। এরমধ্যে শহরের নুইন্নাছড়া এলাকার ৩টি , ইনানীর ২টি এবং বাঁশখালীর ৩টি ফিশিং বোট রয়েছে। এ ঘটনায় নিখোঁজ জেলেদের মধ্যে গত শুক্র ও শনিবার সমুদ্রসৈকতের বিভিন্ন পয়েন্টে ৬ জেলের মরদেহ ভেসে আসে। সর্বশেষ গতকাল রোববার সকালে কক্সবাজার শহরের পশ্চিম কুতুবদিয়া পাড়া সমুদ্র উপকূলে ভেসে আসে জেলে ইউনুছ মাঝির মরদেহ। জেলা ফিশিং বোট মালিক সমিতির সাংগঠনিক সম্পাদক মাস্টার মোস্তাক আহমদ জানান , খবর পেয়ে পুলিশ মরদেহটি উদ্ধার করে কক্সবাজার সদর হাসপাতাল মর্গে নিয়ে যায়। পরে স্বজনদের কাছে মরদেহটি হস্তান্তর করা হলে গতকাল রোববার সন্ধ্যায় নামাজে জানাযা শেষে কক্সবাজার শহরের উত্তর নুইন্নাছড়া ঠুইট্টাপাড়া কবরস্থানে দাফন করা হয়। এ ট্রলারডুবির ঘটনায় এখন পর্যন্ত ৭ জেলের মৃতদেহ উদ্ধার হলেও এখনও ২০ জেলে নিখোঁজ রয়েছে বলে জানান তিনি।

title: Silencio cómplice
creator: Dario_Arregoces
content: Se llamaba Eudaldo Díaz y su pecado fue tomar parte en un Consejo Comunitario. Muy acostumbrado para la época, en el que como alcalde del municipio El Roble, ubicado al occidente del departamento de Sucre, se dio a la tarea de denunciar actos de corrupción, manifestando con micrófono en mano, que primero lo suspendieron, luego lo destituyeron y después acabarían con su vida, como en efecto así ocurrió. Era un aciago abril del año 2003, cuando en Corozal (Sucre), el presidente de Colombia y el señor Salvador Arana, por aquel entonces gobernador de Sucre, sentados en la mesa principal escucharon atentamente la voz del alcalde Díaz, anunciando su muerte. Este hecho victimizante serviría de preámbulo a otro no menos trascendental ocurrido el 24 de julio de 2004 , cuando el jefe paramilitar Salvatore Mancuso se dirige al Congreso de la República en un discurso que procuró, a toda costa, justificar “sus acciones terroristas” en medio del conflicto. Dos hechos siniestros, que enlutaron la democracia y que nos debe llevar a reflexionar sobre el papel que jugaron los medios tradicionales frente a un anunciado asesinato, y un discurso que declaraba oficialmente “que el fin justifica los medios” . Pero los medios tradicionales de entonces, callaron, o mejor, guardaron un silencio cómplice, porque según ellos: era lo políticamente correcto. El compromiso de un periodista debe ser siempre con la verdad, la independencia y la responsabilidad social, enseña Javier Darío...

title: Bác sĩ bán siêu xe lấy 3 tỷ đồng ủng hộ đồng bào bị lũ lụt
content: Ngày 15/9, mạng xã hội xôn xao thông tin một bác sĩ ở thành phố Hồ Chí Minh cùng vợ quyết định bán chiếc siêu xe Porsche Macan mua năm 2023 với giá 3 tỷ ủng hộ đồng bào bị lũ lụt ở Tây Bắc. Người được nhắc đến trong câu chuyện gây xôn xao mạng xã hội là bác sĩ Ngọc Trung hiện đang công tác tại một bệnh viện tại Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh. Trên trang facebook cá nhân của mình, bác sĩ Trung viết: , dòng trạng thái của bác sĩ Trung viết. Tiếp đó, bác sĩ Trung nói rằng, mơ ước của anh là sau này không để dành gì cho con hết và được lên núi ở cùng nội dung giới thiệu về chiếc xe Porsche Macan mua năm 2023. Xe đc bảo hành 5 năm và rất ít đi, thường xuyên để ở hầm. Cuối dòng trạng thái, bác sĩ Trung khẳng định chiếc siêu xe đã được bán, thêm được 3 tỷ ủng hộ cho việc học tập của các cháu và hứa sẽ sao kê đầy đủ và làm việc có trách nhiệm nhất! Mọi việc sẽ có kế hoạch rõ ràng. Tối 15/9, xác nhận thông tin này với Báo Công Thương, bác sĩ Trung xác nhận đăng thông tin trên trang cá nhân vào sáng cùng ngày. Theo bác sĩ Trung, trong đợt thiên tai mà miền Bắc phải hứng chịu, anh đã ủng hộ khoảng 500 triệu đồng cho các đơn vị mua thuyền, áo phao, thuốc men cho bà con vùng lũ. title: Donald Trump targeted in second assassination attempt as he played golf
creator: The Telegraph
content: Donald Trump was the target of by a gunman armed with an assault-style rifle, the FBI have said. The former president was rushed to safety while golfing after a Secret Service agent spotted a rifle barrel sticking out of a fence at his golf course in West Palm Beach, Florida, on Sunday. The , who was equipped with an AK-47 rifle with a scope, two backpacks and a GoPro camera, said Ric Bradshaw, the Palm Beach County Sheriff. Trump was as few as 300 yard of him at the time, Mr Bradhsaw said. “With a rifle and a scope, that’s not a long distance,” he added. The suspect was identified last night as 58-year-old Ryan Wesley Routh by multiple US media outlets. Mr Bradshaw said it appeared . On being engaged at around 1.30pm local time, he dropped the items and was observed by an eyewitness fleeing in a black Nissan. A suspect, a white male in his 50s, was later detained on a motorway and identified as the same man by the eyewitness, Mr Bradshaw said. Last night the FBI said it was “investigating what appears to be an attempted assassination of former President Trump”. If confirmed, it would be the second time in just over two months that an attempt has been made on the life of the Republican 2024 candidate, after he was shot at a rally in Pennsylvania. The incident is likely to raise major questions about the under-fire secret service tasked with protecting him. Mr Bradshaw, the local sheriff, admitted last night that Trump’s golf course had security vulnerabilities owing to the...

title: Khu vực Bắc Bộ và Thủ đô Hà Nội có mưa dông, nguy cơ ngập lụt đô thị
content: Theo Trung tâm Dự báo Khí tượng Thủy văn Quốc gia, sáng sớm 16/9, một vùng mây đối lưu đã phát triển và gây mưa cho khu vực Ba Vì, Chương Mỹ, Quốc Oai, Đan Phượng, Đông Anh, Hoàng Mai, Mỹ Đức, Mê Linh, Phúc Thọ, Quốc Oai, thị xã Sơn Tây, Thạch Thất, Thanh Trì, Thường Tín. Vùng mây này đang di chuyển và mở rộng sang khu vực nội thành thành phố Hà Nội gây mưa dông mạnh, khả năng kèm lốc, sét và gió giật mạnh; ngập lụt vùng trũng khu vực đô thị. Cảnh báo độ rủi ro thiên tai do lốc, sét, mưa đá cấp 1. Cũng theo dự báo của Trung tâm, từ sáng sớm 16 đến đêm 17/9, khu vực Tây Nguyên và Nam Bộ có mưa vừa, mưa to và dông, cục bộ có nơi mưa rất to với lượng mưa phổ biến 40-80mm, cục bộ có nơi trên 150mm; thời gian mưa tập trung vào chiều và đêm. Ngoài ra, trong ngày và đêm 16/9, khu vực Trung và Nam Trung Bộ có mưa rào và rải rác có dông, cục bộ có nơi mưa to đến rất to với lượng mưa từ 15-30mm, cục bộ có nơi trên 90mm; mưa tập trung vào chiều và đêm. Khu vực Bắc Bộ và Thanh Hóa có mưa rào và dông rải rác, cục bộ có nơi mưa to với lượng mưa từ 15-30mm, cục bộ có nơi trên 80mm; trong mưa dông có khả năng xảy ra lốc, sét và gió giật mạnh. Cảnh báo, ngày và đêm 18/9, khu vực Tây Nguyên và Nam Bộ...

title: 식스맨상 이어 대표팀도 발탁된 DB 박인웅 “확실한 내 자리 만들어보고 싶다”
content: 2023~2024시즌 정규리그 식스맨상에 이어 남자 농구대표팀에도 발탁된 DB 박인웅은 조금 더 높은 곳을 바라보며 기량 발전에 힘쓰고 있다. 사진제공|원주 DB (function(){var s="365863",w="760px",h="150px",a=document.createElement("script");a.src='https://native.mediacategory.com/servlet/adNative?from='+escape(location.href.replace(location.hash,""))+'&s='+s+'&service=cntb&product=w&width='+encodeURI(w)+'&height='+encodeURI(h);a.type="text/javascript";document.getElementsByTagName("head").item(0).appendChild(a)})(); 원주 DB 포워드 박인웅(24)에게 2024년은 잊지 못할 한 해다. 2023~2024시즌 정규리그 시상식에서 식스맨상을 받았다. 올 여름엔 생애 처음으로 남자 농구대표팀에도 승선했다. 프로에 데뷔한 2022~2023시즌 부상으로 정규리그 33경기 평균 16분여 출전에 그친 그는 지난 시즌엔 식스맨으로 알토란같은 활약을 펼쳐 DB의 정규리그 우승에 힘을 보탰다. 박인웅은 다가올 10월 개막하는 2024~2025시즌을 더 중요하게 생각하고 있다. 자신의 농구를 한 단계 레벨-업 하느냐, 아니면 지금처럼 식스맨에 그치느냐를 결정할 시즌이라고 판단하고 발전을 위해 애를 쓰고 있다. 장기인 3점포 이외에 볼 핸들링과 2대2 공격 등 다양한 옵션을 장착하려 힘썼다. 팀의 야전사령관인 가드 이선 알바노에게 쏠리는 부담을 조금이나마 덜어주고 싶기도 했다. 하지만 팀 소집 이후 국내 훈련과 일본 전지훈련 초반까지는 경기력이 좋지 않았다. 그는 15일 B2리그 나라 밤시셔스와...

title: 米菓の新しい食感を切り開いた「新潟の星」が拡大 ミニパック投入して売場を広げ認知度上昇中 越後製菓(食品新聞)
content: 現在JavaScriptが無効になっています Yahoo!ニュースのすべての機能を利用するためには、JavaScriptの設定を有効にしてください。 JavaScriptの設定を変更する方法はこちら 9/16(月) 8:17 配信 「新潟の星」の「甘から」「青のりしょうゆ」 越後製菓が「ふんわり名人」に続く定番商品にすべく注力している米菓「新潟の星」の売場が拡大している。 今春に従来の80gに加えて40gのミニパックを発売したところ、新たにコンビニに導入されたほか、スーパー・量販店・ドラッグストアのレジ横やエンド両側のサイドネット売場を獲得。売場拡大に伴い認知度も上昇している。 「新潟の星」は、構想30年という歳月を経て2022年11月にテスト販売された。 その後、その後、店舗で様々なアンケート調査を実施するなどして消費者の声に耳を傾け、大きさや風味を見直し23年9月から「甘から」「青のりしょうゆ」の2品を発売している。 2品の特徴について「形を少し大きくするなど磨きをかけて米菓の新しい食感を切り拓いたと自負している。最初は歯ごたえがあるのだが、口の中に入れるとほぼ噛まなくても溶けるのが特徴」と星野一郎会長は胸を張る。 2品とも原料にこだわり、米は新潟県産米のみを使用している。「気持ちとしては、新潟ではなく新潟米(にいがたまい)の星だと位置づけている」と述べる。 一番の訴求ポイントは、口どけのおいしさ。 「後引く旨さと食べやすい大きさで、口の中に放り込みやすく、舌でつぶすだけでスッと溶けていく」と説明する 溶けやすさは「ふんわり名人」に次ぐ。「ふんわり名人」は口の中ですぐに溶け、「新潟の星」は口の中に入れて5秒くらいで溶けるという。 星形の形状も特徴。 大柿麻由営業本部係長は「かわいらしい見た目からSNSとの相性もよく、お客様の反応をダイレクトに感じている。今後も商品の認知拡大ならびに販売促進に注力していきたい」と意欲をのぞかせる。 【厚生年金・国民年金】10月15日に「約46万円」と「約67万円」が支給される夫婦の違いとは? 道路にある「謎のカメラ」は“スピード違反取締り”だけじゃない! 「罰金30万円級」の違反車両を見つける「重大な役割」に反響集まる! ついに“億超え”!? 日本車を代表するスーパーカー レクサス「LFA」が海外オークションに登場 走行距離5700km!極上モノの落札価格とは 久しぶりに実家に帰ると父親が「待てど暮らせど年金が払われない」と。聞いてみたら年金の請求をしていなかった!これまでの年金はどうなる? 日産「“2列6人乗り”ワゴン」がスゴイ! “全長4.3m”級&斬新「前列3人座れる」シート採用! メーカー初の機能もある「ティーノ」とは? 《上皇さまが支払われた相続税は約4億3000万円》宮内庁侍従に筋金入りの「資産運用のプロ」が着任 「皇室の相続」という難題に取り組む 誰がなぜ?北陸新幹線「米原ルート」再燃の震源地 小浜・京都ルート2025年度末着工は課題山積 日本で最高評価の「断熱窓」は海外では「違法レベルの低性能」という驚愕の事実 年金月20万円で生活費を賄い、70代両親が大事にとっておいた「退職金2,000万円」...じわじわ削り取る、我が子を失い豹変した「40歳一人娘の大暴走」【FPの助言】 国交省と警察庁が50ccと同じ税金額を要望!...

creator: Infobae Noticias

title: Победа "Динамо", ничья "Спартака" и дебют Дзюбы в "Акроне". Итоги игрового дня РПЛ
content: МАХАЧКАЛА, 16 сентября. /ТАСС/. Программа восьмого тура Мир - Российской премьер-лиги (РПЛ) завершилась в воскресенье тремя матчами. В этот день московский "Спартак" на выезде сыграл вничью с махачкалинским "Динамо", столичное "Динамо" вырвало победу у грозненского "Ахмата", а тольяттинский "Акрон" разгромил подмосковные "Химки". Завершала тур встреча "Спартака" и махачкалинского "Динамо", которые сыграли вничью со счетом 1:1. Перед игрой в пресс-службе махачкалинского клуба сообщили, что на матч против красно-белых, который проходил на "Анжи-Арене", проданы все билеты. Игру также посетил чемпион Абсолютного бойцовского чемпионата (UFC) Ислам Махачев, который нанес символический удар перед началом встречи. "Спартак" начал очень активно, гости контролировали игру и вскоре после созданных моментов открыли счет. На 20-й минуте произошел заброс в штрафную хозяев, Хесус Медина скинул мяч в центр, откуда его в ворота переправил нападающий Манфред Угальде. После отстранения и ухода Александра Соболева в "Зенит" 22-летний форвард стал основной атакующей силой "Спартака", для него этот мяч стал пятым в восьми матчах в чемпионате России. После забитого гола "Спартак" немного успокоился и отдал инициативу. "Динамо" создавало моменты, но они не представляли опасности для голкипера гостей Александра Максименко. А на 36-й минуте махачкалинцы сравняли счет благодаря автоголу Руслана Литвинова. Красно-белые пропустили первый мяч в РПЛ с 28 июля, тогда команда Деяна...

title: Detroit police chief after Sunday shootings: 'Tailgating, drinking and guns, they don't mix'
creator: USA TODAY Sports
content: Detroit police confirmed two people were shot, one killed and another in critical condition, following a fight in Eastern Market near Ford Field on Sunday evening. Detroit Police Chief James White said officers arrested a man from the Oakland County suburb of Oak Park, Michigan, who is in his 30s and is licensed to carry a gun. Eastern Market is a popular tailgate destination for fans. Hundreds flock to the market during game days. On Sunday, the hosted the at 1 p.m. local time. “Tailgating, drinking, and guns. They don’t mix,” White said. White said a fight between two men escalated about 4:30 p.m. at one of the buildings known as Shed 6 at the outdoor market. They put up hands in preparation to fight when the suspect pulled out a gun and fired at least two rounds, White said. The man the suspect was fighting — a Detroit man in his 40s — was killed. Another Detroiter, a man in his 20s, was shot and was hospitalized in critical condition. Nearby officers directing outbound traffic from the Lions game responded to the shooting, arrested the suspect, and recovered two guns, White said. On the scene, White was troubled by what he described as a lack of conflict resolution. “It shouldn’t have led to this,” he said.

title: ‘Plan devpt work keeping in mind population growth’
content: Jaipur: Urban development and housing (UDH) minister Jhabar Singh Kharra told officals at a review meeting on Sunday that all development and maintenance work should be done keeping in mind population growth for the next two to three decades. The minister said videography should be done while sewerage cleaning for transparency in the process. Kharra instructed officials to pay special attention to the quick repair of all roads and sewerage lines damaged by rain. “Many engineers were given the responsibility to check the quality of the roads, but they are not taking this work seriously. All such officers should discharge their duties carefully and vigilantly and pay special attention to the problem of waterlogging,” said the minister. He also gave directions to conduct surprise inspections of Awasan Mandal and Pratap Nagar’s IAS colony, as well as other colonies, and submit a deficiency and quality report. “The tax paid by the common man should not be wasted and should be used in a better way for their benefit. Road repair and sewerage cleaning work should be done with excellent planning. First, work on the main roads of the cities should be completed and then the construction and repair of roads inside the colonies should be done,” he said. He instructed that special care be taken of sewerage and drainage lines during road repair and maintenance work. At places where construction of sewerage-drainage lines is going on, it should be completed first and then the repair of road...

title: Trump golf club shooting: what we know so far about apparent assassination attempt
creator: The Guardian
content: after US Secret Service agents opened fire when they spotted a person with a firearm at the Trump international golf course west of Palm Beach, where the former president’s Mar-a-Lago resort home is located. Law enforcement officials said the gunman was in some bushes near the property line of the golf course when Secret Service agents, who were clearing holes ahead of where Trump was playing, spotted a rifle barrel in the bushes. . The gunman then dropped his rifle, two backpacks and other items and fled in a black Nissan car. A witness, the sheriff said, saw the gunman and managed to take photos of his car and license plate. In a press conference, Palm Beach County Sheriff Ric Bradshaw said a male suspect had been detained by authorities. According to Bradshaw, the suspect was relatively calm. The gunman was spotted about 300 to 500 yards from where Trump was playing, Secret Service officials said. The FBI and other law enforcement officials said the suspect had a scope on an AK47 rifle, and a GoPro camera with which he apparently intended to record footage and two backpacks with ceramic tiles in it. , three law enforcement officials told the Associated Press. Fox news and CNN also reported the same name, citing law enforcement sources. Authorities have not publicly identified the suspect. The Guardian has not confirmed this independently. He added, “Nothing will slow me down. I will NEVER SURRENDER!”. Trump was injured in an assassination attempt in Pennsylvania on 13...

title: スーパーの菓子を食べたことがない重役夫人が養護施設で味わった「不幸のどん底」と100歳で達した無欲の境地(プレジデントオンライン)
content: 現在JavaScriptが無効になっています Yahoo!ニュースのすべての機能を利用するためには、JavaScriptの設定を有効にしてください。 JavaScriptの設定を変更する方法はこちら 9/16(月) 8:17 配信 出所=『100歳は世界をどう見ているのか』(ポプラ新書) 長生きできても生活のランクが落ちたり介護施設に入ったりしたくないという考えがある。心理学者の権藤恭之さんは「100歳以上の高齢者に会って話を聞くと、幸福感を得るためには、あるがままの状態を受け入れることが大事だとわかる。ある100歳の女性は、かつてはぜいたくな暮らしをしていたが、現在は月3000円のおこづかいで満足していると語った」という――。 【画像】「100歳になると優しくしてもらえることが一番」と語った女性も ※写真はイメージです ※本稿は権藤恭之『100歳は世界をどう見ているのか』(ポプラ新書)の一部を再編集したものです。■会社の重役の妻としてぜいたくに暮らしてきた100歳の女性 2007年に大阪大学に移ってきて共同研究者たちと百寿者の話をまとめる機会がありました。そして幸福感の内実について、要素を抽出しました(図表1)。すると「前向きな気持ちで生きる」とか「制限の中で生きる」、あるいは「他者との良い関係性を築く」ことで「人生の充足感を感じる」ことがわかりました。 幸福感の中身はさまざまですが、その中で一番大事なのは「あるがままの状態を受け入れること」だと私は考えています。 100歳の女性Fさんを紹介しましょう。この人は旦那さんが会社の重役か何かをしていてわりあい贅沢な生活をしていました。いつも京都にお茶を飲みに行っていたと話されましたが、お茶といってもきちんと点てたお茶です。そういう生活だったので、スーパーでプラスティックのパックに入っている和菓子を見ると、「どなたがお食べになるのかしら」と思っていたそうです。 その後、家族が体調を崩し、自分は施設に入ることになりました。最初の何カ月間は泣いて暮らしていたそうで、「自分は不幸のどん底や」と思っていたそうです。ところがある時、施設でその「どなたがお食べになるのかしら」と思っていたパックの和菓子が出されて、ちょっと食べてみようと口に入れたら「あら美味(おい)しい」と驚いたことを話してくれました。■食べたことのないスーパーの和菓子をおいしいと思うように そういう経験が重なって、私がお会いした時には非常に幸せに施設で生活していました。Fさんが自分から語ったのが毎月のお小遣いのことです。昔は贅沢をしていたが、今は月に3000円をお小遣いとしてもらっている。それで新聞広告を見て、いい本があると1カ月に1冊か2冊、1000円台のあまり高くない本を買うのが楽しくなったと。「以前は何でも手当たり次第に買っとったけれど、自由に買えなくなって、自分でああでもないこうでもないって考えて買うことがものすごい楽しみなんです」というのです。 私たちも美味しいものを食べたり楽しい経験をしたりしますが、Fさんのような話を聞くと、楽しみ方もさまざまだと感じます。最近は「アクティブ」という言葉をシニア世代に当てはめることが多いですが、活動的ではないけれど、頭の中で考えたり想像したり、いろいろな楽しみがあるのだなあと思うのです。 1 / 4ページ...

title: Twins-Guardians series preview: Radio-TV information, injury report, key statistics
content: Four-game series at Progressive Field All games on BSN, 830-AM and 102.9-FM Monday, 5:40 p.m.: RHP Pablo López (15-8, 3.88 ERA) vs. LHP Matt Boyd (2-1, 2.18) Tuesday, 5:40 p.m.: RHP Zebby Matthews (1-3, 7.11) vs. RHP Gavin Williams (3-9, 5.23) Wednesday, 5:40 p.m.: RHP Bailey Ober (12-7. 3.90) vs. RHP Tanner Bibee (11-8, 3.60) Thursday, 12:10 p.m.: RHP Simeon Woods Richardson (5-5, 4.08) vs. LHP Joey Cantillo (2-3, 4.99) Twins update: The Twins (79-70) begin their final road trip of the regular season with four games at AL Central-leading Cleveland. The Guardians have already won the season series, going 7-2 vs. the Twins, and lead the defending division champions by 61⁄2 games. The Guardians won the first five meetings before the teams split a four-game series at Target Field last month. The Twins are 26-13 vs. the rest of the AL Central. ... The Twins finished a 3-3 homestand with Sunday’s 9-2 victory over Cincinnati and are 6-8 in September. ... The Twins, who are 37-37 on the road this season, close out the road trip with three games in Boston, one of their pursuers for the final AL wild card; the Red Sox are 41⁄2 games back, with Detroit and Seattle 21⁄2 behind. Cleveland update: The Guardians (86-64) have the AL’s best home record at 45-27 after a 2-0 victory over Tampa Bay on Sunday. ... RHP Emmanuel Clase leads the majors with 45 saves, including five vs. the Twins. His 22 career saves vs. the Twins are his most against any opponent. ... Jose Ramirez (107) and Josh...

title: Willie Mays’ words at Cepeda’s celebration of life put a ribbon on emotional year for SF Giants
creator: Evan Webeck
content: SAN FRANCISCO — The words of Willie Mays graced the shores of McCovey Cove one last time Sunday afternoon. In a fitting ribbon on an emotional year for the Giants organization, that saw the death of two lions of the game within two weeks of each other, Mays’ prepared remarks headlined the hourlong celebration of life for his former teammate, Orlando Cepeda, who died just 10 days after Mays this summer. The ceremony preceded the Giants’ series finale against the Padres, a 4-3 loss in 10 innings, and would have delighted Cepeda with a live band, dancers and dozens of his closest friends and family in addition to a slate of speakers that included fellow Hall of Famers Tony Oliva and Juan Marichal. Oliva, a Twins legend hailing from Cuba, told the story of meeting Cepeda for the first time as a rookie at an exhibition game in New York in 1963 and said, “From that moment Orlando Cepeda never forgot me.” Marichal, his teammate in San Francisco from 1960-66, added, “Orlando wasn’t just a tremendous athlete, he was a beacon of generosity and kindness. His love was infectious, his wisdom profound and his loyalty unwavering.” But the most powerful — and least expected — moment of the afternoon was Mays’ message from the afterlife, delivered by emcee Mike Krukow. Before his death, Mays got word of Cepeda’s deteriorating health and wanted to make sure he had a chance to honor his friend, even if he couldn’t be there. “How do you say goodbye to a little brother?” Mays’ letter read, in...

title: Delays on Departure Plaza, Mascot after man struck by minibus outside Sydney Airport
creator: Rhiannon Lewin
content: A pedestrian has been injured when he was struck by a minibus outside Sydney Airport. The man, aged 75, was hit before 6.40am on Monday along Departure Plaza in Mascot, outside the airport, police said. Paramedics treated the man before he was taken to St George Hospital. Know the news with the 7NEWS app: Download today He is believed to be in a serious but stable condition. The minibus driver has been taken to Mascot Police Station, where he is assisting with inquiries. A crime scene has been established. One lane along Departure Place is closed, and major traffic delays are being experienced. Travellers are urged to allow extra travel time in the area. More to come ...

title: The Latest: Trump safe after gunshots reported, Biden and Harris have been briefed
creator: AP
content: Gunshots were reported in Donald Trump's vicinity Sunday afternoon. The former president is safe . U.S. Secret Service agents opened fire after seeing a person with a firearm near Trump’s West Palm Beach golf club in Florida while the Republican presidential candidate was golfing. No injuries were reported. Officials say the person fled in an SUV and was later apprehended by local law enforcement. It was not immediately clear whether the reported shots were targeted at Trump. The U.S. Secret Service said it was investigating and that the incident occurred shortly before 2 p.m. “The former president is safe,” according to the Secret Service. Roughly two months ago, Trump was shot during an assassination attempt at a rally in Pennsylvania, and a bullet grazed his ear. Here is the Latest: Fox News host Sean Hannity, a close Trump friend, said on air that he spoke with both Trump and the former president’s golf partner, Steve Witkoff, after the incident. They told Hannity that they had been on the fifth hole and were about to go to up to putt when they heard a “pop pop, pop pop.” Within seconds, he said Witkoff recounted, Secret Service agents “pounced on” Trump and “covered him” to protect him. In the aftermath, Trump checked in with allies, including his vice presidential nominee, JD Vance, South Carolina Sen. Lindsey Graham and several Fox News hosts. It was not immediately clear whether the incident would affect Trump's campaign schedule. On Monday night, he was set to speak...

"We love sharing the beauty of our country with Aussie travellers and the scenic landscapes and picturesque beaches of Queensland are no exception." title: 'No regrets': Farmer Wants a Wife star confirms split after wedding rumours
creator: Anna Houlahan
content: Farmer Wants a Wife star Andrew Coleman has announced the end of his relationship less than a week after his ex-fiance Claire Saunders . or signup to continue reading The Narromine-based couple met during season 13 of the popular reality show and exited earlier than planned after declaring their love. Mr Coleman said "despite all the love and effort we both gave, sometimes things just don't work out", in a candid post to Instagram on September 16. "Living together brought its own challenges, and we realised our paths weren't meant to stay intertwined. It's sad the relationship ended but I stand tall knowing we gave it our all," he said. The couple were engaged in March 2024 but to work in the Northern Territory during the dry season. "I'm not sure what else to say other than, sometimes life is hard and we all just need a little breathing space. There will be no farming content from me for the foreseeable future," she said in July. On September 7 Ms Saunders made saying he had followed her to her mother's home in Tasmania and taken her car back to mainland Australia while she slept. She later walked back the claims saying that she "never felt unsafe and the post was worded completely wrong". Fans were surprised on September 11 when Ms Saunders posted photos of wedding cake decorations, featuring herself and the Narromine sheep farmer surrounded by their dogs, to social media. The pictures were captioned "our cake topper arrived today". But, despite the suggestion of a...

"I'm not sure what else to say other than, sometimes life is hard and we all just need a little breathing space. There will be no farming content from me for the foreseeable future," she said in July. On September 7 Ms Saunders made saying he had followed her to her mother's home in Tasmania and taken her car back to mainland Australia while she slept. She later walked back the claims saying that she "never felt unsafe and the post was worded completely wrong". Fans were surprised on September 11 when Ms Saunders posted photos of wedding cake decorations, featuring herself and the Narromine sheep farmer surrounded by their dogs, to social media. The pictures were captioned "our cake topper arrived today". But, despite the suggestion of a...

知事が変わるだけでリニアはこんなに進むのか...川勝知事退任で結論を180度変えた「御用学者」の無節操(プレジデントオンライン)
content: 現在JavaScriptが無効になっています Yahoo!ニュースのすべての機能を利用するためには、JavaScriptの設定を有効にしてください。 JavaScriptの設定を変更する方法はこちら 9/16(月) 8:17 配信 JR東海が試験しているリニアモーターカー。一般の人を乗せて走る時の最高速度は時速500キロの予定です=2020年10月、山梨県都留市の山梨リニア実験センター - 写真提供=共同通信社 「リニア妨害」の川勝知事が退任してから、静岡工区のリニア問題はどれほど進んでいるのか。ジャーナリストの小林一哉さんは「懸念の一つだった残土置き場問題がまたしてもあっさり解決した。知事が変わるだけでこれまでの議論が覆される会議の存在意義を疑う」という――。 【写真】深層崩壊が懸念されるとしたツバクロ残土置き場計画地 ■リニアの「未解決事案」がまたひとつ解決 川勝平太・前静岡県知事の「リニア妨害」の象徴のひとつだった「トンネル工事の残土置き場問題」について、静岡県は9月6日に開いた地質構造・水資源専門部会で、これまでの姿勢を一変させて、従来の計画をそのまま容認した。 JR東海は、リニア南アルプストンネル静岡工区工事で発生する土砂を約370万立方メートルと見込んでいる。 そのうちの97%、約360万立法メートルの発生土を処理する大規模な「ツバクロ残土置き場」はトンネル工事現場近く、大井川左岸に面した燕沢(つばくろさわ)上流付近に建設される。 残土置き場が決まらなければリニアトンネル工事に入ることはできないため、JR東海は、2018年夏から始まった地質構造・水資源専門部会で、燕沢付近の崩壊対策などを詳しく説明してきた。 構造物の排水、安全性・耐震性、背後地山・周辺地形の確認、深層崩壊の確認、施行管理、維持管理、異常時対応などに問題がないことを具体的に示した。 さらに過去の論文等を基に燕沢付近での深層崩壊の可能性が非常に低いことも説明している。■専門部会は結局「政治」に左右される ところが、川勝知事は2022年夏になって突然、「深層崩壊について検討されていない。熱海土石流災害を踏まえても極めて不適切だ」などと横槍を入れて、ツバクロ残土置き場を認めない方針を示し、この問題はこじれた。 これを受けて、2023年8月3日に開催された地質構造・水資源専門部会で、塩坂邦雄委員(株式会社サイエンス技師長)が「下流域に影響を及ぼすリスク(危害・損害などに遭う高い可能性)」を問題提起した。 さらに、「広域的な複合リスク」として、多発的な土石流が発生するリスクや斜面崩壊の発生リスクもあるとした。 専門部会はツバクロ残土置き場の位置選定に問題があるという意見で一致した。 ところが、川勝知事がことし5月に辞職したことで大きく潮目が変わった。 昨年8月以来、これまで残土置き場に関する議論は行われていなかったが、ほぼ1年後に開かれた9月6日の専門部会で、静岡県はJR東海のツバクロ残土置き場計画をそのままあっさりと認めたのだ。 川勝知事の退場によって、県の姿勢が180度変わったことになる。 いくら専門部会が科学的・工学的な議論を行っているといっても、実際は、いかに「政治」に左右されているかがわかる。 1 / 4ページ なぜ?「新一万円札は結婚式祝儀ダメ」行き過ぎたホワイト風潮に、竹田恒泰氏ら困惑「生きづらい」...

title: João Mendes: «Sinto-me muito feliz, fizemos um jogo enorme»
creator: online@record.pt (Record)
content: João Mendes cumpriu os primeiros 90 minutos completos da temporada com uma exibição determinante para a conquista do triunfo ( 2-0 ) do V. Guimarães no terreno do Sp. Braga. Depois de alguns problemas físicos, o influente médio foi titular, marcou e esteve nos melhores momentos da equipa. "Sinto-me muito feliz, fizemos um jogo enorme. A nossa estratégia funcionou, fomos inteligentes, uma verdadeira equipa, aproveitámos os erros do Sp. Braga e estivemos muito bem", começou por dizer João Mendes à Sport TV, destacando essencialmente a exibição na 2a parte. "Marcámos e a expulsão ainda ajudou um pouco, mas podíamos ter feito o terceiro golo. Por isso, o resultado é justíssimo", sublinhou. Relacionadas Sp. Braga-V.
